Iran: Firaisan-kina amin'ireo gadra mitokona tsy mihinan-kanina ||| Iran: Solidarity with Hunger Striking Prisoners
Nisy ireo fihetsiketsehana nokarakaraina nanerana ny tanàna 25 fara-faha keliny maneran-tany ny Sabotsy 25 Jona 2011, mba hanehoana ny firaisan-kina amin'ireo gadra politika miisa 18 eo ho eo izay mitokona tsy mihinan-kanina any amina fonja Iraniana roa. ||| Protests were organized in at least 25 cities around the world on Saturday June 25, 2011, to show solidarity with the approximately 18 political prisoners who are on hunger strike at two Iranian prisons.
Natombok'ireo gadra politika izany fitokonan'ny hanoanana izany tamin'ny fahafatesan'ny mafana fo ara-politika roa, Reza Hoda Saber sy Haleh Sahabi. ||| The prisoners began their hunger strikes to protest the death of two political activists, Reza Hoda Saber and Haleh Sahabi.
Nofaranany tamin'ny takarivan'ny Alahady izany fitokonana tsy hihinan-kanina izany. ||| They finished their hunger strike on Sunday evening.
Ny Hetsi-Panoherana Maitso dia nandefa antso ao amin'ny Facebook mba hanaovana fihetsiketsehina maneran-tany: ||| The Green Protest Campaign has launched a Facebook call to protest worldwide:
Ny Hetsi-panoherana Maitso dia manambara ny fanokafana ny "fifadian-kanina politika" mandritry ny herinandro manomboka ny Alahady 19 2011, mitaky ny fanamelohana mafy kokoa ny famonoana an'i Haleh Sahabi sy Hoda Saber. ||| The Green Protest Campaign announces the launch of a "Political Fast" for a period of one week beginning Sunday June 19th, 2011 aiming to further condemn the killings of Haleh Sahabi and Hoda Saber.
Ankoatra izay, ny 25 Jona dia hotanterahina manerana ny tanàn-dehibe maneran-tany ny hetsiky ny "Onja Mainty", manohitra ireo famonoana tsy ara-drariny ireo sy ny fitohizan'ny fanitsakitsahana ny zon'olombelona ataon'ny Repoblika Islamikan'Iran. ||| Furthermore, on June 25th "Black Wave" sit-ins will be held in major cities around the world, protesting these unjust killings and the continuation of human right violations by the Islamic Republic of Iran.
Ireo fihetsiketsehina dia natao tany amina tanàna 25 fara fahakeliny tahaka an'i Ankara, Tiorkia London, United Kingdom, ary Oslo, Norway. ||| The demonstrations were held in at least 25 cities such as Ankara, Turkey London, United Kingdom, and Oslo, Norway.
Ny bilaogy Nehzatsabz dia manoratra fa maro ireo mpangataka ny fiarovana any Tiorkia nanao fihetsiketsehina tany Ankara. ||| Nehzatsabz blog writes that several asylum seekers in Turkey held a demonstration in Ankara.
Namoaka sary maro tamin'ity fihetsiketsehina ity io bilaogy io. ||| The blog has published several photos of this demonstration.
Manoratra i Thavolesabz fa nizara voninkazo fotsy ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana ho fahatsiarovana an'i Hale Sahabi sy Hoda. ||| Thavolesabz writes that protesters distributed white flowers in rememberance of Hale Sahabi and Hoda Saber among people.
Nampiseho ny sarin'ireo mpiitokona tsy nihinan-kanina ihany koa ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana. ||| Protesters held photos of the hunger strikers.
Mohammad Mostafai, mpahay lalàna momba ny zon'olombelona izay nitsoaka an'Iran, dia miteny ao amin'ny lahatsary (eto ambany) fa niharatsy ny toe-pahasalaman'ireo mpitokona tsy nihinan-kanina: ||| Mohammad Mostafai, a human rights lawyer who fled Iran, says in the video (below) that the health conditions of those under hunger strike has deteriorated:
Renay ny feon'izy ireo ary tianay ho henon'izao tontolo izao... Isan'ora izahay dia maheno vaovao ratsy foana mikasika ny fampijaliana sy fampidirana am-ponja mandritra ny fotoana lava mihatra amin'ireo gadra politika any Iran. ||| We heard their voice and we want to make the world hear this... Every hour we hear bad news about torture and long prison sentences for political prisoners in Iran.
Global Voices teny Espaniola Mpitsara fifaninanana fanaovan-gazety Bottup ||| Global Voices in Spanish on jury for Bottup citizen journalism award
Manaiky ny fisoratana handray anjara amin'ny fifaninanana fanaovan-gazety andiany faharoa hatramin'ny faha-15 marsa ho avy izao ny vohikalam-panaovan-gazety Espaniola Bottup. ||| The Spanish citizen journalism site Bottup is accepting entries to the II Citizen Journalist Award until March 15.
Hotondroina ho "Solontena manokan'" ny Bottup ary homena loka fandehanana maimai-poana any amin'izay toerana rehetra tiany hanaovana fanadihadiana (€1800 farafahabeny) izay mandresy amin'izany. ||| The winner will be named a "Special Correspondent" of Bottup and will be awarded free travel to any destination from where they would like to report (max 1,800 Euros).
Tafiditra ho anisan'ny mpitsara hifantina izay homena ny loka amin'izany ny tonian'ny Global Voices teny Espaniola, Juan Arellano avy any Però. ||| Editor of Global Voices in Spanish, Juan Arellano from Peru, will be joining the jury that selects the winner.
Afa-mandray anjara amin'izany avokoa ny avy amin'ny firenena miteny espaniola rehetra. ||| Spanish-speakers from any country can participate.
Misoratra anarana ho olo-tsotra manao gazety miaraka amin'ny Bottup fotsiny ianao dia mametraka vaovao (tantaraina) amin'ny endrika rehetra tianao ampitàna azy(lahatsoratra, lahatsary, sary, sns). ||| You simply have to register as a citizen journalist with Bottup and submit a news story in any format (text, video, images, etc).
Hanitsy ny tantara ny ekipan'ny Bottup raha misy ny lafiny tsy maintsy hanaovana izany ("fanamarinana, fanamarihana, fanitsiana ary fampivelarana") ary hamoaka izany ho hitan'ny besinimaro. ||| The Bottup Newsroom will edit the story if necessary ("contrasting, verification, correction and widening") and publish it.
Izay tantara rehetra tafavoaka ao amin'ny Bottup mialoha ny 15 Marsa 2010 no mandray anjara ho azy ao amin'ny fifaninanana. ||| All news stories published on Bottup before March 15, 2010, will automatically be entered in the competition.
jerena manontolo ato ny andinindininy rehetra momba izany (teny Espaniola). ||| You can consult the complete documentation here (in Spanish).
Zava-tsy rariny ve no tiana hotantaraina? ||| Want to report a grave injustice?
Sa famintinana momba ny sarimihetsika nojerenao farany? ||| Or write a review of the last movie you saw?
Ny tanjon'ny fifaninanana hanaovan'olo-tsotra gazety dia ny hampiroborobo endrika famoahan-javamisy vaovao izay miainga avy eny anivon'ny sarambambe, vokarin'olo-tsotra ary iasan'ny mpanao gazety matihanina amin'izany. ||| The purpose of the Citizen Journalist Awards is to promote a new model of information-from the ground up, produced by citizens and worked on by professional journalists.
Tamin'ny andiany voalohany tamin'ity fifaninanana fanaovan-gazety avy amin'olo-tsotra Bottup ity tamin'ny 2008 moa dia telo no nahazo ny loka tamin'ireo sokajy samihafa, nofantenina avy tamin'ny mpandray anjara miisa 214. ||| In the first edition of the Bottup citizen journalism award in 2008, there were three winners in different categories, selected from 214 participating news stories.
Nahazo ny loka tamin'izany i Ágata Mata Bermúdez avy any Málaga izay namoaka lahatsoratra La Iglesia: comunión y celíacos. ||| The winners were Ágata Mata Bermúdez from Málaga who won with the article La Iglesia: comunión y celíacos.
Inona no eritreretin ny Koreana amin ny toe-draharaha any Myanmar? ||| How do Koreans think about the Myanmar situation?
Mahaliana fa hitan ny mpibilaogy ho mifandraika amin ny tantaran i ||| Interestingly, many bloggers strongly feel an attachment to this situation and link it to Korean history.
ireo mpibilaogy izay efa niainan-dry zareo tany ny taona 1980 tany ho any ny zavamisy ao ||| The Myanmar situation reminded some bloggers of their own experiences in the 1980s of Korea.
Lasa manana toerana manokana ho ahy i Burma na antsoiko hoe Myanmar hatramin'ny nahatany amin'ny sekoly ambony ahy. ||| Burma has become a special place since I called Myanmar as Burma in high school.
Tsapako ho tahaka ireo nitolona ho amin'ny fahaleovantena Koreana aho ireo mpitolona ho amin'ny fahaleovantena tany Japana, Shina, Manditsoria ary Amerika nandritra ny fanajanahantany Japoney mahita ireo Birmana mihetsiketsika ho amin'ny fampanjakana ny demokrasia... ||| Looking at Burmese working in a strange place, Korea, and fighting for democratization, I felt that I am likely looking at Korean independent activists for the nation's independence in Japan, China, Manchuria, and America during the Japanese colonization period....
Ary ankehitriny.Sivily sy mpanokatena Bodista eo ho eo amin ny 100.000 eo ho eo no mivondrona ao anaty fihetsiketsehana tsy mampiasa herisetra manohitra ny fitondrana miaramila ary dia misy ny maty sy ny maratra noho ny famoretana avy amin ny governemanta Birmana. ||| And today. In a land which is not strange for them anymore, they must have complicated thoughts looking at their land, which they can't go to now.
Ao amin ny firenena tsy manavahiny azy intsony, mety efa ho hafa mihitsy ny ao an eritreriny ao raha mijery ny firenena (Myanmar) tsy ahafahany miala izy.Ankehitriny, mahatsiaro ny herisetra sy ny fandripahana tao Kwanju (Korea) tamin ny taona 1980 aho mijery ny fihetsiketsehana, ny herisetra hamongorana izany ary ny famonoana hita lany. ||| Today, observing the demonstrations, violent suppression, and massacre, I feel that I go back to Kwanju in May, 1980 and look back at violence and massacre.
Miantso ny mpibilaogy hafa koa aza ny Sasany amin izy ireo mba hanohana ireo Birmana mpanao fihetsiketsehana. ||| Some of them actively appeal to other bloggers to join supports for Burmese demonstrators.
Avy amin i Jung Beom-Rae mipetraka any Myanmmar ireto sary ireto. ||| Photos here are from Jung Beom-Rae who stays in Myanmmar.
Tapaka moa ny aterineto any, ka tsy afa-mandefa vaovao matetika izy. ||| Currently the internet is disconnected there and, so, he can't send information everytime.
Niangavy ahy izy mba haseho ireo sary ireo. ||| He asked me to put these photos up.
Mampahery ny Birmana ny mpibilaogy hafa toa an i Indofantazy raha mampahatsiahy indray izay nataony tamin ny fotoana nitolomany ihany koa. ||| Some bloggers like Indofantazy console Burmese through their experiences and reminisce about their own struggling time.
Mampientanentana ny fitolomana ho amin ny demokrasia. ||| Democratization is a funny time.
Miaina ao anaty tontolo voretra anjakan ny kisoa tsy mety voky sy mpamotika ny demokrasia isika.Mbola mahatsiaro ny fahataitairako aho tamin ny andro voalohany nandehanako nilahatra. ||| We live in a dirty world where pig-like developers pursue their greed and destroy democratization. I still remember the nervousness of the first day when I went for a demonstration.
Tsy hohadinoiko ny taona 1991 fony feno mpilahatra i Jongro, i Euljiro, ary i Kwanghwamun. ||| I can't forget the sky in 1991 where Jongro, Euljiro, and Kwanghwamun were full of demonstrators.
Tsy maintsy miandry ny amin ny enina ora hariva ny olon-drehetra hampidinana ny sainam-pirenena ao anaty fahanginana. Ary na dia anaty fijerena fampisehoana aza dia tsy maintsy mitsangana avokoa rehefa mandre ny hiram-pirenena. ||| Every 6 pm, all civilians had to wait for the moment to bring down the national flag with dumb faces and even in the theater, all people had to stand up at the time of the national anthem.
Raha hanomana fihetsiketsehana izahay, dia samy nihaodihaody miafin endrika manodidina an i Dongdaemun, Myeongdong, ary Euljiro ka misy iray mitarika dia manaraka avy hatrany ny rehetra dia manomboka ny fihetsiketseham-panoherana. ||| In order to have a demonstration, we individually had to walk around Dongdaemun, Myeongdong, and Euljiro with disguise and one person started leading, others joined him (or her) to start the demonstration.
Izany no nataonay na dia nanana fahalalahana hanao fivoriana sy hanangana fikambanana aza izahay, tena halako izany vaninandro izany. ||| Even though we had the freedom of organizing meetings and associations, I extremely despise that time.
Myanmar aho Na dia handromba-pahefana indray aza ny miaramila ary tsy hiraharaha ny tolona ankehitriny, ny tantara dia mbola hitsara araka ny rariny amin ny fotoana ho avy tsy vitsy ny mpiblaogy no nitsikera ny sabakam-pihetsiky ny governemanta Koreana ||| Not a few bloggers criticize the ambigious attitude of the Korean government.
Koa raha te-hampanjaka ny fandriampahalemana tokoa izy reo, Nahoana no mangina manoloana izao fanahim-biby izao? ||| Rangoon, Myanmmar and Seoul, Republic of Korea.
Japana: Nodimandry i Kazuo Ohno, fanta-daza amin'ny Butoh ||| Japan: Butoh Legend Kazuo Ohno Passes Away
Kazuo Ohno, manan-talenta fanta-daza ary iray amin'ireo ray mpamorona ny Butoh, dia nodimandry tamin'ny 1 Jona teo amin'ny faha-103 taonany. ||| Kazuo Ohno, legendary performer and one of the founding fathers of Butoh, passed away on June 1st at the age of 103.
Ampahany amin'ny tantaram-piainany nomen'ny Kazuo Ohno Dance Studio ||| A quote from his bio provided by the Kazuo Ohno Dance Studio
Rehefa mandihy izy dia mampitombo hery ny tenany ihany. ||| When he dances, he vitalizes himself.
Tonga olona mpanome hery ny hafa ilay lahiantitra iray toy ny olon-drehetra ihany. ||| An ordinary old man becomes a somebody who gives power to others.
Izany no antony itiavan'ny olona mifanerasera amin'i Kazuo. ||| People love to encounter Kazuo because of that.
Niaina fotoana ela izy, ary nanohina mafy ny atifon'ny olona. ||| He lives long, he moves people deeply.
Kazuo Ohno dia mpanakanto izay nampitombo ny fahefa-manaon'ny olombelona. ||| Kazuo Ohno is an artist who has enlarged human potential.
Ny Butoh dia dihy fiomanana niforona tany Japana taorian'ny Ady Lehibe Faharoa, miavaka amin'ny fandokoana ny vatana ho fotsy sy ireo fihetsika maneho hevitra sy fijaliana. ||| Butoh is an avant-garde dance form that originated in post World War II Japan, characterized by white body paint and conceptual, tortured movements.
Ity manaraka ity dia horonantsary avy amin'ny "Beauty and Power" antsoina hoe "Talanjona manoloana an'i La Argentina". ||| This is a clip from "Beauty and Power" called "Admiring La Argentina".
Notarihan'ilay lehilahy iray hafa namorona ny Butoh, Tatsumi Hijikata ary naseho voalohany tamin'ny 1977, ity tantara ity dia fanomezam-boninahitra an'ilay mpandihy Espaniola Antonia Mercé (fantatra amin'ny hoe "La Argentina"), izay nojeren'i Ohno an-tsehatra tamin'ny 1929 fony izy vao 22 taona. ||| Directed by fellow Butoh founder Tatsumi Hijikata and premiered in 1977, the piece is a tribute to the Spanish dancer Antonia Mercé (known as "La Argentina"), whom Ohno saw on stage in 1929 when he was 22.
Maro ireo nahatsiaro ny fotoana nahitany an'i Ohno mandihy sy ny nanamarika azy ireo tamin'izany. ||| Many reflected on the times they had seen Ohno perform and how it impacted them.
Michiko Murayama ao amin'ny blaogy True Colors, tamin'izy nahita voalohany an'i La Argentina, am-polontaonany maro lasa izay: ||| Michiko Murayama at the True Colors blog, on the first time she saw La Argentina, several decades ago:
Nalalaka ara-panahy sy ara-batana tanteraka izy hampiasainy hifanakalozana hery tsy hita maso amin'ireo mpanatrika azy, ary tsy tanako intsony fa dia nikakakaka aho. ||| He had a completely liberated soul and body on hand to exchange unseen energy with the audience, and I couldn't help but laugh out loud.
Tena nahafinaritra aoka izany ny nijery azy nanatanteraka tamim-pahaizana ireo fifandridrana mendri-piderana. ||| Watching him play so masterfully with the interaction was absolutely glorious.
Toa niparitaka teny amin'ny habaka rehetra teny ny fiombonan'ny vatana sy ny fanahy ho iray, tsy voakitiky ny fahamatorana mihitsy, ary tsapa ho feno fahalalahana tokoa izany. ||| The fusion of body and soul seemed to stretch endlessly to space, untouched by any kind of seriousness, and it felt so free.
Nandritra izany fotoana izany, nikaon-doha andro aman'alina aho tamin'ny famoronana dihy miaraka amin'ireo mpandihy namako, niezaka ny hahita sehatra vaovao. ||| During this period, I was spending my days and nights absorbed in creating dance pieces with my fellow dancers, trying to break new ground.
Rehefa mangetaheta fanovàna ny olona iray, tsy mahagaga raha mipoitra ny tahotra sy ny fisalasalàna. ||| When a person thirsts for change, it is natural for feelings of fear and uncertainty to surface.
Fotoana toy izany no nanatrehanay ny fampisehoany, ary tsaroako fa fatratra loatra ny hafaliako nony nandao ny teatra aho, nahazo herim-po sy fahavitrihana tsy manam-petra. ||| We chanced upon his performance at a time like this, and I remember that we left the theater elated, having received endless courage and energy.
Mitanisa ireo zava-niainany koa i koyu, mpilalao fototra, ary mamintina: ||| Base player koyu also lists his experiences and concludes:
Araka izay efa nosoratako foana tany aloha, ny butoh dia endrika kanto izay aingam-panahy nanampy ahy tamin'ny asa famoronako manokana.Ohno Sensei, misaotra sy mankasitraka anao tamin'ireny taona maro ireny. ||| As I've written many times before, butoh is a form of art that has been a guiding inspiration to my own creative work. Ohno Sensei, thank you so much for the many years.
Tsy tanjaka no nasehony tamin'ny vatany fa ny fanonjan'ny fanahy sy ny fo vita amin'ny felam-boninkazo. ||| With his body, he expressed not strength but the wavering of the spirit and how the heart is made up of petals.
Ny fanahy malemy mihitsy no asehon'ny fahanterany sy ny vatany mikentrokentrona. ||| His aging, wrinkly body was the delicate soul itself.
Kengo Nakamura dia namoaka sary mahafinaritra vitsivitsy misy an'i Ohno nandritra ny filalaovana an-tsehatra ilay tantaran'i Yukio Nakagawa, "Hadalàn'ny voninkazo" tamin'ny 2003. ||| Kengo Nakamura posted some gorgeous shots of Ohno in Yukio Nakagawa's outdoor performance piece "Craze of Flowers" in 2003.
Tamin'ny fitsingerenan'ny faha-100 taonany, mpaka sary 47 izay voasarika manokana sy voafaritra taminy mihitsy aza na ahoana na ahoana, no niara-niasa nanao fampirantiana sary mitondra ny lohateny hoe "Kazuo Ohno araka ny firaketana an-tsary nataon'ireo mpakasary". ||| For his 100th birthday, 47 photographers who were inspired and in some ways even defined by him, put together a photo exhibition titled "Kazuo Ohno as caught on film by photographers".
Ny komity dia notarihan'i Eikoh Hosoe, andry iankinan'ny tontolon'ny fakàna sary maoderina Japoney. ||| The committee was headed by Eikoh Hosoe, a pillar of modern Japanese photography.
Na dia taorian'ny nampalemy azy aza dia mbola nahita fomba hanehoany hevitra foana i Ohno amin'ny fampiasàna ireo tànany sy ny tratrany: ||| Even after he lost mobility, Ohno found ways to express himself using his arms and torso:
Costa Rica: Nampihitsoka ny olom-pirenena sy ny mpitsidika ny Horohorontany 6.2 ||| Costa Rica: 6.2 Earthquake leaves nationals and tourists stranded
Nasehon'ny sehatra famahanana madinidnika Twitter indray ny halakin'ny vaovao aely manerantany, ka ny tranga eto dia ny horohorontany 6.2 izay tsapa nanerana an'i Costa Rica iray manontolo, nanana ny ivony tao Vara Blanca, 35 Km miala ny renivohitr'i San Jose. ||| Once again, the Twitter microblogging platform has proven to be an exceptional way to efficiently move news across the globe, in this case, related to the 6.2 Earthquake that was felt throughout Costa Rica, with the epicenter in Vara Blanca only 35 Km away from the capital city of San José.
Nivoaka ny trano fiasana avokoa ny olona tao an-drenivohitra sy ny tao amin'ny vohitra mpifanila vody rindrina tao Alajuela sy Heredia tao aorian'ny hotakotaka, toy izany koa ireo polisy nanakana ny arabe tao afovoan-tanàna noho ny ahiahy hianjeran'ny trano efa antitra. ||| After the strong tremor, people in the capital city and neighboring towns of Alajuela and Heredia, stayed outside their office buildings, as police closed off streets in downtown areas fearing that old buildings would collapse.
Tamin'ny alalan'ny Twitter no ahitantsika ny tatitra voalohany ny horohorontany izay nosoratan'ny Reiterstahl voafehy anaty teny iray ho fahatsapana ny hovitrovitra: HOVITRA!!!!!. ||| With twitter we saw the first report of the earthquake as Reiterstahl wrote a single word as the tremor was felt: TEMBLOR!!!!!!.
Vetivety dia niely sy nanjaka avy amin'ny Twitter ny marika "Cr" sy "Temblor" La Nacion hojerena ny olona, mamaky sy mamaly izay voalazan'ny vohikala. ||| The reports via twitter and the tags "Cr" and "Temblor" quickly dominated. After the quake, telephone lines became jammed, and electricity was cut off in several areas of the city for a few hours.
Loharanom-baovao hafa ihany koa ny an'ny mpanao gazety Amerliarueda izay manana kaonty ao Twitter ka mamoaka ny vaovao amina toe-javatra mahatsiravina tahaka itony amin'izay olona mifandray aminy. ||| People with family and friends in the affected areas had to depend on alternative information sources such as the CoverItLive live-blogging application that the La Nacion newspaper has kept available for people to access, read and respond after their website came down. Other alternative news sources were journalist Ameliarueda who kept the Twitter account buzzing with insider news on dramatic situations as people contacted her.
Ao amin'ny Peace Lodge sy zaridainan'ny riandranon'i La Paz dia 200 farafahakeliny ny mpiasa sy mpitsidika nihitsoka sy tssy afa-nifandray tamin'ny hafa tao La Paz Peace Lodge sy ny zaridainan'i riandrano izay potika tanteraka araka ny nolazain'ny mpiasa iray nifandray tamin'I Amelia Rueda na dia tsy nisy aza ny aina nafoy. ||| In the touristic area of La Paz Waterfall Gardens, at least 200 employees and about 200 other visitors and tourists were trapped and isolated at the La Paz Peace Lodge and Waterfall gardens, which according to an employee who communicated with Amelia Rueda, was completely destroyed, although no people died.
Azonao henoina sy vakiana tsara ireo fanadihadiana momba io horohoron-tany io ao amin'ny blaogin'i Amelia, ary koa ny tatitra farany momba ireo helikoptera tsy miankina naka vola mitentina mba hamonjena azy ireo hiala ny toerana iharan'ny loza. ||| You can hear the audio and read an account of the earthquake at Amelia's blog, as well as later reports of private helicopters charging tourists about for taking them away from disaster areas.
Fusildechispas kosa mampahalala aoao antsika ao amin'ny twitter-ny sy ny blaoginy ihany koa, izay mampiandravandra antsika amin'ny alalan'ny horonan-tsary ny fahapotehan'ny tranoiray ao afovoan-tanànan'i San Jose ||| Fusildechispas also kept us well informed through his twitter account as well as his blog, pointing us to this citizen media video of damages to a house in downtown San José.
Ivelan'ny vohitra, akaiky ny tanan'ny Vara Blanca, Poasito, Cinchona sy Fraijanes, dia voalaza fa namoizana tovovavy anankiroa sy fianakaviana iray miisa olona dimy ny fihotsahan'ny tany, ary ahiahiana rehefa miposaka ny masoandro dia ho betsaka ireo faty mety ho hita. ||| Outside the city, near the towns of Vara Blanca, Poasito, Cinchona and Fraijanes, landslides have already claimed the lives of two young girls and a family of five, and it is suspected that tomorrow, as day breaks, more deadly victims will be found.
Betsaka ny fahasimbana, toy ireo trano mijoalajoala nianjera, ny arabe izay nanjavona noho ny fihotsahan'ny tany ka nety nanototra fiara, fiarakaretsaka ary trano. ||| Material damage is substantial, as buildings collapsed, and many roads dissapeared in landslides that may have taken with them cars, buses and houses.
Nitondra safo-drano ho an'ny renirano ihany koa ny horohoron-tany noho ny fotaka sy ny fako isan-karazany (matiere organique) nivarina tao anatiny. ||| The earthquake also brought flooding down the river banks as a result of so much dirt and organic matter falling into them.
Mbola sarotra ny haminavina ireo fahasimbana avy amin'ny horohoron-tany sy ny safo-drano ary ny fihotsahan'ny tany araka ny filazan'ny vokovoko mena Kostarikana. ||| In total, the damage caused by the earthquake, flooding and landslides is still impossible to predict according to the Costa Rican Red Cross.
Efa nametraka saritany Google mampiseho ireo tatitra momba ny fahasimbana i JaguardelPlatanar. ||| has been keeping a google-map marked with damage reports.
Mba hijerana ny saritany farany, dia tsindrio eto azafady. ||| To view the updated map please click here.
mpikirakira maro dia maro tao amin'ny YouTube ihany koa ireo horantsary voaray avy amin'ny Televiziona mba hanomezana fampahafantarana ho an'ny hafa izay tsy afaka mahita fantsona (canal) avy ao anatin'ny televiziona izay misy ny toe-javatra taterina. ||| Video captures from TV have also been uploaded on YouTube by many different users in an attempt to inform many others who don't have access to the television channels where the situation is being reported.
Voavinaviana fa rahampitso satria mbola ho hita ny fiantraikan'ny voina dia ho betsaka ny fiara sy ny trano ho tsikaritra ny fahapotehany ary ho maro kokoa ny isan'ny niharan-doza fantatra. ||| It is expected that tomorrow, as aftershocks continue and more destroyed houses and cars are found, that the victim toll will rise.
Fanampiny: Peace Lodge sy La Paz Waterfall Gardens, manazava nkokoa ny mombamomba ny trano fandraisam-bahiny mihaja. ||| Edited to add: Cindy Banks, the owner of Peace Lodge and La Paz Waterfall Gardens sent me an email clarifying some of the information regarding the lodge.
Tsy simba akory ny trano, nieren-doza ireo biby ary manantena izy ireo fa hiverina amin'ny laoniny sy hihatsara izany afaka volana vitsivitsy. ||| The lodge was not destroyed, the animals all survived and they hope to be back up and running in a few months.
Soa ihany fa tsy nisy aina nafoy tao amin'ny tranom-bahinin'izy ireo ary ny kitro-tongotra folaka no ratra hita hoe ratsy indrindra. ||| Luckily no lives were lost at their hotel and the worst injury from the quake was a broken ankle.
Nomarihany ihany koa fa na dia hoe tsara vitana aza izy dia maro ireo fianakaviana no very trano sy havana teo amin'ny mpiray monina ary mametraka zotra ao amin'ny tranokalany izy ireo mikasika ny fanomezana azonao omena ireto fianakaviana tra-boina ireto. ||| She also mentions that even though they were very lucky, many families lost their homes and family members in the neighboring communities and they are setting up a link for donations for these families at their website.
Global Voices Podcast: Teknolojia hanomezan-kery bebe kokoa ny vehivavy! ||| Global Voices Podcast: Technology that Empowers!
Miarahaba ny Tontolo! ||| Hello world!
Amin'ity andiany Global Voices podcast na fandraisam-peo ity isika no handre ny fomba fampiasan'ny vehivavy any Ejipta ny teknolojia hiadiana amin'ny fanorisorenana, sy izay ataon'ny tonia sy mpanoratra ao amin'ny Global Voices ao amin'ny Fetiben'ny Mozilla ao Londres. ||| In this edition of the Global Voices podcast you can hear how women in Egypt are using technology to fight harassment, and what our Global Voices authors and editors got up to at the Mozilla Festival in London.
Homarihantsika ihany koa ny Andro manerantany iadiana amin'ny Sida amin'ny fanomezana fitenenana ireo mpikatroka momba ny resaka VIH/SIDA any Kenya sy Ejipta momba ny asa manokana ataon'izy ireo. ||| We also mark World Aids Day by speaking to HIV/AIDS activists in Kenya and Egypt about the special work they do.
Teknolojia hanomezan-kery bebe kokoa ny vehivavy ||| Technology to empower women
Ny mpanoratra ao amin'ny Global Voices, Maria Grabowski Kjær no nifampitafatafa tamin'i Engy momba ny asam-piarovana ny vehivavy eny ankalamanjana. ||| Global Voices author, Maria Grabowski Kjær spoke to Engy about her work in support of women's safety and comfort in public.
Andro manerantany iadiana amin'ny Sida ny voalohany volana Desambra. ||| December 1st is World Aids Day.
Fotoana ieritreretana ireo olona maro miaina miaraka amin'ny VIH na ny SIDA sy ny iheverana ny azo atao hanohanana azy ireny sy ny asany. ||| A time to think about the many people who living with HIV or AIDS and consider what can be done to support them and their carers.
Nifampitafa tamin'olona anankiroa miasa mafy tokoa ho fanatsarana ny toe-javamisy sy ny fanentanana momba ny lohahevitra aho. ||| I had a chat with a two people working hard to improve conditions and raise awareness.
Efa niasa tamin'ny Fandrindram-pianakaviana ao Kairo sy ny Fikambanam-pampandrosoana izy ary ao amin'ny Fandraisan-tanana Ejipsiana Momba ny Zon'ny Tsirairay amin'izao fotoana izao. ||| He has worked with Cairo Family Planning and Development Association and is now with the Egyptian Initiative for Personal Rights.
Miresaka momba ny holatra sy ny sakantsakana ateraky ny Fitroarana any Ejipta amin'izao fotoana izao amin'ny fanohanana ireo fiaraha-monina tandindonin-doza. ||| He talks about stigma and how the current uprising in Egypt is actually hindering support for communities at risk.
dia mpikatroka ao amin'ny fiaraha-monina, mpamaham-bolongana, mpanoratra ary solontenan'ny World Pulse. ||| is a community activist, blogger, author, and World Pulse correspondent.
Mpiara-manorina fikambanam-behivavy anankiroa izy, Andraikitry ny Vehivavy Tambanivohitra Jacolo Manoloana ny VIH/SIDA sy ny Hetsika Miabo ho amin'ny Fiovana. ||| She is co-founder of two women's organizations, Jacolo Rural Women Response to HIV/AIDS, and Positive Action for Change.
Mpandray anjara amin'ny tetikasa "Miabo Famahanam-bolongana" ao amin'ny Rising Voices ihany koa izy. ||| She is also a participant in the "Blogging Positively" project of Rising Voices.
Niresaka taminy momba ny rafi-pitsaboana keniana sy ny fanantenany amin'ny ampitso izahay. ||| We talked to her about the Kenyan health care system and her hopes for the future.
Afaka miditra an-tsehatra ao amin'ny Miabo Famahanam-bolongana ihany koa ianao raha liana amin'ny fampitam-baovaon'olotsotra mifandraika amin'ny VIH/SIDA. ||| You too can be involved with Blogging Positively if you're interested in citizen media related to HIV/AIDS.
Raha ao amin'ny Twitter ianao amin'ny andro iraisampirenena iadiana amin'ny Sida, ampiasao ny tenifototra "BlogPos" mba hahitanay anao. ||| If you're on Twitter for World Aids Day, use the hashtag "BlogPos" so we can find you.
Momba ny Global Voices sy ny manodidina azy ||| Global Voices out and about
Nandray ny fetiben'ny Mozilla "media, fahafahana ary ny web" tamin'ny Novambra i Londres. ||| London was host to the Mozilla Festival on "media, freedom, and the web" in November.
Voasolon-tenan'ny ekipa mahay ao amin'ny Siansa Madio ny Global Voices. ||| Global Voices was represented by an awesome team at the Science Fair.
Amin'izao ekipa mahafinaritra avy amin'ny GV tafatoby amin'ny toerana iray izay dia tsy maintsy nanontany azy ireo amin'ny antony ijoroany eny tsirairay avy aho. ||| With so much GV goodness in one place, I had to ask them what they were up to.
Emma Brewin moa no Tonia Lefitry ny Fandaminana ny vaantseraseranay. ||| Emma Brewin is our Deputy Editor of citizen media organization.
Marta Cooper indray dia mpanoratra ao amin'ny Ekipan'ny Global Voices. ||| Marta Cooper is an author who is also on the Board of Global Voices.
Paula Goes indray no Tonian'ny fiteny marolafy izay nampiseho mpiara-miasa iray nandritra ny fotoana tamin'ny alalan'ny lahatsary nampitaina mivantana. ||| Paula Goes is our Multilingual editor who was showing a colleague around the event via a live video connection.
Amira angamba no mpitafatafa tanora indrindra ato amin'ny Global Voices podcast ao anatin'ny faha-10 taonany. ||| Amira is possibly the youngest interviewer so far on the Global Voices podcast at 10 years old.
Izy no nifampitafatafa tamin'ny mpanoratra Irakiana Salam Adil. ||| She interviewed our Iraq author Salam Adil.
Eny ary, izay no azonay naisina ho amin'ity laharana Global Voices fandraisam-peo ity. ||| Well, that's all we can squeeze into this edition of the Global Voices Podcast.
Mankasitraka anareo rehetra tamin'ny fihainoana ary ankasitrahana ihany koa izay nandray anjara sy nifampitafatafana rehetra. ||| Thank you all for listening and thanks to all of our contributors and interviewees.
Hiverina eto indray izahay amin'ny volana ambony fa azonao atao hatrany ny mandalondalo any amin'ny sehatry ny valantserasera tahaka ny Twitter na ny Facebook sy mba miarahaba! ||| We'll be back next month but you can always drop by on any of our social media spaces like Twitter or Facebook and say hi!
Ao anatin'ity fandraisam-peo ity ianao dia maheno mozika maro anaty zo Creative Commons. ||| In the podcast you can hear lots of lovely Creative Commons music.
Raha te-hahalala bebe kokoa momba ireo artista ireo ianao dia indreto rohy ho anao. ||| If you want to find out more about these artists here are the links.
Isaorana i Orb Gettarr amin'ny fiverenana ato amin'ny atmosfera ny Kandidà Lemioran'i Atlanteana, i Mark Cotton amin'ny Fahatiarovana am-panahy, ny misongadina avy amin'i Superbus. ||| Thanks to Orb Gettarr for the atmospheric Return of the Atlanteans Lemurian Candidate, to Mark Cotton for his Spiritualized Homage, to Superbus feat.
Ny ankamaroan'ny hira moa dia hita ao amin'ny OpSound.Org, "The Free Music Archive" na nalaina mivantana tany amin'ny artista. ||| Most of the music was found via OpSound.Org, "The Free Music Archive" or direct from the artists.
Isaorana ihany koa ireo olona mahafinaritra nireaka sy ny hira izay mandravaka ny fandefasampeo mahatonga antsika ho tafaraikitra eto. ||| Thanks also to all of the wonderful voice over performances and clips that help to glue the podcast together.
Iran: Mpamafa Làlana Nahita 500.000 Dolara Amerikana Ka Namerina Izany Tamin'ny Tompony ||| Iran: Street Sweeper Finds and Returns $500,000
Lohateny vaventy miresaka kolikoly an-tapitrisa maro matetika no hitantsika miranty amin'ireo pejy voalohan'ny gazety Iraniana. ||| Headlines about multi-million dollar corruption often dance across the front pages of Iranian newspapers.
Tsy ela akory izay dia nisy vaovao mafàna mikasika hosoka lehibe taminà banky tao Iran, voalaza ho nataon'olona manao kopaka isasahana amin'ny governemanta. ||| There is currently hot news about Iran's biggest bank fraud, allegedly by people with ties to the government.
Saingy tampoka teo, singam-baovao tsara iray no namiratra tao Iran sy tany ivelan'ny firenena: Mpamafa làlana iray antsoina hoe Ahmad Rabani avy ao Bojnourd, 700km miala an'i Tehran, no nahita 1 lavitrisa Toman (eo amin'ny 570.000 dollars Amerikana eo) ary namerina izany tamin'ny tompony. ||| But all of a sudden a piece of positive news shined in Iran and outside country: A street sweeper named Ahmad Rabani from Bojnourd, 700km from Tehran, found 1 billion Toman (about $570,000 US dollars) and returned it to the owner.
Ho fisaorana azy, dia nomena 200.000 Toman (120 dollars Amerikana) izy ho valisoa. ||| As thanks, he received a 200,000 Toman ($120 US dollars) reward.
Ilay bilaogera iraniana Unirani dia nidera ilay mpamafa làlana sy niantso ny fihetsiny ho lesona iray ho an'ireo manampahefana eo amin'ny Repoblika Islamika voarohirohy aminà kolikoly. ||| Iranian blogger Unirani praises the street sweeper and calls his actions a lesson for Islamic Republic officials involved with corruption.
Hoy ilay bilaogera manoratra: ||| The blogger writes:
... lehilahy iray avy amin'ny sarangan'ny mpiasa sady mpikambana iray avy amin'ny kaominina no nahita 1 lavitrisa Toman tanaty kitapo iray ary namerina izany tamin'ny tompony. |||... a man from the working class and a member of the municipality found 1 billion Toman in a bag and returned it to its owner.
Takatsika tsara ny maha-mendrika ny fihetsiny raha fantatsika fa niaina tanaty fahantrana izy noho ny halalin'ny olana ara-toekarena misy eto amin'ny firenena. ||| We realize the worthiness of his actions when we learn he lived in poverty because of dire economic situation in country.
Raha amin'ny maha-olona dia azony natao ny nikepoka ilay vola, niala tamin'ny asany, ary dia tonga iray amin'ireny mpanefoefo ireny. ||| Naturally he could have kept the money, resigned from his job, and become one of these millionaires.
Saingy tsy nanao izany izy. ||| But he did not do it.
Aoka izany ho lesona ho an'ireo olona mpangalatra sy mpanao kolikoly izay mangalatra ny zavatra rehetra eto amin'ny firenena sy mahatonga ny olana ara-toekarena tsy misy farany eto noho ny politika maloto ataony. ||| Let that be a lesson to those thieves and corrupt people who steal everything in the country and with their impure policies that create endless economic difficulties.
Bilaogera iray hafa, Pesarirouni no manoratra mikasika ity tantara ity ary miteny hoe: ||| Another blogger, Pesarirouni writes about this story and says:
Mbola misy ny fahamendrehana... anatinà fotoana izay tsy hahaizan'ny mpirahalahy mifampitsinjo intsony... teraka tanaty fianakaviana avy amin'ny sarangan'ny mpiasa aho ary mahatsapa tsara ny olana rehetra atrehan'ireny olona ireny... Tena deraiko ny fahamendrehany, ary heverko fa tokony hahazo ny medalin'ny Voninahitra izy noho ny fihetsika nataony. ||| Dignity still exists... in a time when a brother has no mercy for a brother... I was born in a working class family and I can sympathise with all the difficulties these people face... I praise his dignity, and think he should get a medal of honor for his actions.
Deldel manoratra fa tsy maintsy nisedra fitsapàna oavana maro i Rabani talohan'ny hamerenana ilay vola, raha tombanany ho mitovy amin'ny karamanà mpamafa làlana mandritra ny 166 taona ilay izy. ||| Deldel writes that Rabani must have overcome big temptations to return the money, since he estimates the amount of money would equal 166 years of a street sweeper's salary.
Filipina: Mpanolotra Fahitalavitra Voahendrikendrika Ho Mampiasa Zaza Tsy Ampy Taona ||| Philippines: TV Host Accused of Child Exploitation
Niteraka kotaba indray ny mpanolotra fandaharana amin'ny fahitalavitra Willie Revillame avy any Filipina, tamin'ity indray mitoraka ity izy nandrangitra ireo olom-pirenena voakasika, izay nampiasa ny aterineto sy ny fampielezam-baovao sosialy handaminana ezaka hanoherana izay eritreretin-dry zareo ho fampiasàna zaza tsy ampy taona amin'ny fijerena mivantana fahitalavitra. ||| Controversial TV host Willie Revillame from the Philippines has once more stirred a hornet's nest, this time drawing the ire of concerned citizens who used the Internet and social media to organize efforts in addressing what they believe was a case of child exploitation on prime time TV.
Izany dia nitranga tamin'ny fandaharan-dalaony 'Willing Willie' tamin'ny 12 Martsa tao amin'ny tambajotran'ny TV5, nahitana zazalahy Filipiana 6 taona mpifaninana tamin'ny iray amin'ireo andian-dalao, izay mahazatra ny fanaovana hira na mandihy alohan'ny hanombohan'ny lalao. ||| The incident occurred on the March 12 airing of his game show 'Willing Willie' at TV5 network wherein a six-year-old Filipino boy was a contestant in one of the show segments where it was routine to do a song or dance performance before the game itself.
Rehefa nandeha ny hira hip-hop an'i Snoop Dogg, nanao dihy mandrangitra ity ankizilahy 6 taona, hoe maka tahaka ny fandihin'ny 'degany' any amin'ny toeram-pandihizana amin'ny alina ireny. ||| When a Snoop Dogg hip-hop tune was played, the 6-year-old boy did a provocative dance pretending to be a 'macho dancer' in a night club.
Toa tsy sarotiny tamin'izany dihy izany i Willie Revillame, izay tsy dia fahita loatra ataon'ny zaza tsy ampy taona, ary vao mainka aza nampirisika ny mpijery hitehaka an'ilay zazalahy. ||| Willie Revillame didn't appear to be bothered by the dance which is unusual to be performed by minors and instead he cheered on the audience to applaud the boy.
Nandritra izany dia nirotsaka nanaraka ny takolany ny ranomasony, noho izy namerina foana ilay dihin'ny degany isaky ny mandeha ilay hira. ||| All the while, tears were running down his cheeks as he repeated the macho dancer routine every time the song was played.
Definitely Filipino dia milaza fa fampiasana zaza tsy ampy taona izany tranga izany: ||| Definitely Filipino denounces the incident as child exploitation:
Fialam-boly ve izany? ||| This is entertainment?
Afa-baraka mihitsy ilay zazakely tamin'ny nanao izany tamin'ny voalohany, nefa nandihy im-betsaka ihany ary niaraka tamin'ny famporisihan'i Willie, ny tompon'andraikitra ary ny mpijery nanatrika mihitsy aza izany — ny sasany tamin'izy ireo dia latsa-dranomaso mihitsy noho ny fihomehezana. ||| The child was obviously humiliated the first time he had to do it, but performed the dance several times upon the inducement of Willie himself, his staff and with the encouragement of the people in audience — some of whom can be seen brought to tears in laughter.
Tsy mampihomehy mihitsy izany. ||| This is not funny at all.
Tokony natao hampisehoana ny ampahany 'talenta' amin'ity fifaninana ity fotsiny izany 'fisehoana an-tsehatra' izany, dia tokony nifarana teo. ||| The 'performance' should have been allowed only once to qualify for the 'talent' portion of the contest, and that should have been the end of it.
Nalàn'i Willie baraka ihany koa ny dadan'ity zazakely noho ny fananany trano fihetezana, ary toa notereny hamboraka ny fironan'ny rainy ara-pitiavana ihany koa ity zazalahy. ||| The child's father was also ridiculed by Willie for owning a parlor, seemingly trying to coerce the child into revealing the sexual orientation of his father.
Inona no mahadiso amin'ny fivelomana amin'ny fanapahana ny volon'ny hafa? ||| What is wrong with trying to make a decent living by cutting people's hair?
Na mahitsy, na mifanambady amin'ny mitovy aminy, dia maninona? ||| Straight or homosexual, so what
Dennis dia mino fa nihoa-pefy izy ary fotoana izao handraisan'ireo olom-pirenena andraikitra: ||| Dennis believes that a line has been crossed and it's time for concerned citizens to act:
Fotoana izao hijoroan'ireo izay nangin ary hilazana amin'ny teny mahitsy ny zavatra tsapany momba an'io fandaharan'ny fahitalavitra io. ||| It's time the silent majority stood up and stated in no uncertain terms exactly what it feels about the TV show.
Fotoana izao handàvana ny olo-malaza sy ny vondrona tompon'andraikitra ao amin'ny fahitalavitra tsy hibaiko antsika amin'ny tokony ho lalàna moralintsika. ||| It's time to refuse to let an egoistic celebrity and his misguided group of TV executives dictate what our moral standards should be.
Dennis Sy dia mitsara ny ray aman-drenin'ilay zaza noho ny nampianaran'izy ireo an-janany ity dihy mahamenatra: ||| Dennis Sy scores the kid's parents for teaching him the provocative dance:
Ho an'ny ray aman-drenin'ity zazalahy izay nivarotra an-janany tamin'ny fahitalavi-pirenena – henatra be izany. ||| For the parents of this boy who pimped their kid to come out on national TV – shame on you.
Tsy misy ray aman-dreny tia zanaka hanery ny zanany hanao izany. ||| No loving parent would force their kid to do this.
Ramblings of Adam and Eve dia mifantoka amin'ny fanararaotan'ny mpanolotra fandaharana Willie Revillame ny tranga toa izao: ||| Ramblings of Adam and Eve zero in on how TV host Willie Revillame takes advantages of such situations:
Na dia marina aza fa mety efa nanampy olona maro i Willie, ny marina koa dia nanampy ny tenany izy tamin'ny nanampiany ireo olona ireo. ||| While it's true that Willie may have helped a lot of people already, it's also true that he helps himself while he's helping these people.
Ankoatra izany dia tsy i Willie tenany no nanampy azy ireo, fa ireo mpanohana ny fandaharana. ||| Besides, it's not Willie himself who helps them, it's actually the sponsors of the show.
Manao ny asany fotsiny i Willie, ary mahazo vola be izy amin'izany. ||| Willie's just doing his job and is actually earning a lot from it.
Nefa ny vola tsy mahavidy ny fahamaotinana, ny faharanitan-tsaina, ny fitiavana ary ny fahatsapana. ||| But money can't buy class, intelligence, taste and sensitivity.
Ratsy be ho an'i Willie fa mety nieritreritra angamba izy hoe azo natao izany. ||| Too bad for Willie because maybe he thought he could.
Trisha dia miantso ireo mpamokatra ny fandaharana sy ny fianakavian'ilay zazalahy: ||| Trisha appeals to the show's producers and the boy's family:
Tamin'izaho nijery iny lahatsary iny dia tena tsy nahazo aina mihitsy. ||| When I watched this video, I felt really really uncomfortable.
Tokony eritreretin'ny fahitalavitra tsara izay tena tian'ny fandaharany tratrarina. ||| The show should rethink what their show really wants to achieve.
Ho an'ny rain'i Jan-Jan sy ny nenitoany, tsy azoko hoe nahoana no iny dihy iny no nofidianareo nampianarina azy. ||| To Jan-Jan's father and aunt, I don't know why you chose that dance move to teach him.
Mivavaka ho an'ilay zazalahy, ny fianakaviany ary ny mpijery nanatrika azy io i Better Filipinos mba hahitàn'izy ireo fa diso làlana izy: ||| Prayers for the boy, his family, and the audience are offered by Better Filipinos so that they may see the error of their ways:
Mivavaka aho mba hotahiana ity zazalahy ity ka ho voaaro ny sainy, izay mitady ho voafitaak'ireo mpiaro azy. ||| I'm praying that this kid will be blessed to have his mind protected by the corruption being instilled by his guardians.
Mivavaka aho mba hahatakaran'ireo ray aman-drenin'i Jan-Jan haingana fa mila mitia kokoa ny zanany izy ireo ary tsy sitrak'andriamanitra izao fomba fitadiavam-bola amin'ny alalan'ny zanany izao. ||| I am praying that Jan-Jan's parents will understand soon enough that they need to love their child more and that this way of milking money from this child is not God's way.
Mivavaka ihany koa aho ho an'ireo mpijery nanatrika - nihomehy sy nanaiky izany zavatra mahamenatra izany - mba hahatsiaro tena sy hifona amin'izany fomba fiaina izany izy ireo. ||| I am also praying for the audience - laughing and approving this vicious thing to this child - to realize and repent from this way of life.
Patricio Mangubat dia manamarika fa ho voasaringotr'ity olana vaovao ity koa i Revillame, ilay mpanolotra fandaharana mahery: ||| Patricio Mangubat points out that the powerful men behind TV host Revillame will also be dragged into this new mess:
Ny mahagaga ahy dia ity lehilahy ity tohanana olona mpanao afera goavana, tahaka an'i Manny Pangilinan sy Manny Villar. ||| What I am surprised about is that this man is being supported by big businessmen, like Manny Pangilinan and Manny Villar.
Ireny olona ireny no tokony ho andry ijoroan'ny firenena. ||| These people are supposed to be the shakers and movers of this Nation.
Ireny lehilahy ireny no tokony ho tonga saina indrindra. ||| These men are supposed to be of high integrity.
Mba fantatr'ireny lehilahy ireny ve fa voasaringotra amin'izany koa ny anarany noho izy ireo mpiaro an'Atoa Revillame, isaky ny voasaringotra amin'ny zavatra tsy mety na asa ratsy ity lehilahy ity? ||| Do these businessmen realize that their names are also being dragged as protectors of Mr. Revillame, every single time this man gets caught with a misdemeanor or a crime?
Amin'ny lafiny iray i Katrina Stuart Santiago dia mametraka fanontaniana goavana ho an'ny tsikeran'i Revillame: ||| On the other hand, Katrina Stuart Santiago posed a crucial question to Revillame's critics:
Rehefa miteny aho hoe "ngayon lang," dia ny ezaka nifanarahana mba hijoroana ho an'ilay zazalahikely Jan-Jan sy ny fanararaotana niainany nandritra ny fandaharana izany. ||| when I say "ngayon lang," I mean this concerted effort to stand up for little boy Jan-Jan and the perceived abuse he suffered on the show.
Rehefa manamarika ny fitarainan'ny vahoaka izay tsy nivoaka raha tsy izao aho, dia ireny fotoana tsy voatanisa — tsy voatanisa! ||| when I point out this fact of public outcry happening only now, I mean what of those countless — countless!
— nanafitohinan'ny fandaharan'i Willie Revillame ireny, no manafintohina, izay saika tamin' ny fotoana rehetra. ||| — times that these Willie Revillame shows have offended, are offensive, which is really pretty much most of the time.
dia fanontaniana tsy miresaka momba ny famelàna heloka an'i Revillame na ny fandaharany. ||| is a question that is not about forgiving Revillame or his show.
Io dia fanontaniana mitady ny mahasamihafa ny fepetra ankehitriny mitodika amin'i Jan-Jan sy ny tamin'ny dimy taona lasa tamin'ny Wowowee sy ny herintaona latsaka nisian'i Willing Willie. ||| it's a question that's about figuring out how these current conditions with regards Jan-Jan are different from the five years of Wowowee and the less than a year's existence of Willing Willie.
Na mety hoe tsy misy mahasamihafa azy mihitsy ireo, fa tamin'ity indray mitoraka ity dia azontsika tamin'ny video an'i Youtube ilay izy. ||| or maybe it isn't different at all, we just got this one on a youtube video.
Raha izany dia inona marina no lazain'io momba antsika? ||| in which case what does this really say about us?
Mbola lavitra be isika. ||| we are farthest from the point.
Zara raha hahakasika ny mety hanafoanana an'i Willie sy ny Willing Willie amin'ny fahitalavitra any an-toerana ny hatezerantsika aminy. ||| our anger towards Willie and Willing Willie will barely scratch the surface of possibility of both being cancelled out of local TV.
Raha ny marina amin'izao dia zavatra azon-dry zareo tsy raharahiana io, ary azony ampiasaina hanoherana antsika mihitsy aza. ||| in fact at this point it's almost something they can shrug off, and something to use against us.
Satria eto isika mitora-bato azy, tezitra sady rikoriko, ka mamboraka ny sokajy sosialy misy antsika. ||| because here we are shooting from the hip, angry and disgusted, in the process revealing our social class.
Adinontsika fa ho ao an-tsain'i Willie ny hijery izany amin'ny tena izy: ny tsy fitovian-tsokajy any am-piasana, izay tsy tiantsika atrehana akory, mety holavintsika, ary tsy hamoahantsika 10000 pesos. ||| we forget that Willie will know to see this for what it is: the class divide at work, one that we refuse to deal with, one we will deny, and ultimately one we will not put out P10,000 pesos for.
Na dia afaka hanao izany aza isika. ||| even if we could.
Tamin'ny fotoana nanoratana ity, ny Sekreteran'ny Sampan-draharaha Fiahiana ara-tSosialy sy Fampandrosoana dia nandefa fampandrenesana tany amin'ny tambajotra TV5 izay mandefa ny fandaharana "Willing Willie" momba ity tranga ity, ary nanamarika izany ihany koa ny Komisiona momba ny Zon'olombelona sy ny MTRCB. ||| As of this writing the Secretary of the Department of Social Welfare and Development has sent communications to TV5 network which airs the "Willing Willie" show about this incident while the the Commission on Human Rights and the MTRCB have also taken notice.
Manohy miady hevitra momba izany ny mpitoraka blaogy sy ny mponin'ny aterineto ary mikarakara fanohanana ho an'ilay zazalahy enin-taona. ||| Bloggers and netizens continue to debate the issue and organize support for the 6-year-old boy.
Mazava fa tsy hifarana vetivety izao zavatra izao. ||| Clearly, things are far from over.
Chili: Horohorontany mahatratra 8,8 refy Richter ||| Chile: Powerful 8.8-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Country
Horohorontany manana herim-pihetsehana 8,8 amin'ny refy Richter no nandona ny faritr'i Maule tamin'ny 3:34 maraina tany an-toerana any Chili io. ||| At 3:34 a.m. local time, an earthquake with a magnitude of 8.8 struck off the coast of the Maule region in Chile.
Heno hatrany an-drenivohitra Santiago izay 325km miala ny ivony ny hetsiky ny tany. ||| The earthquake was felt in the capital city of Santiago located 325km from the epicenter.
Betsaka ny fahasimbana manerana ny firenena, ary mitombo isa araka izany ihany koa ny niharam-boina. ||| Extensive damage has been reported throughout the country, and the number of casualties continues to go up.
Mbola re matetika moa ny setriny nandritra ny tontolo andro tany amin'iny faritra iny. ||| Throughout the day, aftershocks have also been felt in the region.
Haingana dia haingana ny nananganan'i Francisco bolongana antsoina hoe "Horohorontany Chili" vantany vao nisy ny horohorontany. ||| A blog "Earthquake Chile" was quickly created by Francisco soon after the earthquake hit.
Ankoatra ny namoahany ny fepetra tokony horaisin'ny olona rehefa misy ny horohorontany, dia nanangona sary sy rohy maro tamin'ny Twitpic ihany koa izy. ||| In addition to posting recommendations on what citizens should do following the earthquake, he has been collecting and linking to various Twitpic pictures.
Eo akaikin'ny ivony i Robinson Esparza avy amin'ny gazety El aMaule, anisan'ny orinasa Diarios Ciudadanos no mamoaka ny vaovao isam-paritra sy anatin'ny firenena farany. ||| Near the epicenter, Robinson Esparza of the citizen newspaper El aMaule, part of the Diarios Ciudadanos network has been updating a post with the latest regional and national news.
Maro amin'ny famoahan-kevitra no ahitana ny ahiahin'ny fianakaviana monina any ivelan'ny renivohitra, ary mbola nitohy izany tsy fandrenesam-baovao izany ho an'ireo mitady fianakaviana na namana izay misy fahatapahana ny herinjiro sy ny taribin'ny sofindavitra. ||| Many comments have been worrying about family members in areas outside the capital, and this lack of communication has continued to be an issue for relatives trying to contact family and friends in places where electricity and phone lines have been affected.
Rodríguez tamin'ny levilevy tao anatiny: ||| Rodríguez writes about this frustration:
tao anatin'ny ora maro no niezahako niantso ny fianakaviana any Valparaíso, tsy mamely ny fiantso tsy mihetsika an'ny VTR, tsy tokony hanao tolotra ry zareo: ||| trying for hours to communicate with family in Valparaíso, the fixed telephone line of (the company) VTR is disastrous, they shouldn't let them provide service:
Nanangana kaonty Twitter antsoina hoe "Ampio i Chili" ireo mpamoaka vaovao ao amin'ny bolongana Terremoto Chile ka ao no angonina ny vaovao avy amin'ny mpampiasa Twitter hafa mitady fianakaviana ary dia ampiasaina ihany koa ny re-tweeted (mamerina ny sioka an-tserasera ho an'ny mpanaraka). ||| Those who have been posting on the Terremoto Chile blog have also created a Twitter account called "Help Chile" in which information from other Twitter users who are looking for family members are collected and re-tweeted.
Misy moa ny mpampiasa Twitter sasay tahaka an'i Pablo González Carcey no manolotena hiantso ny olo-pantatr'ireo olona tahaka an'i Daniela Alvarado izay tsy mety mahazo an'antso ny anadahiny any Chili. ||| Some Twitter users such as Pablo González Carcey have also offered to call relatives for those such as Daniela Alvarado who was unable to reach her brother in Chile.
Dani Alvarado, niantso ny fianakavianao aho ka salama tsara izy ireo! ||| Dani Alvarado, I made the phone call and your family is fine!
Vao nipoaka ny andro dia maromaro avy hatrany ny sary an-serasera nivoaka. ||| After daybreak, more images of the damage soon appearing online.
Nivezivezy nanerana an'i Santiago i Claudio Olivares hijery ny fiantraikan'ny voina ka namoaka ny sary tao amin'ny Owly, tahaka ny nataon'i Costanza Campos izay naka saripika ny fahasimban'ny fiangonana ao Santiago. ||| Claudio Olivares went on a walking tour of Santiago to survey the damage and uploaded the photos on Owly, as did Costanza Campos, who took some photos of the damage to some of Santiago's churches.
Naka ity lahatsary manaraka ahitana ny fidabohan'ny lavarangana amin'ny tilikambon'i Bilbao any Las Condes manodidina an'i Santiago ity ny mpampiasa YouTube Franciso Vivallo Sainz: ||| YouTube user Franciso Vivallo Sainz took the following video of the collapse of a platform in the Bilbao Towers in Las Condes neighborhood of Santiago:
Efa misy sahady moa ny fanairana mety hisian'ny tsunami navoakan'ny Ivotoerana mpamantatra ny mety hisian'ny tsunami any amin'ny babandranomasin'i Oseana Pasifika. ||| There are already tsunami warnings issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center for locations bordering the Pacific Ocean.
Maraoka: Mitoraka blaogy momba ny fitorahana blaogy ||| Morocco: Blogging About Blogging
Ireo Maraokana, toy ny mahazatra, dia mitoraka blaogy, fa amin'ity indray mitoraka ity kosa dia momba ny...fitorahana blaogy! ||| Moroccans, as usual, are blogging, only this time it's about...blogging!
Amin'ity taona ity, loka roa no hatolotra ao amin'ny tontolon'ny blaogy: ny andiany fahatelo amin'ny Fifaninana isan-tanona Blaogin'i Maraoka (Maroc Blog Awards), izay nisarika ny mason'ireo media tato anatin'ny taoana vitsy, ary ny fifaninanana vaovao Loka ho an'ny Blaogy Maraokana Tsara indrindra. ||| This year, two awards are being offered in the blogosphere: the third annual Maroc Blog Awards, which has garnered significant media attention in recent years, and the brand new Best of Morocco Blog Awards.
Mbola eo an-dalam-pifidianana kosa ny Loka ho an'ny Balogin'i Maraoka ary mety ho amin'ny herinandro hafa no hotanterahana, raha mbola mitohy kosa ny fandraisana ny fisoratana anarana ho an'ny "BOMBies" hatramin'ny 21 Janoary 2010. ||| The Maroc Blog Awards are currently in the voting stage and will be for another week, while the "BOMBies" are still taking nominations until January 21, 2010.
Ilay mpifaninana indroa voatendry The View from Fez dia manoratra momba ny "BOMBies": ||| Two-time nominee The View from Fez writes of the "BOMBies":
Efa nanomboka ny fifidianana ho an'ny Fifaninanana ho an'ny Blaogy Maraokana Mendrika indrindra. ||| The voting has begun for The Best of Moroccan Blog Awards.
Misy sokajy dimy izy ireo: ny Tsara amin'izy rehetra, ny Fitsidihana, ny Vaovao, ny Kolontsaina, ary ny an'ny Tena Manokana. ||| There are five categories: Best Overall, Travel, News, Culture, and Personal.
Iza no mety hahazo ny loka voalohan'ny "BOMBies"? ||| Who will win the first annual "BOMBies"?
Eatbees, Amerikanina mipetraka any Maraoka, manamarika ny firotsahany, ary miteny mikasika ny fitorahana blaogy ao amin'ny tany sy ny fanjakana: ||| Eatbees, an American who lives in Morocco, mentions his nomination, and says of blogging in the kingdom:
Fony aho nanomboka tamin'ny 2006, dia zara raha nisy ireo mpitoraka blaogy nanoratra momba an'i Maroka amin'ny teny Anglisy. ||| When I started in 2006, there were just a handful of bloggers writing about Morocco in English.
Amin'izao dia lasa misy blaogy momba ny kolontsaina, ny blaogy miresaka Fitsidihana, ary ny an'ny Tena Manokana, ireo blaogy mitatitra vaovao sy politika — iarahan'ireo Marokanina sy ireo hafa tia an'ny Maroka. ||| Now there are culture blogs, travel blogs, personal blogs, blogs about news and politics — both by Moroccans and others by lovers of Morocco.
The Good Life in Morocco sy The Elephant Cloud koa dia nitoraka blaogy momba ny fahatafidiran'izy ireo ao amin'ny "BOMBie". ||| The Good Life in Morocco and The Elephant Cloud have also blogged about their "BOMBie" nominations.
Robin des Blogs no nibata ny fandresena tamin'ny taona lasa tamin'ny sokajy "Blaogin'ny taona" tamin'ny Fifaninanana Blaogin'i Maraoka. ||| Robin des Blogs is the winner of last year's "Blog of the Year" award in the Maroc Blog Awards.
Amin'ity taona ity, dia mbola voafantina indray izy; miresaka momba ity voninahitra lehibe ity, dia hoy izy: ||| This year, he has been nominated again; speaking of the honor, he says:
Mankasitraka ireo rehetra izay nifidy ahy tamin'ny taona lasa aho, ary ireo izay mbola mikasa ny hanao izany amin'ity taona ity ihany koa. ||| I am grateful to all those who voted for me last year, and those who intend to do so this year too.
Mampirehareha ahy izany porofom-pitiavana lehibe izany, satria mikasika ny fitiavana ity fa tsy fifaninanana akory, satria mamerina amintsika amim-pakasitrahana ny sasany amin'ireo zavatra nozaraintsika tamin'izy ireo izay nifidy antsika. ||| This testimony of love is a pride for me, because it is primarily about love, not competition, because those who choose us make us a part of what has been shared with them in a gesture of recognition.
Eljadida.com sy Blogipedia, etsy andanin'izany, dia mitoraka blaogy momba ny nahatafiditra azy ireo ao amin'ny Fifaninanana Blaogin'i Maraoka. ||| Eljadida.com and Blogipedia, among others, blogged about their nominations for the Maroc Blog Awards.
Ny mendrika no aoka handresy! ||| May the best blogs win!
Madagasikara: Ady amin'ny fanamoramorana mandritra ny andro manerantany iadiana amin'ny SIDA ||| Madagascar: Fighting complacency on World AIDS Day
Mampahatsiahy ny mpamaky azy ny mpamaham-bolongana mandritra ity andro manerantany iadiana amin'ny SIDA ity fa na dia eo aza ny fandrosoana misy eo amin'ny fisorohana ny VIH sy ny fitsaboana ny SIDA ity, dia tsy tokony ho moramorainy amin'ny fisorohana azy ny tsirairay. ||| On world AIDS day, Malagasy bloggers reminded their readers that despite the progress made in the field of AIDS therapy and HIV prevention, one cannot afford to be complacent about preventing the disease.
Nandritra "Ny tenin'ny Filoham-pirenena" fanaon'ny filoha Marc Ravalomanana no nampahatsiahiany amin'ny olom-pirenena fa tsy misy fampandrosoana vanona raha tsy tsy misy ny fitsaboana sy nampirisihany ny fikambanana tsy miankina amin'ny fanjakana (ara-tsosialy) sy ny fikambanana miankina amin'ny fiangonana hiray hina amin'ny fiadiana amin'ny ady amin'ny VIH/SIDA. ||| During his weekly address to the nation, the president of Madagascar Marc Ravalomanana reminded his fellow citizens that there is no development without health care and encouraged nonprofit organizations and faith-based associations to unite in the fight against HIV/AIDS.
Sipagasy no mampahatsiahy antsika fa mari-pitiavana ny miangavy ny miaraka aminy hanao firaisana voaaro: ||| Sipagasy reminds us that requesting one's partner to use protection during sexual activity is an act of love:
Mahagaga tokoa mantsy fa araka ny hita izy ireny dia misy ny mieritreritra fa dia hoe mahamenatra hono ny manontany 'fimailo' ilay olona miaraka aminy!! ||| It is mind-boggling to me that people are still bashful about requesting their lovers to use protection.
amiko anisan'ny porofom-pitiavana izany, satria miaro azy sy miaro ny tenanao ianao ||| That is the ultimate act of love because you are protecting both your partner and yourself.
Manontany ny mpamaky azy i Ikala raha tena siora (matoky) ny toe-tenany tokoa izy ireo amin'ny tsy fisian'ny VIH ao aminy. ||| Ikala asks her readers whether they are absolutely positive about their HIV status.
Manasa ny tsirairay izy hanao fitiliana tamin'ny alalan'ny fakana antontan'isa: ||| She invites her readers to get tested and quotes a telling statistic:
Araka ny isa navoakan'ny InVS dia 6.500 no nahalala fa mitondra ny tsimok'aretina tamin'ny 2007. ||| According to the data from INVS, 6,500 found out that they are HIV-positive in 2007.
Saika ny olona 1 amin'ny 3 mitondra ny tsimok'aretina no tsy mahalala ny fananany izany. ||| Almost 1 out of 3 people living with HIV still ignores that they are HIV-positive.
Mbolamisy hatrany ny SIDA na dia efa misy aza ny fivoarana amin'ny fitsaboana azy sy hanatsarana ny fiaian'ireo mitondra ny tsimok'aretina ||| AIDS is still a threat despite the recent progress that allows one to get better treatment and improves the quality of life of HIV-positive people
Manombana kosa i Pati hoe hatraiza moa izay ny zavatra vita. ||| Pati assesses how much progress were actually made.
Fantany tsara ny fampahafantarana natao mikasika ny VIH saingy amnontany izy raha vitantsika ny voadintsika (na ny adidintsika): ||| She acknowledges a widespread awareness of HIV but wonders whether we are keeping our promises:
Raha mbola maro ny mandà ny hanao fitiliana hahalalany ny toe-tenany, betsaka ny loa-bary an-dasy vita Eny fa na dia any amin'ny toerana saro-dalana eto amin'ny nosy aza, resahina sy ampahafantarina mandrakariva ny VIH, saingy mampanontany hoe aiza ho aiza ary isika izao? ||| While many people still refuse to know their status, workshops and testing are being organized all the time Even in the most remote places on the island, HIV is being discussed, campaigns are making progress and yet, the question remains, how far along are we now?
Tomavana indray moa mampahatsiahy amin'ny rehetra fa mbola matanjaka dia matanjaka ny fanavakaahana ny olona mitondra ny tsimok'aretina VIH: ||| Tomavana wants everyone to remember that discrimination against HIV-positive people is still strong:
Ny SIDA / AIDS no tokony havahana, fa tsy ireo olona izay mitondra ny otrik'aretina ||| don't pick the wrong fight: exclude AIDS, not HIV-positive people.
Ho fampanajana ny zon'ny olona mitondra ny tsimok'aretina VIH, dia nanangana bolongana vaovao hitehirizana ny asa nataony ny fikambanana miaro ny zon'ny mpivaro-tena sy mpitia ny olona mitovy fananahana aminy na FIMIZORE izay miorina eto Madagasikara. ||| With respect to fighting for the right of HIV-positive people, the FIMIZORE association for the protection of the rights of sex workers and homosexuals in Madagascar created a new blog to document their actions.
Raha te-hahalala bebe kokoa ianao dia tsidiho ny takelaka manokan'ny Global Voices mikasika ny Andro manerantany iadiana amin'ny SIDA 2008. ||| For more information, please visit Global Voices' special coverage page for World AIDS Day 2008.
Irana: Afaho i Hossein Derakhshan ||| Iran: Free Hossein Derakhshan
1 Novambra 2009 no tsingerintaona voalohany amin'ny namonjàna ilay Iraniana mpitoraka blaogy, Hossein "Hoder" Derakhshan. ||| November 1, 2009 was the one-year anniversary of the arrest of the Iranian blogger, Hossein "Hoder" Derakhshan.
Cyrus Farivar, amerikana iray monina any sady mpitoraka blaogy no mpanao gazety dia nitatitra fa tafaresaka tamin'i Hamed, rahalahin'i Derakhshan izy, izay nilaza taminy hoe: ||| Cyrus Farivar, a US-based blogger and journalist, reports that he has been in touch with Derakhshan's brother Hamed, who informed him that:
Nihaona tamin'ny mpampanoa lalàna vaovaon'ny distrika ireo raiamandreniny, fotoana vitsy lasa izay, ka nomen'io alàlana nahazo niara-nisakafo hariva tao amin'ny fonjan'i Evin niaraka tamin-janany lahy, Hossein Derakhshan, ny Alakamisy29 Oktobra 2009 teo. ||| His parents recently had a meeting with the new district attorney, who allowed them to have dinner in Evin Prison with their son, Hossein Derakhshan, on Thursday, October 29, 2009.
Manamafy izany fa mbola voatazona ao amin'ny fonjan'i Evin i Hossein, nefa tsy fantatr'ireo fianakaviana akory hoe rahoviana indray ny fotoana manaraka hahafahan'izy ireo mihaona aminy. ||| This confirms that Hossein is being held in Evin Prison, however the family does not know the next time they will be allowed to see him.
Ny mpitoraka blaogy Iraniana, Jooya, dia manoratra fa i Derakhshan dia mbola ao amin'ny sampana No. 325 foana any amin'ny fonjan'ny Revolutionary Guards.  ||| Iranian blogger Jooya, writes that Derakhshan is still in section No. 325 in the Revolutionary Guards' prison.
Raha ny filazan'ireo mpiaro ny zon'olombelona, hoy i Jooya manampy, dia natoka-monina tanteraka izy nandritra ny herintaona eo ho eo. ||| According to human rights activists, Jooya adds, he has has been in solitary confinement for about a year.
Vondrona iray ahitàna mpitoraka blaogy Iraniana no nanapa-kevitra hanampy hoe "Afaho i Hossein Derakhshan" amin'ny anarana entin'ny blaogin-dry zareo mandritra ny herinandro iray. ||| A group of Iranian bloggers decided to add "Free Hossein Derakhshan" to the names of their blog for one week.
Izaho koa nanampy ny hoe "Afaho i Hossein Derakhshan" amin'ny anaran'ny blaogiko. ||| I also added "free Hossein Derakhshan" to the name of my blog.
fony Hossein nanomboka niampanga ny hafa dia nitsahatra tsy namaky ny blaoginy aho, saingy ankehitriny dia miaro ny zony aho, tsy asiako fieritreretana hoe iza moa izy izay. ||| when Hossein started accusing others I stopped reading his blog, but now I defend his rights without thinking who he is.
Hossein, toy ireo olombelona rehetra ihany, dia tokony hànana ny zony amin'ny fahalalàhana misaina sy miteny. ||| Hossein like other human beings should have right for freedom of thought and speech.
Parsanevesht dia manentana ny mpitoraka blaogy rehetra mba hiasa miaraka mba hahazoana akony goavana. ||| Parsanevesht asks bloggers to act collectively in order to have maximum impact.
Rosia: Mba Hampangarahara Kokoa Ny Fampiasàn'ny Irak'i Etazonia Ny Twitter ||| Russia: US Envoy's Use of Twitter to Further Transparency
Michael McFaul, Masoivohon'i Etazonia any Rosia, nampiasa ny kaonty Twitterany tamin'ny fiandohan'ity herinandro ity mba hanehoany ny ahiahiny fa voahitsakitsaka ny arofenitra diplomatika rehefa nahita ny fandaharam-potoanany nivoaka tany amin'ny mpanao gazetin'ny fahitalavitra NTV ny fandaharam-potoanany, tetikasa mikasika na orinasa mpamokatra entona voajanahary, Gazprom an'ny fanjakana. ||| Michael McFaul, the United States Ambassador to Russia, used his Twitter account earlier this week to voice his concerns that diplomatic protocols had been violated when it appeared his schedule had been leaked to journalists at the NTV television network, a project of the state-owned natural gas company Gazprom.
Efa n iresadresaka mikasika ireo ezaky ny fitondran'i Obama hanamora ny fangaraharàna ao anatin'ny fifandraisan'i Rosia sy i Etazonia avy amin'ny alàlan'ny fampiasàna ny media sosialy ny Global Voices rehefa nanao fianianana ny Ambasadaoro McFaul tamin'ny Janoary lasa teo. ||| Global Voices discussed the Obama administration's efforts to facilitate transparency in US-Russia relations through the use of citizen media when Ambassador McFaul was sworn in last January.
Taorian'izay, naka sary ilay fifanoheran-kevitra nalefan'ny famoronana kaonty Twitter tsy tena izy an'i McFaul ny Global Voices izay nampanontany ny fanekena ny fifidianana Filoham-pirenena Rosiana tamin'ny Martsa 2012. ||| Later, Global Voices captured the controversy initiated by the creation of a fictional McFaul Twitter account that called into question the legitimacy of the March 2012 Russian presidential elections.
Tamin'ity herinandro ity, ny 29 Martsa, maro ireo olana nipoitra, anatin'izany ny: 1) ny fampiasàna ny kaonty Twitter manokana iray ana diplaomaty ambony ho fitaovam-pifandraisana mivantana amin'ny vahoaka, 2) fanatsaràna napetraky ny Fifaneken'i Vienna, izay mamela ny hiarovana ireo diplaomaty any amin'ny firenena ivelany, ary 3) Ny fanambarana nofidian'ny Ambasadaoro McFaul sy ny fitsipi-panoratany raha niresaka tamin'ny mpanao gazetin'ny NTV ny tenany. ||| This week, on March 29, several issues were raised, including: 1) the use of a personal Twitter account of a high-ranking diplomat as a means to communicate directly with the general public, 2) regulations established by the Vienna Convention, which allow for the safety of diplomats on foreign soil, and 3) Ambassador McFaul's chosen diction and syntax as he interacted with the NTV journalists.
Nifandefa Bitsika ny Ambasadaoro McFaul sy ilay mpifanerasera amin'ny Mpiambina an'i Môskoa, Miriam Elder, ny Alakamisy hariva, izay nandefasan'i Ramatoa Elder lahatsary fohy mikasika ny tafatafan'ilay ambasadaoro tamin'ireo mpanao gazetin'ny NTV. ||| Ambassador McFaul and the Guardian's Moscow correspondent, Miriam Elder, had a Twitter exchange Thursday afternoon, in which Ms. Elder provided a short video of the ambassador interacting with the NTV journalists.
Manan-jo haka lahatsary ahy eny na aiza na aiza ny mpanao gazety. ||| Press has right to film me anywhere.
Nefa manan-jo hamaky ny mailako sy hiaino ny findaiko ve izy ireo? ||| But do they have a right to read my email and listen to my phone?
Ary ny zavatra tsy azoko dia ity: raha hafetsena alohan'ny fifidianana fotsiny ihany ilay fanao mankahala an'i Etazonia, nahoana izy ireo no mbola mihaza anao? ||| And what I don't get is: if the anti-US stuff was just a pre-electoral ploy, why are they still hounding you?
Namelabelatra lalina kokoa mikasika ny fihetsik'ireo mpanao gazety mikasika azy ny Ambasadaoro McFaul avy amin'ny alàlan'ny kaonty Twitterany. ||| Ambassador McFaul elaborated further via his Twitter account on what exactly about the journalists' behavior concerned him.
Na aiza na aiza alehako dia eny foana ny NTV. ||| Everywhere I go NTV is there.
Manontany tena aho hoe iza no nanome azy ireo ny fandaharam-potoanako? ||| Wonder who gives them my calendar?
Tsy mety hilaza amiko izy ireo. ||| They wouldn't tell me.
Manontany tena aho hoe inona ny lalàna aty manoloana ny trangan-javatra tahaka izany? ||| Wonder what the laws are here for such things?
Manaja ny zon'ny mpanao gazety handeha na aiza na aiza & anontany na inona na inona aho. ||| I respect press right to go anywhere and ask any question.
Nefa moa ve izy ireo manan-jo hamaky ny mailako sy hiaino ny findaiko? ||| But do they have a right to read my email and listen to my phone?
Rehefa nanontany an'ireo mpanangom-baovao ireo ny fomba nahalalany ny fandaharam-potoanako aho, tsy nahazo valiny. ||| When I asked these "reporters" how they knew my schedule, I got no answer.
Fahanginana sahala tamin'ny fotoana nifankahitako tamin'izy ireo nandritra ny fihaonako tamin'i Chubais no reko. ||| Heard the same silence when they met me after meeting w/ Chubais.
Avy eo dia naka fotoana vitsivitsy izy niresahany ireo hetsika ara-diplomatikam-panjakana nataony tamin'io tontolo andro io, tanatin'izany ny fihaonany manaraka tamin'ny Patriarkan'ny Fiangonana Ortôdôksa Rosiana. ||| He then took some time to discuss his official diplomatic activities of the day, including his upcoming meeting with the Patriarch of the Russian Orthodox Church.
Niasa niaraka tamin'ny Sekretera lefitra Gottemoeller, nanatrika fihaonana nahazoam-bokatra tao amin'ny Minisiteran'ny Tafika sy ny Vaomieran'ny Fiarovana androany. ||| With Acting Under Secy Gottemoeller, had productive meetings at MFA and Security Council today.
Henjana ny raharaha, nefa nisy ny firahalahiana. ||| Tough issues, but spirit of cooperation.
Voninahitra ho ahy ny hihaona amin'ny Patriarka Kirill I, Patriarkan'i Moskoa sy Rosia iray manontolo sady Lohan'ny Fiangonana ôrtôdoksa Rosiana rahampitso ||| Tomorrow I have the great honor of meeting Patriarch Kirill I, Patriarch of Moscow and All Russia and Primate of the Russian Orthodox Church
Manamafy ny fampiasàn'ilay Ambasadaoro McFaul an'ilay teny "tsy mahalala fomba" ny NTV - izay tsikaritr'ilay tambajotra ho manafitohina - rehefa nanely ny fifandraisany tamin'ireo mpanao gazety izany tamin'ny Alakamisy hariva. ||| NTV emphasized Ambassador McFaul's use of the word "wild" - which the network found offensive - when it aired his interaction with their journalists Thursday evening.
Nanisy rohy iray mankany amin'io lahatsary io ny mpampiasa Twitter Andrew Ryvkin anatina bitsika amin'ny teny Rosiana: ||| Twitter user Andrew Ryvkin included a link to that video in a Russian-language tweet:
Mijery izany lahatsary ity lahatsary ity aho, ny fomba fanelingelenan'ny NTV an'ilay Masiovohon'i Etazonia. ||| I'm watching this video, how NTV is harassing the US Ambassador.
Tena adala tsy fahita firy mihitsy ny NTV. ||| NTV, of course, are rare (assholes).
Namaly ilay Ambasadaoro ka nilaza fa tsy mampitaha an'i Rosia amina firenena izy, fa amin'ireo hetsika nà mpanao gazety vitsy: ||| The ambassador responded by saying that he was not referring to Russia as a country, but rather to the activities of a few journalists:
Vao avy nijery ny NTV. ||| Just watched NTV.
Diso ny fiteniko noho ny Rosianiko ratsy. ||| I mispoke in bad Russian.
Tsy "firenena tsy mahalala fomba" no tiako notenenina fa te-hilaza ny hetsika nataon'ny NTV ho "tsy fahalalam-pomba". ||| Did not mean to say "wild country". Meant to say NTV actions "wild".
Manaja tanteraka an'i Rosia aho. ||| I greatly respect Russia.
Nanoratra momba ny valin-tenin'ny Trano Fotsy mikasika ity raharaha ity ny Bilaogin'ny Yahoo News: ||| Yahoo News Blog wrote about the White House's response to the incident:
Nitaraina amim-panajana tamin' i Moskoa i Etazonia tamin'ny Zoma fa ny mety hampidi-doza ny Ambasadaoro Michael McFaul, andro iray taorian'ny namaritany an'i Rosia ho "firenena tsy mahalala fomba2 sy ny fampiangany fa misy mpandefa vaovao avy any an-toerana mety miditra an-tsokosoko any amin'ny mailakany, mitsikilo ireo resaka ao anatin'ny findainy sy manara-maso ny fihetsiny. ||| The United States formally complained to Moscow on Friday about possible danger to Ambassador Michael McFaul, a day after he described Russia as a "wild country" and charged repeatedly that a state-run broadcaster there may be hacking his email, spying on his telephone conversations and tracking his movements.
"Naneho ny ahiahinay mikasika ny fiarovana ny Ambasadaoro amin'ny governemantan'i Rosia izahay," hoy ny Departemantam-panjakana tanatina fanambarana fohy iray. ||| "We have raised our concerns about the Ambassador's security with the Russian government," the State Department said in a terse written statement.
Mamiseho karazana fanindrina ireo lohateny hita any amin'ny fandrakofana mahazatra an'io tranga io: ||| Headlines found in mainstream coverage of the incident display a variety of emphases:
The Moscow News: "Miala tsiny amin'ny teny rosiana ratsiratsy" ||| The Moscow News: "McFaul apologizes for his bad Russian"
The Washington Post: "nanontany izay namoaka ny fandaharam-potoanany tamin'ny fahitalavitra" ||| The Washington Post: "U.S. ambassador to Russia wonders who's leaking his schedule to TV channel"
The Los Angeles Times: "miampanga ny mpanao gazety ho misovoka" ||| The Los Angeles Times: "U.S. ambassador to Moscow accuses Russian journalists of hacking"
namerina nitoraka bitsika ny fandinihan'i Rose Gottemoeller mikasika ny vanim-potoana iainantsika ilay Ambasadaoro ny Zoma hariva: ||| Finally, Friday evening the ambassador retweeted an observation about the times in which we live by Rose Gottemoeller:
Matetika dia mitranga eny ankalamanjana ny diplomacy, ary amin'ny hafainganam-pandeha raitra. ||| More often diplomacy is happening in the open, and at quicker speeds.
Niova izao tontolo izao ary tsy maintsy miaina amin'ny zava-misy vaovao isika. ||| The world has changed and we have to adapt to the new circumstances.
Hongria: Ice-T sy ny lalàna Hongroa vaovao mifehy ny Media ||| Hungary: Ice-T and the New Hungarian Media Law
Ao anatina tontolo iray somary mafampàna ihany noho ilay lalàna Hongroa vaovao mifehy ny media, izay nanomboka nanankery ny 1 Janoary 2011, dia nanomboka nanadihady ny Tilos, fampielezam-peo iray tsy mitodika amin'ny fitadiavana tombontsoa ara-barotra ny Manampahefana miandrakitra ny Fampahalalam-baovao sy ny Fifandraisana. ||| In a very sensitive environment because of the new Hungarian media law, which came into force on January 1, 2011, the Hungarian National Media and Infocommunications Authority started investigating Tilos, a non-profit radio station.
Hatramin'ny nametrahan'ny manampahefana 'tsindrim-peo manokana ho fiarovana ny tombontsoan'ny mpanjifa sy ny mpampiasa', dia andraisany fepetra ihany koa ny amin'ireo tanora mihaino, izay no zava-nitranga rehefa nilaza tamin'ilay fampielezampeo Radio Tilos ry zareo fa hisy fanadihadiana hatao taorian'ny fanaraha-maso ny fandaharana nalefan'ilay fampielezam-peo. ||| Since the Authority "places a strong emphasis on the protection of the interests of customers and users," it also takes care of the young listeners, which was the case when they informed Tilos Rádió that an investigation would be launched after monitoring the station's broadcasts.
Ny fanarahamaso no nahita fa nandefa ny hiran'ilay mpiangaly gadona rap Ice-T nitondra ny lohateny hoe It's On ilay fampielezam-peo tamin'ny 2 Sept 2010 tamin'ny 5:53 hariva. ||| The monitoring found that the radio station played rapper Ice-T's songs titled Warning (intro) and It's On at 17:53 on Sept. 2, 2010.
