Fanakianana avy amin'ny Manampahefana ny filazàna fa hoe tsy nandefa fampitandremana mikasika ny fetran-taona ny Tilos Rádió talohan'ny nandefasana ilay hira. ||| The Authority objected to the fact that Tilos Rádió did not use any kind of age limit warning before playing the song.
Ilay taratasy ihany no milaza fa efa voasazy koa ilay fampielezam-peo tamin'ny 2003 sy 2005 noho ny fandefasana mozika miaty hafatra mivantana sy mazava. ||| The letter mentions that the radio station had already been fined in 2003 and 2005 for broadcasting music with explicit lyrics.
Nampiarahan-dry zareo tamina tabilao iray misy sertifika azo teo anelanelan'ny 2000 sy 2009 io mba hilazàna fa hoe mety misy ny tanora nahatakatra ny tononkira ary noho ny taonan'izy ireny dia mety ho nanefy ny toe-tsain-dry zareo ny votoatiny. ||| They attached a chart with the number of language certificates obtained between 2000 and 2009 suggesting that there might have been youth who understood the lyrics and because of their age might have been influenced by the content.
Tao anatin'ilay hira, ireo zava-misy dia naseho tamin'ny alalan'ny tenin-jatovo izay na dia tsy dia azo takarina tanteraka aza ilay izy ho an'ireo fetran-taona arovana, ireo fiteny mahery ampiasainy mitondra ho amin'ny herisetra dia mety hitarika vokany goavana eo amin'ny mpihaino latsaky ny 16 taona. ||| In the tracks the events were portrayed by using the slang of a subculture which even if it wasn't totally understandable for the protected age-group, its harsh intonation prompting violence could generate a harmful effect on listeners who are under 16 years of age.
Ireo izay efa mba manana fahalalàna tsara ny teny (Anglisy) dia afaka hahazo fa ny teo-javatra ratsy iainan'ireo Amerikana manam-piaviana Afrikana, ny fampiasana ny mpivarotena, fivarotana sy fihinanana zava-mahadomelina, ary ny herisetra ara-batana dia tanisain'ilay mpanakanto ho toy ny asa andavanandro ary manana ny hasiny. ||| Those with a better knowledge of the English language could have understood that the negative situation of African Americans, the use of the services of prostitutes, trade and use of drugs, and physical violence were portrayed by the artist as an everyday activity and a value.
It's On dia manasongadina ny 'kolontsaina ghetto' amin'ny fampidirana fitondran-tena maherisetra sy fijery ny tontolo midadasika ||| It's On evoked the 'ghetto subculture' by implying harmful behavioral patterns and worldview.
Ice-T, izay mitoraka tweet ao ambadiky ny solon'anarana hoe "FINALLEVEL," dia nahalala tamin'ny alàlan'ny lahatsoratra Tumblr nalefa tweet fa hoe "noraràna" ny mozikany any Hongria. ||| Ice-T, who tweets under the username "FINALLEVEL," learned through a tweeted Tumblr post that his music was "banned" in Hungary.
Mbola matahotra ahy foana izao tontolo izao. ||| The world still fears me.
Na dia tsy mbola nisy toa azy aza ny vokatr'ilay fanarahamaso, ny National Media and Infocommunications Authority dia tsy maintsy hiatrika vava-ady maro noho io lalàna vaovao mifehy ny media io, izay naharaisana fanakianana iraisam-pirenena rahateo. ||| Although the result of the monitoring is not without precedent, the National Media and Infocommunications Authority has to deal with a very high volume of attention because of the new media law, which has even received international criticism.
Nomen'ny Tilos Rádió anarana hoe "Ice-T-gate" ilay tranga sady nanangonany ireo fanehoankevitra naterak'ilay vaovao momba ny fanadihadiana. ||| Tilos Rádió named the case "Ice-T gate" and collected the reactions to the news of the investigation.
Maro ireo lahatsoratra tanaty bilaogy no nampibaribary fa ilay tononkira izay naraikitra tamin'ny teny Anglisy sy ny dikanteny amin'ny teny Hongroa eo amin'ilay taratasy avy amin'ny manampahefana dia feno diso fandika. ||| A number of blog posts pointed out that the lyrics which were attached in English and with the Hungarian translation to the letter from the Authority contained some mistranslations.
Hongroa iray mpitoraka bilaogy izay nandefa ny dikan'ilay hira rap no nilaza fa ny Manampahefana dia nampiasa fandikàna izay efa nisy diso sahady tamin'ilay tononkira. ||| A Hungarian blogger who posts translations of rap songs stated that the Authority used a transcript of the lyrics that already contained some mistakes.
Na teo aza ireo resabe nanomboka tany amin'ny faramparan'ny taona 2010 tany, efa nahazo valin-kafatra ho setrin'ny fanambaràna ofisialy nomeny tamin'ny fanadihadiana ny Tilos Rádió. ||| Despite the polemic that began at the end of 2010, Tilos Rádió has already received an answer to their official statement against the investigation.
Ilay taratasy vaovao avy amin'ny Manampahefana koa dia navoaka tanatina bilaogy iray, Comment:com, miresaka ny votoatin'ny media. ||| The new letter of the Authority was also published on a blog, Comment:com, dealing with media content.
Ao anatin'ny taratasin'izy ireo, ny Manampahefana dia manindry manokana fa "angamba ireo mafàna fo nefa mazàna tsy mitonona anarana mitolona ho amin'ny fahalalahan'ny aterineto dia afaka hahita ny antony maha-lavitra an'ny Lajos Kossuth an'i Ice-T, ilay tena Hongroa mpiaro ny fahalalahan'ny fanaovana gazety." ||| In their letter, the Authority emphasized that "maybe the brave but frequently anonymous freedom fighters of the internet can see reason that Ice-T is far away from Lajos Kossuth, the real Hungarian fighter of press freedom".
"Sixx" dia nanasongadina andàlana vitsy avy amin'ilay taratasy izay nilazan'ny Manampahefana fa: araka ilay lalàna antsoina hoe Pacifica Foundation, dia aorian'ny amin'ny 10 ora alina ihany no azo alefa ny hiran'i Ice-T. ||| "Sixx" highlighted a paragraph from the letter in which the Authority stated: according to the so-called Pacifica Foundation, Ice-T's song could be aired only after 10 PM. 
"Raha tsy manaraka izany izy ireo, ny manampahefana Amerikana misahana ny media - ny kaomisiona Federaly miandraikitra ny Fifandraisana - dia mety hanasazy azy ireo amina lamandy izay tsy maintsy ho ambony lavitra noho ny tetibola isan-taonan'ny Tilos Rádió. ||| "If they don't do so, the American media authority - the Federal Communications Commission - would punish them with a fine which is certainly higher than the yearly budget of Tilos Rádió".
Ilay mpitoraka bilaogy ao amin'ny Comment:com dia nanondro fa ilay fanapahan-kevitry ny Amerikana lazain'ny Manampahefana eto dia tsy manankery intsony any Etazonia. ||| The blogger of Comment:com pointed out that the U.S. decision mentioned by the Authority was no longer valid in the United States.
Filipina: Ny Rivomahery Sendong Sy Ny Media Sosialy ||| Philippines: Typhoon Sendong and Social Media
Ireo niharam-boina tamin'ny ny rivomahery Sendong (anarana iraisam-pirenena: Washi), ny fianakavian'izy ireo, sy ireo namana, any Filipina dia mampiasa media sosialy mba hitadiavana ireo niharam-boina tsy hita popoka, handaminana sy hanangonana ireo ezaka famonjena, hitahirizana sary sy ny mahakasika ny fahasimbana. ||| Typhoon Sendong (international name: Washi) victims, their families, and friends, in the Philippines are using social media to look for missing victims, coordinate and document relief efforts, and record image and accounts of the destruction.
Niteraka fahafatesan'olona 1.257 ireo tondra-drano tampoka naterak'ilay rivomahery tany amin'ireo tanànan'i Cagayan de Oro sy Iligan any amin'i Mindanao Avaratra sy Negros Tatsinanana, araka ireo angon'ny governemanta. ||| The flash floods caused by the typhoon in the cities of Cagayan de Oro and Iligan in Northern Mindanao and Negros Oriental caused the deaths of 1,257 people, according to government data.
Mihoatra ny 45.000 ireo trano nahitàna fahasimbana, namela tsy manan-kialofana an'arivony. ||| Over 45,000 homes have been damaged, leaving thousands homeless.
Nampiasa ny Facebook ireo tra-boina tamin'ilay tondra-drano mba hanampy amin'ny fitadiavana ireo olon-tiany tsy hita. ||| Flood victims have utilized Facebook to help search for their missing loved ones.
Mitohy ny famoahana ny sary sy ny mombamomba ireo havana sy namana tsy hita ao amin'ireo pejy Olona tsy hita ao Sendong sy Olona tsy hita any CDO sy Iligan ||| Photos and profiles of missing relatives and friends continue to be posted in the Facebook pages Sendong Missing Persons and Missing Persons of CDO and Iligan.
Hatramin'izao dia nahazo "tiako" 1.787 sy resaka 5.341 ilay pejy Sendong Missing Persons. ||| The Sendong Missing Persons page has since gathered 1,787 likes and 5,341 conversations as of this writing.
Na eo aza anefa izany, ireo mpandrindradia nandrisika ireo mpampiasa ilay pejy mba hifandamina amin'ireo manampahefana fa tsy hiankina amin'ny Facebook irery mba hikarohana ireo olon-tiana. ||| The administrators, however, have advised the users of the page to coordinate with authorities and not rely on Facebook alone in finding their loved ones.
Tahaka ny voamarika teo alohaloha kely teo tao amin'ny Global Voices Online, nampiasaina ihany koa ireo bilaogy sy tambajotran'ny media sosialy mba hanetsehana ny fanampiana amin'ireo hetsika famonjena ireo tra-boinan'ny Rivomahery Sendong. ||| As noted earlier in Global Voices Online, blogs and social media networks have also been used to mobilize assistance for relief operations for the victims of Typhoon Sendong.
Manomboka avoaka ao anaty aterineto ny mahakasika ireo ezaka ireo: ||| Accounts of these efforts are also beginning to be posted online:
nitantara zavatra tamiko ny vadiko raha nizara sakafo tany canitoan androany vao maraina, rehefa nahazo sakafo ireo nafindra-monina dia niteny "misaotra betsaka, andriamatoa, mirary krismasy sambatra" niteny ny vadiko fa mampafana ny fon'izy ireo ny fiarahabana azy ireo krismasy sambatra avy amin'olona izay vao namoy zavatra maro ||| my husband told me a story while they were distributing food at canitoan earlier today, when evacuees receive food they would say "thank you very much, sir, merry christmas" my husband said its heart warming for them to be greeted merry christmas by people who lost everything
Nahita ny làlany ao any aterineto hatrany ireo sary samy hafa sy ny mahakasika ny fahasimbàna. ||| Various images and accounts of the destruction have continuously found their way online.
Any an-tanànan'i Dumaguete, Negros atsinanana, afaka naka an-dahatsary ilay faharavàna nateraky ny tondra-drano nisafotofoto i Mark Anthony Besario, mpiandraikitra ny lahatsarin'ny Fikambanan'ny Anjerimanontolo ary namoaka izany ao amin'ny Youtube. ||| In Dumaguete City, Negros Oriental, Foundation University video manager Mark Anthony Besario was able to capture the devastation brought by rampaging flood waters and posted this online in YouTube.
Mizara tantara momba ny fomba namonjen'ireo alika olona nandritra ny loza i Pinoy Dog-Lover. ||| Pinoy Dog-Lover shares stories of how dogs saved humans during the disaster.
Misy iray avy any amin'ny Tanànan'i Iligan: ||| One account is set in Iligan City:
Alohan'ny namafan'ny tondra-drano mahery ny tanànan'izy ireo, tonga dia namoha ireo olony (ireo alika) Aspins Loloy sy Jackie — nikikikiky ny varavarana sady nivovo mafy be. ||| Before the furious flood waters swept through their village, (the dogs) Aspins Loloy and Jackie immediately woke up their humans — scratching the door and barking loudly.
Noho ny fanairan'ireo alika, afaka nahazo toerana ieren-doza i Marrietta sy ny fianakaviany. ||| Because of the dogs' warning, Marrietta and her family were able to get to safety.
Very ny fonenany, nefa mbola tafaray avokoa ny fianakaviany, tsy tahaka ny ankamaroan'ireo fianakaviana niharan'ity tondra-drano ity. ||| They lost their home, but unlike most families affected by the flood, their family is still complete.
Nampiakatra sary iray mikasika ity faharavàna tany Brgy ity i Ryan Chua. ||| Ryan Chua uploads a photo of the devastation in Brgy.
Mitsikera sary iray ao anatin'ity fianakaviambe ity ihany i LiaAndanarYu: "Nisy trano teto indray andro. ||| LiaAndanarYu comments on a photo of the same community: "There once was a home here.
I Kennedy Pacana avy ao amin'ny Tibasak, CDO no tompon'izany trano izany. ||| Kennedy Pacana of Tibasak, CDO owned that home.
Mongolia: Manimba ny fomba fiainan'ny mpifindrafindra monina ny fiovan'ny toetr'andro ||| Mongolia: Climate Change Affecting Nomadic Way of Life
Hatry ny fahagola no nilàn'ny fianakaviana mpifindrafindra monina avy any Mongolia tamina toerana midadasika fa izany no mifandrindra amin'ny fomba fiainany. ||| Mongolian nomadic families have historically depended on the vast land for their livelihood.
Taloha dia azon'ny biby fiompiny nivalamparana avokoa na ny sakafom-biby na ny rano. ||| In the past, rangeland for their grazing animals had been plentiful, and food and water were readily collected from their surroundings.
Saingy niova avokoa izany rehetra izany, fa nanimba ny fomba fiainan'ireo fianakaviana ireo ny fiovaovan'ny toetr'andro. ||| However, all is that is changing, as climate change is having a negative impact on their way of life.
Nampivandravandra izany fiovana izany ny lahatsoratr'i Joshua Kucera ao amin'ny Eurasianet: ||| A recent article by Joshua Kucera in Eurasianet highlights some of these changes:
Nisy fiantraikany goavana tamin'ny mpiandry ondry any Mongolia, izay mahatratra ny 40%n'ny mponina 3 arivoarivo, ny fitomboan'ny hafanana ankapobeny. ||| Global warming is having a harsh effect on Mongolia's nomadic herders, who comprise about 40 percent of the country's overall 3 million inhabitants.
Tafakatra 1,6°C isan-taona ny maripana hatramin'ny taona 1940. ||| Since 1940, the mean air temperature in the country has increased 1.6 degrees Celsius.
Mihamaharotra kokoa ny hafanan'ny toetr'andro, ary "miovaova, mihena amin'ny toerana iray nefa mitombo amin'ny toerana eo anilany" ny rotsak'orana, araka ny filazan'ny Minisitry ny tontolo iaianana sy ny zavaboary. ||| Heat waves are longer, and rain patterns have become "quite variable, decreasing at one site and increasing at a site nearby," according to an assessment by the country's Ministry of Nature and the Environment.
Mihamihisaka tsikelikely mianavaratra ny tany hay ao Gobi, any atsimon'ity firenena ity. ||| The Gobi Desert, in the south of the country, is creeping northward.
Mihena ny firaofan'ny biby, izay loharanon-tsakafo manan-danja amin'izy ireo, ahitra noho ny fitomboan'ny tany hain'i Gobi. ||| The desertification of the Gobi Desert is reducing available land for their animals to graze, which are important sources of food.
Miatrika olana eo amin'ny rano fisotro ihany koa ny mponina, araka ny fitantaran'ny mpamaham- bolongana Mandah, nanoratra ny olana atrehin'ny fokonolona amin'ity resaka rano ity: ||| This population is also facing a freshwater crisis, as described by blogger Mandah, who writes about the the water issues facing these communities:
Mitsonika tsikelikely ary miha-manify ny ranomandry an-tendrombohitr'i Mongolia noho ny fitomboan'ny hafanana amin'ny ankapobeny. ||| Mongolian high mountain peak's snowcap and glaciers have been melting and thinning because of the Global Warming.
Hahatratra 131 santimetatra izany hatevin-dranomandry hitsonika izany amin'ny taona 2039. ||| The thickness of the snow melting will become 131 centimeters by 2039.
Ny manampahaizana dia milaza fa hiatrika tsy fahampian-drano madio fisotro ny mponina 108 arivoarivo amin'ny tany iray manontolo alohan'ny taona 2025. ||| According to the scientist, the whole world will start to face fresh water shortage by 2020 and 108 million people actually have to deal with the fresh water shortage by 2025.
Hatramin'ny 1996 no efa nihena hatrany ny rano anaty tany any Mongolia. ||| Since 1996, Mongolian groundwater level has been decreasing constantly.
Ritra ny farihin'ny faritr'i Goribi tahaka an'i Taatsiin tsagaan, Adgiin tsagaan, Ulaan, Orog lakes ary ny renirano hafa. ||| Some of the biggest lakes in Gobi region such as: Taatsiin tsagaan, Adgiin tsagaan, Ulaan, Orog lakes as well as many other rivers dried up.
Mameno ny momba io fiovaovan'ny toetr'andro io ny mpamaham- bolongana sady botanista Ariungerel: ||| Blogger and local botanist Ariungerel adds information about these changes:
Mihamazava kokoa ankehitriny ny dikan'ny teny manao hoe "harena ny rano". ||| Nowadays, the meaning of the phrase "water is treasure" is becoming clearer.
Lavitra ny ranomasina ny firenentsika ary kely kokoa noho ny an'ny firenenkafa izay manana tahirindrano an-tanety sy ambanin'ny tany ampy ny antsika. ||| Our country is situated far from nearest sea and has less water sources on the ground and underground compared with countries that has enough water sources.
Mandamina ny fiainany araka tahirin-drano ny olona aty amintsika, ohatra: mandritra ny fotoan-dririnina no ampiasaina ny rano lavi-toerana satria kely ny ranomandeha any, ranomandry ihany no misy any. ||| Our people range their life in line with water sources, for example: remote areas can be utilized only in winter times because running water source is scarce there, only snow is available there.
Nitantara ny Ntaolo fa rora no nampiasainy tamin'ny androny hanasany tarehy sy tanana, fa ao anatin'ny tontolo ankehitriny kosa, efa betsaka kokoa ny rano ampisaina hanaovana ireo zava-droa loha ireo. ||| Elders said that they used to use mouthfuls of water to wash their faces and hands, but in the contemporary world, we use many more liters of water for the same reason.
Maro ny lohahevitra tsy mba fantatry ny ao an-toerana loatra, ary manoatra noho izany ny zavatra manerantany. ||| Many of these issues are not well-known within the country, much less around the world.
Saingy, misy tetikasa ao an-toerana antsoina hoe Nomad Green (dika manta: Mpifindrafindra monina maitso) nandray andraikitra hampianatra ny fampiasana fitaovana entin'olo-tsotra mampahalala vaovao tahaka ny bolongana, sary ary lahatsary mba ahafahana milaza ny tantaran'ity firenena ity sy ny olana ara-tontolo iainana entiny. ||| However, a local project called Nomad Green has taken up the initiative to teach the use of citizen media tools like blogs, photogs, and videos to tell the story of this country and some of its environmental problems.
Nanomboka tamin'ny taona 2009 sy iarahan'ny fikambanana sy sampan-draharaham-panjakana miasa, ary efa voapetrapetraka ny daty hanaovana atrikasa isan-karazany ao andrenivohitra Ulaanbaatar sy tanàna hafa manodidina an'i Mongolia. ||| The project started in 2009 as partnership between various organizations and institutions, and to date several workshops have taken place in the capital city of Ulaanbaatar and other communities around Mongolia.
Efa nahitana dingana tsara amin'ny fampianarana ny Mongole amin'ny fampiasana ireo fitaovana entiny mitantara ny fanamby atrehin'ny fireneny eo amin'ny resaka tontolo iainana ny tetikasa. ||| The project has already demonstrated positive steps in teaching Mongolians how to use these tools to tell their stories about environmental challenges of their country.
Anisan'ny porofo amin'izany dingana izany dia ireo mpamaham-bolongana roa efa nolazaina teo aloha teo tamin'ity lahatsoratra ity dia i Mandah sy i Ariungerel dia anisan'ny tao anatin'ny tetikasa Nomad Green avokoa, ary manampy ireo ny feon'ireo liana amin'ny ho avin'ny tontolo iainana any Mongolia. ||| Part of this proof is that the two bloggers previously cited in this article, Mandah and Ariungerel are a part of the Nomad Green project, which only adds to number of voices concerned about the environmental future of Mongolia.
Meksika: Vondrona Mitady Olom-pirenena Tsy Miankina Hirotsaka Hofidiana Ao Amin'ny Kongresy ||| Mexico: Group Looks for Independent Citizens to Run for Congress
Ankehitriny, ao Meksika, mila miditra amin'ny antoko politika ianao vao afaka mirotsaka hofidiana ao amin'ny Kongresy. ||| Currently, in Mexico you need to belong to a political party to be eligible for a seat in Congress.
Nentina nandresen-dahatra hatrany fa manome vahana ny kilasy politika mitady ny tombotsoan'ny antokony manokana amin'ny fanaovana ampihimamba ny fahefana izany rafitra izany. ||| It is often argued that this system only fosters a power monopoly of the political class who looks after its party interests.
Volana vitsivitsy lasa izay, vondrona olom-pirenena no nanosika ny fanovana mafonja amin'ny demokrasia Meksikana, iray amin'izany ny Fanitsiana Ara-politika ny mety amerenana indray ny fifidianana. ||| Months ago, a group of citizens had pushed for substantial reforms to Mexican democracy, one of those was a political reform that included, among other things, the possibility of recall elections.
Saingy hatramin'izay tsy nahazoan' ireny fanovana ireny fankatoavana mihitsy, sy ny fijerana fa taonan'ny fifidianana filoham-pirenena izao, nanetsika ny "Fanovana Politika IZAO" ny vondrona ka nitarika karazana fanovana teo amin'ny Lalàna Federalin'ny Andrimpanjakana sy ny Fikarakarana ny Fifidianana (Code fédéral des institutions et procédures électorales) mba ahafahan'ireo olom-pirenena tsy miankina mirotsaka hofidiana. ||| But since it became impossible for these reforms to get approved, and taking into account that it is a presidential election year, the same group that promoted "Political Reform NOW" is now driving a series of changes to the Federal Code of Institutions and Electoral Procedures that would allow independent citizens to run for an elected office.
Tsy liana amin'antoko, fa olom-pirenena mahaleotena sy manana hevi-baovao ||| Do not have any party interests, be an independent citizen and have fresh ideas
Mikasa hanolotra fanohanana ara-dalàna ho an'izay olom-pirenena voafidy amin'ny birao-pifidianana be olona indrindra ny vondrona tanora tompon-kevitra tamin'izany, ary hanome azy ireo ny fitaovana ilaina amin'ny dingana manaraka hotontosainy. ||| The group of young people behind this initiative intends to offer legal support to the citizens that get elected for a popular election office and hand them a kit to explain their next steps.
Olom-pirenena mampiseho ny soso-kevitr'izy ireo tao amin'ny antenimieran-doholona Meksikana. ||| Citizens presenting proposals to the Mexican Senate.
Hosoratana anarana any amin'ny sampan'ny Ivotoerana Federaly momba ny Fifidianana isan-toerana ny kandidà tsy miankina voafantina, holavin'ny IFE ny fisoratana ny anaran'izy ireo, fa hanatona ny mpitsara ny vondrona tanora hitsipaka ny fanapahan-kevitra. ||| Selected independent candidates will go to register at their local Federal Electoral Institute, IFE will reject their registration and then the group will go to a judge to contest the decision.
Manantena ny tanora fa havelan'ny mpitsara hiseho ao amin'ny biletam-pifidianana amin'ny volana Jolay ny anaran'ireo olom-pirenena kandidà tsy miankina. ||| The youth hope the judge will allow the name of the independent citizens to appear in the ballots on July.
Mitaratra ny fikarohan-kevitry ny tanora mahatsapa tena ho tsy voasolo tena ity hevitra ity. ||| This idea thoroughly reflects the constant search for ideas of a young generation that doesn't feel represented.
José Manuel Azpiroz, Talem-paritry ny Fanofanana momba ny Mpitarika ao amin'ny Fikambanana Ethos, nanambara ny teboka lehibe indrindra tamin'ireo hevitra niposaka: ||| José Manuel Azpiroz, Director of the area of Leadership Training of Ethos Foundation, mentioned one of the main points of this idea:
Manao ahoana raha alaintsika indray ny Kongresy Meksikana? ||| How about we recover the Mexican Congress?
Eny, ilay nalain'ireo antoko politika ankeriny. ||| Yes, the one that's been kidnapped by the political parties.
Paul Moch, anisan'ny mpikambana ao amin'ny vondrona nilaza hoe: ||| Paul Moch, who is a member of the group, said:
Tsy leo ny fanararaotana ataon'ireo olona milaza fa solontenantsika ao amin'ny Kongresy ve ianareo? ||| Aren't you fed up of the abuses of those who call themselves our representatives at Congress?

Tiako kokoa ny mahita ireo Meksikana tapa-kevitra handray ny fitantanana fa tsy miandry ny governemanta hamaha ny olana. ||| I love to see more and more Mexicans deciding to take the lead and not waiting for the government to solve things.
Tsy mbola fantatra izay ho fandehan-javatra ary tsy misy ny antoka fa hiseho ao amin'ny vato-pifidianana ny anaran'ireo olom-pirenena natolotry ny vondrona. ||| The process is uncertain and there is no guarantee that the citizens that the group presents will appear on the ballots.
Na dia izany aza, vahaolana farany izany (taoriana ny fiezahana hahazo mpanohana tao amin'ny Kongresy ny amin'ny tokony hanoratana ny Fanitsiana Politika), feno fanantenana, mba hanovana ny rafitra izay mbola hita fa manjaka ankehitriny: ireo izay ao anatin'ny antoko politika ihany no afaka fidiana amin'ny fe-potoam-piasana amin'ny asam-panjakana ambony. ||| However, it is a last resource (after trying to have the Congress sponsor the necessary changes written in the political reform), full of wit, to try to transform a paradigm that up until now seemed foundational: only those who belong to a political party can be elected to hold public office.

Nitatitra ny Human Rights Watch tany ampiandohan'ny volana Desambra 2010 tany fa i Tahir Nassar, mpisolovava iray sady kandida nirotsaka hofidiana tao amin'ny antenimiera, dia nosamborina sy notànana any am-ponja Jordaniana noho ny fiampangàna azy ho "nihantsy ady eo amin'ny sekta." ||| Human Rights Watch reported earlier in December 2010 that Tahir Nassar, a lawyer and former parliamentary candidate, was arrested and detained in a Jordanian prison on charges of "stirring up sectarian strife".
Ny helok'i Nassar dia ny fandaharan'asam-pifidianany izay mampibaribary ny fanavakavahana mianjady amin'ireo Jordaniana manana fiaviana Palestiana. ||| Nassar's offense was his election manifesto that highlighted discrimination against Jordanians of Palestinian origin.

Pakistana: Fanehoankevitra Noho Ny Fahafatesan'i Osama Bin Laden ||| Pakistan: Reactions on the Death of Osama Bin Laden
Ny 01 May nanodidina ny tamin'ny 10 alina no nanambarana fa hanao valan-dresaka ho an'ny mpanao gazety mikasika olana lehibe iray ny Filoha Obama. ||| On May 1, 2011, around 10 p.m. EST it was announced that President Obama would hold a press conference on an important issue.
Raha mbola teo ampiandrasana ny ho fisehoan'i Obama izao tontolo izao dia efa rakotra bitsika maminany ny mety ho lazainy kosa tao amin'ny Twitter. ||| While the world was waiting for Obama to appear, Twitter was flooded with thousands of tweets guessing about what he was going to say.
Minitra vitsy taorian'izay dia nandefa bitsika i Keith Urbahn, talen'ny kabinetran'i Donald Rumsfeld, fa ny lehiben'ny Al Qaeda, ny mpampihorohoro fara-tampony Osama Bin Laden dia maty ary nanomboka nanapaingotra an'izay vaovao izay daholo ny mpampahalala vaovao rehetra. ||| A few minutes later Keith Urbahn, the chief of staff for Donald Rumsfeld, tweeted that the chief of Al Qaeda, top terrorist Osama Bin Laden had been killed and news media started to jump on the story.
Tsy ela ny tontolon'ny twitter dia nanomboka nipoaka noho ireo bitsika avy amin'izao tontolo izao. ||| Soon the Twittersphere started to explode with tweets from all over the world.

Angidimby mijijy eo ambonin'i Abbottabad amin'ny 1 ora maraina (tranga tsy fahita firy). ||| Helicopter hovering above Abbottabad at 1AM (is a rare event).
Tao anatinà fanafihana notarihan'ny sampam-pitsikilovana, vao maraina be tamin'io maraina io no maty i Osama Bin Ladin tao an-tanànan'i Abbotabad, 80 kms miala an'i Islamabad renivohitra. ||| In an intelligence driven operation, earlier this morning on May 2, Osama Bin Ladin was killed in the city of Abbotabad, 80 kilometers from the Pakistani capital Islamabad.

Manambara ny tatitra fa voatifitra teo amin'ny loha i Osama nandritra ny firotsahana an-tsehatra nataon'ireo angidimby Amerikana tamin'ny fanafihana ny toeram-pamaharany tao Abottabad. ||| Reports state that Osama was shot in the head while US military choppers took part in the operation on a hideout in Abottabad.

Angidimby nianjera tany akaikin'i Kakul. ||| Helicopter crashes near Kakul.

fitambarany angidimby 6. ||| Total of 6 helicopters.
mananihany ahy ve nareo izany ||| you have got to be kidding me

Côte d'Ivoire: Rahoviana Ny Fanokafana Indray Ireo Anjerimanontolo? ||| Côte d'Ivoire: When Will the Universities Reopen?
Nandritra ny disadisa nialoha ny fifidianana tao Côte d'Ivoire, ireo anjerimanontolo telo ao amin'io firenena io (Cocody, Abobo-Adjamé sy Bouaké) dia nakatona ary tsy nasiana olona tany amin'ireo toeram-ponenan'ny mpianatra. ||| During the post election crisis in Côte d'Ivoire, the country's three universities (Cocody, Abobo-Adjamé and Bouaké) were closed and the halls of residence cleared of their residents.
Raha betsaka tamin'ireo Ivoariana no nadray izany fanapahan-kevitra izany tamin'ny lafiny tsara, amin'izao fotoana kosa dia maro ireo mametra-panontaniana manoloana ny manjavozavo mikasika ny ho fanokafana indray ireny anjerimanontolo ireny. ||| While many Ivorians welcomed this measure at the time, today many are questioning the uncertainty surrounding the reopening of the universities.
Tanjona roa no nanosika ny fanakatonana: famotsorana ireo efitrano nobodoin'ireo tsy mpianatra ara-dalàna (indrindra fa ireo mpikambana mitam-piadiana ao amin'ilay Fédération Estudiantine et Scolaire de Côte d'Ivoire, na Federasionan'ny Mpianatra ao Cote d'Ivoire), ary fanavaozana ireo foto-drafitrasa, izay efa tena anaty fahasimbana tafahoatra. ||| The closures had two specific aims: - To free up the rooms that were illegally occupied by non-students, especially members of the powerful, not to mention armed, Federation of Ivorian Students and Scholars - To renovate the buildings, which were in a serious need of repair.
Efitrano iray ao amin'ny Anjerimanontolon'i Cocody, Abidjan, 13 Oktobra 2011. ||| The decaying state of Cocody University in Abidjan.

Asa fanamboarana ao amin'ny toeram-ponenan'ny mpianatra ao Cocody, Abidjan, oktobra 2011, sary an'ny mpanoratra ||| Construction at Cocody University, Abidjan, October 2011. Photo by author.

miharatsy ny toe-draharaha ao Sohar, mifampitorabato ny polisy sy ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana, eo koa ny baomba manetroka. ||| situation not good in Sohar. police and protesters throwing rocks at each other. smoke bombs.
Mihazakazaka ireo mpijery eny amin'ny sisiny sy ny manodidina an'i||| onlookers edge up and then run away.
Nandoro kamiao teo akaikin'ny toeram-piasan'ny polisy izy ireo ho mariky ny fanoherana! ||| They burned a "gas truck" in protest near the police station!
Izay no niatombohan'ny horakoraka tao ||| Thats when the shooting started
sari-na mpanao fihetsiketsehana voasaron'ny setroka... hitanao ny vato eny an-tànany ||| a picture of a protester covered by smoke... you can see the rock on his hand
Fa inona no mitranga ao amin'ny tanànan'i Sohar izay tsy tia ady: Toa mandalo tetezamita marina ny Moyen Orient. ||| Uh what's happening to peaceful Sohar: The Middle East is SERIOSULY transitioning.
Mino aho fa ireo Omanis dia tsy hanaradia an'i Gadafi. ||| I hope Omanis don't follow the footsteps of Gadafi.
Nisy mpanao fihetsiketsehana nanohitra ny fidiram-bola kely sy ny tsy fisian'ny asa eto Sohar, tanàna avaratr'i Oman. ||| There were protests against low incomes and unemployment here in Sohar, northern city of Oman.
Nampiasa baomba mandatsa-dranomaso ny polisy ||| Police used teargas
eto Salalah aho, Oman, raha nanomboka omaly ny fihetsiketsehana. ||| I'm living in Salalah, Oman, where protests started yesterday.
Milamina izy ireo, nefa toa karazany tsy hahazaka ny onjan'ny fihetsiketsehana... ||| They are peaceful, but they are sort of hopping on the wave of protest...
mila mpanao gazety ao Sohar mba hanadihady olona, mandrakitra ny seho, hoy ny voalazan'ny isa hitan'ireo olom-pirenena. ||| need journalists in Sohar to interview people, record scene, confirm citizen accounts.
Mihetsi-po be tao Oman, mba alefaso aty ny mpanao gazetinareo azafady. ||| lots of emotion. Oman please send your reporters.
Mino ireo mi-tweet ao Sohar aho, handray fepetra i Oman ary tsy ho voarebireby ny fikasana halaza vetivety ao amin'ny Tweeter. ||| I hope those tweeting from Sohar, Oman will exercise restraint and won't get carried away at the prospect of instant twitter stardom.
Mitandrema azafady rehefa mi-tweet momba ny zava-miseho ao Sohar Oman. ||| Please be careful in tweeting abt events in Sohar, Oman.
Mety tsy hahazo ny fomba filaza izay tsy teto an-toerana ka mety hampikorontana (hanitatra.) ||| Those not here, do not understand nuances and may blow it out of proportion.
Oganda: Ny Resabe Mikasika Ny Zanaky Ny Mpanjaka Buganda Ivelan'ny Fanambadiana ||| Uganda: Controversy Over King of Buganda's Child Out of Wedlock
Ny Talata 17 Janoary 2012, ny Fanjakan'i Buganda ao Ouganda dia nanambara ny fahaterahan'ny zanaka lahy faharoa n'ny mpanjaka (Kabaka), Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II. ||| On Tuesday January 17, 2012 the Buganda kingdom in Uganda announced the birth of a second son of their King (Kabaka), Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II.
Nitàna ny sain'ny maro tao Oganda nisinisy kokoa ireo tomponandraikitra rehefa nolazain'dry zareo ho ren-tany ren-danitra fa teraka ny volana Jolay ny taona lasa teo ilay zaza. ||| The officials captured the attention of Ugandans even more when they revealed that the child was born in July last year.
Ilay fanambarana izay nahatonga resabe sy fanehoan-kevitra maro samy hafa dia niompana tany amin'ny renin'ilay zaza nantsoina tamin'ny anaran'ny fokony hoe "valala". ||| The announcement which has sparked controversy and mixed reactions only referred to the mother of the child by her clan name "grasshopper".
Ny anaran'ilay zazalahy dia Richard Ssemakookiro. ||| The boy's name is Richard Ssemakookiro.
Efa nanan-janaka lahy iray ilay Mpanjaka, ny Printsy Jjunju Ssuuna Kiweewa. ||| The King already had a son, Prince Jjunju Ssuuna Kiweewa.
Ilay zaza vao teraka io no fahadimy. ||| The new child is the fifth born.
Teraka ny resabe satria ilay Mpanjaka dia natao mariazy tany am-piangonana ny taona 1999 tamin'i Slyvia Nagginda, ilay Mpanjakavavin'ny ao Buganda. ||| The controversy arose because the King duly wed in church in 1999 to Slyvia Nagginda, the Queen of Buganda.
Ny Kabaka ao Buganda, Ronald Mutebi Muwenda, miaraka amin'ilay printsy vao teraka. ||| The Kabaka of Buganda Ronald Muwenda Mutebi with new born prince.
Loharanon'ilay sary: Ny vohikala ofisialin'ny Fanjakan'i Buganda. ||| Photo source: the official Buganda Kingdom website.
Ireo mponina ao Oganda dia nisafidy ny filazam-baovao sosialy mba hanehoana hevitra mikasika ilay vaovao, ny sasany dia manondro ny fijangajangana miharihary raha ny sasany milaza fa afaka manao izay tiany ny Mpanjaka. ||| Ugandans took to social media to react to the news, some pointing to the obvious adultery while others arguing that the King has right to do whatever he wants.
Bitsika iray sangisangy zary tenany tao Luganda no niely momba an'i Kabaka izay tsy nampiasa kapaoty: ||| One sarcastic tweet in Luganda made rounds about Kabaka not using condoms:
Izay vita dia vita. ||| What is pricey is pricey.
(tsy afaka ny hiady varotra amin'ny hatsarany ianao). ||| (You can't really bargain over quality).
Kabaka dia tsy afaka ny hanao kapaoty. ||| Kabaka can't wear a condom.
Mpanjaka eo amin'ny tambajotran'ny filàna ara-nofo? ||| King on the sexual network?
Misy dokambarotra malaza iray izay, mandeha ao Oganda amin'izao. ||| There's a popular advertisement currently running in Uganda.
Ilay dokambarotra dia miteny amin'ny olona mba "hiala amin'ny tambajotran'ny filàna ara-nofo" (manana vady mihoatra ny iray) mba hampihenana ny nety ho fihanaky ny VIH. ||| The advertisement tells people to "Get off the Sexual Network" (having more than one partner) to reduce the risk of getting HIV.
Koa tamin'ny fotoana nivoahan'ilay vaovao mikasika ny zanaky ny Mpanjaka tamin'ny vehivavy hafa dia maro ireo mpandefa bitsika toa an'i Pmagelah no nanambara fa mazava ho azy fa ilay Mpanjaka dia ao anatin'ny tambajotran'ny filàna ara-nofo: ||| So when the news of the King's son from another woman broke many tweeps like Pmagelah said it was evident that the King is on the sexual network:
Ny ambadiky ny printsy vaovao ao Buganda dia ny hoe misy Olona eo amin'ny TAMBAJOTRAN'NY FILANA ARA-NOFO ary ny loza dia tsy nampiasa fiarovana akory ||| the flip side of Buganda's new prince is that Someone is on the SEXUAL NETWORK and worse still hasn't used protection
Na dia i Oganda aza no lazaina fa maodely ho an'ny Afrika amin'ny ady amin'ny fanoherana ny VIH sy ny SIDA, io aretina io dia nisy fiatraikany lehibe tokoa tao amin'ny firenena. ||| Although Uganda is considered a model for Africa in the fight against HIV and AIDS, the disease has had immense consequences in the country.
Ny governemanta sy ny fiarahamonina sivily dia mikatsaka fatratra fomba vaovao hanelezana ny hafatra ho fisorohana ny VIH. ||| The government and civil society are desperately looking for new ways to put across HIV prevention messages.
Isan'ny manana ny lanjany amin'ny ady amin'io aretina io ireo olo-malaza maro toy ny Mpanjakan'i Buganda. ||| Public figures such as the King of Buganda are important part of the struggle against the disease.
Ny fanehoana ny fototra lalina sy ny fanekena ny fihanaky ny fananana vady maro ao Oganda, Pkahill dia milaza fa ilay Mpanjaka dia afaka mahazo ireo vehivavy izay tiany ao amin'ny fanjakany: ||| Showing the deep-rooted and widespread acceptance of polygamy in Uganda, Pkahill says the King can get whatever woman he wants in his Kingdom:
Ny Kabaka (Mpanjaka) ao Buganda, dia ambonin'ny zava-drehetra, ankoatran'Andriamanitra. ||| The Kabaka of Buganda, he is above all other things except God.
Izy no Mpanjaka, afaka ny hanana ny vehivavy izay tiany izy ||| He is the king, he can have what ever woman he wants it
Miresaka ilay raharaha tao amin'ny Facebook, Richard Kavuma dia manontany hoe: ||| Discussing the subject on Facebook, Richard Kavuma asks:
Iza no homen-tsiny? ||| To declare or not to declare?
Edris Kisambira dia milaza fa ireo sangany amin'ny vehivavy avy ao Baganda io (Ireo vehivavy ao amin'ny Fanjakan'i Buganda): ||| Edris Kisambira says it is the elite Baganda women (women from the Buganda Kingdom):
Tena marina nahoana no misy resabe mikasika ny Kabaka? ||| Seriously why the fuss about the Kabaka?
Ireo vehivavy sangany ao Baganda no mandefa tafiotra any amin'izay tsy tokony hahitàna ||| It's elite Baganda women who are kicking up a storm where there shouldn't be any
Bitsika maro no niresaka momba ny toerana tsy dia tsara loatra misy ilay Mpanjaka vavy Nagginda. ||| Other tweets touched on the uncomfortable position Queen Nagginda finds herself in.
Nagginda sy ny Mpanjaka dia manana zanaka vavy iray ary ny zaza efatra hafa dia an'ny Kabaka. ||| Nagginda and the King have one daughter together and four other children are for the Kabaka.
Tohan-kevitra maro no miampanga ilay Mpanjaka manodidina ilay mariaziny tany ampiangonana ary ny fananana zanaka ivelan'ny fanambadiana dia mampiseho ny fanitsakitsahany ny dinan'ny mariazy. ||| Many arguments condemning the King center around the fact that the King married in church and that having a child out out of wedlock shows that he was breaking marriage vows.
Izany dia mampiseho ny disadisa misy eo amin'ny fanao ara-kolotsaina sy ny ekena ara-pivavahanana ao Oganda. ||| This indicates conflict between what is culturally practiced and what is religiously accepted in Uganda.
Asinjadia dia manoro hevitra ilay Mpanjaka vavy hoe: ||| Asinja advises the Queen:
iza no miraharaha izay Reny any, manana printsy izao ny Fanjakana! ||| who cares abt the mama, the kingdom has a prince!
Patience Akumu dia manontany tena hoe ahoana no mety ho fihetseham-pon'ny Mpanjaka vavy: ||| Patience Akumu wonders how the Queen is supposed to feel:
Manontany tena aho hoe ahoana ny mety ho fihetseham-pon'ny Nnaabagereka. ||| I wonder how the Nnaabagereka is supposed to feel.
Sady izy ihany koa anie no vadiny e. Kanefa izy dia niala ary nanan-janaka tamin'ny vehivavy hafa. ||| She is the wife after all. But he ups and has a son with another woman.
Mbola nidina indray ny soatoavintsika ho any amin'ny fahafahantsika manan-janaka (Na ve ny fahafahana manan-janaka lahy?). ||| Once again our value comes down to our child bearing abilities (Or is it son-bearing abilities)?.
Ary mbola mihatra amin'ny vehivavy hatrany ny kolontsaina izay milaza fa mety 'hihena ny mahaizy azy ' raha toa ka tsy mamaly ireo fangatahan'ny vadiny izy. ||| Once again culture communicates to women that they can be 'demoted' if they do not meet their man's every whim.
Manana fanajàna be ho an'i Nagginda aho (Mpanjakavavy mandray andraikitra). ||| I have a lot of respect for Nagginda (a very proactive Queen).
Kanefa inona no afaka ataony amin'izao zava-mitranga izao? ||| But what is she supposed to do in such a situation?
Inona no tokony ho lazainy amin'ireo vehivavy an'arivony mitodika any aminy taorian'iny 'fanambarana iny'? ||| What is she supposed to tell the thousands of girl children who look up to her after this 'announcement'?
Serugo dia mihevitra fa resaka tsy misy dikany loatra ny fahaterahan'ilay zaza lahy iray. ||| Serugo thinks the King's newborn is not an important issue.
Tsy tiany hoe iny vaovao iny no hamily ny mason'ireo mponina ao Oganda tsy hiresaka ny toe-draharaha ara-toekarena ao amin'ny firenena: ||| He does not want the news to distract Ugandans from discussing the state of economy and the country:
Buganda "printsy mpandova" mbola resaka hafa indray? ||| Buganda "crown prince" yet another red herring?
Miresaka momba ny olona foana! ||| Focus people!
Efa 26 taona izay ilay fandaharanasa misy teboka 10 no lasa aretina 10 ho an'ny NRM. ||| It's 26 years since the 10-point programme became NRM's 10 plagues.
Mugumya dia manontany tena hoe nahoana ny mombamomba ilay renin'ilay zaza no tsy navoaka. ||| Mugumya wonders why the identity of the mother has not been revealed.
Tamin'ny fanombohan'ny lahatsorany, nilaza izy fa ilay fanambarana dia natao tanaty Aterineto: ||| In the beginning of his post he notes that the announcement was made on the Internet:
Ilay fanambarana dia natao tanaty vohikala iray fa tsy tamin'ny onjam-peo na tamin'ny feon'amponga. ||| The announcement was made on a website and not on radio or with the sounding of drums.
Tena zava-dehibe izany satria natao mba hanehoana fa ilay Fanjakana fahiny dia efa lasa rafitra manara-penitra ankehitriny. ||| This is significant because I believe it's designed to show that the old kingdom is now a modern entity.
Na dia te-haneeho aza ny Fanjakan'i Buganda fa rafitra manara-penitra, ny fomba fitondrany ny vehivavy dia efa ntaolo be: ||| Although the Buganda Kingdom wants to show that it is a modern entity, its treatment of women is old-fashioned:
Ilay milin'ny Fanjakana PR dia mametraka ilay Fanjakana ho toy ny rafitra iray manara-penitra, kanefa ny fomba fitondrany ny vehivavy dia mahamenatra. ||| The Kingdom PR machine is definitely positioning the kingdom as a modern entity but its treatment of women is still appalling.
Fantatro fa betsaka ireo olona no tsy hiteny n'inon'inona ny amin'izany, manahy ny fahatezeran'ireo Baganda namany. ||| I know many people will be silent on this issue, fearful of angering their Baganda friends.
Kanefa mila ambara izany zavatra izany. ||| But this needs to be said.
Ilay Fanjakana dia tokony hivoatra kanefa ny fomba fitondrany ny vehivavy dia efa ntaolo be, tena efa ntaolo be sy tena ratsy, ary manao fika taloha be sy tena mahatsiravina toy ny tamin'ny andro fahagola. ||| The kingdom might be now modern but its treatment of women is still as old, as old-fashioned and as terrible and abhorring and as despicable as during the days of stone age.
Ankehitriny, aza resahina izany kolontsaina izany aho rehefa mampiasa ny aterineto ianareo hanaovana fanambarana goavana iray mahakasika ny ho avin'ny Fanjakana. ||| Now don't tell me about culture when you are using the internet to make an announcement so important to the future of the Kingdom.
Mila manaraka ny toetr'andro ny Fanjakana, kanefa amin'izao fotoana izao, tsy misy fanajàna ilay renin'ilay printsy kely mihitsy avy amin'izy ireo, tsy misy fankasitrahana azony afatsy ny fiantsoana azy amin'ny hoe avy any amin'ny foko Nsenene. ||| The Kingdom needs to go with the times but currently they have no regard for the mother of the young Prince, she gets no recognition other than that she comes from the Nsenene clan.
Tsy manana endrika izy, tsy manana anarana. ||| She has no face, no name.
Izy dia fitaovana fanalana andro ho an'ny Mpanjaka ihany. ||| She's just an object of desire for the King.
Ary mankarary ny vavoniko izany. ||| and that makes my stomach turn.
Tontolo Arabo: Misy ny misaona an'i Osama bin Laden ||| Arab World: Where Some Are Mourning Osama Bin Laden
Siokantsera teny Arabo milaza fa Bin Laden an-tapitrisany no hitsangana ||| A tweet in Arabic saying that a million Bin Ladens will now rise
Maro ny mpisera Twitter manerana ny tontolo arabo no manome voninahitra sy fahatsiarovana noho ny fahafatesan'ilay Saodiana lehiben'ny Al Qaeda. ||| The end of Al Qaeda's Saudi leader Osama Bin Laden was met with tributes and remembrance by many users on Twitter from across the Arab world.
Indreto misy siokantsera avy any Bahrain sy Koety, milaza fa mety hoe maty i Bin Laden saingy mbola velona kosa ny fotokeviny. ||| Here is a sample of tweets from users in Bahrain and Kuwait, who say that Bin Laden may have died but his ideology will live on.
Ny fanehoan-kevitry ny olona raisiko eto dia tsy mahasolo tena ny tontolo Arabo manontolo, izay nahitana fijery tena midadasika ka misy hatramin'ny fahafalina ka hatramin'ny tsy finoana. ||| These reactions express the views of the people I quote and are not representative of the entire Arab world, where views cover a wide spectrum, from joy to disbelief.
Raha maty ity, dia hanana Osama arivo ny (Mpaminany) Muhammad-n'ny Ummah (Fiarahamonina Islamika). ||| If he had died, then (Prophet) Muhammad's Ummah (Islamic community) has another 1,000 Osamas.
Tsy hitsahatra amin'olona iray tsy akory ny fivavahana Islamika. ||| The Islamic religion will not stop with one man.
Izany no ummah izay nolovaina tamin'ny maherifo isan-taranaka hatramin'ny andron'ny mpaminany. ||| This is an ummah which has been inherited by heroes over generations, from the times of the Prophet.
Mbola any Koety ihany, nanampy ny Dr. Sajed Al Abadli: ||| Still in Kuwait, Dr. Sajed Al Abadli adds:
Tsy olona iray i Osama bin Laden. ||| Osama bin Laden is not a person.
Fotokevitra iray i Osama bin Laden. ||| Osama bin Laden is an ideology.
Maty ny olona iray... maty koa ve ny fotokevitra? ||| A person has died... did the ideology die too?
Misy hevitra tsy itovizana amin'i Bin Laden saingy mangataka amin'i Allah aho hamindra fo amin'ny fanahiny sy handray azy ho toy ny maritiora. ||| We may differ with some of Bin Laden's ideas but I ask Allah to forgive him and have mercy on his soul and welcome him as a martyr.
Koa tahaka ny Jihad (ara-drariny) dia mbola hitohy io mandra-pahatongan'ny Andro Fitsarana. ||| As for the legitimate Jihad (war), it will continue until the Day of Judgement.
Mety hoe maty i Bin Laden saingy efa nahatsangana an-tapitrisany izy, izay efa notolorany ny fanahin'ny Jihad (Ady Masina Islamika) izay namoronany Bin Laden an-tapitrisany eto amin'izao tontolo izao, izay afa-mandaboka ny fanirian'i Obama ||| Bin Laden may have died but he has created millions, whom he gave the spirit of Jihad (Islamic holy war) to create a million Bin Laden's in this world, who are able to overthrow the likes of Obama
Amin'ny tsy fitovianay hevitra amin'i Al Qaeda, dia mirehareha izahay amin'ny fahafatesan'ny Miozolomana iray izay nahavita nanozongozona ny tontolo tao anatina vanim-potoana tsy nahavita izany ny tafika Arabo rehetra mitambatra ||| With all our differences with Al Qaeda, we are proud of the death of a Muslim man who was able to shake the world at a time all the Arab armies united couldn't do that
Hamindra fo aminao anie i Allah ry Osama. ||| May Allah have mercy on you Osama.
Tsy faly aho tamin'ny fahafatesanao. Ianao irery no niteny hoe "Tsia" ao anatin'ny vanim-potoana ny Arabo niteny hoe"Eny." ||| I wasn't happy for your death.. you are the only one who said "No" in an era where the Arabs said "Yes".
Mbola any Bahrain ihany, nanamarika ny Dr. Adel Abdulla: ||| Still in Bahrain, Dr. Adel Abdulla notes:
Tsy olombelona i Bin Laden fa zava-nitranga lehibe. ||| Bin Laden is not a human being but a phenomena.
Mety ho nahafaly olona anarivony ny fahafatesany ary nisintona ny fankahalan'ny tontolon'olombelona tamin'ny fomba tsara indrindra i Etazonia. ||| His death may make thousands happy and the United States attracts the hate of humanity with excellence.
Tsy mahafaty ny hevitra na ny fotokevitra ny fahafatesan'olona iray ||| The death of one person does not kill the idea or the ideology
Pikan-efijery ao amin-ny takelaka Facebook We are all Osama bin Laden page on Facebook ||| Screen shot of the 'We are all Osama bin Laden' page on Facebook.
Mandritra izany fotoana izany ao amin'ny Facebook, takelaka fanohanana tahaka ny hoe We are all Osama bin Laden maro no nipongatra. ||| Meanwhile on Facebook, pages of support like We are all Osama bin Laden have popped up.
Aza miala hanarahanao ny fihetseham-po hafa any Afovoany Atsinanana sy Afrika Avaratra momba ity tantara ity. ||| Stay tuned for more reactions on this story from across the Middle East and North Africa.
Nankalaza ny faha – 50 taonan'ny fahaleovantenany niala tamin'ny zioga Belza ny Repoblika Demokratikan'i Congo. ||| The Democratic Republic of Congo has been celebrating the 50th anniversary of independence from Belgian rule.\
Raha mbola faly mampidera ny halafon'ny f itaovana ara-miaramila vaovao izay ampiasaina amin'ny fisehosehoana amin'ireo manamboninahitra ny fanjakana, dia mitantara ireo filatroana tany Kinshasa sy Lubumbashi kosa ny mpitoraka blaogy Kakaluigi sy Congo Miliki, eo andanin'izany, mampahatsiahy ny vanim-potoan'ny fahaleovantena sy ny zava-bita tsara indrindra tamin'ireo androm-panantenana ny mpitoraka blaogy Kongole sasany. ||| As the state proudly wheeled out some expensive new military hardware for the delectation of visiting dignitaries, bloggers Kakaluigi and Congo Miliki describe the parades in Kinshasa and Lubumbashi, while other Congolese bloggers reminisce about the era of independence and the record since those optimistic times.
Manadihady an'i Albert Kalonji, izay raisina ho toy ny iray amin'ireo 'rain'ny fahaleovantena Kongole' sy mpitolona mpitaky fizakantena ary mpanohitra ara-politika an'i Patrice Lumumba, i Mboka Mosika. ||| Mboka Mosika interviews Albert Kalonji, considered one of the 'fathers of Congolese independence' but also a one-time Luba secessionist and a political opponent of Patrice Lumumba.
Hoy izy, "Afaka mifaly amin'ny nahazoantsika ny fahaleovantena isika, na dia teo aza ireo fotoana tsy hay noararaotina... toy ireo ady sivily izay niseho, sy ny tsy fahampian'ny fifehezana hentitra sy ny traikefa teo amin'ny fitantanana ny raharaham-bahoaka, izay andraikitr' ireo mpitondra ara-politika." ||| He says, "We can only rejoice over our independence, despite the missed opportunities... like the civil wars which followed and the lack of charisma and amateurism in management of public affairs, for which the political leaders are responsible".
Ahoana no fomba hitazonantsika an'i Kinshasa hadio? ||| How should we keep Kinshasa clean?
Tohizo ny fanasàna ny mpanjaka Belza! ||| Keep inviting the Belgian King!
Mamerina maneho ny lahateny nataon'ny mpanjaka Belza Joseph Kasa Vubu sy i Lumumba tamin'ny tena lanonan'ny fahaleovantena tamin'ny taona 1960 i Banacongo. ||| Banacongo republishes the speeches given by the Belgian king, Joseph Kasa Vubu and Lumumba at the original independence ceremony in 1960.
Mihevitra i VieuxVan fa ny finday no mba hany tena fivoarana marina mba hitan'ny 'mponina' ao RDC taorian'izay. ||| VieuxVan thinks the only real progress the 'villagers' of DRC have seen since then is the mobile phone.
Mahita fivoarana ao Goma kosa i Texas in Africa, na izany aza, mifanohitra amin'ny sary famaritan'ny seraseram-baovao mikasika toerana iray hoe "ny vehivavy Kongolezy rehetra dia niharan'ny fanolanana ary ny lehilahy rehetra dia mpamono olona": ||| Texas in Africa sees progress in Goma, though, contrary to media depictions of a place where "every Congolese woman is a rape victim and every man is a criminal":
Nitafatafa tanaty aterineto tamin'ny namako maro taloha aho ary nihaona tamin'ny maro amin'ireo vaovao, teto an-toerana, tamin'ity herinandro ity, ary ny lohahevitra iray iraisana tamin'ireo fifampiresahana dia ny fahadisoam-panantenana tamin'ny tantaran'i Goma izay mbola tsy resahana ihany amin'izao fotoana izao. ||| I've chatted with several old friends and met many new ones here this week, and one common theme in the conversations is frustration that the story of Goma is not being accurately told.
Araky ny nametrahan'ny olona iray azy ity, raha raisina amin'izay teny ilazan'ny seraseram-baovao azy, dia hihevitra ianao fa ny vehivavy Kongolezy rehetra dia efa niharan'ny fanolanana ary ny lehilahy rehetra dia mpamono olona. ||| As one put it, if you took the media's word for it, you'd think that every Congolese woman is a rape victim and every man is a criminal.
Tsy izay no tena zava-misy marina eto. ||| That's not the reality here.
Amin'ny taonina ny fandraharahana vaovao misokatra, efa lasa ny fandrahonana ary nitombo naka ny toeran'izy ireny ireo tranobe maro rihana, ary betsaka ny orinasa natsangana. ||| Tons of new businesses are opening, eyesores are gone and new buildings have gone up in their place, and factories are being built.
Niha-nivoatra ny foto-drafitr'asa, mihoatra noho izay nantenaiko ho vita. ||| And infrastructure has improved more than I believed possible.
Efa vita làlam-bato ny làlam-be eo amin'ny tanàna afovoany ||| The main roads in the central city have been paved
Niantso i Congoblog, ny andro taorian'ny filatroana, fa mendrika ny tokony hahazo andro tsy iasana ireo 'mahery fon'ny fitsingerenan'ny faha-50 taona ': Ny mpandoko, ny mpanadio sy ny mpiasa maro hafa izay niasa mafy mba hanatsara ny endrik'i Kinshasa, ka mba nahafahan'ny ankizy sy ny mpivarotra eny amoron-dalana niaina indray tamin'ny farany ary niverina eny am-povoan-tanàna. ||| The day after the parades, Congoblog's Cedric Kalonji hails a deserved day off for "the heroes of the 50th anniversary": the painters, cleaners and other workers who'd worked so hard to spruce up the image of Kinshasa, while street children and street vendors can finally breathe again and return to the city centre.
Indrisy anefa, ho afaka ve ny polisy mpandrindra fifamoivoizana, izay noraràna tsy hanenjika ny mpamily: "Mahalala ny sasany aho izay mikosika ny tanany roa. Hahita faisana izao ireo mpamily." ||| Unfortunately, so can the traffic police, who had been forbidden from harassing drivers: "I know some who are rubbing their hands together", writes Cedric, "it's going to get hot for drivers".
Tsy mandeha ho azy intsony ny tenifototra ao amin'ny Twitter, farafaharatsiny ho an'ireo Bahraini mpampiasa Twitter izay mampiasa tenifototra ho toy ny fitaovana iray hanelezana vaovao mikasika ny hetsi-panoheran-dry zareo hanoherana ny fitondràna iray izay hatreto dia nanolotra azy ireo sarintsarim-panovàna taorian'ny herintaona maninjitra nanaovany hetsi-panoherana. ||| Twitter hashtags are no longer spontaneous, at least not to Bahraini Twitter users who are using hashtags as another tool to spread information about their protest against a regime which has so far granted them cosmetic reforms after a whole year of protest.
Na dia vitsy amin'ny isa aza ny vahoaka ao Bahrain, dia tena mifandrindra tsara kosa ireo mpampiasa Twitter ao anaty aterineto, mampiasa ny sehatry ny media sosialy ho toy ny làlan-tokana hitehirizan'izy ireo ny heloka bevava ataon'ny fitondràna amin'izy ireo. ||| Although Bahrain's population is small in number, Twitter users are very organized online, using social media platforms as their only way to document the crimes of the regime against them.
Ity hevitra hiresaka betsaka ny tenifototra ity dia nanaomboka tamin'ny fanehoana firaisankina tamin'i Abdulhadi Khawaja, mafàna fo iray manan ny toerany sady olo-malazan'ny fanoherana, izay voaheloka higadra mandra-maty taorian'ny niampangana azy ho nanandrana nanongam-panjakana ary nitokona tsy hihinan-kanina efa ho herinandro maro. ||| This idea to trend hashtags started in solidarity with Abdulhadi Khawaja, a prominent activist and opposition figure, who is sentenced to life imprisonment after being accused of attempting to overthrow the regime and who has been on hunger strike for weeks.
Volana vitsy teo aloha teo, ireo Bahrainis dia nahavita nametraka tenifototra marobe mba haely erak'izao tontolo izao. ||| For the previous month, Bahrainis have succeeded in getting several hashtags to trend worldwide.
Tamin'ny ezak'izy ireo farany, dia naniry hanoratra ho an'ny Formule 1 ry zareo, ilay mpikarakara hazakazaka fiarakodia manana ny lazany, mba hanafoana ny hazakazak'izy ireo tsy handalo ao Bahrain ho hetsika hanoherana ny fanitsakitsahan'ny mpitondra ny zon'olombelona. ||| In their latest attempt, they wanted to address Formula 1, the famous car race organizer, to cancel their race in Bahrain in protest against the regime's violations against human rights.
Ilay hazakazaka dia voaomnana hatao ny 20 hatramin'ny 22 Aprily 2012. ||| The race is scheduled to be held from April 20 to 22, 2012.
"Tsy dia nahasarika loatra ny sain'ireo mpamaphalala vavao isika ary ankehitriny dia tsy ampy fanajàna ireo maritiorantsika sy ny voafonjantsika noho ny famelàna ny "BloodyF1" hisy eto Bahrain" ||| "We never got enough media attention and now you're disrespecting our martyrs and prisoners by allowing the "BloodyF1" in Bahrain"
Tsy manohana ny "bloodyF1" aho satria io dia mandeha hafatra diso toy ny hoe mandeha TSARA ny zavatra rehetra eto Bahrain raha toa kosa ny mponina ka mangirifiry isan-andro vaky izao. ||| I don't support the "bloodyF1" because it sends a wrong msg that everything is OK in Bahrain while the people suffer on a daily basis
mety haharangitra anao ny "BloodyF1", saingy moa va handranitra anao bebe kokoa noho ieo 83 namoy n y ainy? ||| "BloodyF1" may annoy you, but does it annoy you more than the 83 who lost their lives?
Marika manohitra ny Formula1 nobitsihan'ny mafàna fo iray ||| Anti-Formula1 signs tweeted by activist
Mpanao hetsi-panoherana ao Sitra mitafy akanjo manohitra ny hazakazaka formule 1 ||| Protester in Sitra wearing a shirt against the formula 1 race
Ny olom-pirenena hafa niezaka naneho hoe mahatsiravina toy ny inona moa ny fomba iainana ao Bahrain: ||| Other netizens tried to show how horrifying the situation in Bahrain is:
Ny hafa nandefa bitsika ny sarin'ny famelezana amin'ny entona mandatsa-dranomaso, izay nanjary zavatra iainana iray isanandro ho an'ireo Bahrainis. ||| Others tweeted pictures of tear gas attacks, which have became part of everyday life for Bahrainis.
Bahrain: Manondrana ny tanàna amin'ny entona mandatsa-dranomaso ||| Bahrain: Flood the villages with poison gas
Govt -n'i bahrain mamono anay amin'ny fampiasàna entona misy poizina..Tsy vonona ho amin'izay F1 i Bahrain ||| Government of Bahrain is killing us by using toxic gases.. Bahrain not ready for F1
Ary anatin'ny roa minitra monja, dia vitan'ilay teny fototra ny niakatra ho eny amin'ny tampony tamin'ireo tantara resahana be tao amin'ny Twitter: ||| And for two minutes only, the hash tag was able to make it to the top trending stories on Twitter:
Japana: Tantaran'ny "Gypsy" Nokleary ||| Japan: A Nuclear Gypsy's Tale
Talohan'ny nampibaribarian'ny lozan'i Fukushima ny toetra manaitran'ny indostria nokleary Japoney, efa taona maro izao no nanao asa anaty fotoana fohy tao anatin'io toby io ireo mpiasa an-tselika nefa tsy nahalala akory ny risika amin'ny asany. ||| Before the Fukushima accident brought to light the parlous state of the Japanese nuclear industry, for years temporary workers have jumped in and out of remunerative short-term jobs at the power plants ignoring the risk of their profession.
Takeshi Kawakami dia iray amin'ireo antsoina hoe mpandehandeha nokleary ary tahaka ireo mpiara-miasa aminy maro, izay efa 30 taona izao no nanaovany asa fivelomana tany amin'ireo toby noklearin'ny firenena mandritra ny fotoana fohy. ||| Takeshi Kawakami was one of the so-called 'nuclear gypsies' and just like many other colleagues of his, for about 30 years he made a livelihood working at the different nuclear plants of the country for short periods.
Efa an-taona maro izay no nahazoany vola amin'ny fanampiana ny fanamboarana na fanoloana ireo ampahany tsy miasa tsara amin'ireo toby nokleary sy ny fanaraha-maso ireo raharaha mety hampidi-doza noho ny fisian'ny risika fivoahan'ny taratra mahery vaika. ||| For years he earned money helping repair or replace malfunctioning parts of nuclear reactors and carrying out dangerous operations, with a high-risk of radiation exposure.
Anatin'ny bilaoginy, nampahafantatra ny kolikoly sy ny fanaovana fifanarahana miafina nisy teo amin'ny governemanta sy ny indostria nokleary i Kawakami, mampifantoka ny fandrakofany ao amin'ny toby noklearin'i Hamaoka. ||| In his blog, Kawakami denounced the corruption and collusion between the government and the nuclear industry, focusing his coverage on the Hamaoka nuclear power plant.
Vao haingana io toby nokleary io no nakatona noho ny fangatahan'ny governemanta Japoney noho ny fanaovana asa fanamboarana taorian'ny fiheverana hoe mampidi-doza ny fanohizana ny fanaovan-draharaha anaty taratra nefa izy dia ao anatin'ny faritr'ireo tany lalovan'ny triatra vokatry ny horohoron-tany any amin'ireo nosy Japoney. ||| This power plant was recently shut down at the request of the Japanese government for remedial work after it was deemed dangerous to continue operating in light of its position on one of the major seismic faults lines in the Japanese archipelago.
Ao amin'ilay lahatsoratra izay voadika amin'ny ampahany eto, milaza ny zava-niainany amin'ny maha-mpiasa an-tselika azy izy rehefa niasa voalohany indrindra tao anatina mpamokatra enton-drano tao amin'ny Toby noklearin'i Genkai any atsimon'i Japana. ||| In the post partly translated here, he tells of his experiences as a temporary worker when he worked for the first time inside a steam generator at the Genkai nuclear power plant in southern Japan.
Nadika eo ambany faneken'ny mpanoratra ity lahatsoratra manaraka ity: ||| The following post was originally published on December 26th, 2010 and translated with the author's consent:
Efa mihoatra kely ny 5 taona aho no niasa tao amin'ny Toby noklearin'i Hamaoka, nefa tsy voalohany izao no niasako tanatina Toby nokleary. ||| I worked at Hamaoka nuclear plant for a little over 5 years, but it was not the only time I'd worked at a power plant.
Talohan'i Hamaoka, nandany ny faha-30 taonako niasa tanatina toby nokleary teo amin'ny manodidina ihany aho nandritra ny 10 taona teo ho eo tamin'ny taona 1980. ||| Before Hamaoka, I spent my 30's working at a nearby nuclear plant for about 10 years in the 1980's.
Tamin'izany fotoana izany, tsy niasa tanatina toerana iray monja aho fa nifindrafindra tamina toby maro mba hanao asa fikojakojana mitohy. ||| At that time, I did not work at just one site but was moving from one plant to another to do regular maintenance work.
Tato ho ato, izany sokajin'olona izany dia antsoina hoe "mpifindrafindra toerana nokleary" miaraka amina somary fanambaniana kely ary tamin'izany vanim-potoana izany aho dia niaina tahaka ny iray amin'ireo. ||| Recently, that kind of people are called "Nuclear gypsies" with a bit of contempt and in that period I was living as one of those.
Roa taona taorian'ny nanombohako ny fiainana mirenirenin'ny mpifindrafindra toerana, Voalohany indrindra no nidirako tao anatin'ny ||| Two years after I began the wandering life of a gypsy, I entered for the first time the
Ny zava-nitranga marina tamin'iny andro iny dia nisy olona nisolo ahy ary niditra tao anatin'ny mpamokatra entona mba hametraka ilay robot. ||| Actually what happened on the day was that another person replaced me and entered the steam generator to install the robot.
Taorian'ny fahavitan'ny fametrahana, nisy olana satria dia tsy nety namaly ilay robot ary tsy afaka nobaikoana avy aty ivelany. ||| After the installation was completed, there was a problem in that the robot wouldn't respond and thus could not be operated from outside.
Nisy loaka kely be dia be tamin'ny rindrin'ny foiben'ny mpamokatra entona ary ireo "tongotra" enin'ilay robot (enina izy ireo raha tsy diso aho), nampiasaina avy amin'ny alalan'ny fibaikoana alavitra, dia tokony ho afaka nanaraha-maso izany avy amin'ny alalan'ireo loadoaka ireo. ||| There are many small holes in the walls of the central part of the steam generator and the six (I believe there were six) 'legs' of a robot, operated via a remote control, should be able to survey it through those holes.
Ireo mpiasa tompon'andraikitra amin'ny fanaraha-maso ny fametrahana dia nihevitra araka izany fa nisy olana ny fametrahana araka ny tokony ho izy ny tongotr'ilay robot. ||| The employees in charge of supervising the installation concluded that there had been a problem in properly positioning the robot's legs.
Raha tsy mipetaka tsara ireo 'tongotra' ka avela amin'izany toerana izany ilay robot, dia mety hijanona tsy handeha amin'ny fotoana rehetra izany. ||| If the 'legs' are not completely inserted and the robot is left in that position, it could fall down at any time.
Raha izany no mitranga, midika fahaverezana milina manana fahamarinana avo (de precision) izany, izay voalaza fa mitentina eo amin'ny yen zato tapitrisa maro eo. ||| If that happens, it spells the loss of a precision machine that's said to be worth several hundred million yen.
Izany no nahatonga ahy nalefa niditra tany anatin'ilay mpamokatra, tsy nanam-potoana hiomanako akory, mba hamerina ilay robot amin'ny toerana mety hampiasaina azy talohan'ny nitrangan'ny loza. ||| That's why I was sent in to enter the generator, on very short notice, to replace the robot back to its correct operating position before that happened.
Nanomboka nanao ny fitaovana sy akanjo ilaiko aho hidirako ao anatin'ilay trano, teo amina toerana manakaiky ilay mpamokatra entona. ||| I started putting on the gear to enter the housing at a spot near the steam generator.
Nisy mpiara-miasa amiko roa nanampy ahy niakanjo. ||| Two workers helped me put it on.
Efa nanao akanjo roa sosona aho, ary teo ambonin'izany, nanao akanjo fiarovana Tyvek izay vita avy amin'ny taratasy sy vinyl, ary nanao saron-tava misy rivotra alefa aminà fantsona aho. ||| I was already wearing two layers of work clothes, and on top of those, I put on Tyvek protective gear made of paper and vinyl, and an airline respirator.
Ho fanampin'izay, nanarona ny tendako, ireo hato-tanako sy ny kitrokeliko tamin'ny vinyl maro aho mba tsy hisy na dia fisokafana bitika aza. ||| Plus, I wrapped a lot of vinyl tape around my neck, my wrists and my ankles, to block even the slightest opening.
Vao vita ny fanaovako ilay akanjo fiarovana — izay raha tsorina dia ohatra ny akanjona mpoandeha sambondanitra— nizotra nankany amin'ilay tranobe aho. ||| Once I finished putting on the protective gear — which honestly looks like an astronaut suit — I headed toward the housing.
Rehefa tonga tany amin'ny faritr'ilay tranobe aho, nisy mpiasa roa niandry. ||| When I arrived at the area near the housing, two workers were waiting.
Mpiasa anatina orisana iray antsoina hoe Japanese Society for Non-Destructive Inspection izy ireo ary, ny nahatalanjona ahy, na dia avo dia avo aza ny fielezan'ny taratra ao amin'io faritra io, tsy niakanjo afa- tsy ny akanjo fiasana tsotra izy ireo. ||| They were employees of a company called the Japanese Society for Non-Destructive Inspection and, to my surprise, despite the area being highly radioactive, they were wearing nothing but plain working clothes.
Tsy nanao saron-tava akory izy ireo. ||| They weren't even wearing masks.
Nanasa ahy ilay olona tompon'andraikitra ary, taorian'ny nandinihany ny masoko tanatin'ilay saron-tava, dia nanondrika ny lohany nandritry ny fotoana fohy. ||| The person who appeared to be in charge invited me over and, after a look at my eyes inside the mask, nodded his head a few times.
Heveriko fa ny fandinihany ny masoko fotsiny ihany dia efa nahafahany hamantatra fa afaka miasa ao anatin'ilay fony aho. ||| I guess just looking into my eyes he was able to determine that I'd be able to handle working in the core.
Niaraka nankany amin'ny mpamokatra entona izahay. ||| He and I went to the steam generator together.
Izay no nahitako maso ny mpamokatra entona voalohany indrindra. ||| That was the first time I saw the generator with my own eyes.
Boribory na somary lavalava ny bikany, mety eo amin'ny 3 ny savaivony (mety tsy tadidiko tsara ny habeny), ary nipetraka tamina toerana mbola avo noho ilay makarakara nitsangananay. ||| It was I guess a spherical or oval shape, maybe 3 meters in diameter (I might not be remembering the size correctly), and was located at a position higher than the grating we were standing on.
Ny fototr'ilay mpamokatra entona dia toa nahatakatra ny soroko, teo amin'ny latsaky ny 1.5m teo. ||| The base of the steam generator more or less reached my shoulder, at slightly less than 1.5m.
Any amin'ny farany, nisy zohindriaka. ||| At the bottom, there was a manhole.
Nivoha izy io, ary tonga dia fantatro fa tsy maintsy hiditra ao anatiny aho. ||| The manhole was open, and I immediately realized I would have to climb up into it.
Nalefany manodidina ahy ny tanan'ilay tompon'andraikitra avy amin'ny JSNDI ary niara-nanatona ny zohindriaka izahay. ||| The JSNDI employee in charge put his arm around me and together we approached the manhole.
Nanatona ny sisiny izahay ary nijery ny tao anatiny. ||| We looked over the edge and peered in.
Maizina tao anatiny, ary mavesatra sy tsy azo iainana ny rivotra. ||| Inside was dark, and the air was dense and stagnant.
Tahaka ny nisy zavatra mampiahiahy niaina ao anatiny. ||| It felt as though something sinister was living inside.
Lasa matroka ny endriko. ||| My expression glazed over.
Nisy fahatsapana tahotra nisoko miadana tato amiko. ||| A slight sensation of dread came over me.
Raha nanakaiky ny zohindriaka aho, nahamarika fimonomononana tanatin'ny sofiko sy nahatsapa ho niahotra aho hiditra ao anatiny. ||| As I approached the manhole, I noticed a ringing in my ears and felt reluctant to go in.
Rehefa nijery tao anatiny aho, hitako fa nifatotra tamin'ilay rindrina natoron'ilay mpiasan'ny ilay robot. ||| When I looked inside, I saw that the robot was attached to the wall indicated by the employee.
Tsy nifatotra tsara izany, izay no nahatonga ny fandefasana ahy tany. ||| It was not properly attached, which is why I had been sent in.
Nampihorohoro ny tontolo tao anatiny ary tsy maintsy niady tamin'ny faniriako hitsoaka aho. ||| The atmosphere inside was ghastly and I had to desperately fight off the urge to flee.
Mety tsy te-hiditra tao anatiny aho, nefa tsy afaka nandà. ||| I might not have wanted to enter, but I was in no position to refuse.
Nanana bika efamira ilay robot, 40 cm isaky ny lafiny ary 20 cm ny hateviny. ||| The robot was square-shaped, 40 cm on each side and 20 cm deep.
Nantsoina hoe 'robot hàla' izany. ||| It was called a 'spider robot'.
nanatohaka ny tarehiny tamin'ny sisin'ny zohindriaka ilay mpiasan'ny JSNDI, ny ampahatelon'ny tarehiny dia ntodika tany anatiny, ary nanazava tamim-pahatoniana tamiko ny zavatra tokony hataoko. ||| The JSNDI employee put his face at the edge of the manhole, a third of his face peering in, and diligently explained what I had to do.
Nisy fahamalinana kely tamin'izany fotoana izany ny amin'ny loza ateraky ny fielezan'ny taratra ho an'ireo mpiasa, nefa na izany aza dia lasa saina tamin'ny hetsika feno faharisihan'ilay mpiasa, izay nijery tao anatin'ilay tranobe niaraka tamiko aho. ||| There was little awareness at the time of the dangers to workers of radiation exposure, but even so I was concerned about the bold act of the employee, who looked inside the housing with me.
Nanohy nijery tao anatiny izy, tsy tqitrq qkory, ary tadidiko ho nanontany tena aho hoe maninona izy no tsy natahotra. ||| He continued looking inside, unfazed, and I remember wondering why he wasn't scared.
Izaho efa saika rakotra tanteraka raha izy kosa tsy nanao na dia saron-tava fotsiny ihany aza. ||| I was almost completely covered while he wasn't even wearing a mask.
Taorian'ny nahazoako ny fanazavana amin'ny antsipiriany ny asa tsy maintsy ataoko ao anatiny, tonga ny fotoana andehanana. ||| After receiving a very detailed explanation of the work that I was to do inside, it was time.
nanatona ny zohindriaka teo akaikina tohatra miankina izay nentina tany aho, ary nanao famantarana tamin'ny loha taty amiko ilay mpiasan'ny JSNDI. ||| I crouched beneath the manhole next to a stepping ladder that had been brought in, and the JSNDI employee gave me a deep nod.
Nitsangana aho, nianika ilay tohatra, ary nanosika ny vatako ambony miankina amin'ilay zohindriaka. ||| I stood up, climbed the ladder, and pushed my upper body through the manhole.
Tamin'izany segondra izany indrindra, nisy zavatra nitazona ny lohako ary nanery mafy ny lohako. ||| In that second, something grabbed at my head and squeezed hard.
Tonga dia nigobona ny sofoko avy eo. ||| A pounding in my ear started right away.
Miady amin'ny tahotra, nametraka ireo tanako tamin'ny sisin'ilay zohindriaka aho ary nampiasa ny elanelana mba hanosehiko ny vatako rehetra any anatiny. ||| Battling fear, I placed my hands around the rim of the manhole and used the momentum to launched my whole body inside.
Mbola nitombo ihany ilay feo migobona. ||| The pounding sound got bigger.
Nisy mpiasa iray niteny fa vantany vao nitsofoka ny toby nokleary izy dia naheno feo tahaka ny drakaka mikisakisaka. ||| One worker said that right after he entered a nuclear reactor he heard a noise like a moving crab.
Niteny izy fa mbola henony ihany izany feo izany taorian'ny nahavitany ny asa. ||| He said that he could still hear this noise after he finished the work.
Na taorian'ny asa fanaraha-maso aza, rehefa niverina tany an-tranony izy, tsy mbola afaka tao an-tsofiny ilay feo. ||| Even after the inspection work, when he went back home, he couldn't forget that noise.
Niafara tamin'ny fahakiviany izany. ||| The man ended up having a nervous breakdown.
Ny mpanoratra iray izay naheno ity tantara ity dia niresaka tamin'io lehilahy io ary nanoratra asa soratra feno mistery momba ny zava-niainany. ||| A writer who heard this story spoke to this man and wrote a mystery novel based on that experience.
Ny lohatenin'ilay boky dia "Ny drakaky ny toby nokleary". ||| The title of the book is "The crab of the nuclear reactor".
Nivoaka tamin'ny taona 1981 ary nalaza dia nalaza teo aminay. ||| It was published in 1981 and was very popular among us.
Raha ny momba ahy, tsy mbola naheno feo tahaka ny drakaka aho fa nahatsapa fa voatery mafy ny lohako ary naheno lalina tany anatin'ny sofiko, ako maranitra tahaka ny sutra "gan, gan, gan". ||| In my case, I never heard such a crab-like noise but I had the feeling that my head was being tightly constricted and deep in my ears I heard very high-tempo echoes like a sutra "gan, gan, gan".
Rehefa niditra ny mpamokatra entona aho dia nitsangana tampoka ary nikasoka ny valindrihana ny arolohako. ||| When I entered the steam generator I stood up all of a sudden and my helmet hit the ceiling.
Noho izany dia tsy maintsy niforitra aho ary nitazona ny sandry ankiroan'ilay robot tanatin'ny efitra maizina. ||| So I had to bend my neck and hold both the arms of the robot in the darkish room.
"OK" hoy aho nihiaka. ||| "OK" I screamed.
Tsy voabahana intsony ilay robot ary nivoaka ny lavaka ny tongony. ||| So the robot was unlocked and its feet jumped out of the hole.
Tsy dia mavesatra noho izay noeritreretiko ilay robot. ||| The entire robot was not as heavy as I had thought.
Taorian'ny nametrahako tamin'ny laoniny ireo tongony tao anatin'ireo lavaka dia niteny OK indray aho ary nipetraka tao anatin'ilay lavaka izy araka izany. ||| After I matched its feet position in the holes I gave them another OK sign and so it was positioned in the hole.
Tanatin'ny aizina, rehefa namerina nijery aho raha tafapetraka tao anatin'ireo lavaka daholo ny tongony dia nanao OK indray aho ary nivoaka ny zohindriaka. ||| In the dark, when I verified that all the feet had entered into the holes I gave them another OK and jumped out of the manhole.
(Vantany vao tafavoaka,) Mbola somary tohina kely ihany aho nefa nijery ny fitaovam-pandrefesana ary nahita fa nanamarika 180 izany, raha 200 kosa ny sanda lehibe indrindra afaka tahiriziny. ||| (Once outside,) I was almost in shock but looked at the alarm meter and saw that it had recorded a value equal to 180, when the maximum it can record is 200.
Tanatina 15 segondra monja, nilona tamina taratra avo dia avo aho, 180 millirem. ||| In only 15 seconds, I was exposed to an unbelievably high level of radiation, 180 millirem.
Tamin'izany fotoana izany dia nampiasaina ny mari-drefy 'millirem' raha hafa kosa izany ankehitriny. ||| At that time the unit 'millirem' was used while now it's different.
Ankehitriny dia mampiasa ny sievert avokoa ny olon-drehetra. ||| Now everybody uses sievert.
Tamin'ity fotoana ity dia niandraikitra ny asa fanaraha-maso izay naharitra teo amin'ny 1 volana teo aho. ||| That time I was in charge of an inspection work that lasted about 1 month.
Taorian'izay dia niasa tanatina toby nokleary iray hafa aho nefa fanindroany izao fa mbola tsy afaka tato amiko ny tahotra ary mbola niatrika indray ilay feo mampatahotra. ||| After that I worked in another nuclear reactor but even on the second time I couldn't get through the fear and experienced the same creepy noise.
Isaorana i Tomoko Tsuchiya Chris Salzberg tamin'ny fanampian'izy ireo tamin'ity lahatsoratra ity. ||| Thanks to Tomoko Tsuchiya and Chris Salzberg for helping with this article.
Korea Atsimo: Fifampitifiran'ny Super-Supermarkets (Fivarotana goavambe) any anaty Twitter ||| South Korea: The Super-Supermarkets Twitter shootout
Raha manao telimoka an'ireo fandraharahàna madinika ireo toeram-pivarotana goavambe, mipongatra kosa ny adihevitra mivaivay ao Korea, na io anaty aterineto na ety ivelany. ||| As mega-markets arrive to devour small businesses, serious discussions have been rekindled in Korea in both online and offline venues.
Ny alin'ny 28 Oktobra, raha tao anatin'ny fandaharam-potoanan'ny Fahitalavitra lehibe iray ny fifanakalozan-dresaka mikasika ny SSM, mpifanandrina roa goavana, ny iray misolo tena ireo mpiombon'antoka goavana ary ny iray mpiaro ny tompona fandraharahàna madinika, no nifamaky ady tao amin'ny Twitter. ||| On the night of October 28, while a serious debate on the SSM issue was taking place on a major TV network program, two formidable opponents, one representing big corporations and the other standing for the small business owners, engaged in a battle on in Twitter.
Chung sy Moon dia endrika roa fantatry ny maro tsara fa mipetraka amin'ny tendro roa mifanohitra (mifanao atsimo sy avaratra) raha resaka momba ny SSM. ||| Chung and Moon are two prominent figures standing on diametrically opposite sides of the SSM debate.
