Myanmar: Te-hampihendanja ny mpanokatena ny miaramila ||| Myanmar: Soldiers Trying to Reduce Monk's Influence
Ny Feo demokratikan'i Birmania, fikambanana mpamoaka vaovao tsy mikatsaka tombotsoa, hany ahenoana ny vaovao avy ao Myanmar mbola maratra amin'izao fotoana izao no mitantara fa miezaka ny hampitsahatra ny fiainam-pahamasinan'ny mpanokatena ny miaramila. ||| Democratic Voice of Burma, a non-profit news organization and one of the few places where the news from Myanmar still trickling in has posted a report in Burmese on soldiers trying to get the monks to give up their religious life.
Mpanokatena 300 voasambotra andro vitsy lasa izay no natoby tao anaty garazy mifanila amin'ny Oniversiten'i GTI Insein. ||| Some 300 monks who were arrested a few days ago were delivered to a garage just out side of Insein GTI College.
Voalaza fa manery ny mpanokatena natoby ao ny miaramila "hanary ny fiainam-pahamasinana (fiainan'izao tontolo izao no itateran'ny gazety azy eo ambony io), hanaisotra ny lambam-pahamasinana irakofana (ny lamba jaky fahitantsika), hiverina ho lahika ary tsy hanaja intsony ny haifitondrantena mahampitokamonina." ||| The soldiers are reported to be trying to force the monks to" give up the secular life, to disrobe - become a layperson and no longer honor the ethics of being a monk".
Heverina ho fahotana ny miala amin'ny fiainam-panokanatena tsy amin'antony. ||| It is considered to be a sin to just give up being monkhood without valid reasons.
Te-hampihen-danja ny fanajan'ny vahoaka azy noho izany no kendren'ireo miaramila ireo, te-hanala baraka ny mpanokatena. ||| The soldiers are trying to significantly lower their influence on people down, to shame them.
Milaza ihany koa ny DVB fa nampiantso ny "zokiolona indrindra amin'ny mpanokatena ao Instein" ny miaramila hamaky ny soratra pali hanombohana ny fampahamenarana ny mpanokatena, hampiova azy ireo ho lahika. ||| DVB also mentioned that soldiers ordered the "most senior monk in Insein" to come over and read pali scriptures that will begin the process of "shaming the monks" to make monks change into laypersons.
Saingy nanda hamerinteny ny soratra vakian'ny zokiolona ny mpanokatena ary nony afaka kelikely dia niteny ilay zokiolona fa tsy afaka ny handresy lahatra azy ireo hiova ho lahika, tsy hisy na oviana na oviana izany fiovana izany ka nanda ny hanohy ny vakinteny izy ary dia nolazaina fa navela nandeha. ||| However, the monks, who are supposed to repeat the pali scriptures read by the senior monks, refused to repeat them and after a while, the senior monk said that he can't convert them into laypersons and that it just won't happen and refused and supposedly left.
Notaterina ihany koa fa ampijalian'ny miaramila ny mpanokatena ao Insein. ||| There are reports that the soldiers are also beating the monks in Insein.
Nisy mpanamboatra ny simba amin'ireny fantson-drano ireny niasa tao amin'ny garazy, nitady azy io ny mpanokatena iray saingy voaloaza fa nokapohina miaramila iray tamin'ny fehikibo ilay mpanokatena (sahisahy). ||| When a plumber came to fix the water pipes in the place, a monk looked up to see him and a soldier is said to have hit him with his belt.
Mbola misy filazana hafa ihany koa fa fony nentina tanaty fiaraben'ny miaramila teny amin'ny lalambe ireo mpanokatena ireo ka nisy mpamily iray nampaneno ny anjomara (noho ny tahotra) dia najanon'ny miaramila ny fiara ary nosamborina io mpamisy voalaza io. ||| There was also a report that when the army truck with these monks passed by cars on the street, one driver made the mistake of honking (probably in fear) and the soldiers stopped the truck and arrested the driver who honked.
Mbola nisy ihany koa nitatitra fa nisy mpanokatena iray rapa tamin'ny tongony roa nentina tao amin'ny hopitaly lehibe ka nibaiko ny mpitsabo tao ireo miaramila ireo fa tsy mahazo tsaboina io mpanokatena io raha tsy efa manaiky hivadika ho lahika. ||| There are also reports that a monk with wounds on his feet was brought to the general hospital and the soldiers ordered the doctors to not treat the monk until he converted back to a layperson.
Namaly noho izany ilay mpanokatena fa aleony maty fa tsy hanaiky hiova ho lahika mihitsy izy. ||| The monk then replied that he will not revert to become a layperson and preferred to die from his wounds.
Voalaza ary fa voatery naka alalana manokana avy tamin'ny praiminisitra lefitra mihitsy ny mpitsabo tao vao afaka nikarakara ilay mpanokatena. ||| Apparently, the hospital staff had to get the permission of the Deputy Prime Minister Dr. Mya Oo to be able to finally treat the monk.
Vavolombelon maro no nitatitra fa nambenana miaramila maro ny hopitaly nandritra izany fotoana izany ka hadiahadiany avokoa izay miditra sy mivoaka eo. ||| Witnesses report that soldiers have surrounded the entrances and exits of the general hospital and are interrogating everyone who is visiting.
Fankalazana ny faha205 taona ny fahaleovantenan'i Haiti ||| Haiti: 205th Anniversary of Haitian Independence
Taorian'ny voina izay nandravarava tamin'ny 2008, dia teo ho eo ihany ny fankalazan'ny vahoaka Haitiana ny fanombohan'ny taona 2009 - satria ankoatra ny maha fanombohan'ny taona azy eto Haiti, dia manamarika ny fahaleovantena azo tamin'i France tamin'ny 1804 ihany koa ny voalohany Janoary, ka nahatonga an'i Haiti ho firenena mainty voalohany nandala ny demaokrasia manerantany. ||| After the disasters they went through in 2008, Haitian people celebrated the start of 2009 more or less happily - in Haiti, January 1st marks not only New Year, but also the date when in 1804, the island got independence from France, becoming the first black democracy in the world.
Mampiahatsiahy ny androm-pankalazana ny mpamaham-bolongana Haitiana amin'ny teny frantsay na mampiomana amin'ny fahasahiranana hatrehina rahampitso aza izy ireo: ||| Some French-speaking Haitian bloggers pay homage to the anniversary while readying themselves for the difficulties their country will have to face in the future:
Manazava ny fandehan'ny tantara nizotra ho amin'ny fahaleovantenan'ny nosy i Darlie sady niteny ihany koa ny nentin-drazana nolovain'ny Haitiana mifandraika amin'izany: mihinana "soup joumou" amin'ny 1 Janoary... ||| Darlie explains the historical events which led to the island's independence but also tells of the traditional celebration inherited by Haitians: eating "soup joumou" on January 1st...
Voalaza fa nandritra ny nahazanatany an'i Saint-Domingue, dia nalaza tokoa ny lasopy saingy natokana ho an'ny tompon'andevo sy ny andevo an-trano antsoina Andevo manantalenta, tahaka an'i Toussaint Louverture izany. ||| It is said that at the time when Santo Domingo was a colony, soup was in fashion, but only for the slave masters and mainly some house slaves, called Talented slaves, like Toussaint Louverture.
Raha mirary "sakafo matsiro" ho an'ny vahoakany izy amin'izao fotoanan'ny firariantsoa izao dia tahaka ny mirary firaisan-kina ihany: ||| While she wishes her people "a good meal", her Season's Greetings sound more like a plea for solidarity:
Andao hiaina tsy misy fitaka, hiara-miaina, hivondrona hiaraka amin'ny lalan'ny firahalahiana, fandriampahalemana ary ny fampihavanana ||| Let's live truly, together, let's walk united on the path to brotherhood, peace and reconciliation
Ireo tenin'i Darlie ireo dia mahaliana kokoa noho ny vina natolotry ny filoha Haitiana René Garcia Préval ho amin'ny taona 2009 wizay ho "taona sarotra...ho an'ny Haitiana" (araka ny notaterin'i Romandie News) nandritra ny fitsidihana ofisialy tany Gonaïves avaratry Haiti. ||| These words from Darlie are all the more interesting given Haitian President René Garcia Préval 's forecast that 2009 will be "a difficult year...for Haitians" (as reported by Romandie News) during his official visit to Gonaïves in northern Haiti.
Fifanojoan-javatra ve fa i Gonaïves indrindra no toerana voalazan'ny tantara ho nahaterahan'ny fahaleovantena - sady faritra niaritra ny mafy indrindra tamin'ny Fandravaravan'ny rivodoza nandritra ny 2008. ||| Coincidentally, Gonaïves is the historical birthplace of Haiti's independence - and also the region that suffered most from 2008's devastating hurricanes.
Ao amin'ny bolongana HaitiRectoVerso, no nilazan'i Decky Lakyel tamim-pahagagana ihany ny nahatongavan'ny mpitondra ambony tany Gonaives ny andro mialoha ny fankalazana. ||| In the blog HaitiRectoVerso, Decky Lakyel relates with a certain amazement the early arrival of the Haitian government officials in Gonaives, one day before the official date of the celebration.
Nohazavainy araka izay henony ao amin'ny Radio Kiskeya, ny antony roa nahatonga ity fitsidihana ity: ||| Blogging about an interview heard on Radio Kiskeya, he explains the double motivation of this early visit:
Neken'ny minisitra fa ny fitsidihana tampoka nandritra ny roa andro nataon'ny fahefana mpanatanteraka taty amin'ny tanànan'ny fahaleovantena (Gonaïves) dia ny hanamarika ny faha-205 taona ny fahaleovantena, ary maneho ny "fanekena ny mahazavadehibe ny famantarana (hita maso)" ny toerana manorina ny tantaram-pirenen'i Haiti. ||| The Minister confesses that the surprising 2 day visit of the Executive officials to Independence City (Gonaïves) to celebrate the 205th anniversary of the Haitian epic, represents the "acknowledgement of the symbolic importance" of those founding places in Haitian national history.
Nefa rehefa avy namaky ny lahatsoratra farany nosoratan'ny mpamaham-bolongana Haitiana Stanley Lucas ao amin'ny Solutionhaiti, dia mivandravandra fa tsy ny rehetra tsy akory no resy lahatra amin'izany ezaka izany. Fabienne Flessel ||| But after reading the last post of Haitian blogger Stanley Lucas in Solutionhaiti, it is quite obvious that not everyone is convinced by these efforts.
Brezila: Famonoan-jaza ataon'ny fampahalalam-baovao fampisehoana ||| Brazil: Making a child murder into a media show
Tamin'ny alin'ny 29 marsa, dia hita teo anoloan'ny zaridainan'ny tomandavantrano ipetrahany miaraka amin'ny rainy sy ny renikeliny ary ankizy roa miara-tezaina aminy, any amin'ny faritra ipetrahan'ny saranga antonontonony any São Paulo ilay zazavavy 5 taona antsoina hoe Isabella Nardoni. ||| Isabella Nardoni was found dying in the front garden of the apartment block where she lived with her father, her stepmother and her two half-siblings, in a middle class neighborhood in São Paulo.
Hitan'ny mpiandry ny tanàna i Isabella raha tahaka ny natsipy avy any ambaravarakelin'ny efitranony. ||| The caretaker found Isabella after she apparently fell out of her room window.
Taorian'izany dia nolazaina fa nihazakazaka nankeny an-jaridaina ny rainy, nilaza fa mety ho nisy nanipy razazavavy nandritra ny fotoana nahatany ambany rihana azy nanampy ny vadiny, renikelin'Isabella, nitondra ny zanany roa natory niala teo amin'ny garazy nankany an'efitrano. ||| Moments later, her father is said to have rushed into the garden, saying that someone must have thrown her through the window while he was downstairs helping his wife, Isabella's stepmother, bring their two sleeping children from the car in the garage to the apartment.
Miniotra vitsivitsy taorian'izany moa dia nodimandry tao anaty fiara mitondra marary i Isabella. ||| The case has received nonstop coverage on Brazilian blogs and big media.
Niverimberina matetika tao amin'ny Rede Globo, Folha de São Paulo, Estado de São Paulo ary ny fahitalavitra Breziliana maro sy ny gazety moa io fiahiahiana io, ankoatra ny an'ireo bolongana anarivony manerana an'i Brezila. ||| This version of the facts has been repeated over and over in the last few days by Rede Globo, Folha de São Paulo, Estado de São Paulo and many other Brazilian TV stations and newspapers, not to mention on thousands of blogs around Brazil.
Talohaloha dia tsy nitandrina loatra amin'ny fanondroana an'izatsy na izaroa ho ahiahiana nanao ny heloka ny fampahalalam-baovao lehibe Breziliana. ||| In the past, major Brazilian mainstream media groups haven't always been careful when branding this or that suspect guilty of a crime.
Matetika no voatery mamoaka fanitsiam-baovao ny polisy sy ny sampan-draharahm-panjakana mba tsy hanondroana ampahan'olona ho meloka sahady eo anatrehan'ny mponina mialoha ny ahavitan'ny fanadihadiana manontolo. ||| The Brazilian police and investigation bureaus have often been pressured into giving the media information and statements designed to make individuals under investigation look guilty in the eyes of the public before the investigations are concluded.
Raha hita tamin'ny fanadihadiana fa hay olon-kafa no tena meloka dia ankavitsiana no mba manitsy ny fahadisoana nataony ireo fampahalalam-baovao ireo, fa maika hilaza zavatra toy ny fahafatesana mahatsiravina na fahafam-baraka politika ohatra. ||| If, at the end of the official investigation, it is revealed that the real culprit was someone else, the same newspapers have rarely bothered to correct these mistakes, quickly moving on to the next playoff goal, political scandal or horrible death.
Ary indro fa mbola mandady indray amin'ny fanaovana tondro-molotra ny ny tontolon'ny fampahalalam-baovao amin'ity raharaha Isabella Nardoni ity. ||| And the media circus and finger pointing is ramping up yet again in the case of Isabella Nardoni.
Meloka sa tsia tamin'ny famonoana mahatsiravina, efa nambara ho meloka sahady eo imason'ny gazety sy ny fampielezan-tsarin'i Brezila ankehitriny ny rain'Isabela sy ny renikeliny, ary iray amin'ny mpanohana lehibe mavitrika amin'izany fanamelohana izany ny mpitsara misahana ny raharaha, Francisco Cembranelli, izay nanome valandresaka maro ilazany ny finoany fa hizotra amin'ny fanamelohana ny mpivady ny fanadihadiana. ||| Guilty or innocent of the horrible crime, Isabella's father and stepmother have already been declared guilty under the spotlight of Brazilian newspapers and TV shows, and one of the greatest supporters of these statements is the public prosecutor working on the case, Francisco Cembranelli, who has given many interviews suggesting that he does believe the investigations will establish the couple guilty of the murder.
Andeha hojerentsika ny eriteretin'ny tontolom-bolongana Breziliana amin'ity raharaha iray loha ity. ||| Let's check in on what the Brazilian blogosphere thinks about the case.
"Vetivety dia tafapetraka hanana anjara lehibe ao anatin'ny fandaharam-potoan'i Globo ny fitsapana ny hevitry ny mpijery: Raha eritreretinao fa ny rainy no namono an'Isabela Nardoni dia antsoy 0300-703-584-01. ||| "Soon, during Globo's prime time program grid, a new interactive poll: If you think Isabela Nardoni's murderer is the father, call 0300-703-584-01.
Raha ny renikeliny kosa dia antsoy ny 0300-703-584-02. ||| To vote for the stepmother, call 0300-703-584-02.
Tsy andoavam-bola ny antso. ||| The call is toll free.
Tamin'ny 9 Avrily i Ricardo Noblat, mpanao gazety sady manoratra amin'ny bolongana ampiatranoan'i Globo.com – vavahadin-tseraseran'i Rede Globo – no namoaka vaovao mafana tamin'ity raharaha ity: ||| On April 9th, Ricardo Noblat, a journalist who writes a blog hosted by Globo.com - Rede Globo's Internet portal - wrote a post with breaking news about the case:
"Ny rainy, Alexandre Nardoni, no nanipy ny zanany vavy dimy taona Isabella Nardoni avy eny am-baravarakely." ||| "It was the father, Alexandre Nardoni, who threw his daughter, 5 years old Isabella Nardoni, trough the window."
Nampitain'ny mpitsara Francisco José Cembranelli nandritra ny resadresaka tamina andiana mpanao gazety androany tlakandro io vaovao io. ||| The information was given this afternoon by the prosecutor Francisco José Cembranelli in a private conversation with a group of journalists.
Taloha dia efa nanao tahaka izao nataony tamin'i Alexandre izao tamin'ny mpianany iray taloha koa ity mpitsara ity. ||| In the past, the prosecutor had Alexandre as one of his students.
Nolazainy manko fa io mpianany io fa "kamovelona, mpirobaroba amin'ny volandrainy noho ny hajejoany". ||| He refers to him as "a slob, who always lived on his father expenses, a playboy".
Ny andro manaraka dia nanda i Cembranelli fa tsy nilaza izany teny araka ny fitateran'i Noblat izany ary dia nanakiana mivantana ny Mpamaham-bolongana mpanao gazety Noblat ny lehilahy. ||| Next day, when asked by reporters about the statements Noblat quoted him as saying, Cembranelli denied having said anything like that, and made personal attacks to the blogger-journalist Noblat.
Taorian'io indrindra dia nihoatra ny 200 ny isan'ny fanehoan-kevitra tamin'ny lahatsoratry Noblat ary ny ankamaroany dia fiampangana an'i Noblat ho mamorom-baovao na tsy marim-pototra ny loharanom-baovaony. ||| Right after this, more than 200 comments were made on Noblat's post - most of them accusing Noblat of fabricating news or standing over dubious sources to make his statements.
Mandraka ankehitriny moa dia manam-paharetana i Noblat mamaly ireo fanehoan-kevitra rehatra ireo, feno fitokisana amin'ny nolazain'ny loharanom-baovaony, ary miampanga an'i Cembranelli ho mandà indray izay tena nolazainy raha niresadresaka tamin'ny mpanao gazety izy. ||| Up to now, Noblat has been answering patiently to all comments, keeping his faith in his sources and in what he stated before, and accusing Cembranelli of denying falsely what he had effectively said before, in that conversation with journalists.
"Mivandravandra loatra ny fanirian'i Francisco Cembranelli ho hita mandrakariva amin'ny fampahalalam-baovao rehefa misy resaka habibiana mba hahatsiarovana azy tamin'ny nandraisany anjara anaty raharaha mitalakotrokotroka. ||| "Francisco Cembranelli's desire for having his image associated with a savage crime, so that he can appear a lot in the media and be remembered by his participation in a case of immense country-wide repercussion is more than obvious.
Mazava ihany koa ny faniriana mba hanamelohana ny ray aman-dreny satria amin'izay fotoana izay dia halaza ny raharaham-pitsarana, miaraka amin'ny pikantsary sy fampirantiana ampahibemaso. ||| It is transparent, too, wishes for the parents to be effectively declared guilty of what happened, because in this case the trial will be spectacular, with even more spotlights and public exposure.
Mbola zavamiafina avokoa raha toa avy amin'ny zava-poana ihany izany rehetra izany, na mety hisy tsoa-kevitra azo raisina avy amin'ny tantara. ||| Whether all this comes from mere vanity, or whether there is in the air the smell of some advantage to be derived from the episode, is a mystery.
Fa amin'ny lafiny rehetra hafahafa ny fahatsapana fa hahafapo ny fanatrehana famonoan'olona tahaka izao na hafa. ||| Either way, it's uncomfortable to feel that in face of such a terrible crime one or another may be satisfied.
Enga anie mba hitondra hitondra zavatra ho an'ny fiarahamonina ny 'fitabatabana' ity tantaran'olona mampalahelo ity. ||| In this case, I keep wondering if all this 'mediatization' of a familiar tragedy will bring any benefit to the society.
Handinika tsara amin'izay ataony ve aloha ny olona mety hieritreritra ny hanipy ny zanany avy eny ambaravarankely? ||| would someone who may be thinking about throwing a kid out of the window rethink their attitude?
Hametraka lalàna hisorohana tranga toy izao ve isika? ||| Will we create laws that prevent such tragedies to ever happen again?
Sa ve hoe tsy misy zavatra tsaratsara indray amin'ny vaovaon'ny fahitalavitra ka araraotina ny 'hetahetan-dra' n'ny ankamaroan'ny mponina, hahabetsaka ny isan'ny mpijery fotsiny ihany?" ||| Or maybe simply there wasn't anything intelligent to air on the TV news and they took advantage of the distinct 'thirst for blood' of a large part of our population, just to raise their audience"?
Efa niaina toe-javatra mitovitovy amin'ny sedrain'i Nardoni mivady ireto i Guilherme Fiuza, mpanao gazety mamaham-bolongana Breziliana miavaka. ||| Guilherme Fiuza, a distinguished Brazilian blogger-journalist, experienced an ordeal somewhat similar to the one to which the Nardoni couple has been subjected.
18 taona lasa izay, maty tao anatin'ny lozam-piarakodia nampahonena ny voalohan-janany. ||| Eighteen years ago, he lost his newborn first son in a tragic domestic accident.
Voampanga ho nahatonga ny fahafatesan-janany i Fiuza sy ny vadiny taloha tamin'ny voalohany, ary dia maro tamin'ny olona sy ny mpiray monina manodidina azy no nanao tantara valamaty manondro azy ho tsy matahotra ny hamono olona, mandra-panaporofoana fa madio tsy meloka ry zareo. ||| At first, Fiuza and his ex-wife were accused of causing of the boy's death, and his neighbours and several people Fiuza says he had never seen before started fabricating stories confirming them as cold-blooded murderers, until it was proven they were innocent.
Tsy nahatsikaritra i Fiuza fa nisy niala tsiny taminy na nanao azafady taminy avy eo. ||| Fiuza doesn't mention that he received any apologies. About his past experience and Isabella Nardoni's case, he writes:
"raha tsy azo tanterahina ny ahafahan'ny olona maminavina ny halalin'ny ratram-po mianjady, dia efa fandrosoam-pahalalana lehibe raha tsapany, indray mandeha onja, fa ||| "If it's not possible for people to imagine in their own skin the burning feeling of tragedy, it would be already a great civilized advance if they could understand, once and for all, that (others) lives are not a Big Brother".
Momba ny resadresaka maimaika nataon-dramatoa miandraikitra ny raharaha ka niteny hoe "efa voavaha ny 70%n'ny raharaha" hatramin'ny fotoana vitsivitsy nanaraka ny ny fahafatesan'Isabella, dia nanampy i Fiuza fa: ||| About the hurried interviews given by the Police Inspector responsible for the case, who told reporters that "the investigation is 70% concluded" since the early days after the death of Isabella, Fiuza adds:
Nampahafantatra anay ny tompon'andraikitry ny polisy misahana ny raharaha Isabella fa efa voavaha avokoa ny 70%n'ny raharaha heloka bevava. ||| The Police Inspector responsible for Isabella's case informs us that 70% of the crime has already been solved.
Vaovao lehibe izany. ||| This is important news.
Saingy, inona ny mitranga raha mandritra ny 30% farany misy toe-javatra vaovao mitranga ka milaza fa nanao ny heloka (tany anatin'ny sokajin'ny 70%?) ||| But, what happens if during the last 30% some new character shows up and admits the murder?
Amin'izay fotoana izay, ramatoa, dia lasa zero ny 70%nao. ||| In this case, lady, your 70% are equal to zero.
Tsy mbola nahita mihitsy izahay, nandritra ny tantaran'ny fanadihadiana, izany 70%n'ny raharaha voavaha izany. ||| We have never seen, in all the criminal investigation history, a 70% solved case.
Na Revolisionera ny tompon'andraikitra, na miteniteny foana. ||| Either the Inspector is a revolutionary, or she is irresponsible.
Mpanao gazety malaza nandao ny gazety be mpividy niasany hisahanany manontolo ny mahampamaham-bolongana feno azy i Luiz Carlos Azenha, avy ao amin'ny "Nahita izao tontolo izao aho". ||| Luiz Carlos Azenha, from "I've seen the World", is another eminent journalist who quit his mainstream media job to become a full time blogger.
Mieritreritra lalina ny zava-mahaliana ny haino aman-jery omban-gazety momba ity raharaha ity izy: ||| He reflects on the media's interest in this case:
Tsy hitsahatra velively ny milina fitotoan-kenan'ny haino aman-jery. ||| The media's meat-grinding machine never stops.
Mila mamokatra mandrakariva izy. ||| It needs to produce continually.
Ary mamokatra zavatra manaitra filana – raha lazaina amin'ny fiteny ratsy indrindra. ||| And to produce, always, something sexy — in the worst meaning of the word.
Ankizy natsipy avy eny am-baravarankely, na notaritarihin'ny fiara¹, izay rehetra mahatonga ny fahafatesana ho lasa 'tsenambarotra'. ||| Children being thrown through windows, or dragged by automobiles, anything goes as long as the death has some 'market value'.
Izany hoe tsy varotra manintona eny an-tsena ny filazana zaza maty tsimoramora noho ny hanohanana eo anoloan'ny tranoben'ny Folha de Sao Paulo, manamorona ny lalamben'ny Barão de Limeira. ||| That means that the death of a child by starvation, little by little, right in front of the Folha de S. Paulo's building, in the Barão de Limeira (avenue), has zero value in the news scale.
Ary sokajiana ho tsy misy dikany ny miresaka zaza maro maty any an-tobin'ny indizeny, na any amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana ankizy. ||| Dead children in indigenous reserves, or in the child-care units, are already part of what is trivial.
Sora-pohin'ny mpandika ho amin'ny teny anglisy: milaza ny momba ny raharaha João Helio ity. ||| Translator's note: This is a mention of the João Helio case.
Zazalahy enintaona maty notaritarihina 11km tamin'ny fiaran'ny reniny nangalarina i Helio. ||| Helio was a 6 year-old boy who died after being dragged outside his mother's car for seven miles in a car robbery.
Niteraka fihetsiketsehana lehibe hanoherana ny fitombon'ny habibiana any Rio de Janeiro io raharaha io ary nahatonga ny fitakiana hanamafisana kokoa ny fanamelohana ny trangam-pankahalana tahaka itony. ||| The case sparked a wave of demonstrations against the increase of criminality in Rio de Janeiro and calling for harsher penalties in the case of heinous crimes.
Nisy ihany koa zazalahy maty tamin'ny fomba feno habibiana tahaka izay nanjo an'i João Helio tao anatin'ny herinandro nahafaty ny voalohany saingy tsy nisy kosa ny gazety nilaza an'io. ||| The week of João Helio's death, another boy died in a similar way in another part of the country. No newspaper noticed it.
Ny bolongana ihany no nanamarika ny tranga faharoa, nefa tsy nahita ny filazana momba io ao teo ho eo. ||| Only blogs took note of the case, but I couldn't find any mention of it in recent times.
Mety ho tsy dia misy loatra ny fahasamihafan'ny ireo tranga roa ireo, ankoatra ny maha-avy amin'ny saranga antonony sy mahafotsy an'i João Hélio, raha avy amin'ny sarangan'ny mahantra sy matroka hoditra kosa ilay zazalahy faharoa tsy fantatra anarana.) ||| It might have not made any difference, but João Hélio was middle-class and white, while the other unnamed victim was poorer, and of darker skin).
Timor atsinanana: Momba ny fahafatesan'i Suharto ||| East Timor: On Suharto's death
Tamin'ny taona 1975 no nanambaran'i Timor Atsinanana ny fahaleovantenany rehefa nozanahan'i Portiogaly 400 taona. ||| In late 1975, East Timor declared its independence from Portugal after 400 years of domination.
Saingy vao haingana kosa no nahazoany ny fahafahana, noho ny fanafihana sy ny fibodoan'i Indonesia izay nanjaka taminy 24 taona. ||| But the freedom only lasted a little while, as the country was later that year invaded and occupied by Indonesia, which led to a 24 year rule.
Tombatombanana ho mihoatra ny 200 000 na ny iray ampahatelon'ny mponina ao an-toerana no maty vokatr'io (fibodoana io). ||| It is estimated that up to 200,000 people, one-third of the local population, died as a result of it.
Ny Jeneraly Suharto no nitari-tafika tamin'ny fanafihana, izay efa mpitondra jadon'i Indonesia tamin'izany fotoana izany, niaraka tamin'ny fandrisihan'i Aostralia sy ny faneken'i Etazonia. ||| This invasion was commanded by General Suharto, then Indonesia's dictator, with Australian encouragement and United States approval.
Indreto ary atolotra ny fanehoan-kevitry ny mpamaham-bolongana vitsy dia vitsy avy any Timor atsinanana rehefa re ny fahafatesany tamin'ny faha-86 taonany ny alahady 27 Janoary lasa teo. ||| Here is how a few bloggers connected to East Timor reacted to the news of his death at the age of 86 this Sunday January, 27.
José Prereira no nanao teny fampidirana hoe iza i Suharto ho an'izay tsy mahalala azy: ||| José Prereira introduces Suharto for those who didn't know him:
Izany ny olona notohanan'ny Demokrasia Amerikana matetika. ||| This is a man who has always been supported by the American Democracy.
Pedro Fontela indray mandahatra ny lisitry ny lova navelany ry izy no iray anisan'ny nankalaza ny vaovao: ||| Pedro Fontela list his legacy and says he is among the ones celebrating the news:
Maty ihany nony farany i Suharto, ilay manao didy jadonateo aloha. ||| Suharto, the former Indonesian dictator, died at last.
Tsy ampy fihatsarambelatsihy aho hilaza fa malahelo azy. ||| I lack the hypocrisy to suggest that I can feel any pity for him.
Iny no iray amin'ny olon-doza mpandripa-bahoaka manerantany, tsara iany ho anay! ||| It is one less tyrant genocidal in the world, good for us!
Tokony hisy aza ny (filazam-pifaliana)! ||| May there be a celebration!
Namoaka ny tantaram-piainan'ilay mpitondra jadona teo aloha koa i Timor Lorosa e Nação ary nametraka raka izay nolazainy fa iray amin'ny mpamono olona lehibe indrindra amin'ny vanim-potoanan'ny ankehitriny taorian'ny ady lehibe faharoa i Suharto ka tsy mendrika fanajana amin'izao fahafatesany izao: ||| Timor Lorosae Nação also publishes the ex-dictator's biography and states that Suharto, who he says is 'the biggest criminal of Contemporary History after the World War II', does not deserve respect in his death:
Lasa any amin'ny afobe ihany lahy izy iny, ary any no handorana azy amin'ny afo natsagany tamin'ny alalan'ny famonoana olona maro, fandatsahan-dra ary fampihorohoroana nataony nanodidina an'i Azia Atsimo Atsinanana. ||| At last, he has gone no Hell and there he will be to be consumed in flames fed by so much killing, bloodshed and terror that he spread around the South-East Asia.
Isabel Faria indray mitsikera an'i Ramos Horta, izay filohan'i Timor Atsinanana amin'izao fotoana izao, izay mamepetra ny olona tsy hamoaka ny likilikim-pony miatrika ny fahafatesan'ny jeneraly izao: ||| Isabel Faria criticizes Ramos Horta, the actual President of East Timor, for stating that people should not harbour resentment towards the deceased general:
Miala tsiny aminao aho, fa angaha lasa tsy mpanao jadona intsony ny mpanao jadona rehefa nodimandry? ||| Excuse me there, is a dictator no longer a dictator after they die?
Tsy tokony ho liana amina fahafatesana mpamono olona izay tsy notsaraina tamin'ny heloka vitany ve izahay? ||| Should we not be concerned by a dead murderer who was not judged for his crimes?
Timor Online indray moa nanangona ny voalazan'ny blaogy/bolongana sy ny haino aman-jery tamin'ny nandrenesana ny vaovao na tamin'ny teny anglisy izany na tamin'ny teny Paortiogey. ||| Timor Online has been collecting blogs and media reactions to the news, both in English and in Portuguese.
Izy no firenena voalohany nahazo ny fiandrianam-pireneny tamin'ity taonjato faha21 ity. ||| It was the first new sovereign state of the twenty-first century.
Iran: Maty Nandritra ny Fandevenana ny Rainy ilay Vehivavy Mafàna Fo Amin'ny Fiarovana ny Zon'ny Vehivavy ||| Iran: Women's Rights Activist Dies at Father's Funeral
Ezzatollah and Haleh Sahabi Haleh Sahabi, maty omaly maraina ny vehivary iraniana iray mafana fo amin'ny fiarovana ny zon'ny vehivavy noho ny herisetra nataon'ireo mpitandro filaminana nandritra ny fandevenana an-drainy, Ezatollah Sahabi, tia tanindrazana sady mpitarika politika ela nihetezana. ||| Haleh Sahabi, an Iranian women's rights activist died yesterday morning as a result of rough treatment by security agents during the funeral of her father, Ezatollah Sahabi, a veteran patriotic political leader.
Haleh no nitarika ny filaharana sady nitondra voninkazo sy sarin-drainy iray tamin'ny fotoana nirotsahan'ireo mpitandro filaminana nanao akanjon'olon-tsotra niezaka ny haka ilay sary. ||| Haleh was leading the procession with flowers and a picture of her father when plain-clothed agents charged forward and tried to tear away the picture.
Ireo vavolombelona nanatri-maso dia nilaza fa nampiasa kobay ireo iraka ireo ary nilofika noho izany izy ka teny an-dalana ho any amin'ny hopitaly no maty. ||| Eye-witnesses said the security agents used batons and that she collapsed and died on the way to hospital.
Izao fahafatesany tampoka sy aloha loatra izao dia lohatenin'ireo vohikalam-baovao maro samihafa. ||| Her untimely death made headlines in several news sites.
Ireo sarin'i Haleh sy ny rainy (etsy ambony), ny vatana mangatsiaka sy ny lahatsarin'ireo mana-manjo dia miparitaka mameno ny Facebook sy bilaogy. ||| The photos of Haleh and her father (above), lifeless body and films of mourners made their way through Facebook and blogs.
Ilay iraniana bilaogera Zede Kodeta (Manohitra ny Fanonganam-Panjakanat) dia mankahery ny vahoaka hiakatra eny am-bovonana sy hikiaka ny fanoheran'izy ireo ny fitondrana, ho fanoherana ny zavatra nahazo an'i Haleh. ||| Iranian blogger Zede Kodeta (Anti Coup d'Etat) encourages people to go to the rooftops and chant anti regime slogans, in order to protest against what happened to Haleh.
Vehivavy nafàna fo tamin'ny fiarovana ny zon'ny vehivavy i Haleh, 56 taona, ary mpandalina ny Korany. ||| Haleh was a 56 year-old women's rights activist and a Koran researcher.
Nosamborina izy ny 5 Aogositra 2009 raha nohosorana indrindra hitondra fanindroany indray ny filoha Mahmoud Ahmadinejad. ||| She was arrested on August 5, 2009 when President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad was inaugurated for a second term.
Iray tamin'ireo mpanohitra tonga teo akaikin'ny Antenimieran'i Iran izy. ||| She was one of the protesters present beside the Parliament of Iran.
Nodarohan'ny mpitandro filaminana izy... Nino izy fa ho azonao atao ny hahita fitoviana eo amin'ny lahy sy ny vavy, raha toa ianao mamaky ny Korany amin'ny fomba fitaratry ny vehivavy sy ny tebitebiny. ||| She was beaten by security forces... She believed you can find equality between men and women, if you read The Koran through a woman's prism and concerns.
Haleh Sahabis firy no ilaina ho faty vao ho ravantsika ny tsy fitoviana? ||| How many Haleh Sahabis should be killed until we finish with our indifference?
Hafiriana no tokony hiandrasana, ary ho faly hihaino an'i Obama hilaza hoe,"tao Iran no nanomboka ny hetsika fanehoan-kevitra voalohany tany amin'ny faritra"? ||| How long we should wait, and be pleased to see Obama say, "the first demonstrations in the region began in Iran"?
Fa maninona moa isika no tsy maka ohatra amin'i Ejipta, Tonizia, ary ny hetsik'ireo vahoaka mahery fo tao Syria? ||| Why we should not be inspired by Egypt, Tunisia, and the heroic people's movement in Syria?
Dia tsy misy na iray aza mahatsiaro ve (ilay ohabolana Iraniana) 'mahavita zavatra ianao raha toamanarana azy'? ||| Does no one remember (the Iranian proverb) 'you do something if you finish it'?
Meksika: Miadihevitra Momba Ny Famerenana ny Fifidianana ||| Mexico: Discussing the Possibility of Recall Elections
Tao anatin'ny herinandro, niadihevitra momba ny fanavaozana politika ny Antenimieram-pirenena, izay araka ny hevitr'ireo mankatò izany fepetra izany, fa hanova ny fitsipika momba ny fanaovana politika Meksikana ary hampisy fifandanjam-pahefana bebe kokoa hanome vahana ny olom-pirenena. ||| For a number of weeks, the Chamber of Deputies in Mexico has been discussing a political reform that would, according to those in favor of the measure, change the regulations of the Mexican political game and shift the balance of power more towards the citizenry.
Tamin'ny 25 Oktobra 2011, taorian'ny fandalovan'izany tao amin'ny vaomieran'ny Antenimierampirenana Iray, dia niadian-kevitra tanteraka ny volavolan-kevitra. ||| On October 25, 2011, after its passage in the Chamber of Deputies committees, the initiative finally reached the floor.
Na dia izany aza, fantatr'ireo mpanohana ny tolo-kevitra fa tsy mafonja araka izay tadiavina ny singa ahafahana mandresy lahatra, tahaka ny famerenana ny fifidianana ben'ny tanàna sy ny mpanao lalàna, ary ny "fanapahana ny fotoam-piasana", fantatry ny maro kokoa amin'ny hoe famerenana ny fifidianana. ||| However, it lacked elements that its supporters considered essential, such as the reelection of mayors and legislators, and the "recall of the mandate", most commonly known as recall elections.
Ity hevitra farany ity no niadian-kevitra mafana tao amin'ny Antenimiera sy tamin'ny valantserasera tamin'ny 25 Oktobra. ||| This last point was discussed with exceptional intensity in the Chamber and on social networks on October 25.
Misy akony lehibe eo amin'ny fiarahamonina ny mety hanatontosana ny famerenana ny fifidianana, fiarahamonina izay mahatsiaro voatohitohina avy etsy sy eroa hatrany ary mahatsiaro ho tsy mba manana solontena, araka ny nolazain'i Omar Bello: ||| The possibility of implementing recall elections has an echo of importance in a society that feels constantly attacked from many different fronts and furthermore does not feel represented, as Omar Bello expresses:
Nanontany ny amin'ny Famerenana Fifidianana an'i Javier Duarte aho, ny fanombohana goveremantam-panjakana ratsy indrindra ao Mexico ||| I ask for a Recall Election for Javier Duarte the worst start of a state government in Mexico
Tsy nankatoavin'ireo vondrona solombavambahoaka avy amin'ny Antoko Revolisioneram-panjakana (Parti Révolutionnaire Institutionnel), ny Antoko Mpiaro ny Tontolo Iainana Maitso ao Meksika, ary ny Antokom-Piarahana Vaovao ny tolo-kevitra. ||| The initiative was blocked by a group of deputies from the Institutional Revolutionary Party, the Ecologist Green Party of Mexico, and the New Alliance Party .
Noraisin'ny maro ho toy ny esoeso izany, satria efa nisy ny dokambarotra nataon'ny PRI mba hiantsony azy hoe "Ny PRI vaovao" ka miara-dalana amin'ny hevi-baovao sy fitantanana vaovao, Jorge Arturo Aguilar nanoratra hoe: ||| This has been considered ironic by many, given the advertising campaign that the PRI has launched to call itself "the new PRI" and associate itself with new ideas and leadership, as Jorge Arturo Aguilar writes:
Amin'ny PANAL vaovao, tsy mila "zavabaovao" manimba ny tombontsoa anatin'ny fotoana lavitr'ezaka izahay, nefa manome vahana anareo amin'ny ||| In the new PRI we don't want "newthings" that affect our long-standing interests but benefit yours
Sandra GLG nametraka fanontaniana izay manitikitika ihany koa ireo Meksikana maromaro: ||| Sandra GLG asks the question that surely many Mexicans are asking themselves:
Raha tsy matahotra ny olom-pirenena izy ireo ary mahatoky ny asa "tsara" ataon'izy ireo, nahoana no tsy mankasitraka ny Famerenana Fifidianana?? ||| If they don't fear the citizens and are so certain of their "good" job, why don't they approve the Recall Elections??
Ahoana no nahafahantsika hitazona mpanao politika mpanao kolikoly, tsy mahalala menatra ary tsy mba manana fo mangoraka hatramin'izay? ||| How have we been able to maintain a political class so corrupt, so cynical and so insensitive for so long?
Nanomboka mitriatra ny firaisana nananan'ny antoko PRI nandritra ny adihevitra teo aloha raha manomboka misintaka amin'ny hevitra ijoroan'ny antoko ny solombavambahoaka sasantsasany araka izay asongadin'i Maite Azuela hoe: ||| The unity that PRI maintained in previous debates started to show certain weaknesses when some deputies distanced themselves from the party position, as Maite Azuela tells us:
Solombavambahoaka 3 ao amin'ny PRI no nifidy ny famerenana ny fifidianana Miguel García Granados, Manuel García Corpus sy Ricardo Abued ||| 3 PRI deputies voted in favor of the recall elections Miguel García Granados, Manuel García Corpus and Ricardo Abued
Nofehezin'i José Merino tamim-bazivazy ny toe-draharaha: ||| José Merino expresses the irony of the situation:
Ry mpifidy namana, tsy hamela anareo hahazo ny demokrasia mahasolotena izay tadiavinareo izany. ||| Dear voters, we won't allow you to have a representative democracy in which you matter.
Jesús Robles Maloof, nanasongadina, tamin'ity fanamarihany nataony ity: ||| Jesús Robles Maloof, points out, with his characteristic precision, that,
Afaka mifidy antoko iray isika, na antoko hafa, na tsy mifidy ny iray amin'izy ireo akory aza, ny tsy azontsika ekena dia ny fanohizan'izy ireo mitazona fahefana marobe. ||| We could support one party, the other or none of them, what we can't allow is that they continue to concentrate so much power.
iray amin'ireo mpiserasera manohana ity fanovana ity, taorian'ny adihevitra mafana tao amin'ny Antenimieram-pirenena, nandefa hafatra ho an'ny tsirairay izy mialoha ny hatoriany: ||| one of the young activists that supports this reform, after such an intense day in the Chamber of Deputies, signed off before going to sleep with a message for everyone:
Inoako fa handroso i Meksika aorian'izao, tsy maintsy hiasa mafy isika, afaka tanterahina tokoa izany. ||| I think Mexico will advance after this, we will have to work hard, but it is very possible.
Ireo lahatsoratra be mpamaky indrindra teto amin'ny Global Voices taona 2008 ||| A Review of Global Voices in 2008
Efa namoaka ny tamberin'ny 2008 any amin'ny faritra misy azy ny mpamoaka vaovao isam-paritry ny Global Voices. ||| Global Voices regional editors have written roundups of the last year of posts in their regions.
Azonao vakiana ny takelaka manokana Best of 2008, ary afaka ny manampy ny lahatsoratra ankafizinao ao amin'ny sarintanin'ny mpamaky amin'ny Google map aza ianao. ||| You can find them on the Best of 2008 special coverage page, and even add your own favorite posts to our public Google map.
Efa namoaka ny fehifehin'ny zavabita ny tale mpanantanteraky ny Global Voices, Ivan Sigal. ||| Global Voices' executive director, Ivan Sigal, has also written an organizational overview of what we've accomplished.
Ary fomba tsotra indrindra ahafantarana izay tian'izao tontolo izao matetika ny tahirin-kevitra. ||| And our media archive is always a good indicator of what the world likes us for.
Tianao ve ny hahafantatra ny lahatsoratra be mpamaky indrindra tamin'iny taona 2008 iny? ||| Want to know what our most read posts were in 2008?
Tahaka ny tamin'ny 2007 ihany, dia ny lahatsoratra mikasika an'i Shina no be mpamaky indrindra. ||| As in 2007, our most read posts in 2008 were from China.
Amin'ny maha-mpitati-baovao tohanan'i Reuters anay tamin'ny vaovaon'ny lalao olaimpika, dia nanoratra i ty lahatsoratra ity i John Kennedy tamin'ny volana Mey ka nihoatra ny 700 ny fanehoan-kevitra taorian'ny firotsahana an-dalambe nataon'ny mpanohana an'i Tibet (ny fizakantenany) (sy ny mpanohitra izany fizakantena izany) tany Etazonia. ||| As part of our Reuters-sponsored Olympics coverage, John Kennedy wrote this post in May that received more than 700 comments about the fallout after
Variraraka tokoa ny resaka noho ny tsy fifankahazoan-kevitra momba an'i Tbet nandritra ny volana marsa sy avrily, ary na dia ity lahatsoratra fohy navoakan'i Oiwan Lam ity aza dia efa nampiady hevitra ka nahatonga ny maro tamin'ny mpamaham-bolongana Shinoa namaly bontana ny fomba fitateran'ny hainy aman-jery tandrefana ny vaovao. ||| Disagreements over Tibet raged so much throughout March and April, that even this short post by Oiwan Lam sparked intense discussion, as did many others on Chinese bloggers' angry responses to Western media coverage.
Tamin'ny volana Mey, Tsy ampy adin'ny roa taorian'ny horohorontany tany Shina faritanin'i Sichuan, i John Kennedy dia efa nahavoaka lahatsoratra miaraka amin'ny sary sy lahatsary navoakan'olo-tsotra izay nanohizany namoaka ny vaovao farany nandritra ny ora sy ny andro manaraka. ||| In May, less than 2 hours after an earthquake shook China's Sichuan province, John Kennedy wrote a much-read post with citizen video and photos that he continuously updated over the next hours and days.
Iray tamin'ny lahatsoratra maro nivoaka teto amin'ny Global Voices nitantara ny horohorontany sy ny fiantraikany. ||| It was one of many posts that appeared on Global Voices describing both the earthquake and the devastating aftermath.

Notsinjarazaraina teny anglisy, Japoney ary shinoa moa ity lahatsoratra ity, ary lasa loharanom-baovaon'ny gazety mahazatra avy eo. ||| This post was Slashdotted in English, Japanese and Chinese, and became a source for several mainstream media articles.
Maro ny famoaham-baovao farany mikasika ity tantara ity navoakan'ny ekipa Japoney teto amin'ny Global Voices. ||| There were several updates to this story by the Japanese team on Global Voices.
Adin'i Ossetia atsimo sy Rosia tamin'i Georgia ||| South Ossetia, Russia and Georgia - War
Haingana dia haingana ny namoahan'i Onnik Krikorian teto amin'ny Global Voices ny vaovao avy tamin'ny bolongana tany amin'ny faritra raha mbola vao mikasa ho any ny ankamaroan'ny mpanao gazety, ary dia nahazo fankasitrahana avy tamin'i New York Times, CNN, Reuters, ary ny hafa ry Veronica Khokhlova, Elia Varela Serra sy izay tsy voatanisa avy eto amin'ny Global Voices izay nanampy be dia be tamin'ny fitaterana ny vaovaon'ny ady tamin'ny alalan'ny fampitam-baovaon'olotsotra. ||| reported quickly from blogs of the region before most journalists had even made their way there, earning links and praise from the New York Times, CNN, Reuters, and others, along with Veronica Khokhlova, Elia Varela Serra, and others from Global Voices who helped cover the conflict through citizen media.
Fa ny tena nahazoanay mpamaky betsaka indrindra nanditra ny taona dia ny fitambarana lahatsoratra miresaka ny Fanafihan'ny mpampihorohoro an'i Bombay, India tamin'ny volana Novambra. ||| The highest spike in traffic we received all year was for the combined posts and special coverage about the Mumbai terrorist attacks in India in November.

Bahrain: Mibahana ny Lapan'ny Antenimieram-pirenena ny fihetsiketsehana ||| Bahrain: Protests Block National Assembly Building
Nobahanan'ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana manohitra ny fitondrana io alatsinainy maraina io Lapan'ny Filakevi-pirenena izay toerana ivorian'ny Parlemanta sy ny Filankevitra Shura isan-kerinandro. ||| Anti government protesters on Monday morning blocked the National Council building where both Parliament and the Consultative Councils hold their weekly sessions.
Ny anton'ny fihetsiketsehana teo anoloan'ny Antenimieram-pirenena moa dia ny handravana ny rafitra "roa loha" ankoatra ny fitakiana hafa ataon'ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana toy ny Lalampanorenana vaovao sy ny fanonganana ny fitondrana. ||| The reason for the protest in front of the National Assembly is to topple the bicameral system in addition to the protesters' other demands for a new constitution and the toppling of the regime.
Mpikambana 40, nofidian'ny vahoaka, no mandrafitra ny Antenimieram-pirenena ary ny 40 hafa kosa, izay notendren'ny Mpanjaka, no mpikambana ao amin'ny Filankevitra Shura. ||| The National Assembly is made up of 40 members of Parliament, elected by the people, and another 40 Shura Council members, appointed by the King.
Fivoaram-baovao, voahodidin'ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana ny Lapan'ny Filankevi-pirenena eto Bahrain ||| In a new development, protesters have surrounded the National Council buildings in Bahrain
Mpanao fihetsiketsehana mibahana ny vavahadin ny Filankevi-pirenena ao Manama. ||| Protesters block the entrance of the National Council buildings in Manama.
Lahatsarin'ny tanora mibahana ny Lapan'ny Al-Shura ny 14 Febroary ||| Video of February 14 Youth blocking the entrance to Al-Shura council building
Tao anatin'ny fihetsika ara-pirahalahiana no nitondran'ny mpiasan'ny Filankevitra Al-Shura rano ho an'ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana.. ||| In a friendly gesture, Al-Shura council staff brought water to the protesters..
Novatsian'ny Filan-kevitra Al-Shura rano an-tavoahangy ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana ary ny tanora kosa namaly hoe 'Misaotra anareo'! ||| Al-Shura Council give out water bottles to the protesters and the youth say 'Thank You'!
Na dia notaterina aza fa valo amin'ny mpikambana 40 ao amin'ny Shura ihany no nanatrika ny fivoriana, ny hafa kosa nitatitra fa nanapa-kevitra ny hanao fivoriana mankana ny Filan-kevitra Shura handinihana ny toe-draharaha misy eo amin'ny firenena. ||| Although some reports said that only eight of the original 40 Shura council members were attending the session, other reports said that the Shura council decided to hold an extraordinary session to discuss the current situation in the country.
Mpikambana valo no ao ankehitriny ary nisy ny baiko hanidiana ny vavahafy sy hisorohana ny fidiran'ny hafa ao an-dapa, ao anatin'ny fivoriana mety hofoanana ||| There are currently eight members and an order was made to lockdown the gates and prevent anyone entering the building, with the session most likely to be cancelled

Repoblikan'i Afrika Afovoany: Herisetra No Manamarika Ny Firosoana Ho Any Amin'ny Fifidianana ||| Central African Republic: Violence Marks Lead Up to Elections
Hisy fifidianana parlemantera hatao any amin'ny Repoblikan'i Afrika Afovoany - amin'ny 4 Septambra 2011. ||| The Central African Republic is set to hold partial parliamentary elections on September 4, 2011.
Niakatrakatra ny tosi-drà tato ho ato taorian'ny famoriam-bahoaka nataon'ny mpanohitra niafara taminà herisetra, satria nokorontanin 'ireo tanora mpomba ny antoko KNK an'ny Filoha Bozizé ilay fihaonambe nokarakaraina. ||| Tensions have arisen recently after an opposition party rally was marred with violence, as young supporters of President Bozizé's KNK party disturbed the scheduled meeting.
Mbola eo an-dàlam-pahasitranana avy amin'ny fifandonana mahery vaika izay niandoha tamin'ny faramparan'ny taona 1990, nandritra ny fitondran'i Ange-Félix Patassé ny firenena. ||| The country is still recovering from violent conflicts that started in the late 1990s during the regime of Ange-Félix Patassé.
Ny 12 Jona 2008, lasa laharana faha-efatra ta anatin'ny fandaharan'asan'ny Komisionan'ny Firenena Mikambana momba ny fampandriana tany ny Repoblikan'i Afrika Afovoany. ||| On 12 June, 2008, the Central African Republic became the fourth country to be placed on the agenda of the UN Peacebuilding Commission.
Opposition rally thwarted by violence. ||| Opposition rally thwarted by violence.
Ilay famoriam-bahoaka dia natao mba hanentanana ny olona tsy hifidy; lavin'ireo mpanohitra ilay komity mpanara-maso ny fifidianana efa misy ao an-toerana amin'izao fotoana ary angatahany ny hametrahana iray vaovao. ||| The rally was held to encourage a boycott of the elections; the opposition does not recognize the current electoral monitoring committee and demands a new one.
Ny bilaogy centrafrique-presse dia manoritsoritra ny herisetra tao amin'ilay famoriam-bahoaka toy izao: ||| Blog centrafrique-presse describes the violence at the rally as follows:
rehefa tonga teo amin'ny toerana nanaovana ny hetsika tao Bangui ry zareo, teo amin'ny manodidina ny tamin'ny 3 ora tolakandro, hitan'ireo mpikarakara ireo zatovo avy amin'ny Boy-Rabe, voalambolambon'ny KNK sy efa mamo tampona, tafiditra tao ankianjan'i Marabéna. ||| when they arrived at the rally site around 15:30 in Bangui, the organizers found youngsters from Boy-Rabe, bribed and rendered drunk by the KNK, had infiltrated Marabéna square.
ary nanipy tavoahangy plastika feno lasantsy narehitra nankeny amin'ny lampihazo. ||| They threw lit plastic bottles filled with gasoline at the stage.
Rehefa novonoinay ny afo, dia nanomboka nankeny amin'ny lampihazo nomanina hitenenan'ireo mpitarika mpanohitra ry zalahy. ||| When we extinguished the fire, they began to turn over the stage where the opposition leaders were supposed to speak.

Manamafy ny bilaogy afreekelections fa ny antoko mpanohitra, MLPC dia niantso fibodoana ny fifidianana izay ho parlemantera hatao ny 4 Septambra. ||| The blog afreekelections confirms that the opposition party MLPC called for a boycott of the parliamentary elections on September 4.

Ao Bangui, tsy firaharahàna tanteraka avy amin'ireo mpifidy no misy ao amin'ny distrika sy ny faritra voakasik'ilay fifidianana. ||| In Bangui, there is a total indifference from the voters in the district and boroughs concerned by the elections.

Ity rivotra mavesabesatra ity dia tsapa koa ao Bossangoa (faritra Avaratra-Andrefana). ||| This morose atmosphere is also felt in Bossangoa (Northwest region).

Sampana iray nisintaka avy amin'ny antoko mpanohitra, tsy ela akory izao no nanapa-kevitra hanatevin-daharana ny dingana ho fikatsahana fandraiam-pahalemana. ||| A dissident branch of one of the opposition party, has recently decided to join the peace building process.
Ny mpitarika ilay sampana, Mahamat Sallé, efa zatra nitarika vondron'olona mpirongo fiadiana efa ho 500 isa. ||| The leader of the branch, Mahamat Sallé, used to lead a group of 500 heavily armed men.
Radio Ndeke Luka dia manoratra fa Sallé dia niteny tsy ela akory izay, taorian'ny fanaovan-tsonia ny fifanarahana fa ny antony nanapahan'ny vondrony hevitra handray fiadiana dia ny mba hiarovana ny foko misy azy: ||| Radio Ndeke Luka writes that Sallé confided soon after signing the accord that the reason his group decided to take arms was to protect his ethnic group:
"Ny antony nanangananay ny hetsika dia ho fiarovana ny tombontsoan'ny foko misy ahy izay nataon'ireo vondrona mpihoko maro ho lasibatra." ||| "The reason why we created the movement was to defend the interests of my ethnic group that were being harassed by several rebel groups".
Nangataka ny governemanta izy mba "hiaro ny vahoakany amin'ny didin'ny be sandry". ||| He asks that the government "ensures that his people stay out of harm's way".

Ny fifandraisan'ireo Tchadiana sy ny mpihoko ao amin'ny Repoblikan'i Afrika Afovoany dia nitàna toerana lehibe hatrany tamin'ny fitoniana ara-politika ho an'ny Repoblikan'i Afrika Afovoany. ||| The interplay between Chadian and CAR rebels has always had a major role in the political stability of the CAR.
