Shina: Niakatra ny harin-karena, ary ny fandaniambola? ||| China: GDP rising, public spending too?
Nivoaka ankehitriny ny filazana fa ny toe-karen'i Sina dia efa manakaiky ny laharana faharoa maneran-tany, niaraka tamin'izany ny fampiharihariana ny fiakaran'ny tarehimariky ny firenena Japoney tao anatin'ny telovolana faharoa tamin'ny taona 2010. ||| Indication that China's economy is close to second largest in the world came today with the release of Japan's growth figures for the second quarter.
Mankaiza daholo ary ny vola rehetra? Hoy i BRY, mpikambana iray ao amin'ny vohikala fifaneraserana ara-toe-karena, tao amin'ny lahatsoratra iray nivoaka tamin'ny herinandro lasa teo nitondra ny lohateny hoe: "Maninona ary no manao tahiry betsaka toy izao foana ny Sinoa?" ||| Where's all the money going, Sohu economics forum member BRY seems to ask in this post from last week, "Why do Chinese always save so much"?
Tany Sina, nanamaivana ny olana teo amin'ny saram-pizaham-pahasalamana ny fametrahana ny rafi-piahiana ara-pahasalamana, raha tsy hoe miady amin'ny aretina lehibe mandritry ny andro iainanao ianao ka miaina ao anatin'ny fahasahiranana ny fianakavianao na koa dibo-trosa, indrindra moa raha tsy manana mpiahy ianao. ||| In China, while the universal health insurance system now being implemented has helped alleviate the problem of price gouging in health care, unless you can keep from developing any major sickness during your lifetime, the excess costs beyond coverage are enough leave a family with nothing to its name, or even in debt.
Nampitaha ny saram-pianarana eny amin'ny ambaratonga faharoa any amin'ny firenena toy ny UK, Frantsa ary Inde: ||| And the comparatively low cost of post-secondary education in countries such as UK, France and India:
Any Sina, nitombo avo 25 heny amin'ny sarany tamin'ny taona lasa ny saram-pisoratana anarana hidirana eny amin'ny anjerimanontolo, nefa tamin'io fotoana io ihany, nitombo avo efatra heny fotsiny ny salanisan'ny fidiram-bolan'ny mponina any an-drenivohitra sy any ambanivohitra, midika izany fa niakatra haingana dia haingana avo 10 heny ny saram-pianarana eny amin'ny anjerimanontolo raha oharina amin'ny fidiram-bolan'ny mponina. ||| In China, university tuition has risen to 25 times what it costs less than 20 years ago, yet during this same period of time the average income for urban and semi-rural residents has only quadrupled, meaning the cost of university education is increasing 10 times faster than these residents' income.
Mba ahazoana ny diplaoma mifanaraka amin'ny fianarana mandritry ny efa-taona izany, dia tsy maintsy mandany 28,000 RMB farahakeliny ny mpianatra iray, izay mitovy amin'ny fidiram-bolan'ny mpamboly sy mpiompy iray efa nanalàna ny pitsopitsony rehetra mandritry ny roapolo taona any amin'ny faritra faran'izay mahantra. ||| For four years of undergraduate study, a person will at the very least have to spend RMB 28,000, equivalent to twenty years of net income for a farmer from a poverty-stricken area.
Mbola tsy tafiditra ao anatin'izany ny vidin-tsakafo sy ny akanjo fitafy na koa ny saram-pitandrovana ny fahasalamana. ||| This doesn't take into account costs for other costs such as food, clothing or healthcare.
Notohizany tamin'ny firesahana ny fiainan'ireo be antitra mpisotro ronono any Sina sy any amin'ny toeran-kafa izany: ||| Followed by the state of old age pensions in China and elsewhere:
Ny firenena sosialista izay manana toe-karena tsara tantana tahaka an'i Mongolie, Korea avaratra ary Kioba dia nametraka rafitra mikasika ny fisotroan-dronono izay mifototra amin'ny fiahiana nasionaly, niainga tamin'ny rafi-piahiana ara-tsosialy ka natao ho rafi-piahiana nasionaly tamin'ny alalan'ny lalàm-panorenan'ny firenena tsirairay avy; iantohan'ny fanjakàna avokoa ny saran'ny fisotroan-dronono rehetra, ka tsy mandoa na inona na inona ny tsirairay. ||| Socialist countries with planned economies such as Mongolia, North Korea and Cuba each implement a retirement pension system based on national insurance, a social insurance system made into a national system through each country's constitution; retirement costs are entirely provided by the state, without the recipient having to pay pension fees.
Amin'izao fotoana izao, any Sina, manaraka modely eo amin'ny rafi-piahiana nasionaly mikasika ireo be antitra mpisotro ronono ireo mpampiasa amin'ny fanjakana, ary manaraka modely eo amin'ny rafi-piahiana ireo be antitra mpisotro ronono ny orinasa tsy miankina amin'ny fanjakana ka amin'ny alalan'ny fanomezana fanampiana azy ireo no anaovany izany. ||| Presently in China, government employers use a national insurance model old age pension system, and corporations utilize a publicly funded private insurance model old age pension system.
Ny mpamboly sy mpiompy ary ireo olona tsy an'asa monina an-drenivohitra sy any ambanivohitra (tafiditra ao anatin'izany koa ireo tsy manana asa raikitra), izay mameno ny ankamaroan'ny mponina ao amin'ny firenena, dia tsy manana mpiahy ka tsy maintsy mamoaka 20% amin'ny fidiram-bolany manokana andoavany ny latsakemboka. Raha mbola tsy ampy entina hanazavana ny antony itiavan'i Sinoa manao tahiry betsaka ireo zavatra voalaza miisa telo ireo, dia ampidiro ao koa ny trano fonenana. ||| Farmers and unemployed urban and rural residents (including those without fixed employment), who comprise the majority of the country's population, either live left out of the old age social pension system or else shoulder the 20% of their salary in fees themselves.
Lahatsoratra tsara ho vakiana: miandry fivoarana ny banky. ||| Related: the banks appear to be performing to expectation.
Afrika Atsimo: Ilay vehivavy nandany 7 volana tany amin'ny fonja natao ho an'ny lehilahy ||| South Africa: The woman who spent 7 months in a male cell
Talohan'ny namotsorana azy noho ny fikasàna hangalatra sy hàka an-keriny tany Afrika Atsimo, notànana tamina fonjan-dehilahy nandritry ny fito volana i Denise Abbah mandra-piandry ny fitsarana azy. ||| Before she was acquitted of attempted robbery and hijacking in South Africa, Denise Abbah was imprisoned in a male cell for seven months as she waited for her trial.
Noheverin'ireo mpandraharaha ny fonja ho irony sarimbavy irony izy. ||| The prison officials mistook her for a transvestite.
Ankehitriny dia mitaky ny rariny i Ramatoa Abbah ka nitory ny Departemantan'ny Sampana Famaizana sy mitaky onitra mitentina R100 000. ||| Ms. Abbah is now seeking justice as she is suing the Department of Correctional Services for damages amounting to R100 000.
Raha ny filazan'ny IOL enin-taona aty aorian'ny nanafàhana azy dia vonona i Denise Abbah ny hamaky ady amin'ny Departemanta noho ny sedra mafy nolalovany. ||| According to IOL six years after her release Denise Abbah is ready for a fight with the department on the ordeal she went through.
Niteraka dimy i Denise: ||| Denise is a mother of five:
Tsy misy na dia kely aza tokony handraisana an'i Denise Abbah, renimpianakaviana 36 taona avy ao Durban, ho toy ny lehilahy. ||| There is nothing manly about 36-year-old Durban mother Denise Abbah.
Tsara jerena izy ary tsy misy na iray aza ka olona mahitsy fijery no ho afaka hanombatombana azy ho toy ny lehilahy. ||| She is quite pleasant and no one in their right mind would suggest she looks like a man
Ankehitriny, enina taona taorian'ny nanafahana azy, te-hamaly faty i Abbah: ||| Now, six years after her release, Abbah wants revenge:
"Nisitrika foana aho, Nikorontana ambony ambany ny fiainako. ||| My life has been turned upside down.
Tsy misy tany izay alehako ka tsy hanarabian'ny olona ahy, ilazan'izy ireny ahy ho lehilahy," hoy ity renin-jaza dimy avy ao Durban ity. ||| I cannot go anywhere without people picking on me, calling me a man," says the Durban mother of five.
Ao anatin'ireo antontan-taratasy napetraka ao amin'ny Lapam-pitsarana ao Durban, nangataka onitra mitentina R100 000 izy, nefa sady mbola mitady toro-hevitra ny amin'ny fomba hanondrotana ny fitakiany ihany koa izy. ||| In papers filed in the Durban Magistrate's Court, she is suing for R100 000 in damages, although she is seeking further advice on how to increase her claim.
Diso ny nitendrena ny anaran'i Denise ka lasa "Denis" raha tokony ho Denise ary nalefa tany am-ponja niaraka tamina lehilahy, izay nanaovana an-keriny azy matetika mihitsy. ||| Denise had her name mistyped as "Denis" instead of Denise and thrown in a cell with men where she was raped multiple times.
Christina Engela dia manoratra ao amin'ny blaoginy "Voaloboka maitso - Voankazon'ny tsy fahalalana": ||| Christina Engela writes on her blog "Sour grapes - The Fruits of Ignorance":
Heveriko fa tokony havoitra ny tsy mahamety ny fikarakarana tahaka antsika, sa tsy izany? ||| I think it should be pointed out that it's not so nice to be treated like us, is it?
Ary indrindra tsy tsara mihitsy ny fomba hikarakaraka ANTSIKA - NA EO AZA ny fisian'ireo lalàna heverina hiaro ny olona amin'ny zavatra toy izany. ||| And therefore it's not nice the way WE are being treated - DESPITE provisions in existing laws that supposedly protect people from this sort of treatment.
Raha ny fahitàna azy, nisy tamin'ireo mpiasam-panjakana tampom-pahaizana nandiso ny fitendrena ny anarany hanjary "Denis" - raha tokony ho Denise. ||| Apparently some typically over-qualified genius in the employ of the State mistyped her name as "Denis" - when she was actually Denise.
(Eny e, marina izany, misy "e" - toy ny ao amin'ny "education ") Izany zavatra tokana izany dia ampy hamotika ny fiainana manontolon'ity ramatoa ity. ||| (Yes, that's right, with an "e" - as in "education ") That one slip of a key could easily have cost this woman her life.
Mazava loatra, ny tiako ho lazaina dia hoe tena rava tanteraka mihitsy ny fiainany. ||| In point of fact, I would say that her life has been effectively ruined.
Eny, nofonjaina noho ny fiahiahiana ho nanao heloka bevava izy - saingy ankehitriny, na dia nafahana madiodio tamin'ireo fiampangana ireo teo anatrehan'ny fitsarana aza - dia niharam-boina noho ny fanaovana an-keriny maro samihafa, nijaly noho ireo endrika fanararaotana maro samihafa sy ny takaitra ara-tsaina, mampamono tena, ary mety ho nahazo ny otrikaretin'ny VIH sy areti-mandoza maro hafa koa. ||| Yes, she was detained on suspicion of having committed a crime - but now, despite having been cleared in court of all charges - she is a multiple rape victim, has suffered various forms of abuse and trauma, is suicidal, may have contracted HIV and numerous other diseases.
Tsy ho ampy velively izay teny tsotra avy amin'ny fitsarana na ny Sampan-draharaham-panjakana miahy ny fonja hanao hoe "Kit*** Tena miala tsiny izahay". ||| A simple "We're so f***ing sorry" from the court and the Prison Service - or the State - is just not going to be good enough.
Ao amin'ny blaogy Queerlife, manontany ilay mpitoraka blaogy raha nandà ny hino ireo mpandraharahan'ny fonja rehefa tonga fotoana (nandeha rà) i Abbah, nahoana no tsy nanome fikarakarana ara-pahasalamana ho azy izy ireo? ||| On the blog Queerlife, the blogger asks if the prison official refused to believe that Abbah was menstruating why didn't they provide medical care?
Ary tsy zon'i Denise Abbah ve ny mangataka fizahana ara-pahasalamana amin'ny Governemanta mba ho fanamarinana tanteraka fa vehivavy tokoa izy? ||| And is it right for Denise Abbah to undergo other medical exam for the government as a complete verification that she is a woman?
Fony tonga fotoana i Abbah, niteny taminy ny mpandry fonja fa "noho ny fandidiana 'operation'" izany. ||| When Abbah began to menstruate, the prison guards told her that this was "because of the operation".
Satria, fantatrareo ihany, mandeha rà ny olona aorian'ireny fandidiana igagàna sy tsy mamela takaitra mandritry ny andro voaozona ireny. ||| Because, you know, people bleed after miraculously-healed-up-and-scarless operations all the goddamned time.
nandeha rà, ry zareo tsy nihevitra akory ny hanolotra fitsaboana sahaza an'izany, izay azo heverina mialoha, fa afaka manaporofo hoe ahoana marina ny amin'i Abbah. ||| bleeding, they did not attempt to provide medical care which, presumably, would have revealed that Abbah was cisgendered.
Anaty tontolo toy inona no ho ekena ireo zavatra etsy ambony ireo? ||| In what universe are any of the above things okay?
Ao amin'ny "Judging a book by its cover" (Tsaraina amin'ny fonony ny boky iray) an'i Helen G, ny tranga nahazo an'i Abbah dia faritany ho barbariana sy fanitsakitsahana ny zo maha-olona ary ampifandraisiny amin'ny nahazo an'i Nastaran Kolestani, vehivavy iray 'transsexuelle' nofonjàna nandritry ny iraikambinifolo taona tany amina fonjan-dehilahy: ||| In "Judging a book by its cover" Helen G she describes Abbah's case as barbaric and a breach of human rights and gives a contrast of Nastaran Kolestani a trans woman imprisoned for eleven years in a men's cell:
Ohatra, tsy ela akory izay dia nanoratra aho mikasika vehivavy iray 'transsexuelle' fantatra fotsiny amin'ny hoe 'B' izay nofonjaina tany amin'ny fonja natao aho an'ny lehilahy nandritry ny dimy taona; Nastaran Kolestani tany Etazonia (U.S.) - voafonja nandritry ny 18 volana talohan'ny nitondrana ny raharahany teo anatrehan'ny fitsarana – ary Vehivavy Espaniola 'transsexuelle' iray izay nofonjaina tany amin'ny fonja natao ho an'ny lehilahy nandritry ny iraikambinifolo taona – izay mihitsy, iraikambinifolo taona – talohan'ny nisitrahany ny faran'ny kely amin'ny zo maha-olona izay maro amintsika no mihevitra azy ireny ho toy ny zo voajanahary. ||| For example, I've recently written about the trans woman prisoner referred to only as 'B' who was incarcerated in a cis men's prison for five years; Nastaran Kolestani in the U.S.- held for 18 months before her case came to court – and a Spanish trans woman who was held in a cis men's prison for eleven years – yes, eleven years – before she was granted the basic human rights that many of us take for granted.
Saingy ity tsy hoe ho fametrahana ambaratongam-pamoretana – ny fomba nitondrana an-dRamatoakely Abbah dia tena feno habibiana: ny fito minitra aza efa tena lavabe, navela irery nandritry ny fito volana – nefa ny fampibaribariana fanitsakitsahana ny zo maha-olona notanterahana tanaty halozàna mifanahim-biby (sadique) sy naharitra fotoana ela nandritry ny taona, tsy mba am-bolana, toy izao natao tamina vehivavy 'transsexuelle' voafonja izao. ||| But this is not about creating hierarchies of oppression – Ms. Abbah's treatment has been utterly barbaric: seven minutes would have been too long, let alone seven months – but to point out that comprehensive breaches of human rights are inflicted on trans women prisoners with almost sadistic cruelty over time periods of years, not months.
Iran: Bilaogera "Nanjavona" Sy Famonoan-tena Roa Nampahonena ||| Iran: A "Missing" Blogger and Two Tragic Suicides
Miantso fanadihadiana eo noho eo noho ny famonoan-tena nataona voafonja roa teo aloha sady akaman'i Kouhyar Goudarzi, mpamaham-bolongana sady mpikatroka mpiaro ny zon'olombelona natoka-monina ao amin'ny fonjan'i Evin ao Teheran hatramin'ny nisamboran'ny sampam-pitsikilovana azy tamin'ny 31 jolay 2011, ny Fanantenana Iraisampirenena Mpiaro ny Zon'Olombelona. ||| is calling for an immediate investigation into the recent suicides of two former detainees and associates of Kouhyar Goudarzi, a human rights activist and blogger who has been held incommunicado since his detention by intelligence forces on 31 July 2011 in Tehran's Evin prison.
Nosamborin'ny mpitandro ny filaminana niaraka tamin'ny namany maro tamin'ny 31 jolay 2011 lasa teo i Goudarzi, ary anisan'izany koa i Behnam Ganji, 22 taona. ||| Security forces detained Goudarzi, along with several friends, including Behnam Ganji, 22, on 31 July, 2011.
Nohadihadian'ny mpitandro ny filaminana ihany koa ny naman'i Goudarzi iray hafa, Nahal Sahabi, 37 taona. ||| Another of Goudarzi's friends, Nahal Sahabi, 37, was subsequently interrogated by authorities.
Taorian'ny namotsorana an'i Ganji sy i Sahabi dia nifandimby namono tena ireo tamin'ny 1 Septambra sy 28 Septambra. ||| Following their release, Ganji and Sahabi committed suicide on 1 September and 28 September.
Na dia tokony tsy tokony hirona hamoron-tantara na idiran'ny resaka fihetseham-po aza ny anton'ny famonoantena, maro ny mpamaham-bolongana mihevitra fa ny zava-nihatra tsy zaka tamin'i Ganji tany am-ponja no nanosika azy hamarana ny fiainany. ||| Although one should resist romanticizing or seeking causal explanations for suicide, many bloggers believe the traumatic experience in prison pushed Ganji to end his life.
Heverina ho manana fifandraisana ara-pihetseham-po izy roa ireto ary nanaitra ny maro ny tantaran'izy ireo. ||| The pair was believed to be romantically involved, and their story has captured the popular imagination.
Nosafidian'ny mpamaham-bolongana Jahanzanan ho lohatenin'ny lahatsorany momba ity raharaha ity ny hoe "Ny Fahafatesan'ny Mpifankatia". ||| The blogger Jahanzanan, chose "The death of lovers" as the title for his post about the incident.
Mbola navoakan'i Masih Alinjead, mpanao gazety vehivavy, ihany koa ilay bolongana avy eo. ||| The blog also re-published an article by Masih Alinjead, a female journalist.
Alakamisy androany. ||| Today is Thursday.
Tia lehilahy antsoina hoe Behnam Ganji ny vehivavy iray antsoina hoe Nahal. ||| A girl named Nahal loves a boy, Behnam Ganji.
Behnam indray naman'i Kouhyar, mpanao fihetsiketsehana sy mpiaro ny zon'olombelona, izay nosamborina niaraka taminy ary navotsotra avy eo. ||| Behnam was a friend of Kouhyar, a human rights activist and protester, who was arrested with him and later released.
Tsy nisy fampahalalam-baovao nitatitra ny fisamborana an'i Behnam. ||| When Behnam was arrested, the media did not cover his story.
Namono tena izy rehefa navotsotra... ary ankehitriny namarana ny fiainany i Nahal.... ||| He committed suicide after his release... and now Nahal, ended her life....
maro no maloiloy rehefa mandre ny voambolana hoe "sipa"... saingy hitako ny gazety sasany nitatitra fa "Namono tena nanaraka azy ny sipan'i Behnam"... Mandria ry tovovavy mahafatifaty... ||| there are many who are disgusted by the word "girlfriend"... but I saw in the morning some media reported that "Behnam's girlfriend killed herself after him"... Sleep beautiful girl...
Taorian'ny fahafatesan'i Ganji, dia nanoratra tononkalo tao amin'ny bolongany i Nahal ary nizara rohy tamin'ny lahatsary YouTube: Valsa Mariazin'i Eleni Karaindrou. ||| Following Ganji's death, Nahal wrote a poem on her blog and also shared a link to a YouTube video: Eleni Karaindrou's Wedding Waltz.
Tena izay henjana indrindra ny tsindry nahazo an'i Behnam ka nahatonga azy nanaiky hiampanga an'i Kouhyar namany. ||| Behnam was under the worst pressure to confess against his friend Kouhyar.
Mbola any am-ponja i Kouhyar. ||| Kouhyar is still in the regime's jail.
Tanako ho tompon'andraikitra amin'ny fahafatesan'i Behnam sy i Nehal ny Repoblika Islamika. ||| I hold the Islamic Republic responsible for the death of Behnam and Nehal.
Niteny i Mpiady Tezitra ho amin'ny Fahafahana: ||| Crazy Freedom Fighter says:
Nanaitra ny maro tamintsika i Nehal amin'ny fatoriany. ||| Nehal with her sleep, makes many of us awaken.
Mampahatsiahy amintsika rehetra ny lanjan'ny finamanana sy ny fitiavana izy. ||| She reminds all of us the value of friendship and love.
Mbola any am-ponja i Goudarzi na dia tsy misy na inona na inona fantatra aza izay manjo azy sy ny zavamisy iainany any. ||| Goudarzi remains in prison, though his actual whereabouts, and the conditions of his detention are still unknown.
Tamin'ny lahatsoratra farany nosoratany tao amin'ny bolongana tamin'ny 2009, efa niantso ho amin'ny fanafahana ny mpikatroka roa ihany koa na dia i Goudarzi tenany aza. ||| In his last blog post in 2009, Goudarzi himself called for freedom for two jailed activists.
Azo sorohina ny famonoantena ary tokony hitady vonjy izay manana fihetseham-po te-hamono tena. ||| Suicide is preventable and anyone experiencing suicidal feelings should seek help.
Mihaino anao sy manome torohevitra anao ary afaka mifanampy aminao izay mahatsapa te-hamono tena sy izay manana krizy ara-pihetseham-po ny vohikala tahaka ny Suicide.org Befrienders Worldwide. ||| Suicide.org Befrienders Worldwide offer confidential support for the suicidal and those in emotional crisis.
Iran: Voaroba ny Ambasady Britanika ||| Iran: British Embassy in Tehran Attacked
Nampahatsiahy ny fanafihana tamin'ny 1979 nahazo ny ambasady Amerikana tao Teheran ihany ity tranga ity ho an'ny mpanara-baovao maro. ||| This incident has reminded many observers of the 1979 attack on the United States embassy in Tehran.
Andro vitsivitsy lasa izay dia nifidy ny handroahana ny Ambasadera Britanika ny Parlemanta rehefa niharatsy ny fifandraisana. ||| A few days earlier, Iran's parliament voted to expel the British ambassador since relations had deteriorated.
Indreto ny lahatsary avy amin'ny fihetsiketsehana: ||| Here is a video from the demonstration:
Ny mpamaham-bolongana Iraniana, Xcalibur, manoro hevitra ny olona tsy hanaraka ny tondrozotra ofisialy hilaza ireo mpanafika ho "mpianatra". ||| Iranian blogger, Xcalibur, advises people not to follow the official line by calling the attackers "students".
Tsy marina ny filazana ireo olon-dia ireo ho mpianatra ||| it is not right to call these wild people, students.
Mpamaham-bolongana hafa, Snotes, nilaza fa ny mpianatra saikatafika Basij no nanafika ny Masoivoho, naka antontan-taratasy avy amin'ny "Fosa antitra", ary nandoro ny saina Britanika. ||| Another blogger, Snotes, said it was Basij paramilitary students attacked the embassy, seized documents from "the old Fox", and burne the British flag.
Rahayi Iran niteny fa ny mpampihorohoro no nanafika ny Masoivoho Britanika. ||| Rahayi Iran says it was terrorists who attacked the British embassy.
Niditra tao amin'ny Masoivoho Britanika ny Mpiandry revolisionera mitana toerana ambony iray, Sajadi ary karazana fihantsiana ady ny fihetsika tahaka izany satria heverina ho toy ny zarantany Britanika ny Masoivoho. ||| A high-ranking revolutionary guard, Sajadi, entered the British embassy and such an act could be considered a war declaration, because the embassy is considered British soil.
Mifanohitra amin'ny Lalampanorenana Iraniana ny fihetsika tahaka izany. ||| Such an act is in contradiction with Iran's constitution.
Ho lafo dia lafo ny sandan'ny fihetsika atao tahaka izao ho an'ny firenena. ||| Iran pays a high price for such actions.
Fanafihana firenena sy fanimbazimbana ny mariky ny fiandrianam-pireneny ny fanafihana Masoivoho. ||| Attacking an embassy is attacking a country and insulting its national symbols.
Somayeh Tohidlou, ilay mpikatroka Iraniana nahazo kapoka 50 tany Teheran tamin'ny Septambra 2011 no nanoratra tao amin'ny Friendfeed: ||| Somayeh Tohidlou, an Iranian activist who received 50 whip lashes in Tehran in September 2011, wrote on Friendfeed:
Diso daty ve ry zareo e? ||| Are they wrong about the date?
Taona 2011 izao fa tsy 1979 (raha naka ny ambasadin'i Etazonia tao Teheran ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana). ||| This is 2011, not 1979 (when protesters took the US embassy in Tehran).
32 taona ny fitondrana izao fa tsy herintaona. ||| The regime is 32 years old, not 1 year old.
Shina: Bolongana Tibetana Maromaro no Nakatona ||| China: Several Tibetan Language Blog Sites Shut Down
Amin'ireo olona mandoro tena tao Tibet ho fanoherana ny fanjakazakan'ny fitondrana Sinoa, nikorontana tao Tibet tatsinana izay ahitana mpanao fihetsiketsehana voatifitry ny polisy nitombo be ny miaramila tonga tao an-toerana - tsy azo nidirana intsony androany ny bolongana mahaleo tena amin'ny teny Tibetana fanta-daza hita ao Shina. ||| Against the backdrop of a stream of self-immolations in Tibet in protest against Chinese rule, unrest in eastern Tibet with protestors shot by police and a severely increased military presence, several of the most popular independently-run Tibetan language blog sites hosted in China have gone offline as of today.
Nakatona ny sampana bolongana tao amin'ny tranokala AmdoTibet mandeha tsara kosa ireo tranokala hafa ambiny), hita ao ity fampitandremana manaraka ity: ||| The blog section of the website AmdoTibet has been closed (the rest of the site is functioning) and the following notice can be seen:
Toy izao ny vakin'ity fampitandremana amin'ny teny Shinoa ity: "Noho ny mpamahana bolongana sasany mamoaka votoaty tsy mifanaraka amin'ny tanjon'ity tranokala ity, nakatona vonjimaika ny bolongana, antenainay fa tsapan'ny mpamaha bolongana izany!" ||| The notice in Chinese reads: "Due to some of the blog users not publishing in accordance with the goal of this site, the blog has temporarily been shut down, we hope that blog users will have understanding"!
Bolongana hafa malaza Sangdhor.com no tsy azo nidirana ihany koa, tsy nisy fanazavana mihitsy ny momba izany. ||| Another very popular blog site Sangdhor.com is also offline, without any explanation.
Tamin'ny volana Oktobra 2011, Sangdhor nirisika nandefa tononkalo mitondra ny lohateny hoe "Maraina" izay milaza momba ny fandoroan-tena tao Tibet. ||| In October 2011, Sangdhor boldly published a poem titled "Mourning" that was about the self-immolations in Tibet.
Vetivety foana anefa dia noesorina tao amin'ilay bolongana izany tononkalo izany. ||| The poem was quickly taken offline.
Navoaka tao amin'ny High Peaks Pure Earth kosa ny tononkalo nadika tamin'ny teny anglisy ||| An English translation of the poem was published on High Peaks Pure Earth.
Ity ambany ity, pikantsary tao amin'ny Sangdhor.com, mampiseho ny fomba fiasan'ny Sangdhor amin'ny tokony izy ny pikantsary eo ambony indrindra ary nalaina androany kosa ny pikantsary eo ambany: ||| Below are two screenshots of Sangdhor.com, the top screenshot shows Sangdhor in its functioning state and the bottom screenshot was taken earlier today:
Farany, tsy azo nidirana ihany koa ny bolongana Rangdrol.net nefa ahitana fanamarihana mahaliana mikasika ny Tibetana. ||| Finally the blog site Rangdrol.net is also offline and contains an interesting notice in Tibetan.
Tamin'ny volana Oktobra 2011, Rangdrol namoaka tononkalo mitondra ny lohateny hoe "Ny Marina Momba ny Afo Tao amin'ny Lalàn-tsilo" izay miompana betsaka momba ny afo sy ny lelafo, noesorina ihany koa ny tononkalo, vakio ny dikateny amin'ny teny anglisy ao amin'ny High Peaks Pure Earth. ||| In October 2011, Rangdrol published a poem titled "The Truth of Flames on the Thorny Path" which carried many references to fire and flames; the poem was taken offline (read the English translation on High Peaks Pure Earth).
Ity ambany ity pikantsary nalaina vao haingana tao amin'ny Rangdrol, ny teny anglisy "Toerana tsy an-tserasera"" Bolongana tsy Azo Idirana" manamafy fa noesorin'ireo mpandrindra ny bolongana, ny lahatsoratra amin'ny teny Tibetana eto ambany kosa milaza hoe: "Amin'ny anaran'ny fiainana, misaona isika ary mitomany". ||| Below is a screenshot of Rangdrol taken earlier, the English text "Site off-line" suggests that the administrators have removed the site, and the Tibetan text underneath reads:"For the sake of life, we are mourning and crying".
Ao amin'ny Twitter, maneho ny ahiahiny mikasika ilay Ejiptiana mpitoraka bilaogy sady mpitantana ny Google Middle East, Wael Ghonim, izay tsy hita nanomboka ny Alakamisy ireo namany. ||| On Twitter, friends express concerns for Egyptian blogger and Google Middle East staffer Wael Ghonim, who has been missing since Thursday.
Ghonim, izay nianatra tany Cairo ary ankehitriny dia Tale Ara-Barotry ny birao Google any Afovoany Atsinanana, dia nandefa tweet ny faniriany handray anjara amin'ny hetsi-panoherana ny 25 Janoary: ||| Ghonim, who studied in Cairo and is now Head of Marketing at Google's UAE office, had tweeted his intent to be at the January 25 protests:
Na eo aza ny fampitandremana voaraiko avy amin'ny havana sy namana, hanatrika ny hetsika amin'ny "Jan25" aho. ||| Despite all the warnings I got from my relative and friends, I'll be there on "Jan25" protests.
Mety hisy ho any amin'ny hetsiky Gam'et Dewal ve? ||| Anyone going to be in Gam'et Dewal protest?
Ghonim, izay nitafa tao amina seha-pifanakalozan-dresaky ny Al Jazeera tsy ekla akory izay mikasika ny fahalalahan'ny aterineto, dia nandefa tweets avy any amin'ny hetsika ny 25 Janoary. ||| Ghonim, who spoke at a recent Al Jazeera forum on Internet freedom, tweeted throughout the demonstrations on January 25.
Ny faha-26, taorian'ny fanakanana ny Twitter, naneho ny hatezerany iny momba ny sivana atao ny tweet izay mety ho lasa "top tweet": ||| On the 26th, following the ban on Twitter, he expressed anger at the censors in a tweet that would become a "top tweet":
Izay governemanta matahotra ny Facebook sy Twitter dia tokony hitantana tanàna iray ao amin'ny Farmville fa tsy firenena toa an'i Egypt ||| A government that is scared from Facebook and Twitter should govern a city in Farmville but not a country like Egypt
Ny faha- 27, mangataka ny mpanjohy azy hivavaka ho an'i Ejipta izy, sady nanamarika ny tahony manokana noho ny hetsika ny androtr'iny. ||| On the 27th, he asked followers to pray for Egypt, noting his own fear for the day's events.
Nanomboka hatreo, nangina tanteraka ny famahanany Twitterary ary manahy ireo namany fa tsy hita izay nalehany. ||| Since then, his Twitter feed has been silent and friends are concerned that he's gone missing.
Tokony ho tamin'ny 4:30 tolakandro, ora ao Cairo, dia nandefa tweet: ||| At about 4:30 pm Cairo time, tweeted:
Wael Ghonim avy amin'ny Google Middle East dia tsy hota hatramin'ny Alakamisy. ||| Wael Ghonim from Google Middle East is missing since Thursday.
Mila ny fanampianareo izahay mba hanely ny feo sy hanampy hkarihana azy. ||| We need your help to spread the word and help locating him.
Ora vitsy taty aoriana, nandefa ny sarin'i Ghonim tamin'ny tweet i mangataka ny mpamaky ao Cairo hizara azy io sy hitady azy. ||| A few hours later, tweeted Ghonim's photo, asking readers in Cairo to share it and to look for him.
Habib Haddad, namana irain'i Ghonim, nandefa tweet ho an'ny olona mba handray fepetra: ||| Habib Haddad, a friend of Ghonim, tweeted for people to take action:
Tsy mbola afaka mahalala ny misy an'i ||| SOS: Still not able to locate
Dingana manaraka, manandràma manontany olona manana fahefàna, Anaty aterineto na Ivelan'ny aterineto, mba mandefa antso an-telefaona ka manampy anay hahalala hoe aiza i Wael Ghonim ||| Next step, try asking powerful ppl, Online and Offline, to make calls and help us locate Wael Ghonim
koa dia nametraka anmtso ho an'ireo mpanjohy azy mba hilaza aminy raha nisy nahita i Ghonim: ||| also put a call to followers to notify him if Ghonim was spotted:
Yemen: An'arivony ireo mihetsika amin'ny Androm-pahatezerana ||| Yemen: Thousands Protest on Day of Wrath
Ity lahatsoratra ity dia ampahany amin'ny tatitray manokana mikasika ny Hetsi-panoherana Yemen 2011. ||| This post is part of our special coverage Yemen Protests 2011.
An'arivony ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana nilahatra tao Yemen androany, tao anatin'ilay Androm-Pahatezerana hanamelohana ireo fanafihana ny mpanao fihetsiketsehana tamin'ny Zoma tao Aden, ary hitakiana ny fampitsaharana ny fitondran'ny Ali Abdullah Saleh. ||| Thousands of protesters are marching across Yemen today, Tuesday, in a Day of Wrath to condemn Friday's attacks on protests in Aden, and to call for the end of the Ali Abdullah Saleh regime.
Araka ny ambaran'ny Amnesty International, Yemenita efatra no latsak'aina tamin'ireo fifandonana ireo, ary 26 no naratra. ||| According to Amnesty International, clashes on Friday claimed the lives of four Yemenis, and left 26 wounded.
Tsy nasian'ny mpanohitra lanjany ny antso fifanatonana nataon'i Saleh sy ny amin'ny hanatsaharana ny hetsika izay efa naharitra herinandro vitsy, ny mpanohitra izay tsy mitady afa-tsy ny fialàny sy ireo mpiara-mitantana aminy tsy ho eo amin'ny fitondrana. ||| Saleh's call for national dialogue to end protests that have been taking place for weeks have been snubbed by the opposition, who only want him and his regime out of power.
Tao Sana'a renivohitra, samy nanao fihetsiketsehana na ny mpanohitra na ny vondrona mpomba an'i Saleh, raha i Saleh kosa, izay efa teo amin'ny fitondrana hatramin'ny 1978, dia niampanga an'i Israely sy Etazonia ho ao ambadiky ny onjam-panoherana misy amin'izao fotoana izao manerana ny tontolo Arabo. ||| In the capital Sana'a, protests by both anti and pro-Saleh groups took place, while Saleh, who has been in power since 1978, accused both Israel and the US for standing behind the current wave of protests across the Arab world.
Tao amin'ny Twitter, izao tontolo izao dia manohy manara-maso sy mitondra fanehoan-kevitra amin'ny fivoaran-draharaha ao Yemen. ||| On Twitter, the world continues to watch and react to developments in Yemen.
Ireto manaraka ireto ny sasany amin'ireo fanehoan-kevitra avy amin'ny Yemenita sy ireo bitsika sasany manaraka akaiky ny zava-misy eny an-kianja eny: ||| Following are some reactions from Yemenis and tweeple paying close attention to developments on the ground:
Milaza ny governemanta ao Yemen fa hanangana governemantan'ny firaisam-pirenena ato anatin'ny 24 ora. ||| Yemen government says will form a national unity government within 24hours.
Ny mpanohitra milaza hoe: tsia fa misaotra. ||| Opposition says: no thank you.
Ny fitondrana no tianay haongana! ||| We want to overthrow regime!
Nolavin'ireo antoko mpanohitra ao Yemen ny tolotra fifanatonana avy amin'ny governemanta (ela ny ela) ary ankehitriny maniry revolisiona iray iarahana amin'ny vahoaka!!! ||| Opposition parties in Yemen rejected government's offer to dialogue (at last) and now want a revolution with the people!!!
Yemen an'i Saleh dia miampanga an'i Israely sy Etazonia ho miketrika ireo fitroarana. ||| Yemen's Saleh accuses Israel and US of fomenting revolts.
Mazava loatra fa tsy nihaino an'i Gaddafi izy. ||| Clearly he hasn't been listening to Gadaffi.
Izy mahafantatra fa ny Al-Qaeda sy ny zava-mahadomelina no anton'izao rehetra izao. ||| He knows its all Al-Qaeda and drugs
"AJA: Ny Filoha Yemenita Saleh: Izay mitranga eto amin'ny tontolo Arabo amin'izao fotoana dia i Tel Aviv & White House no mamolavola azy." ||| "AJA: Yemeni president Saleh: What's happening in the Arab world right now is being orchestrated by Tel Aviv & White House".
Ok, Atoa. Saleh, ajanony ny pilina mena. ||| Ok, mr. Saleh, lay off the red pills.
Ampy ny lehilahy adala iray. ||| One madman is enough.
"Zavatra mitovy no lazain'ny filoha Yemenita: Yemen tsy Tonizia na Ejipta.. sekoly iray daholo ihany no nianaranareo mpanao jadona rehetra ireo." ||| "The Yemeni president says the same thing: Yemen is not Tunisia or Egypt.. all of you went to the same dictatorship school".
"Ejipta tsy i Tonizia.. ary Libia tsy i Tonizia na Ejipta.. ary Yemen tsy Tonizia na Ejipta na Libia.. ary Bahrain tsy i Tonizia na Ejipta na Libia na Yemen." ||| "Egypt is not Tunisia.. and Libya is not Tunisia and Egypt.. and Yemen is not Tunisia and Egypt and Libya.. and Bahrain is not Tunisia and Egypt and Libya and Yemen".
Mandritra izany, hetsi-panoherana goavana no mitohy manerana an'i Yemen. ||| Meanwhile, massive protests are continuing across Yemen.
"Androm-pahatezerana androany eto Yemen, ho fanoherana ny famoretana ireo hetsi-panoherana tany Aden." ||| "Today is a Day of Wrath in Yemen, in protest against the oppression of protests in Aden".
"An'hetsiny maro no nanatevin-daharana ny Androm-pahatezerana, izay nokarakarain'ireo antoko mpanohitra, ho hetsika ho an'ireo niharam-boina tamin'ireo hetsika tany Aden, ary hangatahana ny fiatoan'ny fitondràn'i Saleh." ||| "Hundreds of thousands join in the Day of Wrath, which the opposition parties have called for, to protest for victims of the Aden protests, and to call for the end of the Saleh regime".
"An'aliny ireo nilahatra tao amin'ny Kianjan'ny Fanovàna tao Sanaa Renivohitra mikiaka ny fialàn'ny fitondran'i Saleh." ||| "Tens of thousands march to Change Square in the capital Sanaa chanting for Saleh's regime to leave".
Ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana dia niainga tao Tahrir nankany Saylah... ho aiza ry zareo? ||| Pro-Saleh demonstrators heading from Tahrir towards Saylah...where are they going?
Misy angidimby misidina ambany dia ambany eo ambonin'i Sana'a raha mameno ny arabe kosa ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana Yemen ||| Helicopter now circling very low over Sana'a as protesters are streaming to the streets Yemen
"Manodidina ny 100.000 ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana ao Eb, mikiaka ny fialàn'ny fitondrana." ||| "Around 100,000 protesters in Eb, chanting for the regime to fall".

MAIKA: ny Talen'ny Fiarovana ao amin'ny distrikan'i Radfan (anarana: Haidrah) dia maty novonoin'ny tafika izao ||| URGENT: the Security Director of Radfan district (name: Haidrah) been killed by army now

Pero: Fangalàrana Zava-Masina Tao Motupe ||| Peru: Sacrilegious Theft in Motupe
Fanavaozana (Alarobia faha 6 Jolay 2011): Ilay Hazo Fijaliana Masin'i Motupe dia hita ihany saingy tsy nisy an'ireo vatosoa intsony sady notapatapahana nizara dimy sy nisy faritra may ihany koa ilay izy. ||| Update (Wednesday July 6, 2011): the Holy Cross of Motupe was found without its gems, cut in five parts and with burn marks.
Ny Talata 5 Jolay 2011, vaovao ratsy nahataitra no nifohazan'ireo Peroviana: nisy nangalatra ilay Hazo Fijaliana Masin'i Motupe izay tena malaza be sy fanta-bahoaka tokoa. ||| On Tuesday, July 5, 2011, Peruvians woke up to shocking news: the popular and very well-known Holy Cross of Motupe had been stolen.
Ilay Hazo Fijaliana Masin'i Motupe, avy ao amin'ny disitrikan'i Motupe ao amin'ny faritra Lambayeque, avaratr'i Peru, dia efa tany amin'ny 1860 tany. ||| The Holy Cross of Motupe, from the district of Motupe in the region of Lambayeque, north of Peru, dates back to 1860.
Ankalazana isan-taona isaky nyvolana Aogositra izy io, ka ny ilay hazo fijaliana no ivony, araka ny lovan-tsofina, dia namboarin'i Fray Juan Agustín de Abad, pretra Fransiskana. ||| It is celebrated annually every August, and the central point is a cross that, according to the tradition, was made by Fray Juan Agustín de Abad, a Franciscan priest.
Nisy niteny fa ilay pretra dia nandao tampoka sady tsy namela marika mihitsy izay lalàna nalehany. ||| It is said the much-beloved priest left all of a sudden, without a trace.
Nefa talohan'izay dia nampahafantatra tamin'olona maromaro izy fa ao Cerro Chalpón, Cerro Rajado sy Cerro Penachí, dia nametrahany hazo fijaliana goavana izay asan'ny tànany natao tamin'ny hazo guayacán ; ireo hazo fijaliana ireo dia hita tao ary noraisina ho mpiaro ny faritra iray manontolo. ||| Previously, he had let some people know that in Cerro Chalpón, Cerro Rajado and Cerro Penachí, he had left behind huge crosses made with his own hands out of wood from the guayacán tree; those crosses were to be found and considered the protectors of the whole area.
Betsaka tokoa ireo olona sasa-poana niezaka mafy nitady ireo hazo fijaliana ireo. ||| Many people tried unsuccessfully to find the crosses.
Vavaka navela teo amin'ilay Hazo Fijaliana Masin'i Motupe. ||| Prayer notes left at the Holy Cross of Motupe.
Taona maromaro taty aoriana, ny 5 Aogositra 1868 dia nisy tanora iray, 22 taona, nantsoina hoe José Mercedes Anteparra Peralta nahita ilay Hazo Fijaliana Masina izay nafenina tany Cerro Chalpón, tao anaty karazana lavabato na zohy kely iray. ||| Some years later, on August 5, 1868, a 22-year-old villager named José Mercedes Anteparra Peralta found the Holy Cross hidden in Cerro Chalpón, embedded in a sort of grotto or cave.
Ny evekan'ny Trujillo dia nanendry an'i Anteparra ho mpiandraiki-draharaha voalohany tamin'izany, toerana izay notazoniny mandra-paha fatiny tamin'ny 10 Aprily 1921. ||| The Bishop of Trujillo named Anteparra First Superintendent, a position he kept until his death, on April 10, 1921.
Toy izao no fomba fitatitr'ireo bilaogera ilay halatra. ||| This is how some bloggers reported the robbery.
Ny Hazo Fijalian'i Motupe, zavatra iray nomen-kasina, ary najaina sy niankohofan'ireo paroasianina sy ireo mpanao fivahinianana masina tsy hoe ny avy any Lambayeque ihany fa ny avy amin'ny firenena iray manontolo, no very izy io alina io, talohan'ny hiposahan'ny maraina vao mangiran-dratsy. ||| The Cross of Motupe, a symbolic venerated object, admired by thousands of parishioners and pilgrims not only from Lambayeque but from the whole country, was stolen last night, during the early morning.
Tao Cerro Cruz de Chalpón no nisy azy io. ||| It was located at Cerro Cruz de Chalpón.
mpangalatra vitsivitsy no tonga tao an-toerana ary, raha vao avy nanafika sy namatotra ireo mpiambina amin'ny alina, dia tsy nisalasala nanao ilay fanimbazimbàna. ||| some burglars got to the place and, after attacking and tying up the night watchman, had no qualms about commiting the sacrilege.
José Zeña del Valle, blogera avy ao amin'ny Del Valle para todos, dia nanampy andinindininy: ||| José Zeña del Valle, the blogger from Del Valle para todos, added some more details:
Niaraka tamin'ny feon-dakolosy dia nandeha nankany amin'ilay zohy ao Chalpon ireo mponina ka nijery ny manodidina, manantena fa mety hitranga ny hoe natsipin'ireo mpangalatra any amin'ny iray amin'ireo hantsana lalina manodidina ny tendrombohitra Cerro Chalpón ilay zava-masina (nangalarina) rehefa avy naboridana sy nalaina ireo vato sarobidy taminy. ||| With the pealing of bells, the residents have gone to the cave of Chalpon to look around, hoping it may have been possible that the sacrilegious (robbers), after ripping off the (cross') precious garments, had left it in one of the deep precipices around the mountains of Cerro Chalpón.
Io fitrangan-javatra io moa dia nanintona bebe kokoa ireo mpino Katolika ho amin'ilay Hazo Fijalian'i Motupe tao Chalpon, noho ny faha-25-n'ity volana ity hanamarika ny nanombohan'ny andron'ny mpiambina masina (mitambatra). ||| The event has captured more interest from the Catholic believers in the Cross of Chalpon of Motupe, due to the fact that on the 25 of this month will marks the starting of the (associated) patron's saint day.
Ilay Hazo Fijaliana moa dia voarakotra volafotsy sy volamena fotsy ka izany no tena nahasarika ireo mpangalatra handroba azy. ||| The cross is covered with silver and white gold, which makes it attractive for burglars.
Ao amin'ny Twitter, ny tenifototra "cruzdemotupe" dia lasa lohateny malaza resahana be ao an-toerana. ||| On Twitter, the hashtag "cruzdemotupe" became a local trending topic.
Tsy aleon-dry zareo ny Kristy ao no nangalarina (mantsy ilay tsangambaton'i Jesosy Kristy napetraka vao haingana ary raisin'ny Filoha Peroviana Alan Garcia amin'ny fomba tsy misy fanajàna) ||| They'd better steal the Christ of (alluding to a recently installed statue of Jesus Christ and relating it to Peruvian President Alan Garcia in a disrespectful way)
Ny finoana apetraka ety amin'ny sisiny, ny nangalarana ny "cruzdemotupe" dia mampiseho fa tsy misy na inona na inona hajaina eto amin'ny firenena... ||| Beliefs aside, the theft of the "cruzdemotupe" shows that in the country, there is no respect for anything...
Kandy Fuentes dia nalahelo mafy raha nandre izany vaovao izany: ||| Kandy Fuentes was saddened with the news:
Tamin'ity taona ity aho no tsy mba afaka nandeha tany "cruzdemotupe" mba hanatanteraka ny voadiko... Ttena malahelo mafyv aho. ||| This year I wasn't able to go to "cruzdemotupe" to keep my promise... I feel very sad
Ny Ben'ny tanàna ao Motupe miteny momba ilay halatra tao "cruzdemotupe": "Tsy marika fifampitolomana akory". ||| Mayor of Motupe about the theft of "cruzdemotupe": "There are no signs of struggle"
Mikasika ilay halatra dia manambara amintsika ny bilaogy El Perú Rarará fa: ||| About the robbery, the blog El Perú Ra-rá tells us:
Ny Komandin'ny PNP (National Peruvian Police), Alesandro León Roque, miantsoroka ny fanadihadiana, dia nangataka faharetana. ||| PNP (National Peruvian Police) Commander Alesandro León Roque, who is in charge of the investigations, asked for patience.
"Mangataka anareo mpanao gazety aho mba hanam-paharetana amin'o raharaha io, mbola mijanona ho tsiambaratelo ny fanadihadiana. ||| "I ask journalists to be a little patient about this, investigations are reserved.
Koa sitrako indrindra raha mba mitony ianareo, aleo izay hanao ny asanay", hoy izy niteny entitra. ||| I'd like to you to be calm, let us work", he urged.
Indrisy anefa fa tsy io ihany no fangalarana zava-masina nitranga tao Perou tato anatin'ny volana vitsy. ||| Unfortunately, this is not the only sacrilegious theft reported in Peru in recent months.
Ohatra fotsiny ny tamin'ny Oktobra lasa teo, i M. Antonio Agapito Manco, avy ao amin'ny bilaogy Poder Político, dia nandefa fa: ||| For example, last October, M. Antonio Agapito Manco, from the blog Poder Político, posted:
Volamena lafovidy no nanamboarana ny alitaran'ny LORD OF THE MIRACLES (na ny Tompon'ny Fahagagàna), miaraka aminà fitaovana mitentinm-bidy US$ 30,000, izay fandraisana anjara avy amin'ireo vahoaka vontom-pinoana sy ny mpifanolo-bodirindrina, ary novidiana tamin'ny alalan'ny hetsika sosialy sy hetsika ara-pivavahana maro. ||| Rich goldsmithing characterized the altar of LORD OF THE MIRACLES, with a material value over US$ 30,000, which were contributions from neighbors and faithful people, purchased through many social and religious activities.
Tonizia: Mpisolovava voadaroka noho izy ireo mijoro ho an'i Sidi Bouzid ||| Tunisia: Lawyers Assaulted for their Sidi Bouzid Stand
Nijoro ireo mpisolovava Toniziana nanomboka tamin'ny trangan'i Sidi Bouzid - ary dia nanefa ny sandan'izany. ||| Tunisian lawyers have been making a stand throughout Sidi Bouzid's events - and paying the price for it.
Tsy nitsahatra ny nanohitra izy ireo mba hanoherana ny mahazo an'i Sidi Bouzid sy ny zavatra iainana ara-tsosialy ao Tonizia. ||| They have been protesting regularly to denounce what happened in Sidi Bouzid and the social situation in Tunisia.
Izay no antony nandraisan'ny governemanta fepetra 'hanafay' azy ireo. ||| This is why the government has decided to 'punish' them.
Isan'andro, vaovao mikasika fangalàna an-keriny, fisamborana, na fanafihana mpisolovava no mivoaka amin'ny vohikalan'ireo tambajotra sosialy.. ||| Every day, news of the kidnapping, arrest, or assault of lawyers is surfacing on social networking sites.
Tao anaty lahatsorany, Hetsiky ny mpisolovava tamin'ny Talata 28 Desambra 2010 (Lawyers'Demonstration Tuesday 28th, 2010), dia nanoratra i Tunisian Girl: ||| In her post, Lawyers'Demonstration Tuesday 28th, 2010, Tunisian Girl wrote:
Taorian'io, nandeha tany amin'ny fitsaràna ambaratonga voalohany ireo mpisolovava ary nikiaka ny teny fanevany indray. ||| After that, the lawyers went into the first instance court and shouted the slogans again.
Ny sasany tamin'ireny dia natodiny ho an'ireo mpitsara izay nangataka azy ireo hahaleotena. ||| They addressed some of them to the judges asking them to be independent.
Na izany aza, ny 31 Desambra 2010 no tena andro ratsy ho an'ireo mpisolovava. ||| Nevertheless, December 31, 2010, presented the most horrible day for lawyers.
Satria dia tsy nisalasala mihitsy ireo manamboninahitry ny polisy nidaroka azy ireo rehefa iny ry zareo nifamory tao amin'ny Bar House (Avy amin'ny mpandika: Toerana natao ho an'ny Barreau), manoloana ny Lapan'ny Fitsarana ao Tunis. ||| Indeed, police officers did not hesitate to violently beat them when they were gathering in the Bar House located in front of the Courthouse of Tunis.
Nampiasa ny kibainy ireo mpitandro filaminana izay niteraka ratra maro tamin'ireo mpisolovava. ||| Security forces used their truncheons causing many injuries for the lawyers.
Tao amin'ny Twitter, ireo mponin'ny aterineto dia naneho ny fanohanan'izy ireo sy nanely ny feo mikasika ny herisetra natao hikendrena ireo mpisolovava: nandefa tweet: ||| On Twitter, netizens showed their support and spread the word about the assaults targeting lawyers: tweeted:
Ho an'ireo Toniziana mpisolovava dia hitoetra mandrakizay ho ilay "Zomàn'ny vely kibay" ny andron'ny 31 Desambra 2010. ||| December 31st, 2010 will forever remain as the "Friday of the truncheon" to the Tunisian lawyers.
Henatra ho an'ny fitondrana jadona! ||| Shame on the dictatorship!
Ampolony ireo mpisolovava eto Tonizia no niharan'ny fanafihana maherisetran'ny polisy ||| Dozens of lawyers in Tunisia subjected to violent attacks by the police
Niampanga ny zava-nitranga ireo mponin'ny aterineto: ||| Netizens denounced what happened:
Nanaitra ny fampahalalam-baovao maro ny nivoahan'ny sary nalain'ny torista Espagnôla tany amin'ny faritry ny tendrombohitra Rif any Marôka, sary tsy dia mazava loatra izay toa ahitana am-baben-dramatoa Marôkana iray, zazavavikely manana volo blaondy izay toa mitovitovy endrika amin'i Madeleine McCann, ilay zazakely izay nanjavona ary tsy mbola hita mandrak'ankehitriny. ||| Major media outlets and bloggers went into a frenzy a few days ago when a blurry photograph taken by a Spanish tourist in Morocco's Rif mountain region showed a small blonde girl bearing a strong resemblance to missing British child Madeleine McCann perched on the back of a Moroccan woman.
Tsy sarin'i Madeleine McCann anefa ilay izy fa an'i Bouchra Benaissa izay zazavavy Marôkana roa taona eo ho eo, satria tsy vitsy tokoa mantsy ireo olona manana maso mazava loko sy volo blaondy any amin'iny faritra iny. ||| As it turns out, the photograph was not of Madeleine McCann, but of a two-year-old Moroccan girl named Bouchra Benaissa, whose blonde hair and light eyes are not uncommon to the region.
Ary raha mbola zendana amin'izay mety ho fitoviana eo amin'izy roa vavy ny fampahalalam-baovao maro, ireo mpiblaogy Marôkana kosa dia tsy taitra sady mandinika. ||| While many news sites marveled at the similarities between the two girls, Moroccan bloggers weren't all that surprised.
Tena tsy maty vonoina mihitsy ny peta-tavan'olona arak'izay mety ho fihaviany. ||| Ethnic stereotypes definitely die hard.
Sary tokana, tsy dia mazava, mampiseho zazavavy Marôkana, izay nalaina torista tany akaikin'i tanàna Tetouan, dia ampy amaharan'ny fampahalalam-baovao Espagnôla sy iraisam-pirenena hoe: nendahina mpivady Marôkana hono i Madeleine McCann, ilay Anglisy kely efatra taona very tany Pôrtigala hatramin'ny 2 May 2007 lasa teo. ||| All it took for the Spanish, and then international, media machine to spring to action was a fuzzy photograph of a young Moroccan girl taken by a Spanish tourist close to Tetouan. Madeleine McCann, a four year-old English girl who disappeared in Portugal May 2nd, could have been kidnapped by a couple of Moroccans.
Ahoana no mahatonga an'izany? ||| Why this misunderstanding?
Tsotra ny valiny: satria blaondy toa an'i Madeleine ilay zazavavy am-baben-dreniny teo amin'ny sary. ||| The answer is simple: the young Moroccan girl photographed on the back of her mother was fair-skinned like Madeleine.
Vetivety anefa dia sarona ny fanalahidin'ilay mistery, i Bouchra Benaissa no anaran'ilay Maddie Marôkana (FANAMARIHANA: « Maddie » no anaram-bosotra fiantso ireo Madeleine any amin'ireo tany miteny Anglisy.) ||| The mystery was quickly cleared up, "Moroccan Maddie" is in fact called Bouchra Benaissa.
Tsotra be i Ahmed sy Hafida ray aman-dreniny, ary tsy nanasarotra izy ireo rehefa noadinadinin'ireo Zandary, sy ireo mpanao gazety iraisam-pirenena sesehena, izay samy te-hanazava ity « mistery » ity. ||| Her parents, Ahmed and Hafida, extremely kind, even lent themselves to the long questioning of the police, and even to the harassment of dozens of top international, English and Spanish journalists who wanted to clear up this "mystery".
Dieny am-piandohana kosa, na dia mbola tsy fantatra aza fa tsy i Maddie ilay sary dia efa malina ny mpiblaogy Abdelilah Boukili: ||| Even prior to the news that the photo was not of Maddie, blogger Abdelilah Boukili had his doubts:
Raha ny tenako manokana aloha dia tsy mieritreritra fa i Maddie io amin'ny sary io. ||| Personally, I don't think it can be Madeleine.
Ilay ramatoa mibaby azy ohatry ny avy ambanivohitra. ||| The woman seems from the countryside.
Ny vahoaka Marôkana, indrindra ireo any ambanivohitra dia mifankalala avokoa. ||| In Morocco people, especially those living in the countryside know each other.
Ary hoan-dreniny, ny fitaizana zaza izay miteny Anglisy dia tsy maintsy ho nanaitra ny manodidina. ||| For her having a child speaking English can raise the curiosity of people in her area.
Afaka namaly ihany izy hoe zanak'havana mipetraka any Erôpa io zaza io, satria avy amin'ny faritra Avaratry i Marôka ny ankamaroan'ireo Marôkana any an-dafy. ||| She can have as an answer that the child is from a relation who lives in Europe as a substantial number of Moroccan immigrants originate from the north of Morocco.
Sady raha i Madeleine io zazavavy io dia tsy ho sahiny naseho am-pahibemaso. ||| If that girl was really Madeleine, the women wouldn't show her in public.
Mbola an-tsain'ny maro loatra no sady amin'ny lohalaharana amin'ireo sarin'olona tadiavin'ny Polisy Marôkana izy. ||| In general, the local authorities' job is to know about any foreigner living in any areas.
Isan'ny andraikitry ny mpitondra fanjakana koa mantsy ny fahafantarana ireo vahiny monina n'aiza n'aiza faritra misy azy. ||| It has a network that regularly reports about anything special taking place in any area of the country.
Raha Madeleine io zaza io raha dia sarona vetivety monja satria mbola kely loatra izy ka tsy hahay fitenim-paritra ary tsy maintsy lasa firesaka tany an-toerana. ||| If the girl was Madeleine she couldn't have gone unnoticed as it is too early for her to speak the local language fluently without reverting to English.
I Laila Lalami dia nampitaha matoan-dahatsoratra ary nifidy izay tiany indrindra: ||| As a consequence she can be the talk of the area where she is. Laila Lalami shared her favorite headline:
Ny gazety Marôkana Le Matin: Izao vao mahafantatra ny fisian'ny olona Blaondy aty Marôka ny Espagnôla. ||| It comes from Le Matin, of all places: The Spanish discover the existence of blondes in Morocco.
Chergaoui koa dia mivazivazy ny tsy fahalalan'ireto Espagnôla: ||| Chergaoui also mocked the Spanish for their ignorance:
Ny fanarahana ity raharaha Maddie ity aty Marôka... dia nahafahan'ireo Marôkana mianatra fa misy koa ireo Marôkana izay sady blaondy no mazava maso, arak'izay notsindrian'ireo gazety Marôkana maro tamin'ny Alarobia. ||| The Maddie saga's Moroccan red herring...made it possible for the Spaniards to discover that there are Moroccans with fair hair and light eyes, as several Spanish newspapers highlighted on Wednesday.
Ary hamaranana azy, mazava ny lohateny nofidian'i Ghasbouba hoan'ny lahatsoran'ny blaoginy « MNDBA: Marôkana na dia Blaondy aza »: ||| But the best headline of the day came from Ghasbouba, whose blog post was entitled "BWM: Blond While Moroccan".
Tena mahamenatra raha izay « mety » ho fitovian'i Bouchra aman'endrika Erôpeana fotsiny dia ampy hiteraka fahasahiranana hoan'ity mpianakavy kely ity, avy amin'ireo mpitandro ny filaminana aloha, dia avy amin'ireo mpanao gazety iraisam-pirenena indray. ||| In the post, he said: It is really a shame and a pity that little Bouchra and her family are harassed by media and authorities just because she "might" have looked like another European person.
Nampanatsoin'ny fitondrana ireo ray aman-dreniny. ||| Her family was called by the authorities.
Voatery nanome porofo ny maha-zanany azy koa izy ireo. ||| Her parents had to prove she was their daughter.
Mahazendana ahy ihany izany zavatra izany, ary satria tsy hitako izay voambolana metimety kokoa anambarako azy no ampiasako izany fiteny izany. ||| I find this really strange, for lack a better word.

Ghana: Italiana ve i Mario Balotelli sa Ghaneana? ||| Ghana: Is Mario Balotelli Italian or Ghanaian?
Izany no fanontaniana mipetraka nahatonga adihevitra mafana amin'ny aterineto. ||| That's the question that has created a heated debate online.
Mpilalao baolina kitra mpamono baolina, milalao ho an'ny tanànan'i Manchester i Mario Barwuah Balotelli. ||| Mario Barwuah Balotelli is a football striker playing for Manchester City.
Nateraky ny mpifindra monina Ghaneana tany Italie izy? ||| He was born to Ghanaian immigrants in Italy.
Na izany aza, ny olana ara-pahasalamana nanohintohina ny ainy no nampitodika ny ray aman-dreniny tamin'ny asa sosialy ary taty aoriana dia noraisina fianakaviana italiana iray an-tànana izy. ||| However, Mario's life-threatening health condition made his family turn him over to social services and later he was fostered by an Italian family.
Lasa olom-pirenena Italiana izy tamin'ny taona 2008. ||| He became an Italian citizen in 2008.
Nandà ny hiaraka amin'ny ekipam-pirenena Ghaneana izy ary nilaza fa efa nofinofiny hatry ny ela ny hilalao ho an'i Italia. ||| He has refused to join the Ghanaian national team arguing that he has always dream of playing for Italy.
Tamin'ny Aogositra 2007 ny fiantsoana azy voalohany ho ao amin'ny ekipam-pirenen'i Ghana. ||| His first call-up for Ghana national team was in August 2007.
Ndeha hojerena ny hevitr'ireo mpitoraka bilaogy sy ireo mpamaky mikasika izany olana izany. ||| Let's see opinions of bloggers and their readers about the issue.
Atombotsika amin'i Abena Serwaa izay manontany hoe, "Anisan'ny ao amin'ny Ghana-Deniers Club (Klioban'ireo mitsipaka an'i Ghana) ve i Mario Balotelli kely?" ||| We will start with Abena Serwaa who asks, "Is Young Mario Balotelli part of the Ghana-Deniers Club"?
Atombony amin'ny famaritana" ireo fomba fitafin'i Mario avy any amin'ny tany mafana "ny lahatsorany: ||| She starts he post by describing Mario's "smouldering exotic looks":
Fantatra amin'ireo fomba fitafiny avy any amin'ny tany mafana ihany koa i Atoa Balotelli. ||| Mr. Balotelli is also known for his smouldering exotic looks.
Raha ny tena izy, miavaka kokoa izy ka raha mahita azy ianao dia mety somary hihevitra fa izy dia mitovy kokoa amin'ny: ||| In fact, he is so exotic that if you saw him, you may be inclined to think he looks a lot like:
1. namana trotro* izay nandà tsy hanome anao ny tena famerim-bolanao tamin'ny làlanao handeha hiasa tamin'ny herinandro lasa ||| 1. That trotro* mate who refused to give you the correct change on your way to work last week
Ka ahoana ary no mahatonga ny tovolahy tena Ghaneana tanteraka toy izany hanana anarana Italiana miavaka tsara? ||| So how does a guy that looks so typically Ghanaian end up with such a distinctly Italian name?
Anisan'ny ao amin'ny klioba Ghana-Deniers ve izy izay namolavola ireo olona misongadina toy ilay mpanao tolona matihanina, i Kofi Kingston, izay an'i Jamaika teo aloha teo ary an'i Ghana amin'izao fotoana izao? ||| Is he part of the Ghana-Deniers club that has featured prominent personalities such as pro-wrestler Kofi Kingston formerly of Jamaica now of Ghana?
Ny mahaliana, angatahin' ny Ghana Football Association hiaraka amin'ny Black Stars foana izy, nefa mijoro tsara amin'ny heviny izy fa ny nofiny dia ny hilalao ho an'i Italia irery ihany fa tsy ho an'ny firenena niaviany mihitsy. ||| Interestingly, he was courted persistently by the Ghana Football Association to join the Black Stars, but always stood firm that his dream was to play only for Italy and never for his country of origin.
Izany na dia misy aza Italiana maro manana olana goavana amin'ny hidirany ho ao amin'ny Azzurri. ||| This was despite the fact that some Italians had serious objections to him joining the Azzurri.
Mitsikera ny lahatsoratr'i Abena, milaza i Mike fa tsy Ghaneana i Mario. ||| Commenting on Abena's post, Mike says that Mario is not Ghanaian.
Tsy mahatonga ny olona iray ho Ghaneana ny fananany rà Ghaneana ao anatiny: ||| Having Ghanaian genes does not make one Ghanaian:
Indraindray, mila manaiky isika fa tsy mahatonga ny olona iray ho lasa Ghaneana ny fananany rà Ghaneana ao anatiny. ||| Sometimes we have to accept that simply having Ghanaian genes doesn't make one Ghanaian.
Amin'ny endrika mitovitovy, tsy ekeko ny hampiasa ny teny "Afrikana-Amerikana" ho an'ireo taranak'olona nandevozina. ||| It's in a similar way I refuse to use the term "African American" for the descendants of slavery.
Tsy vitako ihany koa ny mibaiko ny tenako hiantso ireo zanakavavin'ny mpiray tampo amiko hoe Ghaneana, na dia, SAMY Ghaneana aza ireo ray aman-dreniny. ||| I can also not bring myself to call my nieces Ghanaian, although for some, BOTH their parents are Ghanaian.

Manohy ny resaka momba ny fifandraisana ara-sosialy ireo mpitoraka blaogy any Kazakhstan. Tamin'ny herinandro lasa teo, ny adihevitra teto amin'ny aterineto dia nampiseho lohahevitra samihafa. ||| Kazakhstan's bloggers continue to discuss topics of social relevance Last week, online discussions touched on various subjects.

Iza no tsisy saina nahita izany fitsipika izany? ||| What moron came up with this rule?

Eto ireo vehivavy dia manaiky ny fanjakan'ny lehilahy amin'ny sehatra rehetra sy amin'ny endriny rehetra, izay hita taratra eny amin'ny firenena Aziatika efa mba mandroso. ||| Women here inherently accept male chauvinism on every level and in every form, which is typical of a second world Asian country.
Ny miara-mandry amin'ny lehibe dia voninahitra ho azy ireo. ||| Sleeping with the boss is considered a great honor.

Ny famakafakana ny tantaran'ny siansa any Kazakhstan dia nampiseho fa ny mpitarika antsika izay tsy mety aongana dia avy amin'ny siansa voajanahary: mpahalala momba ny vohontany, injenieran'ny harena ankibon'ny tany, ary ireo manampahaizana momba ny zava-manan'aina rehetra. ||| Analyzing the history of science in Kazakhstan shows that our perennial leaders have been found in natural science: geologists, mining engineers, biologists.

Pycm mamintina ny zava-mitranga amina hainteny manesoeso: ||| Pycm summarizes the situation with a sarcastic aphorism:
Ny hevitra mifanohitra dia ny hoe tsy manana kolontsaina mihitsy ny firenena, nefa manana Minisitry ny kolotsaina. ||| The paradox is that the country has no culture, yet it has a Ministry of Culture.

Jamaika: 'Dudus' eo ambany fanaraha-maso ||| Jamaica: 'Dudus' In Custody
Nivoaka omaly ny vaovao fa voasambotra ihany ilay lehilahy nokarohina hatramin'ny tany Jamaika, Christopher 'Dudus' Coke - ny fandefasana azy any Etazonia izay mbola andrasana, hiatrika ny fiampangana azy amin'ny fivarotana rongony sy fitaovam-piadiana an-tsokosoko, dia nahatonga ny firenena handray fepetra vonjimaika dodona noho ny fifandonana teo amin'ireo voalaza ho mpanao asa ratsy sy ireo mpitandro filaminana nasionaly. ||| News broke late yesterday that Jamaica's most wanted man, Christopher 'Dudus' Coke - whose pending extradition to the United States to face charges of drug and arms trafficking threw the island nation into a state of emergency thanks to a standoff between alleged criminal elements and national security forces - had finally been captured.
Misy ireo ady hevitra sasany momba ny hoe tena voasambotra marina ve i Coke, na izy mihitsy no nanolo-tena noho ny fanampian'ny Reverend Al Miller, voalaza ho "olona tena ifantohan'ny saina" amin'izao fotoana izao. ||| There appears to be some debate over whether Coke was actually caught, or if he turned himself in with the assistance of Reverend Al Miller, now deemed to be "a major person of interest".
Maneho hevitra i Jamaica Salt: ||| Jamaica Salt comments:
Araka izany dia ambany fanaraha-mason'ny polisy i Christopher Coke taorian'ny nahatratraran'ny polisy azy teny amin'ny arabe Nelson Mandela niaraka tamin'ny Rev Al Miller. ||| So Christopher Coke is in police custody after the police on the checkpoint at Nelson Mandela Highway recognised him with the Rev Al Miller.

Toa tany Kingston sy ny manodidina i Dudus nandritra izay fotoana rehetra izay –toy izany koa ny fianakaviany. ||| It seems Dudus was in Kingston and surrounds all this time – as were his family.
Tsy nahita azy ireo mpitandero filaminana, na dia mitady hiteny aza izy ireo fa ny "fahakingan-tsaina" no nahatontosa ny fisamborana azy. ||| The police didn't find him, although they are trying to say that there was "intelligence" which led to his capture.
Ny tena marina dia eo an-dalam-panoloran-tena izy no voasambotra. ||| The facts are that he was arrested on the way to handing himself in.
Tsy azo lazaina ho tena lehibe i Kingston. ||| Kingston is not that big.
Izao dia mitady an'i Rev Al Miller ny kômisera Ellington– kanefa navelan'ny mpitandro filaminana nandeha izy tamin'iny fotoana iny ary afaka nanararaotra tsara nanadihady azy taorian'ny fiaiken'ny rahalahiny sy ny anabaviny, koa maninona ary izy no tsy niresaka taminy? ||| Now police Comissioner Ellington wants Rev Al Miller – but the police let him go at the time and he had plenty of opportunity to question him following the surrender of the brother and sister, why didn't he talk to him then?
Manontany tena aho raha nihazakazaka saika handeha hitsoaka hiafina any amina toeran-kafa indray izy, na natolon'ny Reverend tsara fanahy tany amin'ny Masiovoho Amerikana. ||| I wonder if he was running to go and hide somewhere else again, or if the goodly Reverend was, in fact, taking him to the U.S. Embassy.
Manontany tena aho hoe diarin'iza marina no tena tohanan'ny Révérend? ||| I wonder whose agenda the Reverend is really pushing?
Nahoana izy no toa mifankahazo loatra amin'ireo mpanao asa ratsy sy ireo mpanjakan'ny rongony sy ny sisa? ||| How come he is so tight with criminals and drug king pins and so on.
Satria tokoa izy niteny am-pahibemaso fa nisy fotoana nanolo-hevitra an'i Dudus mba hanolo-tena. ||| After all, he has mentioned publicly that he has been counseling Dudus to give up himself for some time.
Ahona ary no ahafahany miresaka amin'i Dudus amin-kamorana nefa tsy mety mahatratra azy ny governemanta Jamaikana? ||| How come he can communicate with Dudus seemingly at will and the Jamaican government can't find him?
Nahoana izy no tsy niara-niasa tamin'ny governemanta mba hanolorana azy any amin'ny fitsaràna? ||| Why has he not worked with the Government to bring him to justice?
Ny mahavariana dia, ity ihany ilay Reverend Al Miller izay nanamora ny fiaiken'ireo mpiray tampo amin'ny Coke taloha. ||| Interestingly enough, it was the same Reverend Al Miller who facilitated the surrender of two of Coke's siblings in the past.
Labrish dia manamarika fa ny mpitandro filaminana dia "nampisondrotra ny hahavon'ny herisetra ataon'ireo mpanao asa ratsy amin'ireo mpitandro filaminana Jamaikana ho avo dia avo, midika fa mananontanona ireo fanafihana", raha etsy an-daniny kosa dia manome ny an-tsipiriany bebe kokoa ny Girl With a Purpose: ||| Labrish notes that the police have "raised the threat level from criminal violence against the Jamaica Constabulary Force to extremely high, meaning that attacks are expected imminently", while Girl With a Purpose provides further details:
Nentina ho eo ambany fanaraha-mason'ny mpitandro filaminana izy tany Ferry akaikin'ny Fiombonan'ny Sekoly Hydel eo anelanelan'ny St. Catherine sy St. Andrew, iray ora latsaka izay nandritra ny fizahàna nataon'ny mpitandro filaminana teny amin'ny manodidina. ||| He was taken into police custody at Ferry near the Hydel Group of Schools on the border of St. Catherine and St. Andrew, less than one hour ago during a Police Spot Check in the area.
Raha ny fahitana azy dia teo am-pandehanana ho any amin'ny Masoivoho Amerikana any Liguanea, any St. Andrew i Atoa Coke, mba hikoy any amin'ireo manam-pahefana Amerikana any. ||| Apparently Mr. Coke was on his way to the US Embassy in Liguanea, St. Andrew, to turn himself into the US authorities there.
Hanao latsa-bato ny Parlemanta anio alina, ny amin'ny tokony na tsy tokony hanitarana ny fepetra vonjimaika hatramin'ny 22 Jolay 2010. ||| Parliament is to take a vote tonight, as to whether or not to extend the State of Emergency to July 22,2010.
Efa nanome ny fanekeny hanalava izany ireo Mpanolo-tsaina. ||| Cabinet has already given the go-ahead for it to be extended.
Ny Parlemanta mpanohitra ihany koa dia naneho am-bava ny fanekeny an'ity fanalavàna ity... noho izany dia fomba fotsiny sisa ny latsa-bato. ||| Also the Parliamentary Opposition has verbally expressed its agreement with the extension...so the vote is just a formality.
Misy ihany koa ny fepetra vonjimaika notapahina ho an'ny paroasin'ny St. Catherine, noho ny fisavoritahana vokatr'ireo vono olona tany amin'izany paroasy izany. ||| There is also to be a State of Emergency implemneted for the parish of St. Catherine, due to the troublesome rise in incidents of crime in that parish.
Hihatra manomboka anio amin'ny misasak'alina ny fepetra vonjimaika any St. Catherine ary hifarana amin'ny 22 Jolay 2010 misasak'alina. ||| The St. Catherine State of Emergency will start at midnight tonight and last until midnight, July 22, 2010.
Mbola mitady izay zava-mahatsikaiky ihany i Jamaica Salt ao anatina tranga matotra toy izao: ||| Jamaica Salt manages to find the humor in an otherwise serious situation:
Ny somary mahatsikaiky kely ao anatin'izao rehetra izao, dia ny fitenenan'ireo mpitandro filaminana fa nanao "déguisement" izy tamin'ny tratran-dry zareo – solovolo sy solomaso hosoka. ||| A little bit of comedy in all this, is that the police say they found him wearing this disguise – a wig and fake glasses.
Toa mampihomehy raha lehilahy izay lazaina fa lehiben'ny olon-dratsy voavidy aman-tapitrisa maro no hifidy izany "déguisement" tsotra kely izany. ||| It seems funny that a man who is supposed to be an alleged mastermind of a gang worth millions should choose this little disguise.
Ny sasany mety nitsoaka tany Amerika Atsimo dia nodidiana mihitsy hanova tarehy, i Dudus kosa mipetraka any Kingston miankanjo tahaka ny lehilahy Soisy(suisse). ||| Some might have fled to South America and had plastic surgery, Dudus stays in Kingston dressed like a Swiss boy.
Kanefa i Salt, miaraka amin'ireo mpitoraka blaogy hafa, dia tsy afa-manoatra fa maminany izay ho tohiny fotsiny: ||| But Salt, along with other bloggers, cannot help but speculate as to what happens next:
Miatrika ny fiainany any am-ponjan'i Etazonia i Dudus raha voaporofo fa izy no tompon'ireo rongony sy ireo fitaovam-piadina ireo. ||| Dudus faces life in prison in the US if convicted of the drug and gun charges against him.
Hahaliana ny hahita izay hoteneniny rehefa tonga any izy – hanipy ny fahadisoana any amin'ny Praiminisitra Bruce Golding ve izy? ||| it will be interesting to see what he says when he gets there – is he going to spill the beans on PM Bruce Golding?
The Wickedest Time dia mametra-panontaniana maro noho ireo valin-teny: ||| The Wickedest Time has more questions than answers:
Ny fanontaniana lehibe indrindra dia ny hoe inona indray no manaraka?? ||| The big question is what next??
Hizaka ny anjarany tahaka ny rainy izay nodorana velona tao amin'ny fonja Jamaikana teo am-piandrasana ny famindrana azy tany Etazonia ve izy?? ||| Will he suffer the same fate as his father who was burnt alive in a Jamaican jail while waiting for his extradition to the US??
Iza no hahazo ny US$60,000/JA$5 Tapitrisa valisoa takalon'ny lohan'i Christopher 'Dudus' Coke?? ||| Who will recieve the US$60,000/JA$5 Million bounty that was rested on the head of Christopher 'Dudus' Coke??
Rahoviana izany no hivoaka?? ||| When will it be released??
Ny krizy iray volana izay nanery an'i Jamaika handray fepetra vonjimaika dia namoizana ny ain'ny miaramila iray sy olon-tsotra 73... koa satria eo ambany fanaraha-maso izy izao, hiverina araka ny tokony ho izy ve ny fiainan'ny mponina? ||| The one month crisis that forced Jamaica into a state of emergency claimed the lives of one soldier and 73 civilians... so now that he is in custody, will the lives of the citizens go back to normal?
Chez Hsia no tompon'ny teny farany: ||| Chez Hsia gets the last word:
Notaterina tany amin'ny Tobin'ny mpitandro filaminana Espaniola i Dudus, avy eo tany amin'ny fonjan'i Espana, ary avy eo nalefa fiaramanidina niverina tany Kingston, toerana iandrasany ny datin'ny fitsaràna azy izay lazaina fa ho avy tsy ho ela afaka andro vitsivitsy. ||| Dudus was transported to the Spanish Town Police Station, then Spanish Town prison, and then airlifted back into Kingston, where he is awaiting a court date that they say will be set in the next couple of days.
Ny vinavinako: ny fanjakana Jamaikana dia hampiasa ny fe-potoana mba hiezahana hiampangana azy amin'ny heloka izay mifototra amin'ireo vaovao azon'izy ireo nandritra ny fitazonana sy ny fanadihadiana azy, ary hihizingizina hitana azy tsy ho any Etazonia fa hoe enjehin-dry zareo ao amin'ny taniny aloha. ||| My guess: the Jamaican government will use the delay to try and charge him with a crime based on information they have obtained during the detention and inquisition, and will resist handing him over to the US on the grounds that they want to prosecute him domestically first.
Ho andro fohy mahaliana ny fijerena ny fivoaran'ity raharaha ity ho lasa lavitra hatrany...Raha haneritery ny Etazonia hakàna azy any amin'ny fanaraha-maso, na, ara-diplomatika dia tsy maintsy manaja ny fahalalahan'ny vahoaka Jamaikana hanenjika azy manokana ry zareo, na dia tetik'ady hampitandremana ireo mpitarika Jamaikana amin'ny mba tsy hahatafiditra azy ireo amin'ity asa ratsy ity ihany aza izany. ||| It will be an interesting few days watching how this further unfolds... whether the US turns the screws to get custody of him, or whether they are diplomatically required to respect the autonomy of the Jamaican people to prosecute their own, even if it is merely a ploy to prevent Jamaica's leaders from being implicated in criminal activity.
Filipina: Maneho hevitra mikasika ny kabary fanokanana amin'ny fomba ofisialy ny filoha vaovao ireo mponin'ny aterineto ||| Philippines: Netizens react to inaugural address of new president
Niarahaba tongasoa ny faha-15 amin'ny filohany: Benigno "Noynoy" Simeon Aquino III, nandritry ny lanonana fanokanana azy natao tao Quirino Grandstand, Tanànan'i Manila, ireo Filipiana, ny Alarobia 30 Jona lasa teo ||| On June 30, Wednesday, Filipinos welcomed their 15th President: Benigno "Noynoy" Simeon Aquino, III during his Inauguration held at the Quirino Grandstand, City of Manila.
Zanaky ny tanàna roa malaza famantarana ny demokrasia i Aquino; i Sen. Benigno S. Aquino Jr no rainy, izay lasa maritiora nandritry ny fanjakana jadon'i Marcos, ary ny reniny, i Corazon Cojuanco Aquino dia nakarina ho amin'ny Fitondram-panjakana nandritry ny hetsika ampilaminana raha naverina ny demokrasia tamin'ny taona 1986. ||| Aquino, is the son of two of the country's famous icons of democracy; his father Sen. Benigno S. Aquino, Jr. who was martyred during the Marcos dictatorship and his mother, Corazon Cojuanco Aquino was catapulted to the Presidency through a peaceful revolt when democracy was restored in 1986.
Teo anatrehan'ny Filipiana 500,000 teo ho eo, izay nifamotoana mba hihaino ny azy hanao ny kabarim-panokanana, dia nanao ny Voadiny amin'ny asany i Aquino teo anoloan'ny "Associate Justice Conchita Carpio-Morales", fa tsy tamin'ny Lehiben'ny Fitsarana araka ny fomba fanao. ||| In front of roughly 500,000 Filipinos, who gathered to hear him give his inaugural address, Aquino took his Oath of Office before Associate Justice Conchita Carpio-Morales, instead of the Chief Justice as held in tradition.
Ao anatin'ny kabary voalaza, izy dia nifantoka tamin'ny fiainana ny lohahevitry ny fampielezan-keviny momba ny fanadiovana ny governemanta amin'ny kolikoly, ary hamerina azy hiasa hoan'ireo Filipiana. ||| In the said address, he focused on living up to his campaign theme of cleaning government of corruption and putting it back to the service of the Filipinos.
Ny fahalaniany ho filoha faha-15 ao Philippines dia toy ny fisaorambady natao tamin'ny fitantanan-draharaha Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo naharitra efa ho ampolotaonany, izay voaloton'ny kolikoly sy ny henatra goavambe ara-pitokisana ary ny taham-pahantrana avo indrindra hatramin'ny nisian'ny krizy ara-toekarena Aziatika tanatin'ny folo taona lasa. ||| His election as the 15th President of the Philippines was viewed by pundits as a repudiation of the nearly decade-long Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo Administration which was mired by huge corruption and credibility scandals and record poverty levels since the Asian economic crisis a decades ago.
Raha nanapaka an'i Aquino tamin'ny tehaka sy hafaliana ny vahoaka, ireo Filipiana mponin'ny aterinet kosa dia nandefa fanairana: ||| While the crowds interrupted Aquino with applause and cheers, Filipino netizens chimed in online:
Kely fanantenana ihany i Caffeinesparks, mitoraka blaogy ao amin'i Blog Watch ka manome valinteny malefaka ho setrin'ny kabary fanokanana ny Filoha Aquino: ||| Caffeinesparks, blogging for Blog Watch, keeps her expectations modest as gives a pragmatic response to President Aquino's Inaugural address:
Tsy manantena zava-mahagaga avy amin'i Aquino aho. ||| I do not expect miracles of Aquino.
Raha manome governemanta miasa izy, governemanta izay tsy mitsetsitra ny hazavan'ny andro iainan'ny mponina toy izay ataon'ny vampira kely matanjaka amin'ny hanoanany mihoampampana, dia mety ho faly aho. ||| If he delivers a government that works, a government that does not suck the living daylights out of its citizens as would a tiny termagant vampire with a voracious appetite, then I would be content.
Leo fanjakana mpanitsakitsaka aho izay manararaotra ny fahalemena sy ny tsy fahampiana, izay tokony hanova ny toetry ny lalàna. ||| I have had enough of a predatory state that would prey on the weak and the helpless, that would pervert the spirit of the law.
Nampanjary ho lasa mpihinana olona ireo mpiasam-panjakana izay nanomboka ny asany tamina toe-tsaina tsara izy. ||| It has made cannibals of public servants who began service only with the best of intentions.
Nanjary lasa tsy mahalala menatra ny tanora. ||| It has made cynics of the young.
Lasa nanao sorona ny hoavintsika teo anoloan'ny alitara izany noho ny tsy fisian'ny henatra sy ny hatendana tafahoatra. ||| It has sacrificed our future at the altar of the shameless and the greedy.
Maka ny lafiny tsara amin'ny kabary mikasika ny famoronana governemanta mampandray anjara ny rehetra i Patricio Mangubat ||| Patricio Mangubat picks the positive highlight of the address about creating a participative government:
Ny zavatra mba mahafinaritra amin'ny lahateniny dia ireo fisainany hanova ny governemanta, governemanta miala avy amin'ny tsy fahaizana sy mpampijaly mankany amin'ny governemanta mandray anjara, governemanta izay mihaino sy misokatra amin'ny fanakianana sy ny fandinihana. ||| What are note-worthy about his speech are his thoughts on transforming government, from an inept and tyrannical one to a participative government, one that hears and opens itself up for criticisms and observations.
Nianiana i Aquino ny hamerina fomba fijery ahitana rafitra manao dom-berina (Avy amin'ny mpandika: manao tatitra), ny rafitra fifanakalozana, ka ahafahan'ny governemanta manitsy ny politikany hifanaraka amin'ny filàna sy fomba fijerin'ny vahoaka. ||| Aquino vows to affect a feedback mechanism, a communication system, whereby government will be able to adjust its policies based on the people's perceptions and views.
Ity no voalohany hanandraman'ny governemanta ny fomba fiasa mandray anjara na misy fifanakalozana, fomba fiasa izay mifototra amin'ny tamberina avy any amin'ny vahoaka ||| This is the first time that government will try to effect a participative or a responsive system, a system which relies on a mass-based feedback mechanism.
Tyo izany koa ny fanasongadinana lavaka lehibe iray tao anatin'ilay kabary: ||| As well as pointing out a fundamental hole in the speech:
