Tsy nahateny firy momba ny fanavaozana ny lafin-tany i Aquino, na ny politika eo amin'ny lafin'ny fahasalamana ara-piterahana na ny fandaharam-potoanany momba ny miralenta. ||| Aquino failed to say anything about land reform, the reproductive health policy nor his gender program.
Tena mampanahy izany, hoy ny Prof. Claudio ao amin'ny Foibe UP ho an'ny vehivavy satria maneho hoe hatraiza ny fandraisan'ny mpitantana vaovao ireny olana ireny ho toy ny "tsy-olana". ||| This, says Prof. Claudio of the UP Women's Center, is most worrisome because it reflects how the incoming administration treats these issues as "non-issues".
Amin'io, arahan'ny mpahay lalàna Connie Veneracion a min'ny fanamarihana mibaribary: ||| To this, lawyer Connie Veneracion follows through with a spot-on remark:
Tena hita mazava fa miresaka momba ny fitantanana Arroyo ianao raha miresaka momba ny "fanjakana tsy miraharaha ny antson'ny vahoaka." ||| You are obviously referring to the Arroyo administration when you talk about "a regime indifferent to the appeals of the people". 
Ahoana ny fiantsonao ny fitantanan'ny reninao ka nahatonga famerenana nanoratra ny fandaharan'asam-panavaozana ny ara-pambolena, amin'izay mba tsy hovotsotra amin'ny fianakavianareo ny Hacienda Luisita? ||| What do you call your mother's own administration during which the agrarian reform program was brazenly re-written so that your family would not lose Hacienda Luisita?
Ny dadatoanao nanome alalana ny fanitsiana ny didy, ary ny reninao no nanao sonia ny lalàna. ||| Your uncle authored the amendment and your mother signed the law.
Ing. Aquino — Filoha Aquino — Novakiako indroa ny kabarim-panokananao ary tsy nahita soritra ny mikasika ny fanovàna ny ara-pambolena aho. ||| Mr. Aquino — President Aquino — I have read through your inaugural address twice and found no mention of genuine agrarian reform.
Tena tianao hino ve izahay fa "hisy fandriampahalemana ho an'ny tantsaha", tsotra fotsiny noho ny fanalàna ireo mpamitaka amin'ny zezika sy ireo mpanelanelana? ||| Do you really want us to believe that "there will be security for farmers" simply by eliminating fertilizer scams and middlemen?
Amin'ny farany, na dia teo aza ireo hevitra mivaingana sy mivotra nalefan'ireo mpitoraka bilaogy, dia mipetraka amin'ny tsirairay ny tena lohahevitra mba hahafeno fanantenana. ||| In the end and despite these pragmatic and discerning points raised by bloggers, the overall theme of being hopeful settles in everyone.
Mametraka izany miavaka tsara i Edicio raha mampiasa ny Magnificat fanaon'i Mary izay manakatra lavitra ny hevitry ny kabarin'ny Filoha Aquino izy hamela ny Filipiana ho toy izay indray, feno fanantenana. ||| Edicio puts it succinctly when he uses Mary's Magnificat to extrapolate the meaning of President Aquino's address as one that enables Filipinos to be just like that once more, hopeful.
Saingy ny andrasana avy hatrany sy ny tena andrandraina amin'ny fitsarana no tanisain-dry zareo – toy ny resa-bola sy ny fitsinjarana indray, mampifandray azy ireo ho amin'ny fanantenana fa hizara tobontsoa amin'ny mahantra ny governemanta. ||| But they evoke the more immediate and popular expectations of justice – as retribution and redistribution, linking them to the hope that government will deliver benefits to the poor.
Costa Rica: Fanadihadiana ny fifandraisan'ny Fiangonana sy ny fanjakana ||| Costa Rica: Examining State's Relationship With Church Amidst Controversy
Milamindamin-dratsy ao anatin'ny rivon-drivodoza ny EKAR tao anatin'ny tapa-bolana noho ny fiampangana fametavetana zaza tsy ampy taona ataon'ny pretra avy ao amin'ny fiangonany manerana ny tany. ||| The Roman Catholic Church has been standing the eye of a hurricane for the last couple of weeks because of the many allegations of pedophilia by priests around the world.
Misongadina mihitsy ity raharaha ity any Costa Rica noho ny maha- firenena miankina amin'ny fivavahana azy, satria fivavaham-panjakana ny Katolisisma ao ary miteraka fifandraisana akaiky eo amin'ny Fiangonana (Eglizy) izany. ||| This issue is especially relevant in Costa Rica because of the fact that it is a confessional state, in that the State recognizes Catholicism as the official religion and its increasingly closer relationship with the Church.
Mahatsiaro ho tafiditra lalina amin'ity lohahevitra ity ny mpamaham-bolongana KostaRikana, ary dia feno azy ny aterineto raha tsy atoro intsony fa maro an'isa any amin'ity firenena ity ny Katolika Romana. ||| Costa Rican bloggers seem to be really concerned about this issue, and opinions abound in the web regarding how this controversy may affect the country whose citizens are majority Roman Catholic.
Talanjona aho amin'ny fampiheverana ho tsy dia misy dikany loatra sy tsy mila resahina ny fisongan'ny fametavetana zaza tsy ampy taona ao anatin'ny fiangonana Katolika. ||| I am amazed of the level of news of the wave of pedophilia within the Catholic Church, may pass as something irrelevant and without further discussion.
Saingy hanaiky ve ny mpitarika ny Katolika fa be ny fahadisoana ao anatin'ny fiangonana? ||| But will the Catholic leaders acknowledge that there are large errors in the church?
Miharihary fa tsy hanaiky izany velively ireo. ||| Obviously they won't recognize it.
Maro ny raharaha iezahan'izy ireo nampanginana tamin'ny alalan'ny fanonerana ireo izay niharany, ary afindrafindran'izy ireo fiangonana hatrany ireo mpitondra fivavahana manao ny tsy mety nefa manohy ny fanararaotana ataony, izany no natao mba hosorohana ny fandemena ny herin'ny "fiangonana." ||| In many circumstances, they aim to silence the accusations by compensating the victims, and they even transfer abusive priests from church to church and they continue to abuse children, all to avoid weakening the power "of the church".
Nanoratra ny mpamaham-bolongan'ny "Cultura, Cultura Política y Económica" mijery ny fielezan'ny fahadisoam-panantenana: ||| Referring to the widespread disappointment, the author of the blog "Cultura, Cultura Política y Económica
Ny fanararaotana ara-pananahana ny zaza no fahotana maharikoriko indrindra vitan'olondehibe. ||| Child sexual abuse is among the most heinous criminal acts that an adult can commit.
Ary raha relijiozy, izay nantenaina hanana fahatsoram-po indrindra no mahavita izany heloka izany; dia hiteraka horaka sy fahakiviana kokoa eo imason'ny fiaraha-monina. ||| And if these offenses are committed by religious, of whom a surplus of honesty is expected; deception and scandal are still higher in the eyes of society.
Iray amin'ny fahadisoam-panantenana mitranga moa ny tsy fanasaziana ny mpitondra fivavahana, araka izay lazain'ny mpamaham-bolongana H3Dicho: ||| The disappointment also includes the lack of punishment for this priests, as the blogger H3Dicho comments:
Tokony esorina amin'ny toerany avy hatrany ny mpitondra fivavahana ampangaina amin'ny fanolanana zaza tsy ampy taona rehefa hadihadiana izy, ary tokony ho vonona hiatrika ny manam-pahefana. ||| A priest who is suspected of pedophilia must be immediately removed from his post while he is being investigated, and should be made accountable to the authorities.
Ny olana manko dia aleon'ny fiangonana manao ilay "fanadihadiana anatiny" ihany mba tsy hanalana baraka ny anaran'ny "fiangonana", tsy aseho ny besinimaro izany, mba tsy hanasaziana ny heloka ara-pananahana vitan'izy ireny. ||| The problem is that the church has always preferred to maintain "internal investigations" and in order not to harm the name "church", it does not go public, so that their sexual crimes go unpunished.
Cristian Cambronero, mpanoratra ny bolongana Fusil de Chispas no milaza fa ahitana ny karazany rehetra ny heloka toy izao ao Costa Rica: ||| Cristian Cambronero, author of the blog Fusil de Chispas writes that in Costa Rica there are all types of crimes of this nature:
Eto Costa Rica tsy vitan'ny hoe misy ny mahavita fihoaram-pefy tahaka izao, fa misy pretra iray voaheloka ho any am-ponja dia hitanay fa misy eveka manafina pretra iray nandositra fa nampagaina ho nanao an-keriny. ||| In Costa Rica not only do these kinds of abuses are seen, there is a priest sentenced to prison and we discovered a bishop who covered up a fugitive priest accused of rape.
Ahoana moa ny amin'ilay Eveka? ||| What about the Bishop?
Izy no izy, ao amin'ny Fivondronamben'ny eveka, tia manondrotondro raha mbola azony atao koa izany, mifangaroharo amin'ny mpisoloky, ary manome toromarika ny depiote kanosa aminn'y fomba fitondrana mifanaraka amin'ny "maoraly sy ny fomba tsara ||| There he is, in the Episcopal Conference, pointing the finger whenever he can, become involved with scammers, and giving instructions to bland deputies regarding how to govern according to "morals and good habits
Na dia mihamalaza ratsy aza ny Fiangonana Katolika manerana ny firenena, dia mbola nanatona ny antanantohatr'ity fiangonana ity ihany ny filoha voafidy handray ny fahefana amin'ny 8 May, mba hanamafy orina kokoa ny fifamatorana misy ao amin'ny Fanjakana sy ny Fiangonana. ||| Despite the unpopularity that the Catholic Church is going through in the country, the elected president Laura Chinchilla, who will assume power in May 8, has been approaching the hierarchy of this Church, to strengthen the bonds between the State and the Church.
Niteraka tsy fahafaliana tamin'ny olona maro izany. ||| This has caused discontent by many people in the country.
Nitaraina momba izany i Cambronero raha niteny hoe: ||| Cambronero also complains about this, saying:
Maro no niteny fa nihoampampana ny filazanay tamin'ny voalohan'ny volana hoe nanambady ny eveka i Laura Chinchilla rehefa avy nivory ka nisongadina ny fananganana "komity" mandrindra "ny fifandraisana maharitra misy eo amin'ny fitondrana sy ny Fiangonana Katolika", araka izay navoitran'ny La Nación... ||| Many said that we were exaggerating on the first day of the month when we said Laura Chinchilla was getting married with the Bishops, after a meeting where "a committee" to coordinate "a permanent mechanism for the relationship between the next government and the Catholic Church" emerged, as quoted by La Nación... 
Androany dia mbola niteny tamintsika io gazety io fa notohanan'ny eveka ara-bola i Chinchilla nandritra ny fampielazan-kevitra, Izao indray dia manangana ny Corcordato ry zareo: fifanarahana roa tonta eo amin'i Vatican sy ny Fanjakana, izay manome tombondahiny maro ho an'ny Fiangonana Katolika izay tsy zakain'ny fiangonana hafa. ||| Today the same paper tells us that the Bishops sponsored Chinchilla during the presidential campaign, even violating the constitution, now they want to make a Corcordato: a bilateral agreement between the Vatican and the State, which gives the Catholic Church a number of privileges not enjoyed by other churches.
Nanambara ny mpanoratra ny bolongana ASOJOD fa kivy tanteraka amin'ny toe-draharaha: ||| The author of the blog ASOJOD seems very disenchanted with this situation, and states:
Efa naloanay ato amin'ny ASOJOD hatramin'ny fiandohany mihitsy ny tsikombakomba misy eo amin'ny Fiangonana sy ny Fanjakana, satria miantraika any amin'ny fahafahan'ny tsirairay izany ary raha ny eto Costa Rica dia manome vahana vondrona iray andanian'ny KostaRikana vola. ||| In ASOJOD we have repudiated from the very beginning, the complicity between the Church(es) and the State, because it implies an imposition on individual freedom and as in the case of Costa Rica, it favors a group at the expense of Costa Ricans.
Ankehitriny ny Fiangonana Katolika no mampiasa ny volantsika, fa noho ny asa andavanandron'ny Fiangonana, dia midangana tokoa ny fandaniana ataony tafiditra ao anatin'ny tetibolan'ny Repoblika. ||| Today, our money is used to fund the Catholic Church, which by the temporalities of the Church, with items in the Republic's budget, which are quite high.
Ankoatra izay dia mbola ny fiangonana ihany koa no manondro sasantsasany amin'ny politikam-panjakana, indrindra moa fa ireo izay mifandraika amin'ny fitaizana ara-pananahana sy ny fahasalamana ara-pananahana, ka, noho ny fahefana ananany ara-politika sy ara-pivavahana dia hosihoseny tanteraka ny fahafahan'ny tsirairay amin'izay fanirian'ny tsirairay hitondrany ny fiainany. ||| Moreover, the Church continues to shape the direction of some public policies, specifically those related to sex education and sexual-reproductive health, so that, by its spiritual and political influence it tramples the freedom of individuals to decide how they wish to live.
Frantsa:Fihetsiketsehana tao Parisy Manohitra ny Fitondrana Jadona ao Gabon ||| France: Demonstration in Paris Against Gabon Dictatorship
Gabon ilay firenena kely ao Afrika Andrefana dia nandalo herinandro nafampàna ara-politika, satria governemanta roa - ofisialy sy tsy ofisialy - no samy manambara ho eo amin'ny fitondrana. ||| The small West African country of Gabon has been experiencing weeks of political tension, as two governments - official and unofficial - have both lain claim to the presidency.
Ny Alahady 27 Febroary 2011, ilay filoha tsy ofisaly nisora-tena, André Mba Obame, no nandao ny biraon'ny Sampan'asan'ny Firenena Mikambana momba ny Fampandrosoana tao Libreville renivohitra, toerana izay nialokalofany. ||| On Sunday 27 February, 2011, self-proclaimed unofficial president André Mba Obame left the United Nations Development Programme building in capital Libreville, where he had been taking refuge.
Ny andro nialoha io, olona 7000 no nifamory teny an-dalam-be tao Parisy renivohitra Frantsay mba haneho hevitra ho fanoherana ireo mpitondra jadona Afrikana sy ny governemanta Frantsay nampangaina ho niray tsikombakomba tamin'ireo fiondrana jadona Afrikana. ||| The day before, 7,000 people gathered in the streets of French capital Paris to demonstrate against African dictators and the French government's alleged collusion with African dictatorial regimes.
Niainga tao amin'ny Place de la République ka namonjy ny Ministeran'ny Raharaham-Bahiny Frantsay ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana, nandalo ny 51 rue de l'Université, izay misy tranobe mitentina 140 tapitrisa Euro an'ingahy Ali Bongo Ondimba (filoha Gabone amin'izao fotoana). ||| Protesters left from Place de la République and headed to the French Ministry of Foreign Affairs, via 51 rue de l'Université, where Ali Bongo Ondimba (current official Gabonese president) owns a 140 million Euro mansion.
Samy tonga tamin'ilay filaharana daholo na ireo mafana fo Gabone na ireo Libiana. ||| Both Gabonese and Libyan activists were present in the procession.
Filaharan'ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana manohitra ny jadona any Afrika mandalo eo akaikin'ny Tranom-bakoka Louvres ao Parisy, Frantsa ny 26 Febroary 2011. ||| Procession of protestors against dictatorships in Africa passing near the Louvres Museum in Paris, France on 26 February, 2011.
Mafana fo Gabone manao fihetsiketsehana manohitra ny filoha ofisialin'i Gabon, Ali Bongo, tao Parisy, Frantsa ny 26 Febroary 2011. ||| Gabonese activists demonstrating against official Gabon President Ali Bongo in Paris, France on February 26, 2011.
Rehefa nandalo teo anoloan'ny tanànan'ny filoha Ali Bogo, niato kely ny filaharana mba hahafahan'ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana mikiaka ny hoe "Ali Bongo ndeha miala any", araka izay asehon'ity lahatsary tao amin'ny Youtube ity avy amin'i AfricaWeWish: ||| While passing in front of President Ali Bongo's property, the procession paused to allow protestors to shout "Ali Bongo must go", as show in this Youtube video by user AfricaWeWish:
Serba: Mendrika Hananganana Tsangambato ve ny Filoha Azeri izay efa Nodimandry? ||| Serbia: Bloggers Discuss Plans to Erect Monument to Late Azeri President
Iray amin'ireo zaridaina maitso tsara indrindra ao Belgrady ny sahan'i Tasmajdan, izay vao avy nohavaozina, noho ny fanomezana vola 2 tapitrisa euro avy amin'ny governemanta Azerbaïdjan. ||| One of Belgrade's nicest parks, the Tasmajdan Park, has recently got renovated - thanks, partially, to a donation of 2 million euros by the Azerbaijani government.
Niteraka resabe teo anivon'ny bilaogera sy ny mpiserasera serba anefa izany ny herinandro lasa teo ny nanomezana ity vola be ity avy any Azerbaïdan: ho takalon'izany fanampiana lehibe izany, dia hanorina tsangambato ao amin'ny sahan'i Tasmajdan ho an'i Heydar Aliyev, Filoham-pirenena Azeri teo aloha i Belgrady. ||| The news that has been stirring controversy these past few weeks among Serbian bloggers and on-line community is the condition for this gift from Azerbaijan: in return for the generous donation, Belgrade will erect a monument to Heydar Aliyev, the former president of Azerbaijan, in the park.
tantaran' 'i Heydar Aliyev mikasika ny fitondrany izay mampiady hevitra no nahatonga ireo bilaogera nanadihady raha mendrika hanorenana tsangambato ho an'io karazan'olona io ny fanomezana nataony na tsia. ||| The story of Heydar Aliyev's controversial rule has caused some bloggers to ask the question of whether the donation was worth putting up a statue to someone like him.
... mety hiteraka olana ny hametrahana tsangambato ho an'olona iray efa nodimandry vao taona vitsivitsy lasa na dia tsy mihoatra ny 3 metatra aza ny haavony. ||| ...putting no less than a 3m tall statue of a single person who died just a few years ago would in any case be highly questionable.
Ary karazan'olona manao ahoana anefa izany! ||| And what a person that was!
Noheverin'ilay bilaogera Mahlat koa fa ny fitondran'i Aliyev dia toy ny "fitondrana jadona ratsy indrindra" ary nampiany hoe: ||| Blogger Mahlat also refers to Aliyev's rule as the "worst kind of a dictatorship" and adds:
Kanefa tsy misy na inona na inona amin'izany ho toy ny zava-dehibe, satria nilaza i (Jovan Krkobabić, praiminisitra lefitra misahana ny raharaha sosialy fa isika "dia tsy tokony hiseho ho toy ny" inspecteurs de police" ka manadihady izay rehetra efa vita teo aloha. ||| But, none of this really matters, because (Jovan Krkobabić, deputy PM in charge of social affairs) stated that we "shouldn't behave like police officers and investigate what's been done in the past.
Tsy manam-potoana amin'izany karazan-javatra izany isika..." – na koa hoe, tsy mampaninona ny jadona, satria 2 tapitrisa euros, tompo ô!, koa"hampiasaina ho an'ny tanàna sy ny mponina aminy izany." ||| Because we don't have time for such things"... – in other words - never mind the dictatorship, it's two million euros, for god's sake, and that "all this will serve the city and the citizens well".
Manontany ao amin'ny bilaoginy i Nebojša Krivokuća hoe nahoana no tsy misy olona milaza ny mombamomba an'i Aliyev mihitsy ao amin'ny fampahalalam-baovao ary nofaranany hoe: ||| Nebojša Krivokuća on his blog wonders why almost nobody in the media mentions anything from Aliyev's biography - and concludes:
Roa tapitrisa euro dia mazava ho azy fa hanome fahefana lehibe ho an'ny mpanome azy. ||| Two million euros obviously allow a significant degree of freedom to the donor.
ohatra, fa saingy kosa mba hananganana sarivongana ho an'i Staline ! ||| for example, with the condition of putting up a statue of Stalin!
Mankalaza azy ihany isika indraindray, na dia izany aza. ||| We hail to him, occasionally, from time to time anyway.
Mety hisy koa angamba mbola manankarena kokoa, ka hilaza koa fa hanaingo ny saha (Ušće), fa saingy kosa hametrahana tsangambato 30 metatra, tsy hilaza hoe Hitler isika fa efa manana (efitrano fatoriana mitondra ny anarany izy ao amin'ny hotely iray ao Belgrade), sa indray ve i Kim Jong, mety ho tsara kokoa - somary lavidavitra ara-jeografia antsika ny fitondrany kanefa tsy dia zava-dehibe loatra ny fomba nitondrany, sa tsy izany? ||| And perhaps there would be someone even richer, who would offer to redecorate the (Ušće) park, with the condition of putting up a 30-meter monument to, ok, let's not say Hitler, he already has (a room in a Belgrade hotel named after him), but let's say Kim Jong-il would do - his rule is far enough from us geographically that it doesn't really matter how he ruled, right?
Peroa: Baolina kitra, Dokambarotra Amin'ny Fahitalavitra, Fitrandrahana Harena An-kibon'ny Tany ary Tambanjotra Sosialy ||| Peru: Football, TV Ads, Mining and Social Networks
raha mbola nijalytamin'ilay lalao manasa-dalana teo amin'ny Peroa-Orogoay tamin'ilay Amboaran'i Amerika ry zareo Peroviana, nanana n y antony nandefasana bitsika tamin-katezerana ireo mponin'ny aterineto nijery ilay lalao baolina: Dokambarotra "Sociedad Nacional de Mineria, Petróleo and Energia" na ny (Foibem-pirenena misahana ny harena an-kibon'ny tany, Solika ary ny Angovo) niaraka tamin'ilay mpilalao baolina taloha Juan Carlos Obitas eo amin'ny toeran'ny mpilalao fototra, nalefa nandritra ny fialan-tsasatra, izay nampiasa ny fifandrafiana nisy taloha teo amin'ny Peroa sy ny "Chile" mba hitadiavana ny olona mitsipaka ny fisondrotan'ny haba amin'ny fitrandrahana harena an-kibon'ny tany. ||| On Tuesday, July 19, 2011,, while Peruvians suffered with the semifinal match between Peru-Uruguay for the Copa América, netizens who were watching the match had a reason to tweet with anger: an advertising spot "Sociedad Nacional de Mineria, Petróleo and Energia" with former football player Juan Carlos Obitas in the leading role, aired during halftime, which used the traditional rivalry between Peru and Chile to find supporters against increasing the mining windfall tax.
Toy ny mahazatra, ny filazam-baovao Peroviana dia nahavita nanangona fanehoan-kevitra avy amin'ireo mponin'ny aterineto, indrindra tao amin'ny Twitter, niaraka tamin'ny tenifototra toy ny hoe "culpadeoblitas" ny hadisoan'i Oblitas izay mbola miasa ary ny "consejosdelciego" na ny torohevitr'ilay jamba. ||| As usual, the Peruvian press has gathered reactions by netizens, especially from Twitter, with hashtags like "culpadeoblitas" which is still active and "consejosdelciego".
Misy ihany koa ireo vondrona ao amin'ny Facebook manome ny heviny amin'ilay toe-draharaha toa an'i "Oblitas nivarotra ny fanahinao amin'ny Orinasa mpitrandraka harena an-kibon'ny tany ianao ary nanome vintana ratsy ho an'ny Ekipanao" sy "Eny ho an'ny fakàna onitra amin'ny fitrandrahana harena an-kibon'ny tany izay vola vetivety". ||| There are also some Facebook groups that give their opinions on this issue such as "Oblitas, you sold your soul to the mining industries and you gave our team bad luck" and "Yes to the mining windfall profit taxes".
Ireo dia ampahany amin'ireo bitsika mamoaka tsara ny hevitra momba ny haben'ny fahatezeran'ireo mpampiasa Twitter. ||| These are some of the tweets that provide a better idea about how angry Twitter users are.
Na dia diso filaza aza i Elguille Oblitas tamin'ny nanononany ilay fikambanana nampiasa an'i Oblitas, nampita fahatezerana tamin'ny olona izy tamin'izay fotoana izay: ||| Although Elguille wrongly mentioned the organization that hired Oblitas, he conveyed people's anger at that moment:
Fomba fiady tena tsara nataon'ny Conacami ny fampiasàna an'i Oblitas mba handresena lahatra an'i Peroa iray vohitra momba ny fatiantoka mianjady amintsika noho ireo orinasa mpitrandraka ireo ny 19 Jolay tamin'ny alalan'ny Snaptu. ||| It was a very good strategy of Conacami to hire Oblitas to convince all of Peru about the damage they inflict on us with these mining industries July 19 Snaptu
Tamin'i Ray Flores nilaza ny iray amin'ireo anaram-petak'i Juan Carlos Oblitas: "Ilay lehilahy jamba": ||| While Ray Flores referenced one of Juan Carlos Oblitas' nicknames: "The blind guy":
Nandritra ny fialan-tsasatra dia nahita dokambarotra iray momba ilay fitrandrahana aho iresahan'i Oblitas izay mba fantany amin'ny fitrandrahana, tsy misy inona mba fantany ny amin'izany, mba mividiana toerana ho azy. ||| During halftime I see a commercial where Oblitas talks about mining, what the heck does he know about mining, buy some classes for him
Noho ny hatezerany, nandà mafy ny laza azon'i Oblitas teo tamin'ny baolina kitra i ||| Because of his anger, vigorously denies the football triumphs that Oblitas achieved:
Oblitas, adinoko ilay baolina tsara be nampidirinao fony nifanandrina tamin'i Arzantina tamin'ny dingana fifanintsanana ho amin'ny Meksiko 1986. ||| Oblitas, I forgot your super goal against Argentina in the qualifying round for Mexico 1986.
Ankehitriny ianao dia mpamono iray voakarama. ||| Now you're another hired killer.
Misy hafa koa, tao an'i Cesar, izay nanomboka nampifandray ilay valinà lalao ratsy tamin'ilay dokambarotra. ||| There are some others, like Cesar, who started to relate the bad results of the match to the advertising spot:
Ny baolina matin'i Orogoaina...Henjana izany an!!! ||| Uruguayan goal... What the heck!!!
Fa ambonin'ireo fanehoan-kevitra misy amin'izao ireo, ny haino amanjery dia nanosotra ilay dokambarotra ho toy ny fankahalàna vahiny noho ny fanasongadinana ny fandrafiana an'i "Chile" sy ny fampiasany tsy mendrika ny tarehi-marik'ireo habam-pitrandrahana any amin'ny firenena hafa. ||| But beyond the reactions at the moment, the media has labeled the advert as xenophobic since it promotes rivalry against Chile and it misuses the figures regarding the mining taxes in other countries.
Ny hafa kosa nandà io tamin'ny filazana hoe: "Ao Peroa kely ny vola aloan'ireo orinasa mpitrandraka miohatra amin'ny any Chile". ||| Others deny this fact by saying: "In Peru mining companies pay less than in Chile".
Na dia ireo mpanao politika sasany aza dia niresaka momba io raharaha io. ||| Even some politicians are talking about this issue.
Hita any anaty bilaogy ihany koa ny tsikera. ||| Comments were also seen in blogs.
Galayza, avy ao amin'ny bilaogy Marcamasi nandefa ny nambaran'ny mpitsikera iray mikasika ilay orinasa mpitrandraka harena an-kibon'ny tany ao Peroa izay mandoa onitra be noho ny any "Chile", Kanadà na Aostralia: ||| Galayza, from the blog Marcamasi, posts what a commentator said about mining industries in Peru paying more taxes than in Chile, Canada or Australia:
Te hiteny amin'i Oblitas sy amin'ny mpamaky fotsiny aho fa ao Kanadà ny vola dia an'ny Fanjakana irery ihany. ||| I just want to tell Oblitas and readers that in Canada money belongs exclusively to the State.
Fanampin'izany, ireo orinasa mpitrandraka harena an-kibon'ny tany izay mitrandraka ny harena voajanahary ao Kanadà dia an'ny Fanjakana, na, ny ratsy indrindra, itambarana (Fanjakana - tsy miakina). ||| In addition to that, mining companies that are exploiting natural resources in Canada belong to the State, or, in the worst-case scenarios, are Hybrid ones (State- Private).
Noho izany, ny fampitahan'i Oblita dia manao izay handiso fanantenana ny ankizy. ||| Therefore, Oblita's comparisons are meant to deceive children.
Manalogo nanome ny eritreriny momba ny fampiasana olo-malaza amin'ny dokambarotra. ||| In Manalogo, Manoloprofe provides his reflections on the use of a public personality in the spot.
Manamafy izy fa ohatra iray amin'ny dokambarotra moravidy ireny: ||| He asserts that this is an example of cheap publicity:
Mandalo ihany ny zava-manjo an'Ing. Oblitas. ||| What happens with Mr. Oblitas will be temporary.
Ny zavatra tsy mandalo dia ny fampiasana ny dokambarotra ho toy ny làlana iray hifaneraserana ka satria fotsiny io nandoavam-bola dia tsy afaka ny hiteny na inona na inona ianao. ||| What is not temporary is the use of advertising as a way of communication that just because it is paid you can say anything.
Misy zava-doza hita mivandravandra be amin'io dokambarotra io. ||| There is something that is dangerously evident in this ad.
Amin'ny maha vokatra azy, dia vita tsara tokoa ilay izy, fa raha amin'ny ankapobeny làlana tsotra loatra. ||| As a product, it is well done, but in general terms it is way too simple.
Tsotra loatra ka tsy hitako ny mampiavaka azy. ||| It is so simple that I do not perceive there is something remarkable.
Làlana hita mazava loatra ao anatin'ny hafatra tiany hatao. ||| It is way too obvious in its intended message.
Raha amin'ny maha-dokambarotra dia milaza aho fa tsy tafavoaka izany, tsy tafita. ||| In publicity terms I think that it fails, it is ineffective.
Marco Zanelli, avy ao amin'ny bilaogy "Días Extraños" dia nilaza mazava ny hatezerany amin'ilay orinasa mpitrandraka: ||| Marco Zanelli, from the "Días Extraños" blog, clearly conveys his anger against the mining industry:
Very saina ve ireo olona ao amin'ny orinasa mpitrandraka no tsy te handoa ny haba izay vola vetivety e, amin'ny fanaovana fampiraharahana amin'ireo firenena hafa toy izao? ||| Have the people of the mining industry lost their minds that they do not want to pay the windfall profit tax, by dealing with the relations with other countries like this?
Ny Antamina Mine dia tsy nandoa 300 tapitrisa dollars tamin'ny nampiasàny ny fanafoanana haba avy amin'ny Governemanta Fujimori – Nanjavona efa ho ampolo taonany tany aloha tany ry zareo -raha nahazo vola nihoatra ny 80.000 tapitrisa dollars kosa ny Southern Copper. ||| The Antamina Mine did not pay 300 million dollars by using the tax exonerations of the Fujimori Government – they were already done away a decade ago – while Southern Copper had a windfall profit that exceeded 80.000 million dollars.
Ireo zavatra rehetra ireo dia nitranga tamin'ny herintaona, 2010, rehefa ireo mpitrandraka ara-dalàna, tsy manaraka ny fenitra ara-moraly amin'ny lafint maro, no nanao izay danin'ny kibony tsy nisy fakàna ny hevitry ny mpiara-monina akory. ||| All of those facts took place last year, 2010, when formal mining, immoral in many terms, was doing what it wanted without asking the neighbor communities.
Ernesto avy ao amin'ny Física3 nanana fomba fijery hafa amin'ny famokarana harena an-kibon'ny tany: ||| Ernesto from Física3 has another perspective on mining production:
Tsy fahendrena ny manohana ny fitrandrahana harena ankibon'ny tany raha miainga fotsiny amin'ny endrika ratsin' ny Harin-karena Faobe . ||| It is not wise to support mining just based on the rough figures of the GDP.
Mila jerentsika raha zavatra tsara ho an'ny firenena izany ary araka ny efa nosoratako tamin'ny lahatsoratro farany momba ny" valeurs ajoutées, Peroa dia tokony hirona amin'ny famokarana misimisy kokoa amin'ny sehatra fanodinana ny vokatra mba hisy vidiny kokoa ka hiteraka harena. ||| We have to see if this is something good for the country and as I had written before in my posts about the added value, Peru has to focus on producing more in the levels of the value chain that provide more wealth.
Na dia ny fitrandrahana aza no tena asa mivantana, tsy io no iray tena ahitana tombontsoa. ||| Although mining is the most immediate activity, it is not the most beneficial one.
Noho izany, ny fiandrandràna ny famohana toeram-pitrandrahana hafa, toy ny hoe izy ireny no mpanavotra an'i Peroa, dia midika fa mamatotra antsika ho ny mpamatsy goavana hatrany. ||| Therefore, expecting to open more mines, as if they were the savior of Peru, means condemning us to keep on being the main exporter.
Juan Carlos Lujan nanely lahatsoratra tao amin'ny Sin Papel momba ny fanehoan-kevitry ny orinasa mpitrandraka harena an-kibon'ny tany tamin'ny tsikera tao amin'ny Aterineto: ||| Juan Carlos Lujan published a post in Sin Papel about the reaction of the Mining Society to the criticism on the Internet:
Io maraina io, ny Mpitantàna ny kaonty Facebook- ny Sociedad Nacional de Mineria dia niezaka namaha olana iray goavana mahakasika ny voninahiny tamin'ny fampiasana fepetra roa: famafàna ny tsikera tao amin'ny rindrin'ny Facebook ary fanakànana ny fidiran'ireo mpikambana vaovao tamin'ny alalan'ny bokotra "Tiko". ||| This morning, the administrator of the Facebook account of the Sociedad Nacional de Mineria was trying to solve a serious problem of reputation by using two measures: deleting comments in the Facebook wall and blocking the access of new members through the Like button.
Ireo dia fomba fanao ratsy hanome lesona antsika amin'ny ho avy. ||| Those are wrong actions that will leave us a lesson in the future.
Tsy vita atrehana amin'ny fihetsika toy ireny ny olana momba ny voninahitra. ||| A reputation crisis cannot be faced with those kinds of actions.
Raha ao anaty tambajotra sosialy, amin'ny endrika fikambanana, dia am-pahamendrehana no tsy maintsy iatrehana ireo kiana. ||| If it is part of a social network, as an organization, it has to face negative comments with honesty.
Juan Carlos Oblitas nanambara fa" nino ny zavatra nataony izy". ||| Juan Carlos Oblitas declared that "he believed in what he had done".
Niresaka momba ny tsy fahampian'ny fandeferana koa izy. ||| He also talked about lack of tolerance.
Fanampin'izany, fantatra izao fa ilay mpanao dokambarotra malaza Gustavo Rodriguez no isan'ny iray nanao ilay dokambarotra mahabe resaka. ||| In addition to that, it was known that the famous publicist Gustavo Rodriguez was the one who made the controversial spot.
Tao amin'ny kaontiny Twitter nanamafy izy hoe: ||| In his Twitter account he asserted:
Hanao fanamarihana mikasika ny SNMPE aho rehefa tafavoaka manontolo ilay dokambarotra fanentanana. ||| I'll comment on the SNMPE when the whole publicity campaign is released.
Màndraka androany, amafisiko ireto zavatra roa ireto: 6 ora lasa izay tamin'ny alalan'ny vohikala ||| Up until now, I'll assert two things: 6 hours ago via web
1/3 amin'ny volam-panjakana no mifamatotra amin'ny haba azo avy amin'ny fitrandrahana. ||| 1/3 of what the State collects is related to mining taxes.
Raha tsy mamorona asa hafa isika, dia tsy manana safidy hafa afa-tsy ny miezaka ho afa-mifaninana ao anatin'io. ||| If we do not develop other activities, we do not have any other option but being competitive in that.
II.Tsy rariny ny hitenenana hoe nivarotra ny fanahiny i Oblitas. ||| It is unfair to say that Oblitas sold his soul.
Raha marina izany filazana izany, Sofia na Natalia dia mba nivarotra ny fanahiny koa, fa tamin'ireo karazan'orinasa hafa maso sampana ivelan'ny firenena. ||| If this affirmation was true, Sofia or Natalia would have also sold their souls, but to another type of transnational companies.
Rehefa navoaka ny lahatsarin'i coach Juan Carlos Oblitas manome vahana ny fitrandrahana, dia nahatonga hatezerana be teo amin'ireo olona misolo tena ny antsoina hoe 'caviar left' izay nitaraina momba ilay dokambarotra, nefa raha "caviar" toa an'i Nano Guerra (izay saika Kandidàn'ny Fuerza Social, antoko fahiny nisy an'i Villaran (Ben'ny tanàn'i Lima)), tokony nakombon'izy ireo ny vavany Lenta roa tena mahaliana izany. ||| When the video of coach Juan Carlos Oblitas favoring mining was released, it caused rage among some people representing the so called 'caviar left' that was complaining about the spot, but if it is a caviar like Nano Guerra (an almost candidate of Fuerza Social, the former party of (Lima Mayor) Villaran), they would have closed their mouths.  This is an interesting double standard.
Na dia toa sarotra aza ny hisoroka ny fijery ratsy voalohany ny fikambanana iray izay ailiky ny mponina, dia mbola mila miandry ny fivoahan'ireo lahatsary rehetra amin'ilay dokambarotra vao afaka ny hanome hevitra farany ireo Peroviana. ||| Although it seems difficult to get rid of the first bad impression of an organization that people frown upon, Peruvians will have to wait until all videos of the publicity campaign are released to give a final opinion.
Ramose isany: Lazao ny marina, aloavy ny habanareo, mba zaza hendry, raha tokony handehandeha amin'ny sambo telo, mandehandehana amin'ny sambo roa, satria tsara ny manana kelikely. ||| Sirs: Tell the truth, pay your taxes, be good boys, instead of sailing in three yachts, sail in just two yachts, because having less is beautiful.
Mahazoa vola mendrika toy izay hanao tendan-kanina, mandoava vola tsara, arovy tsara ny tontolo iainana, porofoy avy amin'ny ataonao ihany fa mahavita tsara noho io ianao dia ho hitanao fa hahay hiatrika ny fiainanao ianao. ||| Earn fair money instead of being greedy, pay well, take care of the environment, prove yourself that you're better than this and you will be able to deal with your situation.
Raha tsy izany, mitadiava mpitondra Afrikana mpanao jadona holambolamboina. ||| Otherwise look for an African dictatorship to bribe.
Ity lahatsoratra ity dia navoakan'ny Juan Arellano tao amin'ny bilaoginy "Globalizado". ||| This post was originally published by Juan Arellano in his blog "Globalizado".
Ny sary ato dia sary nalaina tamin'ny dokambarotra anaty TV tao amin'ny Youtube. ||| The picture of this post was a screen shot of the TV commercial on Youtube.
Lahatsary: Lalao Amerikana Tatsimo any Medellin, Colombia ||| Video: South American Games in Medellin, Colombia
Heniky ny lalaom-panatanjahantena sy ny lanonana isan-karazany efa roa herinandro izao ny any Medellin, Colombia mandritra ny handraisan'ity tanàna ity ny Lalao Amerikana Atsimo faha-IX ka ifaninanan'ny firenena Amerikana Latina handrombahana medaily amin'ny taranjam-panatanjahantena isan-karazany. ||| These past two weeks were full of sport activities and celebration in Medellin, Colombia while the city hosted the IX South American Games where different Latin American countries competed for medals in a variety of sports.
Miala amin'ny mahazatra kely noho izany na ny tompontany na ny vahiny hitsidika toerana isan-karazany sy hijery lalaom-panatanjahantena. ||| Locals and visitors paused their routines to visit the facilities and watch the games.
Ireto manaraka ireto ary ny lahatsary mampiseho ny niainan'ny tsirairay amin'izy ireo nandritra ny fanatontosana ny fifaninanan-dalao. ||| Following are some of the videos they made, showing how each of them experienced the games.
Afa-nanatrika ny lanonam-panokafana i Carlos Esteban Orozco. ||| Carlos Esteban Orozco had the opportunity to be at the opening ceremony.
Ao amin'ity lahatsary maharitra efatra minitra ity no hanarahantsika azy mampiseho izany lanonana izany, nipetraka niandry nandritra ny ora vitsivitsy mandra-piandry ny fanombohany, ny nisongadina tamin'ity lanonana ity moa dia ny famaranana azy tao anatin'ny afomanga izay nanazava ny lanitry ny tanàna. ||| In his four minute video, we follow him as he shows up to the ceremony, sits and waits for a few hours until it begins, highlighting parts of the spectacle and ending with the firework display that lit the city sky.
Tao amin'ny lanonam-panokafana ihany koa i Lully saingy ny lafiny hafa noho ny an'i Carlos Orozco no hitany: rehefa tonga teo an-kianja izy dia ny mpiasa nivory nitaky karama tsara kokoa sy asa mendrika kokoa no hitany. ||| Lully was also at the opening ceremonies but she saw a different side than Carlos Orozco: as she arrived at the stadium, she saw workers organized in a protest demanding fairer salaries and decent jobs.
Niresaka tamin'ny sasantsasany tamin'ny atleta izy sy niaraka tamin'ireo nitady toerana ho an'izay tsy afa-niditra tany anatin'ny kianja: mipetraka eo ivelany, mijery ambadiky ny fefy. ||| She interviewed some of the athletes and then proceeded to walk to the improvised seating for those who didn't manage to get inside the venues: sitting outside, watching through the fences.
Na dia nolazaina ho an'ny rehetra aza ny lalao dia tsy nahazo tombony tamin'izany loatra ny vahoaka manontolo. ||| The games, although meant for everyone, didn't really benefit the whole population.
Tahaka izany ihany koa ny niainan'i Ana Vallejo sy i Juan David Escobar izay nikasa hijery ny lalao, saingy nahatsikaritra fa tokony tonga 3 ora mialoha raha te-hahazo toerana. ||| A similar experience was lived by Ana Vallejo and Juan David Escobar who tried to watch the games, but found out that they had to be there 3 hours in advance to get a seat.
Nivezivezy nijery ireo toeram-pilalaovana vaao izy ireo ary nitsikilokilo tanelanelan'ny lavaky ny rindrina nialoha ny hodiana. ||| So they walked around the new sport facilities and peeped in through the perforated walls before heading back home.
Tsy mba nanana olana toy izany kosa i Diana Perez raha niditra ny kianjam-pilalaovana. ||| Diana Perez, however, didn't have much trouble getting into the game venues.
Tafiditra tamina lanonam-panatanjahantena maro izy: ||| She managed to get into several sporting events:
Nanatrika ny lanonam-pamaranana i Lina11co ity manaraka ity ny lahatsary noraisiny teny an-tokotany, izay ahitanao tarika mpanao akrôbasia mihantona amina randram-by tazonina fibatana enta-mavesatra (grue), metatra avo ambonin'ny mpijery: ||| Lina11co was at the Closing Ceremony, and following is the video she made at the open air ceremony, where you can see the acrobat troupe hanging from a metallic structure suspended from a crane, many meters above the audience:
Raha tiana moa ny hijery ny lanonana fanokafana famaranana, dia hita an-tserasera ny lahatsary fenon'ny TV an-toerana TeleMedellin. ||| If you wish to watch the opening and closing ceremonies, the complete videos by regional TV channel TeleMedellin are online.
Bitsika: nalaina ho ao anatin'ny andiam-mpampisehoana an-tserasera Todo lo que hay izay andraisako anjara ny sasantsasany amin'ireo lahatsary ireo. ||| Disclosure: Some of the videos on this post were filmed for an episode of Todo lo que hay, a webshow in which I am involved.
Karaiba: Afaho ny tenanao ||| Caribbean: Emancipate Yourselves
Androany no Androm-panafahana any amin'ny firenena Indiana andrefana (tsy karana) - andro nanambarana ny fiafaran'ny fanandevozana, rehefa afaka araka ny lalàna ny andevo rehetra. ||| Emancipation Day in many West Indian territories - the day that effectively celebrates the end of slavery, when all slaves were legally declared free.
170 taona aty aoriana, vitsy ireo mpamaham-bolongana Karaibeana mba mahatsiaro ireo razambeny izay nanao tsy ho zavatra ny ainy hananan'ny ankehitriny ny fahafahana... ||| One hundred and seventy odd years later, a few Caribbean bloggers pay tribute to their forefathers, whose sacrifice has earned them their freedom today...
Montego Bay Day By Day dia naka sombin-dahatsoratra avy amin'ny The Road to Freedom na lalam-pahafahana nosoratan'i Tanesha Ramdanie, izay mamariparitra ny fihetsika mamaly ny filazana ara-tantara: ||| Montego Bay Day By Day quotes an excerpt from The Road to Freedom by Tanesha Ramdanie, which describes the reaction to the historical pronouncement:
Tsy mitsaha-mirotsaka ny ranomasom-pifaliana, raha manakoako avy any antendrombohitra sy andohasaha ny hiakam-pahafahana nataon'ny lehilahy sy ny zaza amam-behivavy, izay nandre fa afaka amin'ny tsindrim-piarahamonina sy toe-karena nametraka azy ho ambany noho ny olombelona ihany izy ireo. ||| Tears of joy flowed incessantly, while shouts of freedom rang from the mountain tops and the plains, from the men, women and children, who had learned that they were finally free of the oppressive social and economic system in which they were treated as less than human.
...raha naka ampaham- kira malaza Baribady izay nanainga ireo andevo afaka an'arivony hihira an-dalambe hihira ny isan'andininy rehefa nandre ny fanafoanana ny rafi-mpanompoana ka mametraka amin'izay ny tena fahafahana tamin'izany taona 1838 izany i Gallimaufry: ||| Gallimaufry quotes a popular Barbadian folk song which, when in 1838 the system of apprenticeship was abolished and true freedom finally took hold, inspired thousands of former slaves to take to the streets singing its refrain:
Bussa - andevo nitarika ny fikomiana tamin'ny tompon'ny sahabe naharitra indrindra tany Baribada ary maty mahery fo nandritra ny ady iray. ||| "Jin-Jin" refers to Queen Victoria and the words of that song are engraved on the side of the Emancipation Statue in honour of Bussa - a slave who led the longest revolt against plantation owners in Barbados and who died a hero in battle.
Mpamaham-bolongana Baribady hafa, Dennis Jones, no mitantara ny fisesisesin'ny asa any Bridgetown ho fiomanana amin'ny fety: ||| Another Barbadian blogger, Dennis Jones, describes the flurry of activity in Bridgetown in anticipation of the event:
Efa vonona handray ny fihetsiketsehana ny tokotany malalaka. ||| The Esplanade was already set up and decked ready for celebrations later in the day.
Amin'ireo olona efa mifofotra dia mahita Rastas vitsivitsy aho na olona mirandrana miakanjo dreadlocks sy manao fehiloha; anisan'ireo olona manao ny fomba fiakanjo Afirikana tandrefana koa izy ireo. ||| Amongst those already milling around for these, I saw many Rastas, or at least people with dreadlocks and tied heads; they were equally numbered with people who were dressed in west African style clothes.
Fa voasokeran'ny mpivarotra mialoha avokoa ny tarika tsirairay, efa nivondrona koa ireo arynanomboka nahandro hanina: sarotra ny tsy hihinana vao maheno ny fofon'ny endi-trondro... ||| Each group was outnumbered by vendors at this early stage, as they set up and started cooking: the smell of the fish fritters was really hard to resist...
Dia ho gaga ho raha mandre ny teny hoe fanafahana nandritra ny tontolo andro, ankoatra izay any amin'ny adio sy ny televiziona milaza ny momba azy, ary mampalahelo ahy izay toe-javatra izay. ||| I'll be very surprised if I hear many words about emancipation during the day, except during the radio or TV broadcasts related to the day's celebrations, and that strikes me as sad.
Amin'ny ankamaroanay dia tsy mihiratra loatra ity andro ity, tsy manana ny fahamendrehany na mahagoavana azy. ||| For most of us there is nothing august about this day, nothing majestic, dignified, or grand.
Angamba efa zatra ny fahafahana izahay ka tsy mahalala ny vesatry ny fanompoana. ||| Maybe freedom has made us all complacent about what bondage really represented.
Maro ny mainty hoditra no mifantoka fotsiny amin'ny lovam-panandevozana nampiharin'ny Eoropeana tamin'ny razambeny ka mijery azy ho "heloka" nanindrian'ny fotsiny ny mainty ka tsy mahalala na mahalala ny bitika amin'ny tantara lavaben'ny fanandevozana. ||| Many black people only focus on the slave heritage imposed on their ancestors by Europeans and so see it as a white-on-black "crime", and know little or nothing about the long history of slavery...
Noho izany raha mianoka ny fahafahana iaianana ankehitriny isika, dia tokony hahay mijery ny fahabangany any amin'ny toerana maro dia maro. ||| So, while we can loll around complacently with the freedom that we now have, we ought to get sight of its absence in many, many places.
Tsarovy fa tsy rariny hita any amin'ny firenentsamihafa ny fanandevozana, ary toetram-pifandraisana eo amin'ny foko na fiaviana mifanalavitra amin'ny fifandraisan'ny fotsy sy ny mainty ||| Remember that slavery is an international injustice, that has racial and ethnic aspects far removed from black-white relations.
Na izany aza dia namoaka ny fandaharam-potoana hotanterahina mandritra ity Androm-panafahana ity i Discover TnT Blog ho an'i Trinite sy Tobago ary Abeni avy any St. Vincent sy Grenadines indray nisintona avy amin'i Bob Marley sy Maya Angelou hilazany ny fomba fijeriny ny mahazava-dehibe tokony hankalazana mandrakariva ity fotoana ity. ||| Meanwhile, Discover TnT Blog publishes a list of events that are being hosted in honor of Emancipation Day in Trinidad and Tobago and Abeni from St. Vincent and the Grenadines quotes Bob Marley and Maya Angelou to make her point about why the occasion is still an important one to celebrate.
Amerika afovoany: ny vehivavy, ny haitao, ny fanabeazana. ||| Central America: Women, Technology and Education
Misy fanentanana iray antsoina hoe Raiso an-tanana ny Haitao izay mikendry ny hampiasa ny "haitaon'ny fampahafantarana sy ny Fifandraisana hampitsaharana ny herisetra Atao Amin'ny Vehivavy," tahaka ny fanohizana ny ady amin'ny SIDA. ||| A campaign called Take Back the Tech aims to reclaim "Information and Communication Technologies to End Violence Against Women," as well as continuing the battle against AIDS.
Itony no iray amin'ny tetikasa maro manerantany izay mampirisika ny vehivavy tsy hatahotra ny hampiasa ny haitao sy hanatsarana ny andavanandrom-piainany amin'ny alalan'ny fanabeazana. ||| This is one of the many initiatives across the globe that are encouraging women not to be afraid of technologies and through education on how to use it to improve their lives.
Ankehitriny ary no fotoan-dehibe ho an'ny vehivavy sy ny tovovavy hampiasa ny haitao hanatsarana ny fiainany, indrindra ho an'i Amerika Afovoany. ||| Today more than ever, it is important for women and girls to use technologies to improve their lives, especially in Central America.
Voalaza matetika amin'ny lohatenim-baovao ny vehivavy amin'ity faritra ity, saingy tsy any amin'ny antony tian'ny hafa hamakiana ny vaovao izany. ||| Women in this region often make the headlines, but not for the reasons that one would like to read in the news.
Ny herisetra mihatra amin'ny vehivavy, ny fahantrana faratampony, ny tsy fisian'asa, tsy fahampiankanina, fiakaran'ny taham-pahafatesana, eny famonoam-behivavy aza no hitanao amin'ny gazety. ||| Instead, their news are about gender violence, extreme poverty, lack of opportunities, malnutrition, high mortality rates even gendercide.
na eo aza izany dia misy ny vehivavy maha-te-hidera manerana ny faritra, izay manao ho laharam-pahamehana ny fanoratana momba ny haitao ary miezaka ny maneho ny fahasamihafana eo amin'ny fisiany ao anatin'ny fiainan'ny vehivavy. ||| In spite of this, there are amazing women from all the region, who write primarily about technology and who try to make a difference in the lives of women.
Tsy mba hoe manam-pahaizana momba ny rindrambaiko ihany i Sweetsakura fa mpankasitraka ihany koa ny rindrambaiko afaka, mizara ny tsara ho fantatra sy ny toro-heviny ao amin'ny bolongany miresaka momba ny rindrambaiko, rindrambainga ary ny Ubuntu avy any El Salvador. ||| Sweetsakura not only is a software expert, she is also a supporter of free software, sharing information and tips on her blog about software, hardware and Ubuntu from El Salvador.
Avy any Honduras, Librecaos no mizara ny mahazavadehibe ny rindrambaiko amin'ny fiteny ao an-toerana ary mankalaza fa manana Ubuntu, azo ampiasaina, vita amin'ny teny Miskito, teny teratany ao Amerika Avaratra. Mahatalanjona ihany koa ny bolongana Vinculación nataon'i Ivonne Aldana avy any Guatemala. ||| From Honduras, Librecaos shares with her community the importance of software in local languages and celebrates that they finally have Ubuntu, an operative system, localized in Miskito, an indigenous language of Central America.
Mampahatsiahy ny Andro iraisam-pirenena hoamin'ny famongorana ny ady amin'ny herisetra atao amin'ny vehivavy vao notontosaina farany teo izy ka mahatsiahy ny traikefany: ||| She commemorated the recent International Day for the Elimination of Violence Against Women and recalled some experiences:
Nandritra ireny andro ireny aho, dia mahatsiahy ny andro nanombohako niasa ary rehefa tsy maintsy nanoratra izay voarakitra tamin'ny kasetin'ny atrikasa izay nitantaranan'ny vehivavy izay nihatra taminy, tsy tanako intsony fa tsy maintsy nihetsi-po aho nandre ny daroka ataon'ny vadiny aminy, nandre azy ireo nitomany fa tsy afa-miasa izy ireo satria "tsy avelan'ny vadiny," ary ny tena loza dia ny fanaovana azy ireny ho toy ny saribakoly fanaovana firaisam-batana, ary ilaozana avy eo. ||| During these days, I begin to recall the time when I started to work and when I had to transcribe cassettes of workshops where women spoke about their experiences, and I could not help but be moved when I heard how their husbands hit them, heard them cry when they were not able to work because "they did not have permission from her husband," or worse hear how they were used as dolls for sex, and later they were left.
Ny hahaizan'ny ehivavy mamaky teny sy ny fanatsarana ny fanabeazana no antoka iray hamahana ny ankamaroan'ny olana mba hanomezana azy ireo ny fampahafantarana ny fahasalamana ara-pananahana hisorohana ny aretina, ohatra. ||| Women literacy and improving education for girls can contribute to solve major problems by providing access to reproductive health information to prevent diseases, for example.
Antenaina fa hitombo isa ny vehivavy mpampiasa ny haitao (teknolojia), mpamokatra (mpandraharaha) ary mpanapa-kevitra politika! ||| Hopefully Central American women will increase in number of users of technology, producers and policy makers!
Nanoratra ny fitsidihana nataony tany amin'ny tanànan'i Kaesong tany Korea Avaratra i Stray Blog. ||| Stray Blog has written about his visit to North Korea's Kaesong City.
Iray tamin'ny fitsidihana farany azo natao tany Korea Avaratra ny diany mialoha ny nampiatoan'ny mpitondra ny fizahantany mihoatra sisintany. Nosoratan'i Stray Blog moa fa ny Korena tavaratra ihany no matiantoka amin'izao fanaaka-keviny izao. ||| His was one of the last tours before North Korea put a stop to cross-border travel Stray Blog writes that the North Korean are disadvantaging themselves by this action.
Tamin'ny fotoanany tsara ny fitsidihako ny tanànan'i Kaesong, Korea avaratra tamin'ny faran'ny herinandro lasa teo. ||| My visit to Kaesong City, North Korea last weekend was timely.
Niharatsy ny fifandraisana teo amin'ny Korea atsimo sy avaratra tamin'ity herinandro ity, ary nanapa-kevitra ny hampiato ny fifamoivoizana teo amin'ny roa tonta ny Tavaratra. ||| This week, relations between North and South Korea took a turn for the worse, and the North responded by canceling any cross-border movement.
Ny tena mampahonena tamin'ity fanapahan-kevitra ity dia nampiakatra ny vola azon'ny mponina any avaratra ity fizahantany lafo ity. ||| The unfortunate aspect of this decision is that the overpriced tours made a great deal of revenue for the people of the North.
Tena famaizana ny koreana tavaratra ihany, izay efa miady amin'ny tsy fisian-tsakafo mahalasa adala, ilay didy fampiatoana. ||| Canceling them is really just a further punishment on North Koreans themselves, who are already struggling to combat a debilitating food shortage.
Soa ihany fa mbola mba afaka nitsidika ny tany avaratra izay mety hikatona mandritra ny fotoana maharitra aho. ||| I was fortunate to be able to take one of the last tours of the North for potentially a long time.
Tsy maintsy ho gaga amin'ny tsy fisian'ny takelaka dokambarotra sy fahabangan'ny loko isan-karazany ny mpitsidika ny tanàna tahaka an'i Stray blog. ||| Visitors to the country are struck by the lack of advertisement banners and color as Stray blog observes.
fahabangan'ny loko: mangaboka avokoa ny lokon'ny trano, ary ny akanjo anaovan'ny olona dia miloko volombatolalaka na palitao mainty vasobasoka avokoa. ||| absence of colour: all of the buildings are very drab, and the people were clothed in primarily dull brown and black jackets.
Ankizy vitsivitsy ihany no miakanjo marevaka - palitao mena amin'ny ankapobeny ||| Only some of the children were dressed brightly - usually bright red jackets
Namoaka sary tamin'ny diany vao haingana nanaraka ny lalambe mampitohy an'i Pyongyang amin'i Hyangsan ny mpampiasa ny Flickr antsoina hoe Kernbeisser. ||| Flickr user Kernbeisser has posted images of his earlier journey along the Pyongyang-Hyangsan motorway.
Efa noheverina hampifandray ny renivohitra amin'ny tananan'i Huichon faritanin'ny Jagang ity lalambe ity saingy tsy mety vita mihitsy ny ampahany farany. ||| This motorway was planned to connect the capital with the city of Huichon in Jagang Province but the last section was never completed.
Nisokatra ho amin'ny fifamoivoizana tamin'ny 1995 ny ampahany vita saingy nifarana tampoka teo Hyangsan eo amin'ny fidirana ho any amin'ny tangorombohitry Myohyang. ||| The completed part which was opened to traffic in 1995 ends rather abruptly in Hyangsan at the entrance to the Myohyang Mountains.
North Korea Economy Watch kosa manambara ny fisokafan'ny vohikalan'ny Anjerimanontolon'ny hairaha sy ny haitao eto Pyongyong (rohin'ny vohikala). ||| North Korea Economy Watch announces the launch of the website of the Pyongyang University of Science and Technology (website link).
Ao amin'ny vohikala no anoratan'ny mpanorina dia ny Dr. james Chin-Kyung Kim ny antony hananganana ny toeram-pianarana. ||| On the website the founder Dr. James Chin-Kyung Kim writes about the motivation behind the institution.
Fanandramana iray entina mamantatra raha azo atao ny manofana ny mpianatra koreana tavaratra - izay efa voaaro amin'ny fanintonan'ny firenena ivelany - hanana ny fahaiza-manao sy ny fahalalana ilaina ahafahany mitondra ny anjara birikiny amin'ity tontolo ankapobeny miova haingana sy tsy mitsahatry ny miova ity ny PUST. ||| PUST is an experiment to determine if it is possible to train generations of North Korean students - who have been shielded from many international influences-in the technical skills and knowledge required to make positive contributions to a global community undergoing rapid and constant change.
Mampirisika ny mpianatra hahazo antsaina amin'ny fanintonan'ny kolontsaina miteraka ny fahasamihafan'ny fisainana manerantany ihany koa ny PUST. ||| PUST will also encourage the students to become aware of the cultural influences that create the differences in international thinking.
Any Korea avaratra, hahita olona maro mitondra marika sarim-pamantarana an'i Kim jong Il sy Kim Il Sung ianao. ||| In North Korea, you will find people wearning pins featuring Kim jong Il and Kim Il Sung.
Tsiriritin'ny mpizahantany fatratra ireny marika sarim-pamantarana ireny ary sarotra ny ahazoanao azy rehefa tsy Koreana tavaratra ianao. ||| These pins are coveted by foreign tourists and hard to get if you are not a North Korean citizen.
Niezaka ny hahazo na dia iray amin'ireny monja aza ny mpamaham-bolongan'ny Lianlian Films rehefa tany Korea Avaratra. ||| the bloggers Lianlian Films managed to get one while in North Korea.
Tantarainy ary fa mitazona ireny marika sarim-pamantarana amim-panajana fatratra ny Koreana tavaratra eny fa na dia efa any ivelan'ny fireneny aza. ||| They describe how they hold the pin in reverence even when they are abroad.
Tao amin'ny Restaurant P yongyang iray tany Kathmandu, nihiakiaka ity mpanolotra sakafo Koreana tavaratra iray raha nampisehoana marika sarimpamantanrana (pins) - izay tsy fametany amin'ny akanjo rehefa any Nepal. ||| At the Pyongyang Restaurant in Kathmandu, a North Korean waitresses squealed when shown The Pin - they don't normally wear one in Nepal.
Nalain-dratovovavy tamim-pitandremana fatratra io, naka lamba famaohana izy hikosehany ilay vy boriborikely hamirapiratra. ||| The young lady picked it up very carefully, whipped out a piece of tissue and polished the little disc to a shine.
Avy eo dia naka lamba iray hafa izy hamonosany azy mialoha ny hamerenana azy. ||| Then she took out another piece of tissue and wrapped it up before giving it back.
Zara raha niteny izy nandritra izany fihetsika rehetra nataony izany nefa mazava ny hafatra - masina io marika sarim-pamantarana io. ||| All throughout, she barely spoke a word but the message was clear - The Pin is sacred.
Mila karakaraina amim-pitandremana. ||| Treat with care.
Raha miresaka trano fisakafoanana (restaurant) koreana tavaratra ihany, maro moa izy ireny manerana an'i Azia atsinanana ary fampiasam-bola koreana tavaratra amin'ny fomba ofisialy mihitsy. ||| Talking about the North Korean restaurants, there are several of these across East Asia and are official North Korean investments.
Ho fanampin'ny sakafo dia ahitanao tarika koreana tavaratra mihira sy mandihy koa amin'ireny trano fisakafoanana ireny. Io (jereo ny lahatsoratra nadika) ary misy lahatsarinkira aseho anareo nalaina tany amin'ny efitra fisakafoanana iray tany Phnom Penh renivohitry Kambôdza. ||| In addition to the food, a big attraction of these restaurants are the singing and dancing North Korean staff.
Moyen-Orient: Momba sy manohitra ny fandaharana amin'ny fahitalavitra mandritry ny Ramadany ||| Arabeyes: Ramadan TV - for and against
Vao manomboka ny volan'ny Ramadany izao ary ireo mpijery fahitalavitra miteny arabo dia samy efa tsindrian-daona miandry izay fandaharana haroson'ny fahitalavitra voaomana ho amin'izany ny hariva. ||| The month of Ramadan has just started, and many across the Arab world have been looking forward to the special Ramadan television series that are always shown.
Ireo mpitoraka blaogy jordaniana, saodiana sy ny avy any Barheïn dia mifanpizara ny fomba fijeriny manodidina ireo fandaharana be mpanaraka mandritry ny Ramadany. ||| Bloggers from Jordan, Bahrain and Saudi Arabia give us their opinion of the popularity of Ramadan TV in this post.
Avy any Barheïn, zendana i Sami (amin'ny teny Arabo) mahita ny ezaka ataon'ireo mpiray tanindrazana aminy mba tsy ho tara ny fandaharana ao amin'ny fahitalavitra – ary manontany tena raha mbola misy olona liana sy manokana fotoana amin'ny tetiandron'ny fiventesana (toriteny) ny Ramadany: ||| In Bahrain, Sami highlights the effort people make to keep up with the Ramadan TV schedules - and asks if anyone pays as much attention to the timetable of Ramadan sermons:
Manome torohevitra i Bakkouz, avy any Jordania: Zavatra iray tsy azo iadian-kevitra, mandefa fandaharana tsara be ny fahitalavitra rehefa fotoan'ny Ramadany, izay mahatonga ny olon-drehetra ho adala'ny fahitalavitra sy ireo fandaharana ankafiziny manokana, toy ny fanarahana antokom-pivavahana mihitsy. ||| I have received a number of emails containing a lot of details about Ramadan soap operas and television programmes, including those from Egypt, Syria and the Gulf, but there was nothing for those who follow Muhannad and Noor.
Izaho manokana, ohatra, dia tsy hisalasalana fa hanaraka ny Bab El-Hara (tantara Siriana) satria tsy dia ankafiziko loatra ireny fandaharana miresaka tantara sy momba ny Bedouins ireny (na dia tsy manana kina amin'ireny fandaharana miresaka tantara sy momba ny Bedouins ireny aza aho, ianianako). ||| Anyway, one thing that cannot be disputed is that TV channels air some good TV shows in Ramadan, which makes people become obsessed with watching their favorite show, much like a cult following, Me for example, I might watch Bab El-Hara (Syrian drama) since I'm not too much into historical and Bedouin shows (not that I have anything against Bedouin and/or historical shows, I really don't, seriously) and what not.
Azonareo jerena izay tianareo harahana saingy NOHO NY FITIAVAN'NY TOMPO AZA MIJERY IRENY FANALA HAMOHAMO SY FANDAHARAN-DALAO JORDANIANA IRENY, indrindra fa ireo mandeha avy hatrany aorian'ny "athan" (fiantsoana hivavaka), raha tsy izany, mety ho tratry ny aretin'ny ati-doha ianareo. ||| I guess you can watch whatever you want to, but FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DO NOT WATCH JORDANIAN TELEVISION COMEDY AND GAME SHOWS, especially the ones right after the "athan" (call to prayer), unless you suddenly felt the need to get a stroke.
Matotra 100% aho amin'izany, aza manao an'izany! ||| I am being 100% sincere here, don't!
Na izany aza, tsy ny mpitoraka blaogy rehetra akory no miandry fatratra ireny tantara mitohy amin'ny fahitalavitra ireny – na ny Ramadany amin'ny maha-Ramadany azy. ||| However, not all bloggers are looking forward to the TV series – or even Ramadan itself.
Ao Bahreïn, tsy mahatanty intsony i amin'ny teny anglisy: ||| In Bahrain, The Girl With No Face complains:
Halako ny fihatsaram-bela-tsihin'ny Ramadany. ||| I hate the hypocrisy of Ramadan.
Halako ny familivilian'ny olona ny tena hevitry ny Ramadany. ||| I hate how people totally miss the point of it.
Halako ny tsy fananan-tsafidy. ||| I hate that it's not a choice.
Halako fa izay olona rehetra miresaka momba ny Ramadany dia ny fandaharana momba ny Ramadany amin'ny fahitalavitra daholo. ||| I hate how all people ever talk about in Ramadan is the Ramadan shows on TV.
Fenofeno kokoa noho ny tamin'ny taona lasa lisitry ny fandaharana manokan'ny fahitalavitra mandritry ny Ramadany tamin'ity taona ity. ||| The list for this year's TV shows are far more extensive than last year's.
Nefa Tash Ma Tash, ilay tantara mitohy Saodiana be mpanaraka, dia tsy isan'izay handeha amin'ity taona ity. ||| However, Tash Ma Tash, the most famous Saudi TV show, will not be airing this Ramadan.
Najanon-dry zareo tamin'ny farany ilay izy, rehefa nahita fahombiazana nandritry ny fihodinana efa ho in-dimiambinifolo. ||| It finally came to an end after 15 successful seasons.
Tsy dia isan'ireo matimaty amin'io tantara mitohy io aho nefa kosa ekeko fa tena mamboraka ireo olana goavana zakaintsika eto amin'ny firenentsika izy io... Hevitro manokana, tsy dia manaraka loatra ny fahitalavitra aho amin'ny fotoan'ny Rmadany satria heveriko fa misy zavatra hafa manan-danja kokoa noho izay tokony hatao mandritra io fotoana io noho ny hiraikitra eo anoloan'ny fàfan'ny fahitalavitra. ||| I personally wasn't one of the show's enthusiasts but I have to acknowledge that it did touch on many important topics and shed some light on multiple issues that we suffer from in our country.... I personally hardly ever watch TV in Ramadan because I believe there is more to do in this month than be glued to a TV screen.
Mpitoraka blaogy saodiana iray hafa, deja vu (amin'ny teny arabo), dia nanao fampielezan-kevitra ho fibodoana ny fahitalavitra mandritry ny Ramadany, mba tsy ho takona ny tena hevitr'ity volana ity: ||| Another Saudi blogger, deja vu, has started a campaign against watching TV at all in Ramadan, so as not to be distracted from the real meaning of the month:
Sodana: "Revolisiona Facebook" miaraka amin'ny Fanampian'ny Twitter avy eo an-damosiny ||| Sudan: "Facebook Revolution" with the help of Twitter as a side kick
Nifidy ny 30 Janoary 2011 ny mpianatra Sodane mba ho fanombohan'ny hetsika am-pilaminana manohitra ny Filoha Omar al-Bashir. ||| Sudanese students chose January 30, 2011 to be the beginning of peaceful demonstrations against President Omar al-Bashir.
Ny tena antso fototra dia ny fanaikàna ny vahoaka hirotsaka an-dalambe tao Khartoum nalefa tao amin'ny Facebook. ||| The main call asking people to take to the streets of Khartoum was made on Facebook.
Ity ve no voalohany amin'ny "Revolisiona Facebook" eto Sodana miaraka amin'ny fanampian'ny twitter avy eo an-damosiny? ||| Was this Sudan's first "Facebook Revolution" with the help of twitter as a side kick?
Ireo fitaovana fampitàm-baovao sosialy toy ny bilaogy, Twitter, Facebook sy YouTube dia nitàna toerana lehibe tamin'ny fandrindràna sy fanarahana ny fihetsiketsehana am-pilaminana ny 30 Janoary tao Sodana. ||| Social media tools such as blogs, Twitter, Facebook and YouTube played a vital role in organizing and reporting the Jan 30 Sudan peaceful demonstrations.
Ao anatin'ity lahatsoratra ity dia hiezaka aho ny hanasongadina sasantsasany amin'ireo fitaovana media sosialy nampiasaina handrindràna, hitaterana ary hitondrana fanehoan-kevitra mikasika ilay fanoherana. ||| In this post I will try to highlight some of social media tools that were used to organise, report and comment on the protests.
Nitàna toerana lehibe toy ny hoe foiben'ny fanangonam-baovao sy toeram-pandrindràna ny Facebook raha tao amin'ny Twitter indray dia nitatitra mikasika ny fihetsiketsehana amin'ny fotoana tena itrangany ireo mpampiasa azy. ||| Facebook played a vital role as information center and an organizing space while on Twitter users were reporting about the demonstrations in real time.
Jan30Sudan nampiasa ny valan-tserasera Ushahidi ho fametrahana tahirin-kevitra anaty sarintany. ||| Jan30Sudan used Ushahidi platform to document the demonstrations on a map.
Izy ity dia toa sahala amin'ny niantomboka tamina Vondrona Facebook iray nitàna ny toeran'ny mpitarika nanasa ny vahoaka hanotrona ny hetsi-panoherana. ||| It seems it all started with a Facebook group leading the role by inviting people to attend the protests.
Ilay vondrona "Fandraketana na Fanavaozana mikasika ireo fisamborana sy fihetsika tsy araka ny lalàna na herisetra tamin'ny Hetsika Fanoherana am-Pilaminan ny 30 Janoary tao Khartoum." ||| The group "Records or Updates of arrest and illegal actions or violence in the 30 of January Peaceful Demonstration in Khartoum".
Amin'ny lafiny iray, misy bilaogy toy ny hurriyatsudan, izay manaraka ny vaovao sy manome fanavaozana. ||| On the other side, there are blogs such as hurriyatsudan, which keeps track of news and updates.
Ilay bilaogy dia namoaka ny anaran'ireo olona voasambotra. ||| The blog has published names of people who have been arrested.
Ny vohikala Jan30Sudan dia nanampy ny olona hamantatra ny toerana misy ny hetsika sy ny zava-mitranga toy ny fisamborana na ny fifandonana amin'ny polisy. ||| Jan30Sudan website helped people to track locations of the protests and actions such as arrest or clashes with the police.
Ireto ambany ireto ny sasany amin'ireo zava-nitranga voarakitra ao anaty sarintany: ||| Below are some of incidents that were captured on the map:
Mampiasa baomba mandatsa-dranomaso amin'ireo mpianatra ho mpitsabo ny polisy ||| Police use gas bombs against medical students
Ny sasany tamin'ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana dia nampakatra lahatsary tao amin'ilay vohikala fifampizaràna lahatsary, Youtube. ||| Some protesters uploaded videos on the video sharing site, Youtube.
Ireo fanavaozam-baovao ao amin'ny Twitter ampiasàna ny tenifototra "SudanJan30" dia nanomboka hatrany ampiandohan'ny hetsi-panoherana avy amin'ireo mpanotrona ny hetsika toa an'i simsimt sy ny hafa izay nanaraka ny hetsika tamin'ny alalan'ny aterineto. simsint: tsy mahavita mi-tweet ety am-pandehanana. ||| Twitter updates using the hashtag "SudanJan30" started from the beginning of the protest from those attending the protests such as simsimt and others who were following the demonstrations online.
Ary farany, sahala amin'ny mitohy ihany ny pitik'afo satria mbola manomana hetsika misimisy kokoa ireo mafàna fo: ||| And finally it seems that the spark is still on as activists are planning for more protests:
Izao hitantsika izao dia tsy mbola fahita mihitsy teto Sodana. ||| What we are seeing has never before been witnessed in Sudan.
Nitombo niaraka tamin'ny niomerika ny tanora Sodane, ary tsapan'izy ireo tsara ny fivoaran'ny tontolo manodidina azy ireo. ||| Young Sudanese people are growing up digital, and they are well aware of how the world is changing around them.
Arakaraky ny iparitahan'ny resaka dizitaly, indrindra indrindra fa miaraka amin'ny fametrahana ny fibre optique ambany ranomasina, no koa vao mainka mandrisika ny tanora Sodane handray an-tanana ny aminy amin'ny alàlan'ny fitaovana tambajotra sosialy mba hanaovana izay handrenesana ny feony sy hilazàny ny olany momba ny hoaviny. ||| The more the digital divide narrows, especially with the introduction of new fiber-optic sea cables, the more Sudanese youth will empower themselves via social networking tools to voice their opinions and state their concerns for the future.
Arabia Saodita: Niverin-dalana ny fitsaboana ny SIDA ||| Saudi Arabia: AIDS treatment takes step backward
Mbola fady hatrany ny resaka VIH/SIDA any Arabia Saodita, fa mampitroatra ny fiheverana ireo ny marary ho toy ny olo-meloka. ||| The subject of HIV/AIDS has always been a taboo in Saudi Arabia, where the debate is raging over the treatment of patients like criminals.
Vao haigana izay no nanambara ny fikasany hanakatona hopitaly mitsabo maimai-poana iray any Jeddah an'ny Mpanjaka Saud izay fantatra amin'ny fivatsiany fanafody, amin'ny fitaizana ara-tsaina ary ny fitazomana ny mombamomba ireo voan'ny SIDA ho tsiambaratelo. ||| Recently, Saudi Arabia announced its plans to shut down a volunteer clinic in Jeddah's King Saud Hospital that is known for providing medical services, counseling and privacy to AIDS victims.
Taitra ireo mpitoraka blaogy ary miteny fa fihemoran-dalana izany. ||| Bloggers lash out at the move saying it is a step backward.
Wafa, izay nandray anjara tamina trano fiasana nataona fikambanana Saodiana iray miady amin'ny fanilikiliana mianjady amin'ireo voan'ny SIDA, no nanoratra hoe: ||| Wafa, who attended a workshop held by a Saudi organization fighting discrimination against AIDS patients, wrote:
Fantatro tamin'ny zava-misy fa maro ireo olona eto mbola mihevitra fa raha misy olona iray voan'ny SIDA dia noho ny fahadisoana nataony, ary voa izy noho ny nanaovany firaisana ara-nofo. ||| I know for a fact that lots of people here still think that being an AIDS patients is your fault, and that you must have got it through sexual relationship.
Olona vitsy no mahafatra ny fahasamihafan'ny SIDA sy ny VIH. ||| A few people know the difference between AIDS and HIV.
Olona voan'ny SIDA maro no tondroin'iny olona molotra sy andosiran'ny olona. ||| A lot of aids patients are being stained with shame and people look down on them.
Tsy maintsy atao ny fampahalalanaena mila manaparitaka fahalalàna tsara manerana ny tany momba ity aretina ity isika ary manajanona ity fanilikilihana ireo voan'ity aretina ity. ||| We really need to spread the word for a better knowledge of the disease and stop the discrimination against AIDS patients.
Wafa indray no nanazava bebe kokoa ny tsy firaharahian'ny fiaraha-monina ireo voan'ny SIDA, Ny mpitondra fivavahana moa manampy trotraka noho ny tsy fahalalany ny antony mahatonga ity aretina ity: ||| Wafa further explained how the whole society is not welcoming to help the patients, with even the religious leaders increasing the problem due to their ignorance about the causes of the disease:
Ny fiaraha-monina manontolo mihitsy no manana olana. ||| The problem happens in the whole society.
Rehefa nanomboka ny asany ny fikambanana Saodianina voalohany sy tokana mikarakara ireo voan'ny SIDA, dia miatrika ny tsy fahalalan'ny olona fa tsy manana loharanombola ny fikambanana, matahotra ny mpiara-monina hoe raha manaiky ny fisian'ity fikambanana ity izy ireo dia lasa manaiky izy ireo fa misy ny SIDA any Arabia Saodita, indrindra moa noho ny fiheveran'ny maro fa ny fanaovana firaisana ara-nofo amin'ny olona maro no fomba fifindrany. ||| When the First and only Saudi organization for AIDS started its work, it was faced by ignoring from almost everyone thus it has no financial resources, society feared that acknowledging the organization is the first step to accept the existing of AIDS in Saudi Arabia, mostly because it is still believed that the cause of it is sexual relationships.
Mitory ity fikambanana ity koa ireo mpitondra fivavahana amin'ny filazany fa miasa amin'ny fomba tandrefana izy ary manaiky ny isiana fanaovana firaisana ara-nofo tsy mifanaraka amin'ny lalàna ary mitady vola amin'ny zavatra ataony. Mpitoraka blaogy Saodianina vavy hafa, Sabria S. Jawhar, mpianatra ho dokotera any Angletera no manamarika fa na dia teo aza ny fiovan'ny vanim-potoana, dia mbola mitoetra kosa ny lalàna entina hitondrana ireo voan'ity aretina ity hatramin'ny taloha. ||| Another Saudi blogger Sabria S. Jawhar, an IPhD Student in the UK, mentioned that although times have changed, but the most important rule for victims stayed the same.
Tsy maintsy manafina ny fitondrany ny aretina amin'ireo namany, ireo olom-pantany sy ireo havany izy ireo. ||| They have to keep the disease a secret from friends, acquaintances and even family.
Manazava koa izy momba ny olana vaovao mianjady amin'ireo marary, amin'ny fikatonan'ilay hopitaly any amin'ny Jeddah an'ny Mpanjakan'i Saud: ||| She then explained the new problem facing patients, in regards to shutting down the clinic in Jeddah's King Saud Hospital:
Amin'izao fotoana izao, dia efa andalana ny fanakatonana azy ary haely amin'ireo toeram-pitsaboana misy manerana ny fanjakana mba ho tsaboina ireo voan'ny SIDA tao. ||| Now, it's scheduled to be shut down and its AIDS patients distributed all over the Kingdom for treatment.
Mitranga indrindra izao ao anatin'ny fotoana iheverana fa efa hitovy amin'ny firenena manerana izao tontolo izao ny fitsaboana ny SIDA any Arabia Saodita, tahaka ny nahavitany ny fanaovana grefy ny taova sy ny nahavitany nanasaraka kambana miraikitra, ary dia nanapa-kevitra ny hiverin-dalana izy. ||| It appears that just when Saudi Arabia achieves parity in treating AIDS sufferers with the rest of the world, as it has with its organ transplant policies and with its specialization in separating conjoined twins, it takes a step backward.
Ahiana ny tsy fitazonana ny tsiambaratelo momba ny tsirairay sy ny tsy fahazoana fitsaboana manara-penitra amin'izao fikatonan'ny fitsaboana ny SIDA ao amin'ny King Saud izao. ||| The closure of AIDS services at King Saud threatens the privacy and consistent treatment of patients.
Mety hampitombo ny fielezan'ny aretina ihany koa satria tsy maintsy apetraka indray amina olon-kafa mpikarakara marary ny fitokisana ireo dokotera sy ny mpitsabon'ny King Saud. ||| It also increases the likelihood of spreading the disease because the trust built by King Saud doctors, nurses and support staff must be rebuilt with strangers at another medical facility.
Tsy vita mora izany. ||| This is not an easy task.
Mbola baraingo ihany koa izay mety hataon'ireo dokotera hafa azy ireo. ||| The transfer of patients also begs the question of what will other medical centers do with them.
Havela hiaraka efitra amin'ireo olona tsy voan'ny SIDA ve izy ireo sa ho tsaboina amina efitra manokana? ||| Will these patients be grouped with non-AIDS patients or be treated in a specialty ward?
Mety ho voahaja ve ny fiarovana azy ireo? ||| Will their privacy be protected?
Ary, tsy mitovy amin'ny an'ny hafa ireo voan'ny SIDA, mila fitsaboana manokana izy ireo, sy fiaropvana avo lenta, araka ny fanazavan'i Sabria: ||| And, unlike any other society, AIDS patients need special treatment, and high level of privacy, as Sabria continued to explain:
Ny kofehy nampifandray tamin'ireo mpiasan'ny hopitaly dia tena mafy. ||| The emotional bond among hospital employees was strong.
Nisy fifampitokisana teo amin'ireo mpiasa sy ireo marary. ||| A trust existed between the patient and employee.
Tsy sahala amin'ireo mararin'ny SIDA any andrefana izay tsy manafina ny aretiny, dia aleon'ireo Saodianina manafina izany mba tsy ho tsarain'ny fianakaviany sy ny namany. ||| Unlike many Western AIDS patients who don't hide their illness, Saudis insist on it because it means being judged by one's family and friends.
Ny fifampitokisana misy eo amin'ny marary sy ny mpiasan'ny hopitaly no nametraka teo amin'izy ireo fa tsy hivoaka ny tsiambaratelony. ||| The trust between patient and hospital employee meant their secret was safe.
Ny iray amin'ireo voan'ny SIDA dia niteny vao haingana izay, tao amin'ny hopitalin'ny King Saud: "Rehefa nandeha tany izahay dia nokarakaraina toy ny olombelona." ||| One AIDS patient said recently of King Saud Hospital: "When we go there we feel like we are treated like human beings."
Fantatro fa mety hihaino ahy ny olona. ||| I know people will listen to me.
Nefa tsy hitantara izany amin'olon-kafa aho. ||| But I don't tell anyone else.
Tadindonin-doza izany tsiambaratelo izany nanomboka tamin'ny namindrana ireo marary tany amin'ny toeran-kafa. ||| That secret is now at risk as these patients are shuttled to different facilities.
Tandidonin-doza ihany koa ny fiantohana ny fizotran'ny fitsaboana sy ny fisorohana ny fiparitahan'ny SIDA. ||| Ensuring proper treatment and taking precautions to prevent AIDS from spreading is now at risk.
Iray amin'ireo mpitsikera ao amin'ny lahatsoratr'i Wafa, Angie Nader, malahelo ireo marary ary miteny: ||| One of the commentators on Wafa's post, Angie Nader, pitied these patients and said:
Na dia maro aza ireo fampahafantarana ny momba ny SIDA maneran-tany... dia mbola io izy io... tokony hanao izay tratry ny herintsika isika amin'ny maha olona antsika mba handringanana izany aretina izany. ||| Even there is so much talk about aids throughout the world... it still is here... we have to do whatever we can as human people to make this disease stop.
Ary ireo izay mararin'izany kosa... dia mila tandrovina ny hajany ary avelao izy ireo hiaina ao anatin'ny fahamendrehana. ||| And those who are suffering from eaither... we need to show them respect and let them live with dignity.
