Manampy ny feoko amin'ny an'i Angie aho, ary manontany tena hoe misy zavatra tsara azo atao ve mba hanampiana ireo marary ireo.. ||| Adding my voice to Angie, I wonder if something will be better done to help these suffering patients..
Siria: Manomana Fanambaràna Any Antalya ny Mpanohitra ||| Syria: Opposition Drafts Declaration in Antalya
Andro iray monja taorian'ny nanambaràn'ny filoha Bashar Assad ny famotsoran-keloka ho an'ireo gadra politika, mivory ny vondrona Siriana ahitàna ireo mpanohitra mba hanao ilay antsoin'ny tatitra iray hoe "'sori-dalàna' ho an'ny tetezamita milamina sy demokratika ao Siria." ||| Just a day after President Bashar Assad announced a general amnesty for political prisoners, a varied group of Syrian opposition members are meeting to create what one report referred to as a "'roadmap' for a peaceful and democratic transition in Syria".
Ireo voasesitany ny ankabeazan'ireo ao amin'ny vondrona, anisan'izany ireo mpikambana ao amin'ilay fikambanana voarara 'Firahalahiana Silamo. ||| The group is comprised mostly of exiles, including members of the banned Muslim Brotherhood.
Siriana manatrika ny kaonferansa tao Antalya, eo ambany mason'ny sarin'ireo Maritiora Siriana Dr. Mohja Kahf, akademisiana Siriana-Amerikana, profesora ao amin'ny Anjerimanontolon'i Arkansas, dia mitatitra mivantana amin'ny tweets ny fivoriana izay tontosaina ao amin'ny toeram-pialàntsasatra iray any Antalya, Tiorkia. ||| Syrian-American academic Dr. Mohja Kahf, a professor at the University of Arkansas, is live-tweeting the event, which is taking place at a resort in Antalya, Turkey.
Ny Zoma lasa teo, nanoratra momba ny fivoriana izy: "Antalya: Tsy fivorian'ny mpanohitra antitra fanaon'ny dadanao ity Syria Vondrona vaovao miforona, endrika tanora, tanjaka vaovao." ||| Late Wednesday, she wrote of the event: "Antalya: This is not your daddy's old opposition conference Syria New groupings forming, young faces,fresh energies".
Dr. Kahf koa dia nibitsika fa ireo nanatrika ny fivoriana dia hanao fitokonana tsy hihinan-kanina iray andro ho firaisan-kina amin'ireo Siriana rahalahiny. ||| Dr. Kahf also tweeted that the members of the meeting would be holding a day-long hunger strike in solidarity with their fellow Syrians.
Ao amin'ny Twitter ihany, mailaka i nanamarika fa tsy "fivorian'ny mpanohitra" iny fivoriana iny, ary manamarika: ||| Also on Twitter, was quick to point out that the conference was not an "opposition conference," noting:
Nahitàna Siriana tsy miankina maro avy amin'ny lafivalo tao, niray hina hanongana ny fitondràna Siriana" ||| It brought many independent Syrians from the world united in purpose to end Syrian regime
Na dia miray hina amin'izany hetsika izany aza ireo nanatrika ny fivoriana, tsy maintsy nisy ihany ny tsy fifankahazoana. ||| Though the conference attendees are united in their cause, the conference has not been without its disagreements.
Nanamarika tafatafa hitany maso tao an-dalantsaran'ny hotely i Dr. Kahf: ||| Dr. Kahf noted a conversation she witnessed in the hotel lobby:
Lebanon koa dia nanamarika fizaràn'ny tanora sy ny antitra. ||| Lebanon notes a young/old divide as well.
Misy koa ny tatitra manambara fa tsy nety nanatrika ny fivoriana ny Siriana mpikambana sasany ao amin'ny mpanohitra, ary koa fanehoana fahadisoam-panantenana ao amin'ny Twitter avy amin'ireo Siriana ao an-tanindrazana. ||| There have also been reports that some Syrian opposition members refused to attend the conference, as well as some expressions of disappointment on Twitter from Syrians in the country.
Nefa raha narahana fatratra io fivoriana io, nanapa-kevitra ny hizotra any Antalya ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana miandany amin'ny fitondràna, anjatony kilometatra vitsivitsy miala amin'ny sisin-tany Siriana, mba haneho tsy fankasitrahana ny fivorian'ny mpanohitra. ||| But while the conference was well-attended, pro-regime protesters managed to make their way to Antalya, just a few hundred kilometers from the Syrian border, to demonstrate against the opposition meeting.
Nefa araka ny marihan'ny mpitati-baovaon'ny CNN Ivan Watson ao amin'ny Twitter: ||| But as CNN reporter Ivan Watson points out on Twitter:
"Milaza ny filoha lefitry ny polisin'i Antalya fa tazoniny ho lavitry ny fivorian'ny Siriana mpanohitra ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana an-jatony mpomba ny fitondràna." ||| "Antalya deputy police chief says he's keeping hundreds of pro-regime demonstrators at a distance from Syrian opposition conference".
Nanomana fanambaràna hatao ny 1 Jona ireo nanatrika ny fivoriana. ||| The conference attendees were preparing a declaration to be released on June 1.
Taiwan: Sarin'ny Matsom-Pireharehana Maha-LGBT 2011 tao Taipei ||| Taiwan: Photos from the LGBT Pride Parade 2011 in Taipei
Fangon'ny Taiwan LGBT Pride 2011 ||| The logo of Taiwan LGBT Pride 2011
Maherin'ny 50.000 ireo olona namonjy ny hetsika Matsom-Pireharehana LGBT Taiwan fanao isan-taona tao Taipei tamin'ny 29 Oktobra 2011, manamarika ny filaharambe goavana indrindra ao Azia. ||| More than 50,000 people joined the annual Taiwan LGBT Pride parade in Taipei on October 29, 2011, marking the biggest gay pride parade in Asia.
Nitolona nandritra ny taonjato maro ny fivondronan'ny LGBT Taiwaney mba hitaky ny fitovian-jo sy ny fanajana. ||| The Taiwanese LGBT community has been struggling for decades to obtain equality and respect.
Na dia efa mihena dia mihena aza ny fanoseha-bohontanana eo amin'ny fiainana andavanandro, mbola mivoitra eo amin'ny rafi-panabeazana sy ny lalàna ihany ny fanilikilihana. ||| Though there is less and less hostility in everyday life interaction, discrimination is still very much embedded in the education and legal system.
Hoy ny vohikala ofisialin'ny hetsika: ||| According to the event's official website:
Raha oharina amin'ny filazana fankahalana "eo imaso imaso" nahazo ny LGBT folo taona lasa eo ho eo izay, dia efa mianatra miteny tahaka ny hoe "manaja ny LGBT izahay" ny anti-LGBT ary mihevi-tena ho liberaly. ||| Compared with the very direct, "in-your-face" hostility toward LGBT people a decade ago, the anti-LGBT groups nowadays have learned to say words like "we respect LGBT people" and pretend to be liberal.
Mandritra izany fotoana izany dia tsy mitsahatra ny manakana ny nanova sy ireo mpitia mitovy fananahana hanana ny zo fototra maha-olona. ||| In the meanwhile they never stop trying to deprive LGBT people of basic citizen rights.
Fanampin'izany dia efa miezaka ny handresy lahatra amin'ny fomba tsy mendrika ny mpanao lalàna sy ny mpanao politika ry zareo, izay mety hanimba ny fandavorariana ny fivoarana demokratika. ||| Furthermore, they even started to adopt unethical means to influence the legislators and policy makers, which might jeopardize our precious achievement of democratic development.
Ao anatin'izany toe-draharaha sarotra izany dia mandrisika ireo nanova sy ireo mpitia mitovy fananahana hijery tsara izay mety ho fanavakavahana eo amin'ny kolontsaina sy eo amin'ny fiaraha-monina ny fikambanan'ny Rehareha maha-LGBT Taiwan, ary hiezaka ny hanaisotra hatrany ny fanilikilihana miafina mba hahamafy ny fototra fanajana ny zo maha-olona. ||| Under this tough circumstance, Taiwan LGBT Pride Community urges the LGBT people to be more cautious about discrimination in the culture and society, and keep uncovering the well-camouflaged hostility in order to build a more solid foundation for our human rights.
Notontosaina voalohany tamin'ny 2003 izay nahitana mpandray anjara 500 eo ho eo, nihanalaza vetivety ny hetsika ka nahitana mpandray anjara 25.000 tamin'ny 2009, ary 30.000 tamin'ny 2010. ||| First held in 2003 with about 500 participants, the event has quickly grown more popular with 25,000 people participating in 2009, and 30,000 in 2010.
Tamin'ity taona ity moa dia montsana indray ny fahabetsahana indrindra. ||| This year, the participant record has been broken again.
Ny lohahevitra dia "Mitolona indray ny LGBT! ||| Under the theme "LGBT fight back!
miala ny fanavakavahana!", Niainga teo amin'ny fihaonan-dalana Kaidagelan tao Taipei ny filaharambe dia nizara roa ka tafahaona indray teo amin'ny fihaonan-dalan'ny Kaidagelan. ||| Discrimination get out!", the parade started at Kaidagelan Boulevard in Taipei and separated into two routes before reconvening at the Kaidagelan Boulevard.
Mitaky ny hanajana ny safidim-pironana ara-pananahana sy ny safidin'ny tanora, ny fametrahana ny fanabeazana ara-pananahana, ny fampidirana ho ara-dalàna ny mariazin'ny mitovy fananahana, ary ny fanesorana tsy ho heloka ny asam-pananahana (fivarota-tena). ||| Demonstrators demanded respect for the sexual orientation and preferences of youth, implementation of sex education, legalization of gay marriage, and also decriminalization of sex work.
Ireto ambany ireto moa ny sasatsasany amin'ny sarin'ny matso tamin'ity taona ity nalaina tao amin'ny Coolloud.org.tw: ||| Below are some photos from this year's parade taken by Coolloud.org.tw:
Misy ny mpitondra fivavahana manohitra ny filazalazana ny momba ny LGBT any an-tsekoly. ||| Some religious group are against informing youth about LGBT in schools.
Mpianatra maro avy ao amin ny Anjerimanontolo mandray anjara ||| Students from many university LGBT clubs took part in the parade.
Mpanohana kosa ny mpizahatany sy ny mpianatra vahiny mandrato fianarana any. ||| Many foreign tourists and exchange students are also supporters.
Mitantara ny nanjo azy tamin ny nataon ny mpampiasa azy taloha ny mpiteny noho ny fiakanjoany akanjom-behivavy ||| The speaker spoke of the negative treatment he received from his employer because he wears women's clothing to work.
Fikambanan ny Mpiasa vahiny manandratra ny feon ny mpiasa vahiny vitsy an isa mitaky ny zony ara-pananahana ||| Taiwan International Workers Association also voices the sexual rights of underrepresented migrant workers in Taiwan
Milaza ny fanilikilihana roa sosona mahazo azy ny mpikambana LGBT sembana. ||| LGBT members with physical disabilities say they suffer double discrimination.
Mpihira malaza Deserts Chang no tamin ity taona ity ||| Popular singer Deserts Chang is this year's 'Rainbow Ambassador'
Mbola misy sary hafa azo jerena ihany koa ao amin'ny Rakitsary flickr Coolloud.org rakitsary ofisialin'ny vohikalan'ny matso. ||| You can see more photos in this Coolloud.org's flickr album and the official album released by the parade's website.
Ejipta: Miteraka Fanontaniana Momba An'i Etazonia Ny Entona Mandatsa-dranomaso Tonga Tamin'ny Sambo ||| Egypt: Tear Gas Shipment Raises Questions About the US
Volana maro taorian'ny nianjeran'ny filoha Ejiptiana teo aloha Hosni Mubarak, ary andro vitsy monja taorian'ny nisian'ireo olona maro notaterina fa hoe sempotry sy nambara fa matin'ny karazana entona mandatsa-dranomaso vaovao nampiasain'ny polisy Ejiptiana, dia entona mandatsa-dranomaso iray sambo no tonga ao amin'ny seranan'i Suez avy any Etazonia andro vitsy lasa izay. ||| Months after former Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak stepped down, and just days after many people were reported to have suffocated and died allegedly because of new types of tear gas used by the Egyptian police, a new tear gas shipment arrived at the Suez Port from the United States a few days ago.
Vaky ny tantara rehefa notaterin'ny tao amin'ny Al Ahram amin'ny teny Arabo fa ireo mpiasan'ny fadintseranana ao Suez dia nandà ny handray ny entana nentina sambo iray mitontaly fito taonina isan'isany, nahatonga fitroarana teny anivon'ireo tambajotran-tranonkala sosialy. ||| The story broke when it was reported in Al Ahram Arabic daily that the employees of the custom service in Suez refused to receive a shipment with containers of seven tons of tear gas in each, creating an uproar on social networking sites.
Inty ny ampahany tamin'ireo resadresaka tao amin'ny Twitter: ||| Here is part of the conversation from Twitter:
Psypherize: Sambo iray vaovao mitondra entona mandatsa-dranomaso milanja 7 taonina no vao tonga ao Cairo avy any Suez ary tehirizin'ny MOI (Ministeran'ny Atitany). ||| A new tear gas shipment 7 tons heavy just arrived in Cairo from Suez and stored by the MOI.
Dia efa minomàna sahady amin'ny famoretana vaovao indray. ||| Get ready for another crackdown.
RashaAbdulla: Araka ny fahitàna azy, ilay entona mandatsa-dranoamaso milanja 7 taonina tonga tamin'ny sambo avy any US ho any Egypt dia vao ny ampahany 1 amin'ny 3. ||| So apparently, the 7-ton tear gas shipment from the US to Egypt is only part 1 of 3.
Ireo mpiasan'ny seranana ao Suez dia mandà entana miaty entona mandatsa-dranomaso 7 taonina avy eny an-tsambo avy any Etazonia mba hamenoana ny tahirin'ny Ministeran'ny Atitany ||| Port workers in Suez refuse 7-ton shipment of tear gas from US to restock Interior Ministry supply
Taty aoriana, ren'ny olona fa iharan'ny fanadihadiana ireo mpiasa noho ny fandavan'izy ireo handray ilay entana. ||| Later on, people knew that the workers will be subject to investigations for their refusal to receive the shipment:
3alaelhawa: Hatao fanadihadiana ireo mpiasan'ny seranana ao Suez noho ny fandavan'izy ireo tsy handray ilay entana entona mandatsa-dranomaso tonga tamin'ny sambo. ||| The employees of Suez customs will be subject to investigations for refusing to receive the tear gas shipment.
Sahiran-tsaina amin'izay zava-kotrehin'ny governemanta ihany koa ireo mpiondana aterineto: ||| Netizens were also worried about the government's intentions:
tena manakarama ny governemantako aho mba hahazo entona mandatsa-dranomaso tsaratsara kokoa, fomba tsaratsara kokoa hamonoana ahy sy ireo rahalahiko. ||| I pay my government to get a better tear gas, a better way to kill me and my brothers
Ary ho fanehoan-dry zareo ny firaisankinany amin'ireo mpiasa, maro ny mpampiasa Twitter nifampizara ity hafatra manaraka ity: ||| And to show their solidarity with the workers, many Twitter users shared the following message:
Ambarako ny fiombonako manontolo amin'ireo mpiasa ao an-tseranan'i Suez izay atao fanadihadiana ankehitriny noho ny fandavana tsy handray ireo entana avy eny an-tsambo nisy entona mandatsa-dranomaso nalefa ho an'ny Ministeran'ny Atitany Ejiptiana ||| I announce my full solidarity with the workers in Suez customs who are being questioned now for refusing to receive the tear gas shipment sent to the Egyptian Ministry of Interior
Ny hafa nandrisika ireo mpiasa any amin'ireo seranana Ejiptiana hafa mba hanao toy izany koa: ||| Others urged employees in other Egyptian ports to do the same:
Aelezo ny hafatra ho an'ireo mpiasa any amin'ny seranana Ejiptiana hafa. ||| Spread the message to Egyptian port workers.
Aza ekena ny entona mandatsa-dranomaso eny an-tseranana! ||| Refuse tear gas at the ports!
Ireo entona mandatsa-dranomaso ao anatin'ity entana ity dia novokarina tany Etazonia, ka izany no mahatnga ny olona hanontany tena ny amin'ny filazan'i Etazonia fa manohana ny revolisiona any amin'ny Tontolo Arabo, nefa sady mamatsy hatrany ny mpanao jadona any amin'ny faritra. ||| The tear gas bombs in this shipment are manufactured in the United States, hence people are wondering how the US claims to support the Arab world revolutions yet continues to support tyrannies across the region.
Kanefa inona no tiana holazaina amin'izany, rehefa mahita ianao entona mandatsa-dranomaso tonga ao amin'ny seranan'i Suez miaraka amin'ny hoe "Vita avy any Etazonia" eo amin'ny sisin'izy ireny? ||| But what does that say then, when you've got tear gas shipments arriving in the Port of Suez with "Made in the USA" on the side of them?
Ho an'i Etazonia sy ny governemanta Eraopeana: ho solon'ny fanontaniana ny hoe fomba ahoana no hampiroboroboana ny demaokrasia aty Ejipta, ajanony fotsiny izao aloha ny fampidirana entona ampiasaina hanoherana izany androany ||| To U.S. and European governments:cinstead of asking how can we promote democracy in the Egypt, just stop exporting the gas used against today
Avy eo vao tohano ny Revolisionanay ||| And then support our Revolution
Farany, nisy nitatitra fa ilay entana tonga tamin'ny sambo dia navotsotra ary nizotra ho any amin'ny Ministeran'ny Atitany ||| Finally, it was reported that the shipment was released and headed to the Ministry of Interior:
Avy ao Suez: Nanapa-kevitra ny tsy hanohy ny fanadihadiana ireo mpiasa ny manampahefana ao an-tseranana... ary vatabe 3 sahady no efa natolotra ny Ministeran'ny Atitany. ||| From Suez: The port management decided not to investigate with the employees... and the 3 containers have already been handed to the Ministry of Interior now.
Ity lahatsoratra ity dia ampahany amin'ny tatitray manokana momba ny Revolisiona ao Ejipta 2011. ||| This post is part of our special coverage Egypt Revolution 2011.
Prince of Razor dia namorona Storify handrakofana ity lohahevitra ity. ||| Prince of Razor created a Storify covering this topic.
Mba tsidiho any hijerena fanehoan-kevitra bebe kokoa. ||| Check it out for more reactions.
Ary koa, ity ny fandikàna ny fanamarihana avy amin'ny Departemantam-panjakana Amerikana momba ireo entona mandatsa-dranomaso nampiasaina tao Ejipta. ||| Also, here is the transcript of the US State Dept comment on the tear gas used in Egypt.
Madagasikara: Fisamborana sesilany taorian'ny fanonganam-panjakana tsy nahomby ||| Madagascar: Wave of Arrests in the Aftermath of the Failed Coup
Taorian'ny fitsapa-kevi-bahoaka sy ny fanonganam-panjakana tsy nahomby nifanindran-dalana tamin'izany dia nanaloka ny nosy indray ny fisamborana sy famotorana nitranga sesilany. ||| In the aftermath of the referendum and simultaneous failed putsch, a veritable waltzes of arrestations and investigations are shedding a sad shadow on the island.
Raha ny vokatry ny fitsapa-kevi-bahoaka moa no tarafina dia misongadina fa maro an'isa ny manohana azy: 74% n'ny nandrotsa-bato no nanaiky, izay nahitana taham-pandraisana anjara 52.91%. ||| The final results of the referendum are overwhelmingly in its favor: 74% of voters approved, with a participation rate of 52.91%.
Tsy te-hahalala ny amin'ity fitsapa-kevi-bahoaka ity moa ny SADC, ny firenena mpanome fanampiana, anatin'izany i Etazonia, tamin'ny nitsikerany fa tsy niaraha-nanomana ny fitsapa-kevi-bahoaka. ||| The SADC has refused to acknowledge the referendum, donor countries, including the US, have criticized the referendum for not being inclusive.
Nalefan'ny mpisioka an-tserasera iray moa fa iny no fifidianana ratsy fanomanana indrindra teto Madagasikara. ||| A twitterer relays that this was the worst ever organized elections in Madagascar.
Nifampita ny mpisioka an-tserasera fa mpanao politika 350 no voafonja hatramin'ny niakaran'i Andry Rajoelina teo amin'ny fitondrana tamin'ny alalan'ny fanonganam-panjakana. ||| Twitterer relays the fact that since Andry Rajoelina acceeded to power in a putsch in March 2009, 350 political prisoners are held in Malagasy jails.
Tamin'ny fotoana nanatanterahana ny fitsapa-kevi-bahoaka moa dia namoaka fanambarana ny mpanongam-panjakana fa hanangana komity miaramila hitantana ny fitondrana tetezamita. ||| Patrick A, remarks on the fantastic dissolution of the mutiny and the different treatments inflicted on the putschists
Nohazavaina taminay moa avy eo fa fifampiraharahana teo amin'ny mpiray andia samy nivoaka tany amin'ny Akademia miaramila no nahafahana namahana ny olana tsy nisiana herisetra. ||| One explained then that the non-violent resolution was the consequence of negotiations between "brothers in arms" from the same graduation years of the Military Academy.
Tsy azo tsinontsinoavina ihany koa fa ankoatra ny tsindry ara-tsaina, ny fanomezan-toky fa ho maivana ny sazy dia mety ho voaresaka nandritra ny fifampirahana ihany koa ny fisiana takalo ara-bola. Fomba fiady avokoa izany rehetra izany. ||| It is not excluded that psychological pressure, insurances of light sentences and even financial compensations were advanced during the negotiations.
Efa voalaza moa fa amin'ny 25 janoary no hitsarana an'i Fetison Andrianirina. ||| Fetison Andrianirina is now scheduled to appear in court in January 25.
Tsy afa-nipoitra izy tamin'ny fiantsoan'ny fitsarana azy teo aloha, satria tsy fantatry ny mpisolovava azy ny toerana misy azy. ||| He could not appear to his previous scheduled court appointment, because his lawyer could not locate him.
Hita tany amin'ny Sioka ihany koa fa tena ahiana tokoa ny toe-pahasalaman'ny roa tamin'ireo mpanongam-panjakana taorian'ny nisamboran'ny fitondrana tetezamita azy ireo. ||| Tweets also relayed that two of the putschists were under critical condition while under custody of the transitional government.
Ireo mpanongam-panjakana roa ireo moa dia ny Jeneraly Raoelina, lehiben'ny fiarovana tamin'ny andron-dRavalomanana sy tafiditra tamin'ny raharaha fitifirana tamin'ny Febroary 2009, sy ny Kolonely Coutiti, nigadra nandritra ny fotoana nitondran-dRavalomanana noho ny heloka namotika ny mahaolona ka noafahana rehefa nitondra Rajoelina. Nilaza moa ny lehiben'ny fiarovan'ny fitondrana fa niaro ny Kolonely Coutiti izy fa raha tsy izany dia lavo nandritra ny herisetra nanaovana azy. ||| These two putschists are General Raoelina, head of security under Ravalomanana and implicated in the February 2009 shootings, Colonel Coutiti, imprisoned under Ravalomanana for crimes against humanity and freed under Rajoelina, were also in critical while under custody of the transitional government.
Nanamarina moa ny fitondrana fa tena narary tokoa ny Jeneraly Raoelina sy ny Kolonely Coutiti, nefa tsy nohazavainy kosa ny nahatonga izany toe-javatra izany izay efa naha eo ambany fanarahany maso azy ireo. ||| The government later confirmed that General Raoelina and Colonel Coutiti are indeed very ill, while not explaining how this happened under their watch.
Noampangaina ho mpiray tsikombakomba tamin'ny fanaovana rotaka, ady an-trano ary ny asam-panohintohinana ihany koa ny Mpitsara Malagasy manana ny lazany sady filoha lefitry ny Fitsarana Iraisampirenena tany La Haye misotro ronono iray, ny Profesora Raymond Ranjeva, tamin'ny 12 oktobra. ||| A prominent Malagasy jurist and a retired vice president of the Hague international court of justice, Professor Raymond Ranjeva, has been charged on October 12, for complicity to incite unrest, civil war and acts of destabilisation.
Nody an-tanindrazana moa Ranjeva rehefa nandeha nisotro ronono nahavita ny asany tany amin'ny Fitsarana tany La Haye. ||| Ranjeva had returned to the country after retiring from the court of justice in the Hague.
Niantso ny hisian'ny tetezamita tsy miandany izay tokony hotarihany izy. ||| He had appealed for a real neutral transition which he would head.
Namoaka anontan-kevitra antsoina hoe"Vonjy Aina" izy. ||| He had just published a document called "Vonjy Aina".
Nalain'ny fitondrana ankehitriny tarihin'i Andry Rajoelina, izay nahomby tamin'ny fanilihana ny filoha voafidim-bahoaka Marc Ravalomanana nandritra ny fanonganam-panjakana Marsa 2009, moa ireo antontan-kevitra ireo ary nampifandraisiny tamin'ilay fanonganam-panjakana nandamoka. ||| The current country's administration headed by Andry Rajoelina, who succeeded in toppling democratically elected Marc Ravalomanana in a coup in March 2009, seized on this document and linked it to the aborted putsch.
Noafahana moa ny Profesora Ranjeva rehefa nandoa antoka. ||| Professor Ranjeva is now out on bail.
Ny tena nahagaga dia ny nitazonana ny zanak'i Raymond Ranjeva, Riana Ranjeva, ho naniratsira ny miaramila izay nanafika ny tranon'ny rainy nitady ny porofon'ny fandraisany anjara tamin'ny fiokoana. ||| More surprisingly, Riana Ranjeva, daughter of Raymond Ranjeva, was also apprehended on suspicion of contempt of the army who had invaded her father's house to search for proof of his implication in the mutiny.
Ny porofo nitazonana azy ho "manohintohina ny filaminam-bahoaka" moa dia ny fananany dikasoratra ny antontan-kevitra efa voalaza etsy ambony "Vonjy Aina", izay vahaolana -tolo-kevitra- naseho vahoaka amin'ny olona ara-politika mianjady ankehitriny. ||| The evidence that was held against her as a "threat to national security" was the possession of one copy of the aforementioned document "Vonjy Aina", a publicly available political reflection on a solution to the current political stalemate.
Nanaovana fanadihadiana ihany koa ny mpitsara malaza iray hafa izay nianatra tany Harvard, nizaka ny zom-pirenena Malagasy sy Etazonia antsoina hoe Sahondra Rabenarivo, noho ny nitsikerany ny volavolan-dalampanorenana sy ny nampanaovany tsia. ||| Another prominent jurist, Harvard educated Sahondra Rabenarivo, a dual Malagasy US citizen, who had critiqued the proposed constitution, and recommended to vote against it, has also been questioned.
Nohadihadiana izy satria ao anatin'ny lisitra an-tserasera antsoina hoe Vonjy Aina. ||| She was investigated because she was part of the Vonjy Aina mailing list.
Noafahana moa izy taty aoriana. ||| She was later released.
Tao anatin'izany tontolon'ny tahotra izany no nitadiavan'i Citoyenne Malgache ny antony nanakatonan'i NJ ny bolongany, fantatra amin'ny fanoherana an-drajoelina sy ny governemantany moany bolongan'i NJ. ||| The fear steeped climate is making Citoyenne Malgache wonder about the reasons why a popular blogger shut down his blog, NJ's blog was known for his impertinent tone towards Andry Rajoelina and his government.
"Vao nahamarika aho fa tsy hita hojerena intsony ny bolongan'i NJ ka tsy aritra ny tsy hanontany na dia efa manana izay mety ho valiny aza aho. ||| "I just noticed that NJ's blog is not available anymore and I cannot help but wonder why, while having my own ideas to what the answers might be.
Dia manontany tena hatrany aho amin'izao toe-javatra rehetra mitranga izao... mbola hahasahy hanoratra hatrany ve aho eto amin'ity bolongana ity? ||| With everything going on now, I continue to ask myself other questions... would I still dare to write other lines in this blog?
Adidy demaokratika ny maneho hevitra amin'ny maha-olom-pirenena, saingy mety hanelingelina ny eo amin'ny fitondrana izany sy haharomotra ireo mpanaraka azy... ||| To express myself as a citizen is a democratic necessity, but it happens that this would bother the exacerbated susceptibility of those in power and would draw their subordinates...
Ndimby, mpamaham-bolongana ara-politika, raha maneso ny amin'ny hamaroan'ny fisamborana ara-politika. ||| Ndimby, a political blogger, ironizes at the number of political arrests.
"...ankoatra ny kianja sy ny tramways, efa voaomana ao amin'ny fampiasam-bolan'ny Shinoa ihany koa ve ny fananganana fonja mora hametrahana ny mpanohitra rehetra, ny mpanao gazety, ny fiarahamonim-pirenena, ary mety ho avy koa ny anjaran'ny masoivoho sy ny fiarahamonina iraisam-pirenena?" ||| "...tramways and stadiums, but have the Chinese investors planned a jail to host the opposition, journalists, civil society, and undoubtedly soon, the ambassadors of the international community"?
Nitovy hevitra tamin'i Citoyenne Malgache koa izy tamin'"ny filazana fa tsaho na teny diso fipetraka dia mety mahatonga anao ho any am-ponja: ||| He echoes Citoyenne Malgache's fear that any rumor or an ill taken word now can lead one to jail:
"... Amin'izao toe-javatra misy eto Madagasikara izao, ny Hery no mibaiko ny Lalàna, izay mandiso ny fiteny malazan'i Ciceron hoe "ny fitaovam-piadiana aoka hanome fahefana ny lamba sivily". ||| "... in the current atmosphere in Madagascar, Might has taken over Right, making a lie out of Cicero's famous saying "That weapons bow to the toga of the civil power".
Eo ambany fiarovan'ny fitondrana milaza ho mampiasa ny Finoana sady mipetraka eo ambony Lalàna, dia misy ireo mahasahy miteny izay tiany hotenenina nefa tsy voatohitohina (voasazy.) ||| Under the protection of a regime which pretends to use Faith and Law, some feel they may say whatever they want without fear of reprimands.
Aoka ho malina ny rehetra, fa mety ho voampanga amin'ny tsy antony eodaholo: namono an-dRatsimandrava, atidohan'ny fanafihan'ny 11 Septambra, nanohana tamin'ny fanaovana baomba vita tanana, nametaveta zazakely, sy izay rehetra tsy fantatra intsony. ||| Everyone should be careful, because anyone can be accused of anything: to have murdered Ratsimandrava (a Malagasy President murdered in 1975, whoever commandited the murder have not been apprehended yet), ordered September 11 attacks, financed artisanal bombs, being a pedophile, or whatever else.
Aoka tsy hisy intsony ny ho gaga raha misy ny mahare avy any amin'ny gazetin'ny vohitra 12 fa i Ndimby dia tsy iza fa i Oussama ben Laden, izay nialokaloka teto Madagasikara rehefa nanala volombava sy ny baraka (na ny mifamadika amin'izay). ||| That no one should be surprised one day that the 12 hills media will say that Ndimby is actually Usama ben Laden, harbored in Madagascar after having shaved off his beard and washed his headgear (or vice versa).
Arabia Saodita: Ny tondra-dranon'i Jeddah an-tsary ||| Saudi Arabia: The Jeddah Floodings on Video
Mbola miresaka momba ilay tondra-dranon'i Jeddah sy ny vokany foana ny olona, telo herinandro taorian'ny ora-mikija sy ny tondra-drano nampihantona ny fiainana tany andrefan'i Arabia Saodita. ||| People are still talking about the Jeddah floods and their aftermath, almost three weeks after torrential rain and flooding brought life to a standstill in the western Saudi Arabian city.
Mizara rohy ao amin'ny YouTube ireo mpampiasa aterineto, mampiseho ny fahavoazana goavana, avy amin'ny mailaka. ||| Internet users are exchanging links to YouTube, showing the extent of the damage, via email.

Masedoanina: Làlana Vaovao Mety hanimba ny Lovan-kolontsaina ||| Macedonia: New Laws to Have an Adverse Impact on Cultural Heritage
Mety hisy fiantraikany ratsy eo amin'ny lova ara-kolotsainan'ny firenena ny Lalàna vaovao ao Masedoniana. ||| New laws in Macedonia are set to have an adverse impact on the country's cultural heritage.
Vasilka Dimitrovska, mpanoratra ny bilaogy malaza Archaeological Diary nanohitra fametrahana lalàna ankamehana avy amin'ny hevitry ny matihanina iray: ||| Vasilka Dimitrovska, author of the acclaimed blog Archaeological Diary reacted to the fast-track lawmaking from a professional perspective:
Nanao ny Volavolan-dalàna momba ny "fikarakarana zavatra tsy niorina ara-dalàna", fantatra amin'ny anarana hoe Lalàna ho fampanarahan-dalàna ny fananganana tsy ara-dalàna, izay hitondra ny paika farany amin'ny lova ara-kolontsaina ny any amin'ny Repoblika Masedoniana . ||| The state adopted the Draft-Law on Treatment of Illegally Constructed Objects, popularly known as the Law for Legalization of Illegal Constructions, which will probably deal the final blow to the cultural heritage in the Republic of Macedonia .
Fantatra tsara fa ny ankamaroan'ny toerana arkeôlôjika dia eny amin'ny faritra ambanivohitra, saingy misy maro ihany koa anefa eny amin'ny tontolo andrenivohitra - afovoan'ny tànandehibe. ||| It is common knowledge that most of archaeological sites remain in rural areas, but there are many in urban environments – in the midst of cities.
Ahitana tranobe namboarina tsy nahazoana alalana ihany koa ao amin'ny ankamaroan'ireny toerana ireny, izay manimba hatrany ny tànandehibe tranainy iorenany. ||| Most of these sites also house illegal buildings which forever destroyed the ancient towns underneath.
Araka ny Archaeological Map an'ny RM (laharana faha-2, navoakan'ny Akademia Masedoanina momba ny Siansa sy ny Zavakanto tamin'ny taona 1995), ao amin'ny faritany tokana ao amin'ny tànanan'i Skopje, nahitana toerana arkeolojika maherin'ny 150. ||| According to the Archaeological Map of RM (Volume 2, published by the Macedonian Academy of Sciences and Arts in 1995), just on the territory of the city of Skopje there are over 150 registered archaeological sites.
Io faritra io dia misandrahaka amin'nytoerana fantatry ny be sy ny maro amin'ny fanorenana tsy ara-dalàna (tànana kely/ ambanivohitran'i) Volkovo, Zlokukjani, Pripor... ||| These areas overlap with well-known tumors of illegal constructions in (the villages/suburbs of) Volkovo, Zlokukjani, Pripor...
Ohatra, naka amin'ny tany 40 hektara izay mandrakotra ny sisa tavelan'ny tanàna romana taloha an'i Scupi ny tranomihaja an'ireo mpanakarena tsara indrindra ao Zlokukjani, namotika tanteraka ny tantaran'i Masedoniana sy izao tontolo izao. ||| For instance, the villas of the rich elite in Zlokukjani have encroached well within the 40 hectares covering the remains of the ancient Roman town of Scupi, forever destroying the history that belongs to the citizens of Macedonia and the whole world.
Te-hanoratra lavalava kokoa aho sy hanolotra tahiry momba izany tranga izany, kanefa fandaniam-potoana tsy amin'ny antony izany. ||| I wanted to write a longer, more documented post about this, but there's no point in delaying.
Raha hatao ho ara-dalàna ny fananganana tsy ara-dalàna manodidina sy ny anatin'ny faritry ny toerana arkeolojika, dia ho very ny ampahany lehibe amin'ny lova ara-kolotsaina Masedoniana. ||| By legalizing illegal construction around or within the areas of archaeological sites, we will lose a large portion of the Macedonian cultural heritage.
Tafiditra amin'izany ny sasany amin'ireo tànana fahagola lehibe indrindra, tahaka an'i, Heraclea, Lychnidos, sns. ||| This includes some important ancient cities, such as Scupi, Heraclea, Lychnidos, etc.
Nampiasana vola goavana ny fitantanana ny fikarohana arkeolojika, kanefa tsy nahavita namokatra na dia boky iray (izay ankasitrahan'ny fikambanana siantifika) na dia taorian'izay taona maro izay aza. ||| This administration has invested enormous amounts of money in archaeological digs, which, however, failed to produce a single (scientific peer-reviewed) publication, even after all these years.
Hanimba ny vokatr'ireo fampiasana vola tamin'ny arkeolojia io lalàna vaovao mikasika ny fampanarahan-dalàna ny fananganana tsy ara-dalàna io. ||| This current law on legalization of illegal construction will destroy the effects of all their investments in archeology.
Vatom-pasana sy vatampaty romana an'i Scupi eo anoloan'ny Tranombakoka ao an-tanànan'i Skopje. ||| Roman tombstones and sarcophagi from Scupi in front of the Skopje City Museum, exposed to the elements and airborne pollution.
Amin'ny maha arkeology azy, Ramatoa Dimitrovska nanambara fa voatery hijery akaiky ny lova ara-kolontsaina izy, fa tsy mijery ny vanim-potoana ara-tantara momba ny fananganana trano. ||| As an archaeologist, Ms. Dimitrovska stated that she's obliged to care about the entire cultural heritage, regardless of the time period of its making.
Ny voalohany tokony atao, araka ny heviny, dia ny amoahana indray sy hanatanterahana ny Lalàna maty momba ny Lova Ara-kolontsaina. ||| The first step, in her opinion, would be to update and implement the defunct Law on the Cultural Heritage.
Mpamaky iray, Aleksandar, nilaza ny heviny: ||| A reader nicknamed Aleksandar commented on this post:
Mazava ho azy fa tsy naka ny hevitry ny olona ireo izay nanoratra ny Lalàna - olana hatrizay fantatra tsara ao Masedoanina. ||| It is obvious that those who wrote the Law haven't consulted anyone - an old and well-known problem in Macedonia.
Somary voafetra ny hevitry ny Kabinetra... Mampalahelo ny milaza izany, fa tsy miraharaha zavatra maro ny vahoaka izay miantraika mivantana eo amin'ny fiainany, araka izany, hijanona ho tsy mihetsika izy ireo amin'izany. ||| The view from the Cabinet is somewhat limited... It is sad to say it, but the people did not stir about many other things that affect their lives more directly, so it will remain numb about this too.
Ary dia hiverina indray amin'ny olana mikasika ny fampianarana isika, sns., sns... ||| And again we return to the problem of education, and et cetera, and round and round...
V ao haingana ny Global Voices no nitatitra ireo fitarainana nataon'ny bilaogera hafa, izay nanohitra ny fananganana tranom-panjakana vaovao amin'izay ho mety toerana arkeolojika ao afovoan'ny renivohitra Masedoaniana. ||| Global Voices recently covered complaints by another blogger, who objected to the construction of new state buildings over probable archeological sites in the center of the Macedonian capital.
Amin'ny lalàna vaovao, ireo mponina ao amin'ny toerana izay misy ny fananganana tsy ara-dalàna dia nasaina handoa 1€/m² ho zon'ny fananan-tany mba haha-ara-dalàna azy ireo. ||| With the new Law on Treatment of Illegally Constructed Objects, the owners of illegal construction sites are invited to pay EUR 1 per square meter of property to be legalized.
Araka ny mahazatra, nanao fanentanana dokambarotra lafovidy ny governemanta mba hahatonga ny lalàna ho tiam-bahoaka, izay ahitana horonantsary alefan'ireo fahitalavitra mankasitraka ny fitondrana. ||| As usual, the government started a costly advertising campaign to popularize the law, based on videos played on regime-friendly TV stations.
Izany andrana mba hamenoana ny banga noho ny fandaniam-bolam-panjakana izany dia naseho ho toy ny fomban'ireo sokajin' olona andrenivohitra ambanivohitra, izay nampiasa vola tamin'ny fananganana trano tsy nahazoana alalana na tsy nahazo ireo alalana rehetra ilaina, mba hahazo ny tena zo amin'ny fananan-tany amin'ny vidiny mora. ||| This attempt to replenish the depleted state budget is presented as a way for the urban and rural lower classes, who invested in building homes without permits or all the required papers, to cheaply gain real ownership.
Lalàna ilaina koa izany ho an'ireo Andriamborivory (potentat) izay nanorina trano fonenana amin'ny faritra voaaro, tahaka ny valan-javaboarim-pirenena (parcs nationaux.) ||| It also comes in handy to the local power-mongers who have built mansions in nominally protected areas, such as national parks.
Vatom-pasana Vitalis, officier taloha tamin'ny mpitaingi-tsoavaly romana, naseho eo anoloan'ny Tranombakoka ao an-tanànan'i Skopje. ||| Tombstone of Vitalis, an ancient Roman cavalry officer, displayed in front of the Skopje City Museum.
Mba hampitomboina ny tombotsoa ara-kolotsaina, indreto vaovao fanampiny momba ny toerana arkeolojika an'i Masedoanina voalaza ao amin'ny lahatsoratra, miaraka amin'ny lahatsoratra Wikipedia: ||| To increase the cultural benefit, here's a bit more information about the archaeological sites from Macedonia mentioned in this post, with links to appropriate Wikipedia articles:
Scupi no mpialoha làlana romana ny renivohitra ankehitriny Skopje. ||| Scupi was the Roman precursor of the current capital of Skopje.
Toby miaramila naorina ny 168 talohan'i JC, nanjary tanàna mandroso izany, izay rava tamin'ny horohorontany tamin'ny 518 taorian'i JC. ||| Founded as a military camp around 168 BC, it grew into a prosperous city, which was then destroyed in the earthquake of 518 AD.
Nifindra tamin'ny kilometatra maromaro eny amin'ny renirano ny vahoaka ary nampiasa hazo kely taloha mba hanamboarana ny"tanana fahiny" ankehitriny, izany hoe mandan'i Kale, fampisehoana ny loza vao haingana. ||| The population moved several kilometers down the river and even used some of the old marble to construct the current "old town," i.e. the Kale fortress, a site of this recent incident.
Sasany amin'ireo vatom-pasana an'ireo fasana no afaka jerena ao amin'ny ivon-toerana Skopje akaikin'ny Tranombakoka ao an-tanàna, kanefa ny toerana tena izy dia eo akaikin'ny làlana mankany Kosovo, mikatona ho an'ny mpitsidika. ||| Some of the gravestones from its cemeteries can be seen in the center of Skopje near the City Museum, while the actual site is near the road to Kosovo, not open to visitors.
Heraclea Lyncestis dia eo akaikin'i Bitola, tanàna lehibe faharoa an'ny Repoblika Masedoanina. ||| Heraclea Lyncestis is near Bitola, the second-largest city in the Republic of Macedonia.
Namboarin'i Le Roi Phillip II de Macédoine tamin'ny taonjato fahaIV talohan'i JC, io "Toerana ' Héraclès ao amin'ny tanànan'i Lynx" io dia mitondra foana ny sisa tavela romana sy byzantins, amin'izany ny mozaika malaza sy ny teatra. ||| Founded by King Phillip II of Macedon in the 4th century BC, this "City of Heracles in the land of the Lynx" still contains important Roman and early Byzantine remains, including the famous mosaics and theatre.
Taona maro izay, nandravaka ny làlana amin'ny sarisokitra maromaro romana amin'ny toerana ny governemanta. ||| Several years ago, the government adorned its steps with several Roman sculptures from this site.
Lychnidos no anarana grika taloha Ohrid. ||| Lychnidos is the ancient Greek name of Ohrid.
Io faritra madio sy stratejika lehibe io dia nipetrahana tsy an-kijanona nandritra ny taona maromaro, ary koa fantatra tsara amin'ny hairafitrano (architecture), ny sy ikônina mbamin'ny tahiry voarakitra tamin'ny andro antenantenany sy ny vanim-potoanan'ny ottomane. ||| This pristine and strategically important area has been continuously inhabited for several thousand years, and is well-known for its preserved architecture, icons and other treasures from the medieval and Ottoman periods.
Ny fikarohana vaovao tambanin'io tongoa (couche) io nandritra ny taompolo roa farany no nahitana ny Asakanton'ny (artefacts) andro fahagola, nahitana amphithéâtre iray, izay mbola ampiasaina hanaovana fampisehoana rindra-kira hatramin'izao; sy fasan'ny mpiady sy jeneraly Masedoniana fahiny (sarontava sy fitaovam-piadiana vita amin'ny volamena) ary fitaovana sarobidy fanaom-behivavy mihaja. ||| New digs under this layer, made during the last two decades, also yielded artifacts from more ancient times, including an amphitheatre, which is again used for concerts; and graves of alleged Ancient Macedonian warriors/generals (golden masks and weaponry) and noblewomen (sophisticated jewelry).
Mitady tolotra tetikasa madinidinika tsara tohanana indray ny rising voices ||| Rising Voices Seeks Micro-Grant Proposals for Blog Outreach
Ny 30 novambra 2007 no andraisana ny tolotra farany. ||| Application Deadline: November 30, 2007
Manaiky ny handray ireo tolotra tetikasa (avy amin'olo-tsotra) mety hahazo vatsy hatramin'ny $5.000 indray ny Rising Voices, rantsa-mangaikan'ny Global Voices aty amin'ny firenena ankoatra ny tany mandroso. ||| Rising Voices, the outreach arm of Global Voices, is now accepting project proposals for the second round of microgrant funding of up to $5,000 for citizen media outreach projects.
Izay te-handray anjara amin'izany dia handahatra amin'ny antsipirihany sy amin'ny endrika vaovao ny fomba ampianarana fokonolona (na vondron'olona araka izay mety hahazoanao ny teny anglisy) tsy mba manana vintana loatra hahare ny momba ny fampitam-baovaon'ny olom-pirenena. Mba hahita, hahafantatra ary ho tia sy hahay hampiasa ny fitaovana handrotsahana sy hampidirana bolongana (blaogy) ireo vondron'olona ireo ka ho hainy ihany koa ny fampidirana bolongan-tsarimihetsika sy ny bolongam-peo araka izay tiany. ||| Ideal applicants will present innovative and detailed proposals to teach citizen media techniques to communities that are poorly positioned to discover and take advantage of tools like blogging, video-blogging, and podcasting on their own.
Efa nanangana tetikasa dimy tamin'ny tolotra 142 azonay avy amin'ny firenena mihoatra ny 60 izahay tamin'ny volana jolay. ||| In July we funded five projects out of the 142 applications we received from over 60 different countries.
Ny dimy voalohany nahazo vatsy avy tamin'ny Rising Voices dia avy tany Bangladesh, Colombia, Bolivia, India, ary Sierra Leone. ||| The first five Rising Voices grantees are based in Bangladesh, Colombia, Bolivia, India, and Sierra Leone.
Afaka mijery ny tolotr'ireo nahazo vatsy ireo ianao amin'ny alalan'ny fanindriana ny rohy mibaribary ambanin'ny lohateny madinika "Grantees" eo amin'ny tsipisarin'asan'ny Rising Voices wiki. ||| You can view their applications by clicking on the relevant links underneath the sub-heading "Grantees" in the sidebar of the Rising Voices wiki.
Ny tanjon'ny Rising Voices dia ny hitondra feo vaovao avy amin'ny vondron'olona vaovao sy hitondra teny vaovao ao amin'ny tontolon'ny web be resaka, amin'ny alalan'ny fanomezana tahirin-kevitra sy fananganana vondrona ao an-toerana ka mipaka any amin'ny fokonolona tsy henoheno tafa. ||| Rising Voices aims to help bring new voices from new communities and speaking new languages to the conversational web, by providing resources and funding to local groups reaching out to underrepresented communities.
Ny tetikasa mety ho avy amin'izany dia tokony hahitana: fakantsary raitra mitentina $10 amina vondron'olona roa samihafa anatin'ny fokonolona iray ary manangana vondrona mpampidi-tsary Flickr hifampizaran'izy ireo (na ifaninanan'izy ireo) ny sarin'ny tanànany sy ny ho aviny. ||| Distribute $10 digital cameras to two different groups of the same community and create a Flickr group where they confront each other's photographic perspectives of their city. Distribute mp3 recorders to participants of a youth group and help them produce monthly audio documentaries featuring elders who describe how their community has changed over the decades.
Misy lafiny iray lehibe mampiavaka ity fanomezambatsy faharoa ity tamin'ny natao voalohany. ||| This second round of funding differs from the first in one important aspect.
Afaka misafidy ny handefasanao ny tolotra ataonao na alefanao amin'ny alalan'ny mailaka na asehonao amin'ny be sy ny maro amin'ny alalan'ny wiki sady mety mahazo ny setriny amin'ny hanatsarana azy. ||| You have the choice to submit your application via email as before or you can publicly post your proposal on our wiki and receive feedback on how it can be improved.
Ny tolotra aseho vahoaka dia azo apetraka ao amin'ny wiki amin'ny fotoana rehetra sady azo hatsaraina mandrakariva araka izay itiavana azy, fa tsy maintsy vita alohan'ny 30 novambra ho avy izao izany (tsy haiko izaho mpandika ho teny Malagasy koa moa hoe ora inona no iafarany). ||| Public applications can be posted on the wiki at any time and can be reworked as often as the applicant sees fit, but all applications must be finalized by the November 30 deadline.
Manomboka amin'ny $1,000 ka hatramin'ny $5,000 ny vatsy omen'ny Rising Voices outreach (izay mendrika ao amin'ny "fifaninanana" amin'ity indray mitoraka ity. ||| Rising Voices outreach grants will range from $1,000 to $5,000.
Enga anie ianao (ianareo) hamaritra tsara, hahay handinika, ho vita adisanina, ho maty paika ary ho azo tanterahina tokoa ny teti-bola eo amin'ny fandrafetana ny tetikasa. ||| Please be as thoughtful, specific, and realistic as possible when drafting your budgets.
Ho talaky maso ao amin'ny Global Voices ny tetikasa mahomby rehetra. ||| Successful projects will be prominently featured on Global Voices.
Raha tianareo ho hay ny fampiasana ny wiki amin'ny fametrahana ny tetikasa dia jereo eo ambanin'ny bolongana amin'ny teny anglisy (tsindrio ny rohy eo amin'ny original post) fa misy sary fanazavazavana izany na tsidiho pejy fanorotoroana ny tokony atao ao amin'ny wiki. ||| To learn how to apply using the wiki you can view the screencast below or visit the instruction page on the wiki.
Raha tianareo alefa tsy aseho vahoaka moa ny tolotra ataonareo dia sintonina an-tserasera(vakio ny download misy format roa ao amin'ny teny anglisy) ny taratasy fenoina ka rehefa feno sy mahafapo anao dia alefaso amin'ity adiresy ity ny tolotrao outreachalohan'ny 30 Novambra ho avy izao. ||| If you would like to submit your proposal privately via email you may do so by downloading the application and emailing it to outreachby November 30.
Tsy ho azo raisina sy hodinihana intsony izao tolotra tratra aorian'ny fotoana farany voasoratra. ||| No late applications will be accepted.
Iran: Fanentanana ho Fanafahana Ireo Amerikana Mpihanika An-Tongotra Sisa Voatàna Am-ponja ||| Iran: Campaign to Free Last Two Jailed American Hikers
Sarah Shourd dia nandany 410 andro natoka-monina tany Tehran, Iran, talohan'ny nanomezana alàlana azy ho afaka miverina any Etazonia tamin'ny Septambra 2010. ||| Sarah Shourd spent 410 days in solitary confinement in Tehran, Iran, before she was allowed to return to the United States in September 2010.
Miantso izao tontolo izao izy mba hiresaka mikasika ireo namany roa, Shane Bauer sy Josh Fattal, izay mbola any am-ponja ao Iran noho ny fiampangana ho nanao "asam-pitsikilovana" hatramin'ny fotoana nahasamborana azy telo niaraka fony nihanika an-tongotra ny tendrombohitra nanakaiky ny sisintanin'i Iran tamin'ny Jolay 2009. ||| She now calls on the world to speak up for her two friends, Shane Bauer and Josh Fattal, who are still in prison in Iran on charges of "espionage" since they were all three arrested while hiking in mountains near Iran's border in July 2009.
Fianakaviana, namana ary mpanohana maro an'i Shane sy Josh no nitarika ny hetsi-panoherana iray izay teboka niaingan'ny Faran'ny herinandro Fanetsehana ny 2 TAONA LAVA LOATRA Hetsika Facebook iray mikendry ny hanetsika vahoaka ho amina tntolom-panoherana iray tena izy, miainga voalohany indrindra avy ao New York eo anoloan'ny Solotenan'i Iran ao amin'ny Firenena Mikambana ny Zoma 29 Jolay 2011. ||| Family, friends and supporters of Shane and Josh are leading a protest that will kick off a 2 YEARS TOO LONG Weekend of Mobilization. A Facebook event aims to mobilize people to a real world protest, primarily in New York in front of the Iranian Mission to the United Nations on Friday, 29 July, 2011.
Free the hikers dia manana mpitia efa maherin'ny 27.000, ary misy mpanaraka 4.000 amin'ny hoe ao amin'ny Twitter ||| Free the hikers has more than 27,000 fans, and there are 4,000 followers on on Twitter.
Notazonin'ny mpitandro filaminana Iraniana i Shane Bauer, ny fofombadiny Sarah Shourd ary ny namana akaiky azy ireo Josh Fattal tamin'ny 31 Jolay 2009 raha iny ry zareo mba nankafy fandehanana an-tongotra nihanika ny tendrombohitra Kurdistan Irakiana iny.... ||| Iranian forces detained Shane Bauer, his fiancée Sarah Shourd and their close friend Josh Fattal on July 31, 2009 while they were enjoying a recreational hike in the mountains of Iraqi Kurdistan.
Be ny tatitra mifandrirotra mikasika ny hoe tena niditra tany Iraka tokoa ve ny tafika Iraniana mba hisambotra an'ireo tanora Amerikana telo na tafiditra tsy nahy tany ambadik'ilay sisintany zara raha hita soritra ry zareo. ||| There are conflicting news reports about whether Iranian forces entered Iraq to arrest the three young Americans or they strayed across the poorly marked border by mistake.
Navotsotra tamin'ny 14 Septambra 2010 i Sarah, noho ny antony maha-olona taorian'ny nandaniany 410 andro tany aminà toerana mitoka-monina. ||| Sarah was released on September 14, 2010, on humanitarian grounds after spending 410 days in solitary confinement.
Izy telo dia samy nampangaina daholo fotoana fohy talohan'ny namotsorana an'i Sarah noho ny fidirana tsy ara-dalàna sy ny asam-pitsikilovana tamin'ny fakàna ambavany tao amin'ny fonjan'i Evin ao Tehran toerana sambany namelàna azy ireo ho afaka hiresaka tamin'ny mpisolovava azy ireo, saingy tsy afaka akory nifanatrika taminy. ||| All three were charged shortly before Sarah's release with illegal entry and espionage at a hearing in Evin Prison in Tehran where they were finally allowed to meet their lawyer for only the first time but were unable to consult with him.
Ao amin'ny pejy Facebook Hetsika Am-pilaminana 2 Taona Lava Loatra dia miteny hoe: ||| 2 Years Too Long Peaceful Protest page on Faceboook it says:

India: Sedra Vaovao Hiadiana Amin'Ny Raboka Eran-tany ||| India: New Challenges to Fight Tuberculosis Worldwide
Ampahany amin'ny fandrakofanay manokana ny Fivoarana eran-tany ity lahatsoratra ity. ||| This page is part of our special coverage Global Development.
Tafahitsoka tanatina ady mafana izay voafintina amina teny roa "mafy" sy "tanteraka" ny media sy ny tontolon'ny bilaogy Indiana. ||| The Indian media and blogosphere have been locked in fierce battle over two words: "extensively," and "totally".
Raha nanaraka ireo vaovao Indiana ianao, dia fantatrao fa mikasika ny fifanakalozan-kevitry ny fikambanambe iraizam-pirenena momba ny fahasalamana manoloana ny aretina raboka izany. ||| If you've been following Indian news at all, you know that it is about the global health community's tuberculosis debate.
Nipoaka ny tontolon'ny media Indiana ny herinandro lasa teo noho ireo tatitra avy any Mombai momba ny karazana raboka iray tena mahatohitra ny karazana fitsaboana fantatra rehetra. ||| India's media sphere exploded last week with reports from Mumbai of a tuberculosis strain completely resistant to all known treatment.
Nopetahan'ireo gazety Indiana ny anarana "totally drug-resistant tuberculosis (raboka tena tsy andairam-panafody)" na TDR-TB io raboka io. ||| The Indian newspapers coined it "totally drug-resistant tuberculosis" or TDR-TB.
Nefa andro vitsy monja aty aoriana dia namoaka fanambarana mandà ny fampiasàna ny fomba fiteny TDR-TB ny Governemantan'i India, milaza fa tsy manana famaritana mazava ny TDR-TB ny Fikambanana Eran-tany momba ny Fahasalamana, ary karazana raboka matanjaka tsy andairam-panafody (XDR-TB) io TB mipoitra any Mombai, India ity. ||| But just a few days later the Government of India released a statement refuting the term TDR-TB, saying that the World Health Organization has no clear definition for TDR-TB, and that the TB emerging in Mumbai, India is merely another strain of extremely drug-resistant TB (XDR-TB).
Ankehitriny dia antsoin'izy ireo XXDR-TB, na koa "raboka faran'izay tena tsy andairam-panafody ||| They're now calling it XXDR-TB, or "extensively drug-resistant TB
Sarin'ny "mycobacterium"n'ny raboka izay mahatonga ny raboka, azo avy amin'ny micrôskôpy elektronika. ||| Electron microscope image of mycobacterium tuberculosis, responsible for tuberculosis.
Nipoaka ny tontolon'ny bilaogy sy ireo lohateny be amin'ny gazety noho ireo manam-pahaizana sy ny vahoaka Indiana izay manontany tena ny antony mahatonga ny Governemantan'i India sy ireo goavana amin'ny fikirakirana ny fitsaboana ny TB mifandrirotra amin'izay hiantsoana izany, fa tsy ny zavatra tokony hatao momba azy. ||| The blogosphere and headlines erupted with experts and Indian citizens wondering why the Government of India and the big players in TB treatment were arguing over what to call it, rather than what to do about it.
Bharati Ghanashyam, mpitoraka bilaogy iray ao amin'ny Journalists Against TB, na Mpanao gazety manohitra ny Tiberkilaozy, dia namintina ny fisavoritahana nipoaka teo amin'ny tontolon'ny bilaogy eran-tany momba ny fahasalamana taorian'ilay fanambaran'ny Minisitry ny Fahasalamana Indiana, "Antsoy amin'izay tianareo izany fa fongory." ||| Bharati Ghanashyam, a blogger for Journalists Against TB, summed up the outrage that erupted in the global health blogosphere following the Indian Ministry of Health's statement, "Call it any name but banish it".
Nitsikera i Ghanashyam fa tondraky ny raharaha mangan'ny TDR-TB ny vahoaka tamin'ny vaovao izay nanambaran'i India ny tsy fisian'ny polyomelite mandritra ny taona iray manontolo. ||| Ghanashyam commented that the TDR-TB fiasco arose on the heels of the news that India had been declared polio-free for an entire year.
Ny fanontaniany: ahoana no hahafahan'Inde manatanteraka zavatra goavana tahaka izany nefa manary ankitsirano ny TB? ||| His question: how could India achieve such a milestone but drop the ball so badly with TB?
Avy eo dia nomarihiny fa misy "adihevitra mavesa-danja, fandàvana sy resadresaka mikasika ny fiantsoana na tsia an'io endrika vaovao io ho TDR-TB." ||| He then noted that there was "considerable debate, denial and discussion on whether this new form can be termed TDR-TB".
Araky ny tatitra iray nataon'ny Indian Express, "nandefa fanairana nampikoropaka tamin'ny tsy misy dikany ireo mpitsabo avy ao Hinduja. ||| As per a report in the Indian Express, "The doctors from Hinduja have unnecessarily raised a panic alarm.
Tsy eken'ny WHO (Fikambanana Iraisampirenena Momba Ny Fahasalamana) na ny Fandaharanasa Nasionaly Nasiam-panavaozana Iadiana amin'ny Raboka ny fomba fiteny TDR. ||| The term TDR is not recognized by the WHO or the Revised National Tuberculosis Control Programme .
Manomboka eto, antsoin'izy ireo ho raharahan'ny XDR-TB fotsiny izany," hoy ny mpiasam-panjakana avy ao amin'ny Direksiona misahana ny Asa Ara-pahasalamana." ||| As of now, they are only slotted as XDR-TB cases," said an official from the Directorate of Health Services".
misy fahasamihafany kely ny fiantsoantsika ireo karazana TB samy hafa. ||| It makes little difference what we call different forms of TB.
Ny olana dia misy ireo olona maty ||| What matters is people are dying
Ny mpitoraka bilaogy Alanna Shaikh, manam-pahaizana amin'ny fizahana ara-pahasalamana, nanintona ny mason'ny fianakaviamben'ny fivoarana noho ny lahatsoratra tao amin'ny bilaoginy momba ny Atsaharo ny tsy firaharahiana: ary antsoy hoe "TDR-TB" io endrika vaovao io. ||| Blogger Alanna Shaikh, an expert in health consulting, got some attention from the development community for her blog post on End the Neglect: and calling the new form "TDR-TB".
TDR-TB mihitsy no tena mety hiantsoana izany. ||| TDR-TB is exactly what it sounds like.
Mbola tsy afaka namantatra fitsaboana izay mety handaitra ho an'ity TB ity ireo mpitsabo," hoy ny nosoratany. ||| Doctors have not yet been able to identify a treatment for this TB that will work," she wrote.
"Fivoarana ratsy, tena ratsy ho an'ny fahasalamana eran-tany ity. ||| "This is a bad, bad development for global health.
Ny WHO dia milaza ao amin'ny vohikalany, fa tsy misy fomba hamaritana raha toa ka ireo fototra niavin'ny TB izay mahatohitra ny fanafody tany amin'ny trano fanaovana fanandramana ihany no manohitra marina ireo fanafody any amin'ny marary. ||| The WHO claims on their website, that there is no way to determine whether strains of TB that appear resistant to drugs in the laboratory, are actually resistant to the drugs in the patient.
Mety hanohitra ny vinavinany izany satria hatramin'ny nanehoan'ireo 12 mararinà endrika tena matanjaky ny raboka any Mombai fa tsy miasa mihitsy amin-dry zareo ireo fanafody misy, miezaka manambara fotsiny ihany ny WHO fa tsy ampy ny fitiliana mirafibika mba hamaritana ny fangarom-panafody ilaina ao amin'ny trano fanandramana mba hitsaboana ireo tena marary. ||| This may seem counter-intuitive since the 12 patients suffering from a particularly virulent form of tuberculosis in Mumbai have obviously show they are not susceptible to the available drugs, the WHO is simply attempting to state that it lacks a standardized test to determine just how effective different combination of the drugs are in the laboratory vs. treating real patients.
Tsy nahy, namoaka tatitra ny Minisitry ny Fahasalamana any Inde ny 20 Janoary 2012, milaza fa sivy amin'ireo tsaboina telo ambin'ny folo no efa tsy maninona intsony nandritra ny fitsaboana azy ireo amin'izao fotoana ary telo tamin'izy ireo kosa no maty, manamarina fa milavo lefona amina fanafody antibiotika sasany io fototr'aretina io. ||| Incidentally, India's Ministry of Health issued a report on January 20, 2012, stating that nine out of the twelve reported patients were stable on their current treatment while three had died, confirming that the strain is susceptible to some antibiotic treatment.
Misy zavatra iray tsy azo hihodivirana, hentitra amin'ny tokony hanaovan'ireo governemanta sy malala-tànana iraisampirenena mpanome vatsy tahaka ny Global Fund sy ny Firenena Mikambana ny ho laharam-pahamehana ny fijerena mivantana ny tiberkilaozy ireo vondrompiarahamonina mpisolovava ao anaty aterineto sy ny fampitàna mivantana ny tuberculosis ao amin'ny Twitter. ||| One thing remains certain, the tuberculosis Twitter stream and TB online advocacy community are adamant that tuberculosis needs to remain a high-priority for donor governments and international donor organizations like the Global Fund and the United Nations.

Kazakhstan: Akon'ny Fihaonamben'ny OSCE ||| Kazakhstan: Echo of the OSCE Summit
Nekena ihany tamin'ny farany ilay fanomezam-pitantanana noho nyady varotra ara-jeopolitika nafotaka, ny tsindry avy amin'ireo firenena tao anatin'ny firaisana Sovietika teo aloha, ary ny resaka samihafa mikasika ny angovo sy ny fiantohana fandriampahalemana ho an'ny tandrefana. Ny manampahefana Kazakh dia mahita ny toerana maha-mpitantana ho toy ny fitaovana mahomby hanatsaratsarana ny endriny eo amin'ny sehatra iraisampirenena. ||| The Kazakh authorities were viewing the chairmanship mostly as a high-profile instrument to improve its image on the international arena.
Ary ny vovonamben'ny OSCE, fihaonambe iray nihaonan'ireo mpitarika avy amin'ireo firenena mpikambana ao amin'ny OSCE, dia nomanina ho toy ny fankalazana ny maha-mpitantana ny Kazakh sy vintana iray hanosehana an'i Astana, renivohitra vaovaon'ny firenena. ||| And the OSCE Summit, a conference of the leaders of the OSCE participating states, was meant to become the wreath of the Kazakh chairmanship and a chance to boast the country's new capital city of Astana.
Notanterahana ny voalohandohan'ny volana Desambra izy io. ||| It finally took place in early December.
Nandreraka ny fanomanana: ||| The preparations were stunning:
"Tsy tsara loatra ho an'ny mponin'i Astana ny mararirary mandritra ny fotoana hanaovana ny fihaonambe. ||| "It is not recommended for the Astana residents to stop being sick for the period of the summit.
Ho diovina ho an'ireo mpandray anjara amin'ny vovonan'ny OSCE ny hopitaly Maro tamin'ny vahoaka no tohina tamin'ny fanapahan-kevitry ny manampahefana amin'ny fampidirana famerana amin'ny aretina", zhuldyz manoratra hoe. ||| Hospitals will be cleared to serve the OSCE Summit participants Most of the city dwellers are shocked by the official initiative of introducing a sickness limit", zhuldyz writes.
Ireo Astaniana monina manakaiky ny toerana sy ny arabe aza dia nahazo fandraràna tsy hifoka eny an-davarangany mihitsy – fandraràna iray niteraka fanentanana manadrohadro nampitondraina lohateny hoe "Mbà lehilahy, mifoha anankiray." ||| The Astanians residing close to the venue and major roads were even prohibited from smoking on their balconies – a ban that stirred a massive satire campaign titled "Be a man, get a smoke".
Slavasay dia nanara-maso akaiky ilay fihaonambe avy eny an-dalantsaran'ilay hetsika: ||| Slavasay was keeping a close eye on the summit from within the event's corridors:
Hanampy tosika tsara ny hetahetan'ny governemanta Kazakh ilay fihaonambe miaraka amin'ireo fotoana fakàna sary eny afovoan'ny hetsika rehetra eny. ||| The summit will definitely justify the Kazakh government's expectations with the picture-taking ceremony at the center of the whole event.
Avy eo izy dia nitondra fanehoan-kevitra mikasika ny kabary fiarahabàna nataon'ny Sekreteram-panjakàna Kazakh, izay nanomboka ny famelabelarany tamin'ny fiarahabàna ny filohan'ny Kazakhstan amperinasa noho ny tsingerintaona faha-19 nahavoafidy azy ho filoha. ||| He later commented on the welcoming speech by the Kazakh Secretary of State, who started his presentation with congratulations to the incumbent president of Kazakhstan on 19th anniversary of his election as the president.
"Hitako ho miavaka kely mihitsy ny fanamarihana toy izany atao, manoloana ireo mpitarika firenena - heverina ho demaokratika", hoy izy. ||| "I found such an opening remark to the meeting of the leaders of countries - that are meant to be democratic - pretty original", he said.
Slavasay koa dia isan'ireo nanakiana ny tery vaimanta sy ny fandrakofana diso tafahoatra ataon'ny media Kazakh an'ilay fihaonambe. ||| Slavasay was also among those who criticized the summit's excessively obtrusive and overly exalted coverage of the summit in Kazakh media.
Izay rehetra mety ho fandaharam-baovao dia sisihana tatitra momba ilay fihaonambe daholo. ||| All news programs were overwhelmed with summit reports.
Ny andro voalohany tamin'ilay fihaonambe, ny fantsona fahitalavi-panjakana sy tsy miankina rehetra dia samy nanao fandefàsana mivantana ny resaka avy amin'ilay fihaonambe avokoa nandritra ny ora maro. ||| On the first day of the event, all state-owned and private TV channels held a many-hour live broadcast of the summit sessions.
"Mijery an'ilay izy aho ary tena tsy azoko mihitsy hoe nahoana ry zareo (media) no mifanakalo hevitra amina resaka foronina, raha toa ka tena làlan-jotra hafa tanteraka kosa no izoran'ny firenena?" ||| "I watch it and I cannot understand why they (media) are discussing some invented reality, while the country is going in a totally different direction?"
Toa azoko an-tsaina hoe izany koa no zava-nitranga tany Rosia tamin'ny 1915 ||| I guess the same was in Russia back in 1915"
"Raha tsaraina avy amin'ny haben'ny fandrakofana atao ankehitriny, hitoetra eny anivon'ny fanapariahana sary sy feo eto an-toerana ary ny gazety an-tsoratra mandritry ny antsasaka taona iray raha kely indrindra ny fihaonamben'ny OSCE", hoy i Alramin manampy. ||| "Judging by the current scope of coverage, the OSCE Summit will remain in the local broadcast and print news for at least half a year", Alramin adds.
Efa nanambàra ny filoha Kazakhstan Nazarbayev fa nanomboka ho "fandresena iray ho an'ny vahoaka Kazakhstani" ilay fihaonambe. ||| Kazakhstan President Nazarbayev has already stated that the summit became "a triumph of the Kazakhstani people".

(Zandary eny an-tanàna, sary Mehmoud Karim)) ||| (Soldiers in burned block by Mehmoud Karim))

Vondrona hafa antsoina hoe "TSIA, tsy isan'ireo izay manakorontana" koa miantso firaisan-kina: ||| Another group named "TSIA, tsy isan'ireo izay manakorontana" calls for unity:
Mahatsapa fa na dia eo aza ny fahasarotana dia hainay ny mitraka. ||| (we) vouch that in spite of the difficult times, we will keep our head up.
Ary farany misy ny mpanolotena ao amin'ny Peace Corps, diso fanantnana amin'ny tsy filazan'ny gazety Amerikana ny toe-draharaha no nanangana vondrona fanangonana ny aovao farany mikasika ity krizy ity sy ny manodidina azy ho an'ireo mpiara miasa aminy manerana an'i Madagasikara. ||| Finally, a group of Peace Corps Volunteers, disappointed by the lack of information in the US mainstream media, created a group to gather updates related to the crisis and the whereabouts of their colleagues all over Madagascar.
Izao ny aoao farany anoakan'i John Elliot: ||| John Elliot posted the following update:
Nihaona tamin-dRavalomanana ny Masoivoho Amerikana handresy lahatra azy saingy aim-bery maina izany. ||| Yesterday the U.S. ambassador met with Ravolamanana to try and talk sense to him, but bore little fruit.
Nisy nitoraka ny fiarany nony nandao ny fihaonana izy. ||| His car was attacked/rocked by a mob after leaving the meeting.
Ankehitriny dia ny fiantraikany ara-toe-karena no atahorana kokoa noho ny herisetra nihatra. ||| Now the economic impact is more threatening than the violence.
Niakatra haingana ny vidin'ny lasantsy, hanara-dia azy koa ny vidin-tsakafo. ||| Gas prices have skyrocketed, food will soon follow.
tahaka ny lasa fitobian'ny fiara ny toeram-paninjaran-tsolika, ary efa lany lasantsy ny maro amin'izy ireo. ||| Gas stations are like parking lots, lines around the block, and most are out of gas.
Taiwan: Antso mba hanopaza-maso ny politikan'ny angovo ||| Taiwan: Call for Energy Policy Review
Ity lahatsoratra ity dia ampahany amin'ny tatitra manokana ataonay momba ny Horohorontany Japana2011. ||| This post is part of our special coverage Japan Earthquake 2011 and Global Development 2011.
Nampitahotra ny vahoakan'i Taiwan ny tranga niseho tany amin'ny toby nokleary any Fukushima any Japana, momba ny fiarovana ny toby nokleary any amin'ny fireneny. ||| The ongoing Fukushima nuclear power plant incident in Japan has alerted people in Taiwan about the safety of nuclear power plants in their own country.
Mba hamadihana ny olana misy amin'izao fotoana ho politika maharitra ho an'ny governemanta, mpampiasa aterineto maro no nangataka ny governemanta Taiwanais mba hamerina handinika tsara ny politikam-pirenena momba ny angovo sy ny orinasa. ||| In order to transform current concern into long term government policy, many netizens are demanding the Taiwanese government conduct a comprehensive review on the country's energy and industrial policy.
Fifanoherana anatiny amin'ilay politika ||| Policy paradox
famoriam-bahoaka manohitra ny nokleary tany an-drenivohitr'i Taiwan, Taipei tamin'ny 20 Martsa 2011. ||| Anti-nuclear rally in Taiwan capital, Taipei on March 20, 2011.
Tamin'ny 14 Febroary 2011, izany hoe iray volana talohan'ny horohorontany sy tondra-dranobe nandrava an'i Japana, nanao fanambarana ampahibemaso ny Birao misahana ny fiarovana ny tontolo iainana any Taiwan, izay nampiandraiketin'ny Biraon'ny Angovo ny politikan'ny angovom-pirenena ho an'ny 2011-2020. ||| On February 14, 2011, approximately one month before the devastating Japanese earthquake and tsunami, Taiwan's Environmental Protection Administration held a public hearing in which the Bureau of Energy laid out the nation's energy policy from 2011-2020.
Na izany aza, heverin'ny vondrona mpiaro ny tontolo iainana fa ity politikan'ny angovo ity dia tsy manaja ny fifanarahana natao tao amin'ny "Torolalana Maharitra ho Fampandrosoana ny Angovo" nambara tamin'ny 2008, na ny "Fanambarana ny Angovo Nasionaly" avy amin'ilay fivoriana natao tamin'ny 2009. ||| However, environmental groups found the new energy policy violated the consensus formulated in the "Sustainable Energy Development Guidelines" announced in 2008, as well as the "Statement of National Energy" conference held in 2009.
Amin'ny fanoherana ireo tanjona napetraka ho an'ny fampihenana ny entona manimba rivotra, amin'ny fampitomboana ny angovo azo havaozina sy ny fampitodihana ny toe-karena hankamin'ny orinasa tsy mandany angovo be loatra, manohana ny fampandrosoana ny orinasa mampiasa angovo simika azo avy amin'ny solika ilay politika vaovao. ||| Contradicting the goals set for the reduction of greenhouse gas by increasing renewable energy and shifting the economy towards lower energy-consumption industry, the new policy supports the development of the petrochemical industry.
Miteraka fifanoheran-javatra ho an'ny fampivoarana maharitra ny angovo fanodina ny tsy fahombiazan'ny fanavaozana ny rafitry ny orinasa ao Taiwan, araka ny asongadin'i Chia-Yang Tsai avy amin'ny Tobim-baovao momba ny Tontolo iainana any Taiwan: ||| The failure to restructure Taiwan's industry creates a paradox for sustainable energy development, as Chia-Yang Tsai from the Taiwan Environmental Information Center points out:
Ny orinasa any Taiwan dia mandany maherin'ny 60 isan-jaton'ny fitambaramben'ny herinaratra (an'ny firenena), nefa ny vidin'ny herinaratra ho an'ny orinasa dia antsasaky ny vidin'izany ho an'ny olon-tsotra. ||| Industries in Taiwan consume more than 60% of the (nation's) total electricity, but the price of electricity for industries is cheaper by half than the price of electricity for personal livelihood.
Noho izany vidiny ambany dia ambany izany dia tsotra no ahafahan'ny orinasa mandanilany fahatany ny herinaratra. ||| Because the price is so cheap for industries, it is easy for them to waste electricity.
Raha hampitombo ny vidin'ny herinaratra ho an'ny orinasa isika dia mety ho afaka hamongotra ireny orinasa mpandany angovo betsaka sy mpanaparitaka loto be ireny. ||| If we increase the price for industrial electricity, we may be able to eliminate those industries that consume a lot of energy and generate a lot of pollution.
Rehefa voaovantsika tanteraka ny rafitry ny orinasa dia ho voavahantsika ny olana mikasika ny angovo. ||| After we transform the structure of industries fundamentally, we will solve the energy problems.
Ilaina ny safidy mazava ||| An informed choice is needed
Lehilahy tany amin'ny famoriam-bahoaka manohitra ny nokleary tany Taipei, renivohitra Taiwanais, tamin'ny 20 Martsa 2011. ||| Man at an anti-nuclear rally Taiwanese capital, Taipei on March 20, 2011.
Satria mbola mitohy ny olana ara-nokleary any Japana mpifanila vodirindrina aminy, ilaina fanaraha-maso ny politikan'ny angovo mifandraika amin'izany any Taiwan, indrindra ho an'ny fampandrosoana ny angovo nokleary any an-toerana. ||| As neighbour Japan's nuclear crisis continues, a more comprehensive energy policy review is needed in Taiwan, in particular regarding the development of the country's nuclear energy.
Araka ny lahatsoratra iray momba ny loza mitatao noho ny angovo nokleary, naneho ny ahiahiny i Yen fa mety hiteraka tsy fahampian'ny herinaratra any amin'ny firenena ny fampiatoana ireo toby nokleary: ||| According to the an article about the high risk of nuclear energy, Yen expressed concern that the suspension of the nuclear power plants might cause electricity shortages in the country:
Raha vonona hiatrika ny tsy fahampiana herinaratra sy vonona handresy lahatra ny olona hanaiky ny tsy fahampian'ny herinaratra ianao, mandehana dia tohero ny toby nokleary. ||| If you are ready for electricity shortages and to convince other people to accept electricity shortagea, please go ahead and oppose nuclear power plants.
Amin'ny lafiny iray, maro ireo mpampiasa aterineto no manizingizina fa na dia mety hifidy ny hampandroso ny hery nokleary aza ny vahoaka Taiwanais, zava-dehibe ho an'ny vahoaka ny fahatakarana ny risika raisina mialohan'ny hanaovany safidy. ||| On the other hand, many netizens insist that even though Taiwanese people may ultimately choose to develop nuclear power, it is important for the public to understand the risks involved before making their choice.
Tokony handresy lahatra antsika ireo mpandàla ny herinaratra nokleary amin'ny antony tokony handraisanantsika risika manoloana ireo orinasa sasany mpandany angovo be. ||| The supporters of nuclear electricity should convince us why we should take risks because of some high energy-consuming companies.
Raha ny marina, momba ny vaovao navoakan'ny Orinasa mpamokatra Herinaratra any Taiwan, nanambàra i Siro tao amin'ny sehatra fiadian-kevitra iray tamin'ny 21 Martsa: ||| In fact, upon checking the data released by the Taiwan Power Company, Siro argued in a forum discussion thread on March 21:
23,4 isan-jaton'ny fitambaramben'ny famokarana herinaratra amin'izao no tsy ampiasaina akory amin'ny fotoana tena ilàna azy... Raha haatontsika ny toby nokleary telo dia tsy tokony hiatrika tsy fahampiana herinaratra avy hatrany isika. ||| 23.4% of the present total electricity generation is not even used in the peak demand period... If we suspend the three nuclear power plants, we should not face an immediate electricity shortage.
Nanohy nanazava i Siro fa sady tsy mora vidy ny angovo nokleary no tsy madio: ||| Siro continued to explain that nuclear energy is neither cheap nor clean:
Mety hampitombo ny vidin'ny angovo nokleary, mihoatra noho ny nambaran'ny Orinasa mpamokatra Herinaratra any Taiwan ny fandiovana ny loto nokleary aorian'ny fampiatoana ireo toby nokleary. ||| The processing of nuclear waste after the suspension of the nuclear power plants may make the cost of nuclear energy higher than the Taiwan Power Company claimed.
Manohy ihany anefa i Siro fa tsy mora na tsotra ny asa fampiatoana toby nokleary: ||| Siro goes on to say however, that the process of suspending a nuclear power plant is not easy or straightforward:
Raiso ohatra i Penghu, ny toeram-ponenako, akaikin'ny faritry ny tanàn-dehibe ny toby ahodina solika taloha. ||| Take Penghu, the place I live, for example, the old thermal power plant was close to the downtown area.
Rehefa naorina ny tobin'angovo vaovao tany ambanivohitra dia nakatona ilay taloha. ||| When the new power plant in suburb area was built, the old one was torn down.
Namidy tamin'ny vidiny lafo io tany io. ||| That land was sold for a lot of money.
Tsy mbola nitranga tamin'ny toby nokleary mihitsy izany... Izany no tsy noraharahian'ny Orinasa mpamokatra Herinaratra any Taiwan rehefa nikajikajy ny vidiny izy. ||| This is never happens to nuclear power plants... This is what the Taiwan Power Company intended to ignore when they calculated the cost.
Mitahiry loto nokleary koa ny toby nokleary. ||| A nuclear power plant also stores nuclear waste.
Rehefa haato (ny toby nokleary iray) dia mila fikarakarana mandritra ny fotoana maharitra. ||| When (a nuclear plant) is suspended, it needs long-term management.
Tsy mety ny mampiato ny toby ary mampiasa ny tany indray avy eo. ||| It is not possible to remove the plant and use the land again.
Loza mitatao mandrakariva ny fifehezana toby nokleary sy loto nokleary. ||| The management of the nuclear power plants and nuclear waste is always a potential threat.
Nanontany i Tyrone tao amin'ny sehatra adihevitra tamin'ny lahatsoratra momba ny lozan'ny nokleary tamin'ny 14 Martsa: ||| Tyrone asked in the discussion section of the article on nuclear risk on March 14:
Raha misy hadisoana kely amin'ny fifehezana (ny toby nokleary) dia miparitaka ny loto mitondra taratra. ||| If there is any mistake in (nuclear plant) management, radiation pollution takes place.
Nahoana isika no mila manao sorona ny hasambaran'ny taranatsika mba hahazoantsika aina fotsiny? ||| Why do we want to sacrifice our future generation's happiness for our own comfort?
Nikaragoa: Fihaonana mikasika ireo blaogy sy Media Vaovao 2.0 any Managoa ||| Nicaragua: 2.0 Meeting of Blogs and New Media in Managua
Ho tonga daholo ireo manampahaizana amin'ireo vondrom-piaraha-monina dizitaly amin'ity Fihaoanana mikasika ny Blaogy sy ny Media Vaovao 2.0 ity izay hotontosaina ny 12 sy 13 Aogositra ao amin'ny Central American University any Managoa, Nikaragoa. ||| Experts in digital communities will come together for the 2.0 Meeting of Blogs and New Media which will take place on August 12 and 13 at the Central American University in Managua, Nicaragua.
Ity hetsika ity dia fampiharana ny fanandramana ireo fironan'ny aterineto sy ny tanjak'ireo fomba fifandraisana azo isafidianana hisarihana ny tontolon'ny fanjakana sy ny olon-tsotra. ||| The activity is a practical assessment of web tendencies and the power these alternative ways of communication have to influence public and private spheres.
Ity fihaonambe itydia hahitàna ny fandraisan'anjaran'ireo manampahaizana avy any Amerika Afovoany, Kolombia ary Venezoela, izay hanome vela-kevitra, fampiofanana ary zavatra maro hafa. ||| The gathering will include the participation of experts from Central America, Colombia and Venezuela, who will give lectures, workshops and more.
Ireo foto-kevitra tena hifantohana amin'izany dia: ny fahasamihafana misy eo amin'ny Media Vaovao sy ny Kolontsaina ary ny fivoarana; ny fandraisan'anjaran'ny olon-tsotra sy ny mpisolovava; Famokarana ireo votoatin-kevitry ny Media Vaovao; "Scenario" Vaovao: rindram-baiko ho an'ny finday, fampiasana sy tetika vaovao, fibanjinana ny ho avy. ||| The main subjects will be: New Media and Cultural Diversity and Development; Citizen Participation and Advocacy; Content Production for New Media; New Scenarios: mobile applications, new uses and methods, perspectives on the future.
"Hetsika ara-kolontsaina hampitombo fahalalàna ity hetsika ity, nefa dia hiteraka ihany koa fikasana hanamafy fa tsy zava-baovao fotsiny ihany ny aterineto, fa koa fomba enti-mampianatra izay mahatonga adihevitra hisarihana ny hevitry ny olona," hoy David Ruíz López-Prisuelos, Mpandrindra ao amin'ny Foiben'ny Kolontsaina Espaniola any NiKaragoa. ||| "It is a culturally enriching experience, but it also involves a proposal to emphasize that web activity is not only a novelty, but also a learning method that generates real debate that may influence public opinion," comments David Ruíz López-Prisuelos, Coordinator at Spain Cultural Center in Nicaragua.
Entina hanampiana amin'ny fijerena ireo lahateny àry dia hosokafana amin'ny adihevitra mikasika ny fampiasana ireo fitaovana ity hetsika ity. ||| To help visualize the lectures, the event will begin with a panel discussion about the use of these tools.
