Any antsefantsefany any dia misy resaka hanaovana tafa mivantana amin'ny fahitalavitra miandry fotsiny izay higadonany. ||| Somewhere in all this there is a reality TV show waiting to happen.
: Toa kisendrasendra ihany, Akhmatbek Keldibekov dia nandao ny toeran'ny mpitondra teny tao anatinà savorovoro manodidina ny fitsinjarana ny laharam-pamantarana manokana ho an'ireo 'KG'. |||: Coincidentally, Akhmatbek Keldibekov left the speaker's office amidst a scandal surrounding the distribution of the special 'KG' registration plates.
Miainga amin'ny laharam-pamantarana ny an'ny fiadidiana ny fitondrana (KG 001) mankany amin'ireo laharana KG an-jatony tsy dia manao ahoana loatra, ireny zavatra ireny dia manome endrika tsanganana iray ao Kyrgyzstan ary mazàna no manme anao fahafahana miserana tsy amin'ahiahy an'ireo mpitandro filaminana mandrindra ny fifamoivoizana. ||| Ranging from the presidential plate (KG 001) to less prestigious registrations in the KG hundreds, these items are something of a status symbol in Kyrgyzstan and usually get you past traffic cops without any bother.
Mbola mijanona ho ankamantatra ny hoe laharana toy inona no hipetaka amin'ireo "aotobisin-dry zareo". ||| What plates the proposed "faction buses" will carry is as yet unknown.
Nodimandry i Elie Rajaonarison, Mpanakanto Malagasy Malaza ||| Elie Rajaonarison, Malagasy artist, has died
Elie Rajaonarison, poeta Malagasy iray, dia nodimandry ny 27 Novambra 2010 teo amin'ny faha-59 taonany. ||| Elie Rajaonarison, a Malagasy poet, has died on November 27, 2010, at the age of 59.
Mpanakanto feno, efa nametraka ny dian-tànany teo amin'ny resaka fakàna sary ny sarimihetsika. ||| An accomplished artist, Elie Rajaonarison tried his hand successfully at photography and film.
Manampahaizana amin'ny Siansa maha-olona ary mpampianatra tao amin'ny Anjerimanontolon'Antananarivo. ||| He held degrees in anthropology and was a professor at the University of Antananarivo.
Namoaka bokin-tononkalo iray izy, Ranitra, ary nandika an'i Jacques Prevert, poeta Frantsay iray ho amin'ny teny Malagasy. ||| He published a poetry book, Ranitra, and translated French poet Jacques Prevert into Malagasy.
Sekreteran'ny Zavakanto ihany koa izy, ary efa nanolotsaina ny filoha teo aloha Marc Ravalomanana nandritra ireny olana nanaraka ny fifidianana izay ho filoham-pirenena tamin'ny 2002 ireny ka niafara tamin'ny fialàn'ny Filoha teo aloha Didier Ratsiraka sy ny fandehanana sesitany any Paris, Frantsa. ||| He was also Secretary of Culture, and once advised former President Marc Ravalomanana during the 2002 political unrest that followed the presidential elections and led to former President Didier Ratsiraka's ousting and exile in Paris, France.
Nidera azy ireo mpitoraka bilaogy: Ndimby izay matetika no mitoraka bilaogy momba ny politika, dia mba niventy ny lafintsarany koa ||| Bloggers eulogize him: Ndimby who usually blogs about politics, is positively lyrical
Lehilahy namàka lalina tao amin'ny kolontsain'ny firenena nilatsahan'ny tavoniny i Elie, izay hainy nasandratra tamin'ny alalan'ny majikan'ny teniny, ny heviny ary ny asany. ||| Elie was a man deeply rooted in the culture of his country, which he has sublimated in the magic of his words, ideas and actions.
Afaka andro vitsy, hiverina amin'ity tany izay nolalainy fatratra ity ny vatana mangatsiakany, raha hitety ny habakabaka kosa ny fanahiny hifamotoana amin'ny tsifahafatesana. ||| In a couple of days, his body will join this land he loved so much, and his soul will fly in the airs to meet his immortality.
Mamoaka resadresaka iray nifanaovany tamin'i Elie Rajaonarison tamin'ny 2002 i Pierre Maury, fony i Elie Rajaonarison nanatrika ny atrikasa IOWA ho an'ny mpanoratra ary nihaona tamina poeta sy mpanoratra avy amin'ny lafivalon'izao tontolo izao. ||| Pierre Maury publishes an interview he held with Elie Rajaonarison in 2002, while Elie Rajaonarison attended the IOWA Writers' Workshop and met with poets and writers from all over the world.
"Ny ankabeazan'ireo firenena tonga eto dia manao ezaka ho fandikàna ny asa soratry ry zareo, sy mampiditra azy ho ao anatin'ny kolontsaina be mpampiasa amin'izao androntsika izao." ||| "Most countries present here (at the IWP workshop) make the effort to translate their works, to integrate them into the cultural mainstreams of our time."
Ny toetra maha-Nosy antsika tsy tokony ho jerena amin'ny lafiny miiba. ||| Our insular situation should not be perceived as a negative.
Manana vintana isika amin'ny fanànana indray miaraka ny fahatakarana ny fifikirana sy ny fitsangantsanganana toy ireo rehetra monina amina nosy. ||| We have the chance to have both the rootedness sense and the traveling instict like all islanders.
Efa tafapetraka ny resaka manontany ny momba ny maha-izy ny tena, ary tokony hitohy hanohina antsika hatrany. ||| The identity questioning is well engaged, and it should maintain our involvement.
Fotoana ankehitriny "hitsangatsanganana". ||| It is now time to "travel".
Tonga ny fotoana handehanana mijery ny any an-kafa any sy mampitodika ny hafa hijery antsika (tsy misy tsilalaon-teny diso toerana), amin'ny teny roa: misy! ||| It is now time to make ourselves seen and to see elsewhere, in a couple of words: the time has come to exist!
Mipetraka amina toerana mendrika ao anaty sarintanin'ny literatiora manerantany. ||| To gain our place on the world literary map.
Manana ny ilaina rehetra isika hanatràrana io fanamby io: literatiora amin'ny tenim-pirenena tsara fototra ary tsy mitsahatra mivoatra, fifehezana ny teny frantsay izay fikirin'ny intelligentsia, ny fironana "voajanahary" ao amin'ny Malagasy hianatra teny vahiny ary indrindra fa ny teny angliosy, ny fivoaran'ny Ntic izay tena maha tendan-kanina ny tanora an-tanan-dehibe maharaka toetr'andro nefa hipariaka amin'ny sosona sosialy rehetra sy any amin'ny faritra rehetra. ||| We have all assets to win this bet: a well established literature written in our national language which keeps developing, mastery of French that the intelligentsia has well appropriated, the "natural" gift Malagasies have to learn foreign languages, with a special mention to English, development of Information technology of which the urban youth is a greedy user, but which will extend to all social groups and to all regions.
Tombondahiny maro, andrana maro izay ankehitriny dia ilaintsika avadika amin'ny fandikàna ny asa soratsika ho amin'ny tenim-pirenena hafa satria miandry antsika izao tontolo izao ary mila antsika koa izy izy mba hisy." ||| Many assets, many tryouts which we now have to transform by translating our works into foreign languages because the World is expecting us and it needs us to exist, too.
SipaKV manoratra momba ny lohateny Ranitra, navoaka tamin'ny 1992, ary ny hany bokin-tononkalo navoakan'i Elie Rajaonarison, na dia efa nahasoratra tononkalo maherin'ny 500 aza izy tamin'ny 1992. ||| SipaKV writes about the title of Ranitra, published in 1992, and the lone book of poetry that Elie Rajaonarison published, even though he had already written at the time more than 500 poems in 1992.
Fa ny tena tiako indrindra dia ny tsilalaonteny ao anatin'ny fehinteny momba ilay lohateny "Ranitra", tahaka izay anazavan'ilay mpamehy azy. ||| But my favorite in the post face is the wordplay on the title "Ranitra", as explained by the postfacer.
Ranitra raha rasina ho mpamari-toetra dia midika "mandidy", mety handratra, afaka midika koa hoe "marani-tsaina" ||| Ranitra as an adjective standing for "sharp", it may wound, it may also mean "smart"
Ranitra raisina ho tenin-jatovo dia midika koa hoe "manadrohadro", toy ny mila sotasota, mila ady. ||| Ranitra as a root may also mean "tease", as in provoke, irritate
Farany, Ranitra dia midika koa hoe "namana", amin'ny teny Merina, namana miafina toy ny "sakaiza", vady ranitra. ||| Lastly, Ranitra also means "friend", in the Merina language, secret friend as in "mistress", vady ranitra.
Ary ity tononkalo mangidy iray nezahako nadika. ||| And a beautiful bitter booming poem, of which I attempt a translation.
Mivandravandra be ao anatin'ilay tononkalo ny antony itadiavan'i Elie Rajaonarison hamakiana amin'ny feo avo ireo tononkalony. ||| It becomes obvious in the poem why Elie Rajaonarison wanted his poems spoken out loud and scanded.
Notsongaiko manokana izy ity, izay ho tsapanao rehefa mijery akaiky ny daty nanoratana azy ianao. ||| I picked it for a distinct reason, which you will realize if you look closely at the date of its writing.
mangidy raha mangidy ny ketok'hanoanana ||| Most bitter is the bite of hunger
dia miakatra maredona ny Antsan'ireo vonona ||| Bitter is all that!
mihirà Ry Tendrombohitra ||| Then rise the chants of the ready
Nosoratan'i Elie Rajaonarison ny 15 Augositra 1990, taona 1 sy 5 andro talohan'ny vonoolona teny Iavoloha. ||| Written by Elie Rajaonarison on August 15 1990, 1 year and 5 days before the Iavoloha massacre,
Namela mananontena iray, zanakavavy telo ary zafikely maro i Elie Rajaonarison. ||| Elie Rajaonarison leaves a wife, three daughters and many grandchildren.
Shina: Fitokonan'ny mpamily fiarakaretsaka, sendikà ary demaokrasia an-dalambe ||| China: Taxi Driver Strike, Union and Street Democracy
Nitokona nanditra ny iray volana ny mpamily fiarakaretsaka nanerana ny firenena. ||| Taxi drivers from around the country have been in strike for a month.
ka nametraka azy tao amin'ny bolongany; naka dika avy amin'izany i Chong ka nametraka azy tao amin'ny inmediahk.net: ||| Beifeng scanned the letter and put it up on his blog; chong posted a backup copy at inmediahk.net:
Fizotran'ny fitokonan'ny mpanamory fiarakaretsaka ||| Timeline for the nationwide Taxi driver strikes
Tamin'ny 23 Novambra, dia nisy fifandonan'ny fiarakaretsaka iray tamina fiaran'olo-tsotra iray, izay nitarika fibahanan'ny fiarakaretsaka anjatony ny lalana lehibe rehetra. ||| Early in Nov 23, there was a confrontation between a Taxi and a private vehicle in Guangzhou, which leaded to a temporary blocking of a major express road by more than a hundred Taxis.
Nifampitohy tamin'ny fitokonan'ny mpanamory fiarakaretsaka rehetra nanerana ny firenena io toa-javatra io. ||| This episode was connected to the nation-wide taxi drivers strike.
Soritsoritan'i Xin Lijian ho antsika ny fizotran'ny fitokonana nandritra ny volana Novambra: ||| Xin Lijian draws a simple timeline of the strikes in November:
3 Nov – Fitokonan'ny mpitondra piklà tany Chongqing ||| Nov 3 - Chongqing city Taxi driver strike
Ilaina ny sendikàn'ny mpamily fiarakaretsaka ||| Taxi driver union needed
Navoitran'ny mpamaham-bolongana fa ny olana fototra dia noho ny fanambakana madinidinika ataon'ny orinasan'ny fiarakaretsaka (tompon'ny fiara): ||| The blogger also points out that the fundamental problem is due to the middle rank exploitation by the Taxi company:
Manana olana anatiny miteraka ny fitokonana miverimberina ny orinasan'ny piklà. ||| The Taxi industry has some internal problems that cause the series of strikes.
Teôrika dia mahazo manao taxi ny olona iray rehefa mahazo fahazoan-dalana. ||| In theory, Taxi can be an individual business by getting a license.
Nefa niofo ho mpanelanelana mandraharaha ny resaka fanamoriana piklà ny orinasan'ny piklà. ||| However, the taxi companies have turned into an agent on Taxi business.
Nanome fahefana hampiasa (hanambaka) ny mpamily piklà izany fandehan-draharaha izany. ||| Such arrangement gives the company the power to exploit the drivers.
Nitana ny lohalaharana amin'ny resaka fandraharahana ny "orinasan'ny piklà" noho ny ampihimamba ananany eo amin'ny fakana tombombarotra; nefa etsy ankilany dia ny mpanamory pikl kosa no mitana ny rambony eo amin'ny fahazoana tombotsoa. ||| The "Taxi company" has occupied the top rank in the business and has a monopolized status on profit making; while the Taxi drivers are in the lowest rank under the existing profit chain.
Ankoatra ny fanomezana ny hofan'ny fiara, dia mbola ny mpamily ihany koa no miantoka ny vidin'ny solika, ny menaka, ny fikojakojana ny fiara, ny fandoavana ny sazy, miaritra ny fisian'ny fifaninanana rahateo sns. ||| Apart from giving rental fee to the company, they have to take the market risk, such as oil price, competition, maintenance fee, fines, etc.
Misy ihany koa ny fifandonana mihatra amin'ny mpanamory piklà ankoatra ny fiarovana fototra sy zo fototra tokony ho azony, ary efa nitoetra ela ireo olana rehetra ireo ka tsy tokony hahagaga ny fisian'izao fiaraha-mientana izao. ||| There are also conflicts over the taxi driver's basic protection and rights, all these problems have been there for long and the collective outburst is not unexpected.
Mba ahafahana mamaha ireo olana rehetra ireo dia nandroso sosokevitra ny mpamily fiarakaretsaka hanangana Sendikà iray ny vondron'ny sendikà rehetra manerana an'i Shina Manontolo hifampiraharaha amin'ny orinasan'ny piklà. ||| In order to deal with the problem the All China Federation of Trade Unions suggested Taxi drivers to organize union to negotiate with Taxi company.
Na izany aza dia nomarihin'i vahinin'i lakeside fa ny sendikà mahomby dia tsy maintsy tantanin'izay nofidian'ny mpamily fiarakaretsaka mivantana, fa raha tsy izany dia tsy hivaha ny olana: ||| However lakeside guest house points out that an effective union should be directly elected by Taxi drivers, or else the conflicts cannot be solved:
Raha tena tiantsika ny hiarovana ny zontsika mpiasa, ny lalana mahomby indrindra amin'izany dia ny mametraka fifidianana demaokratika hametrahana ny solontenan'ny mpiasa ary mamela azy ireo hanana ny fizakana manokana eo amin'ny fifampiraharahana. ||| If we really want to protect the rights of labour, the most effective way is to support democratic election of labour representative and let them have autonomy in negotiation.
Amin'nya lalan'izay ihany no hisian'ny fifandraisana mitovy tantana eo amin'ny mpiasa, ny fitondrana ary ny orinasa eo ampiaraharahana sy hahitana ny marimaritra iraisana amim-pilaminana. ||| Only by doing this, there will be more equal relation among worker, government and company in negotiation and making peaceful consensus.
Endrika fanao demaokratika tokoa ny fifampiraharahana iraisana, nefa, nofantenan'i Beifeng ny gazety iray avy any Singapaoro milaza fa tokony ekena koa ny endrika demaokrasia an-dalambe ataon'ny mpanamory fiarakaretsaka: ||| Collective negotiation is of course a form of democratic practice, however, Beifeng quotes from a Singapore newspapers which pointed out that the Taxi driver strike as a form of street democracy should also be recognized:
Tahaka ny ahoana no ijerentsika ny fiaraha-mientana miverimberina, indrindra fa eo ampiatrehana zavamisy afokaina ho demaokrasia an-dalambe any Shina izao? ||| How should we look at the series of collective action, especially against the background of negative labeling of street democracy in China?
Izao angamba no fomba ahafahan'ny fitondrana mianatra mifampiraharaha amin'ity toe-java-baovao ity. ||| It is probably a process for the government to learn to deal with this new situation.
Ny fanehoan-kevitra ao amin'ny Zaobao no mametraka fa "eo amin'ny fomba fijerin'ny fitondrana, mila mianatra manova ny fiheverany ny demaokrasia an-dalambe izy ary mampirisika ihany koa ny fampivelarana ny fiaraha-monim-pirenena amin'ny fomba fihetsika vaovao". ||| The commentary in Zaobao states that "from the government standpoint, they have to learn how to change their concept of street democracy and encourage the development of civil society with a new attitude."
Lalana tsy maintsy diavina izany eo amin'ny fiovana politika ihany koa. ||| This is a necessary process in political transformation as well.
Manam-panantenana izany koa moa ilay fanehoan-kevitra: "Kihon-dalana ity fitokonan'ny mpanamory piklà sy ny fihetsiky ny fitondrana ity. ||| The commentary is rather optimistic: "The Taxi driver strike and the government's attitude towards the action is a turning point.
Ity no maneho fa mety ho fantsom-panehoan-kevitra ny demaokrasia an-dalambe, mety hanana endrika fifanakalozan-kevitra sy fifampiraharahana hamahana olana amim-pilaminana ihany koa." ||| It shows that street democracy can be a channel to express public opinion, it can be a form of dialogue and negotiation for solving the issue peacefully".
Arzantina: nandresy tamin'ny fifidianana tsy nahasarika I Kirchner ||| Argentina: Kirchner Wins Apathetic Election
Vita ny fifidianana tao Arzantina. ||| The recent elections in Argentina are over.
Misy milaza fa io angamba ny fifidianana tsy nahasarika indrindra hatramin'ny niverenan'ny demokrasia tamin'ny taona 1983. ||| Some say that these elections have probably been received with the most amount of apathy since the return to democracy in 1983.
Roa andro mialoha ny fifidianana anefa dia tsy misy marika amantarana izany teny an-dalana ankoatra ny afisy vitsivitsy. ||| A couple of days before the elections, there was almost no sign of them in the streets, except a few posters.
Tsy nandray anjara tamin'ny raharaha ny ankamaroan'ny olom-pirenena, nefa tsy midika izany fa tsy hisy fiantraikany fihetsika izany any aoriana any. ||| Most citizens did not take active part in the process, but that doesn't mean there were no repercussions afterwards.
Raha ny marina dia mirotsaka an-tsehatra amin'ny lohahevitra ny bolongana (blaogy) ao an-toerana. ||| In fact, the topic was tackled by many local blogs.
Tsy banga tsy akory ny fifanoheran-kevitra. ||| Controversy was not absent.
Maro ny tolo-bolongana manakiana mafy dia mafy ny governemantan'i Nestor Kirchner sy ny ho mpandimby azy dia Ramatoa Cristina Kirchner izany. ||| Many blogs posted strong criticism against Nestor Kirchner's government and against his successor, Cristina Kirchner.
Raha jerenao ny vokatra ofisialy dia mazava dia mazava tokoa ny fandresena noho ny vokatra azony izay nahatratra ny 45%, manaitra tokoa ny fetr'isa sahal amin'izany. ||| If you take into consideration that the officialism's victory was quite solid, with almost 45% of the votes, such critics attract attention.
Raha raisina ihany koa ka heverina ny toerana nahavitsy mpifidy an'i Cristina izay tany amin'ny tanan-dehibe, izay fonenan'ny maro amin'ny mpampidi-bolongana (mpibilaogy na gilaogera), dia ho azon'izay mahatsikaritra izany avy hatrany ny fahasamihafan'ny vokatra sy ny hevitry ny mpampidi-bolongana. ||| If one take into account that the places where Cristina got less votes were the big urban areas, where most of these bloggers are located, one may understand this particular dissociation between the results of the election and these bloggers' opinions.
Raha vao nandre ny ako nanaraka ny valim-pifidianana fotsiny dia injany fa fanamelohana ny fandresen'ny antokon'ny mpitondra no hita tamin'ny ankapobeny tao amin'ny Twitter. ||| Just by checking Twitter while the results of the poll were being released, one could find that most of the reactions, in general, were a condemnation of the victory of the current government party.
Nisy aza moa ny nanangana bolongana mamporisika tsy hifidy Cristina, tahaka ny No voto a Cristina (Tsy hifidy Cristina aho). ||| Even blogs that promoted not to vote Cristina, such as No voto a Cristina (I don't vote for Cristina), were created.
Etsy andanin'izany, mazava loatra, dia mampiasa ny fitaovan'ny web ihany koa ny ao amin'ny fanohanana araka izay hitanao ao amin'ny Sumate a Cristina (Miaraha amin'i Cristina), sady misy sary ao amin'ny Flickr miaraka aminy, ary eo koa ny filazana vaovao vao milatsaka avy amin'ny Twitter ary misy aza moa ny mpanohana manome toro-hevitra amin'ny alalan'ny MSN Messenger. ||| Of course, from the side of the officialism, there was also a use of Web tools as you can see in Sumate a Cristina (Join Cristina), with pictures in Flickr, Twitter news updates and even supporter assistance through MSN Messenger.
Raha tsy dia nisy zava-nanaitra loatra talohan'ny fifidianana dia somary nisomaritaka kosa izany rehefa tonga ny andro fandrotsaham-bato. ||| And if before the elections nothing much happened, the day of the poll was quite rocky.
Nisy ny nitatitra fa misy toerana ||| There were reports that the polling places opened late due to the lack of election officials.
Raha te-hijery ny tsikera sy ny hasiakan'ny hevitra sasany dia jereo ity iditra ao amin'ny eBlog mitondra ny lohateny hoe "El show de Cristina" ity. ||| To see some of the critics and the level of aggressiveness of some opinions, check the comments at this entry: "El show de Cristina" at eBlog.
Ao no ahitana ny hevitra avy amin'ny mpanohitra ny fitondrana milaza momba ny fangalaram-bato avy amin'ny mpiasan'ny governemanta dia lazaina avy eo fa avy amin'ny sitrapon'Andriamanitra ny valim-pifidianana. ||| There were opinions, from those against the government, that talked about fraud, government employees that stole, and being God's will at the results of the polls.
Etsy ankilany kosa indray dia misy ireo manakiana ny mpampidi-bolongana (bilaogera) sy mpandray anjara ho tsy mahatakatra ny toe-draharaha ka mamaly hoe "tsy mampiasa Nokia N73 na manana Bolongana ny mpifidy an'I Cristina". ||| On the other side, there were the people who accused bloggers and participants of not understanding what was going on, and said that "Cristina's voters don't use Nokia n73 or have blogs".
Misahana ny hoavin'I Arzantina ny halalin'izany hatsam-pisarahana izany, nefa mampiseho ny endri-piadian-kevitra araka ny Peronisma sy ny vahana azony eo amin'ny tontolo politika ao an-toerana. ||| This level of division is something to be concerned about in regards of the future of Argentina, but at the same it's a characteristic of any debate in Argentina where representations of Peronism and it's meaning for the local political life takes place.
Indreto misy iditra mahaliana vitsivitsy ahitana ny adi-hevitra ao an-toerana momba ny fifidianana: "Mitovy daholo ihany amin'ny farany": ao amin'ny Fresco y Batata. ||| Some interesting entries to see the local debate about the elections: "At the end, they're all the same": at Fresco y Batata.
Dia efa misy hevitry ny filoha ho avy tsikerain'Italo Daffra sahady: ||| Italo Daffra criticizes the ideas of the future president:
Niteny ny filoha voafidy Arzantina tamin'ny herinandro fa tsy tokony hikasika lohahevitra manaratsy ny sarin'ny firenena ny fanaovan-gazety. ||| The President-elect of Argentina said last week that journalism should not publish topics that hurt the country's image.
Nahataitra ahy sy nanohina ahy ny fitovian'ny fomba fiteniny sy izay nolazain'ny fitondrana jadona tamin'ny androny ka nametrahana ny sivana mifototra amin'ny fanakanana ny « fanaratsiana ny endriky ny firenena ». ||| What surprises me is the similarity with what the last dictatorship said, that practiced censorship based on what wanted to hurt Argentina's image.
Sahala fa tsy mitovy. ||| So different, so similar.
Ny fanapoirana ny marina nasehon'i Morales Sola: Darío Gallo, avy amin'ny Bloc de Periodista, izay nananihany sy nampisy fifandirana tao amin'ny bolongany (lahatsoratra amin'ny blaogy) mikasika ny lesoka amin'ny tendan'i Cristina Kirchner izay nabaribariny tamin'ny sary rahateo. ||| The great revelation of Morales Sola: Darío Gallo, from Bloc de Periodista, and a very ironic and controverted post about the state of Cristina Kirchner's neck, which had been noticed to be Photo-shopped in pictures.
"Ny fahadisoan'i Carrio": Nosoritan'i Juan Tapiola fa nisy fahadisoan-tetika politika nataon'i Elisa Carrio, kandidan'ny Coalicion Civica, izay nahazo ny toerana faharoa tamn'ny fifidianana. ||| "The mistake of Carrio": Juan Tapiola points out what he believes are the mistakes in the political positioning of Elisa Carrio, the candidate of the Coalicion Civica, who got the second place in the elections.
Diso paika i (Elisa) Carrió araka ny eritreritro. ||| I think Carrió committed a basic strategic error.
Efa nametraka ny tenany ho safidim-bahoaka ho amin'ny fahamarinana ho amin'ny teny sy ny asa ary ny fitsipi-pitondrantena i Elisa. ||| Elisa positioned herself to the Argentine people as the choice for ethics and honesty.
Mampahazo vahana be dia be an'i Carrió eto Arzantina ny fitondran-tena tsy azo kianina sy ny laza azony nandritra ny taona maro. ||| After many years of public complaints and impeccable conduct, placed Carrió in a strong position in Argentina.
Na izany aza dia tsy voatery ho amin'ny fitantanana no fijery nomen'i Elisa ny tenany fa toy ny mpanofinofy ihany. ||| However, Elisa's place is as an idealist and not necessarily as an administrator.
Ary izay no hitako ho fahadisoany... Olona manana vina mahery sy matotra amin'ny fitantanana no tadiavina eny anivon'ny fampandehanan-draharaha isan'andro sy ny fitantanam-panjakana. ||| This is where I think she made her mistake... The administration and daily management should have been delegated with a person with an image of a strong leader in regards to administration.
Jodete: Milaza ny fahavitsian'ny isan'ny mpifidy, lohahevitra mikasika ny olam-pikarakarana ny fifidianana kokoa, ary bolongana (blaogy) nahazoana ny karazam-panehoan-kevitra maro indrindra. ||| Jodete: about the lack of ballots in the elections, a topic of much institutional seriousness, and one that raised all kinds of comments.
Ny governemanta safidiantsika kosa mitantara ireo tetika maharikoriko nefa anatin'ny ara-dalàna tsikaritr'ity governemanta ity. ||| The government we chose provides criticism of the results, where many of the legal scandals this government had been noticed.
Nisalasala tamin'ny fampidirana bolongana (blaogy) nitondra lohateny hoe "Fanontaniana tsy nisy valiny" ny tao amin'ny Uno más del montón rehefa maro ny olam-pitarainana re nandritra ny fotoam-pifidianana. ||| "Questions without answer": at Uno más del montón they wonder about the legitimacy of the results, since there were so many complaints about problems at the time to vote.
Misy ny lisitry ny blaogy manohana an'i Cristina Kirchner ao amin'ny "Miaraha amin'i Cristina" saingy indrisy moa fa maro amin'izy ireo no tsy noankotrihina (na hoe tsy namoaka vaovao intsony) taorian'ny fifidianana. Jorge Gobbi ||| At "Join Cristina" there's a list of blogs that support the candidacy of Cristina Kirchner, although unfortunately many of them have not updated after the elections.
Hong Kong: Lavin'ny Vahoaka Ny Fifidiana Ben'ny Tanàna Tsy Tamin'ny Fomba Demaokratika ||| Hong Kong: Citizens Say No to Undemocratic City Mayor Election
Amin'ireo tale mpanatanteraka 1.200 mpikambana amin'ny kaomitim-pifidianana ao Hong Kong, 689 no nifidy an'i Leung Chun-ying ho ny ben'ny tanàna manaraka ny 25 Martsa noho ny tsindry aloka sy resaka an-jorony nataon'ny Biraom-paritry ny Governemantam-bahoaka foibe ao Hong Kong. ||| Among the 1,200 Hong Kong Chief Executive Election Committee members, 689 elected Leung Chun-ying to be the next city mayor on March 25 under the influence and active lobbying of the Liasion Office of the Central People's Government in Hong Kong.
Rehefa navoaka ny valim-pifidianana, an'arivony ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana nanohitra ny fanodinkodinana ny fifidianana nataon'i Beijing teo ivelan'ny biraom-pifidianana vonjimaika. ||| When the election result was released, thousands of demonstrators protested against the Beijing manipulation of the election process outside the temporary election venue.
Ilay sarintsarina fitsapan-kevibahoaka ||| The mock civil referendum
Talohan'ilay fifidianana, teo anelanelan'ny 23-24 Martsa, maherin'ny 220.000 ireo olom-pirenena tao Hong Kong no nandray anjara taminà sarintsarim-" pitsapan-kevibahoaka" nokarakarain'ny Public Opinion Programme avy amin'ny Anjerimanontolon'i Hong Kong mba hanehoana ny tsy hafalian-dry zareo manoloana ilay fifidianana nataon'olom-bitsy sy hanamafisan-dry zareo ny zony hifidy izay ho ben'ny tanànany. ||| Before the election, between March 23-24, more than 220,000 Hong Kong citizens had participated in the mock "civil referendum" organized by the Public Opinion Programme of the Hong Kong University to express their discontent towards the small circle election and to assert their right to vote for the city mayor.
Na dia voatafik'ireo mpijirika aza ny rafitra fifidianana tety anaty aterineto, an'arivony ireo mpifidy manan-jo (mponina any an-toerana feno 18 taona no mihoatra) no nisisika hilahatra teo ivelan'ny biraom-pifidianana mba haneho ny safidin'izy ireo: ||| Despite the online voting system being attacked by hackers, thousands of legitimate voters (local residents aged over 18) insisted to queue outside polling stations to cast their ballots:
Biraom-pifidianana tao amin'ny Anjerimanontolo Poly ny 24 Marsta. ||| Polling station at Poly University on March 24.
Avy amin'ny pejy Facebook: Fitsapan-kevibahoaka ||| From Facebook Page: Civic Referendum
i Leung Chau Ming, mpampiasa Facebook, dia nilahatra teo ivelan'ny iray tamin'ireo biraom-pifidianana tamin'ny 23 Martsa; nosoritsoritany ny zava-nisy nampihetsi-po tamin'ny hetsiky ny pejy Facebook an'ny civic referendum: ||| Facebook user Leung Chau Ming was queued outside one of the polling stations on March 23; he described the touching scene on the Facebook page of the civic referendum event:
Tao anaty filaharana ao. ||| I was in the queue.
Nijanona nilahatra izahay na teo aza ny rivotra n ifafy. ||| We kept in order despite the gale.
(Nisy) zokiolona, olon-dehibe sy tanora. ||| (There were) old people, adults and young guys.
Renim-pianakaviana iray no sady mampinono ny zanany lahy no milahatra ihany koa. ||| A mother even fed her son while queuing.
Azoko tsara mihitsy fa na eo aza ireo tolona sy famoriam-bahoaka amin'ny 4 Jona (fiaraten-tory isan-taona miaraka aminà labozia), 1 Jolay, ary (amin'ity taona ity) 23 Martsa (famoriam-bahoaka hanoherana ny fijabahan'i Beijing amin'ny fifidianana), sns, dia tsy ho amin'izao andro iainantsika izao no hahitantsika ny vokatry ny demaokrasia, fa ho an'ireo taranatsika ho avy, ny taranaky ny taranatsika any aoriana,... N taranaka miala amin'ny ankehitriny! ||| I fully understand that despite all the struggles and rallies on June 4 (annual candle night vigil), July 1, and (this year) March 23 (rally against Beijing intervention on the election), etc, We probably will not see the fruit of democracy in our lifetime, but for our next generation, our next next generation,... N generations from now. We have responsibilities. It is also the obligation of every Hong Konger here and now!
Thomas Pang dia tao anatin'ilay laharana nisy an'i Leung ary izy dia nanazava ny antony nanapahany hevitra hilahatra tamin'ilay sarintsarim-pifidianana: ||| Thomas Pang was in the same queue with Leung and he explained why he decided to queue up for the mock election:
Azo nisaina hoe 222.990 teo ny olona nifidy tamin'ilay sarintsarim-pifidianana, ka ny 54.6% tamin'izany dia nanao vato fotsy. ||| Eventually, 222,990 people voted in the mock election, in which 54.6% cast blank votes.
i Leung Chun-ying tsy nahazo afa-tsy 17.8% tamin'ny vatom-pifidianana, tena mifanohitra lavitra tamin'ny vokatra azon'ilay fifidianan'olom-bitsy, izay natao tao amin'ny Foibe Fampirantiana sy Kaongresin'i Hong Kong. ||| Leung Chun-ying only got 17.8% of the votes, a huge contrast with the result of small circle election, which was held in the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Center.
Hetsi-panoherana teo ivelan'ny lapan'ny tanàna ny 25 Martsa ||| Protest outside the city hall on March 25
Ny 25 Martsa, maherin'ny 2.000 ny olona nanao hetsi-panoherana teo anoloan'ny biraom-pifidianana vonjimaika. ||| On March 25, more than 2,000 people protested outside the temporary election venue.
Tezitra tamin'ny fandresen"i Leung, novakian-dry zareo ny sakana nataon'ny polisy. ||| Outraged by Leung's victory, they pushed the police barricades.
Ireto ambany ireto ny sary sasany avy tao amin'ny inmediahk.net nalain'ireo olon-tsotra manao gazety tena amin'ny toerana nisian'ny hetsi-panoherana: ||| Below are some photos taken by citizen journalists from inmediahk.net on the protest scene:
Mapnao hetsi-panoherana mandrava ny sakana nataon'ny polisy ny 25 Martsa. ||| Protesters pushing the police barricades on March 25.
Mpanao hetsi-panoherana mitorevaka eo anoloan'ny efitrano fifidianana. ||| Protesters sitting outside the election hall.
Tsy mila fifidianan'olom-bitsy: ny Kisoa, ny Amboadia, ary ny Voromailala. ||| No to the small circle election: the Pig, the Wolf and the Dove.
Joshua Wong, tanora iray mafàna fo, nandinika tsara ilay hetsi-panoherana ary naneho ny hadisoam-panantenany noho ny tsy fahazotoan'ny olona hihetsika: ||| Joshua Wong, a young activist, reflected upon the demonstration and expressed his disappointment with people's unwillingness to take action:
Tadidiko ilay izaho nitorevaka teo amin'ny arabe ivelan'ny foibe iny, nisy olona nihoraka tampoka, 'CY Leung no nandresy! ||| I remembered when I was sitting on the road outside the center, someone suddenly shouted, 'CY Leung has won!
Nitsangana daholo ny olona ary nitrerona. ||| People stood up and howled.
Zendana izy ireo. ||| They felt surprised.
Izaho efa nahafantatra ny handreseny, saingy tsy niandry azy hivoaka handresy tamin'ny fihodinana voalohany tamin'ny vato 689. ||| I was prepared for his victory, but did not expect he could win in the first round with 689 votes.
Vaky fo aho nony nandeha nody, tsy hoe noho ny fandresena azon'i Leung, fa ny fahatsapana fanaovana tsinontsinona sy tsy firaharahiana: 'na ho iza na ho iza no ho Filoha Mpanatanteraka, tsy olana hoahy, raha mbola tsara antoka sy milamina (ny fiarahamonina) ', 'Ny fitroarana tsy am-piheverana dia hitarika mankany amin'ny korontana ara-politika sy fanimbàna ny sarin'i Hong Kong', 'Tsy misy ilàna azy akory ny hanaovana hetsi-panoherana', 'Tsy msy ny tena Demaokrasia na aiza na aiza eto an-tany'... ||| I was heartbroken when I was back home, not because of Leung's victory, but the feeling of cynicism and detachment: 'Whoever will be the Chief Executive is not my concern, as long as (the society is) safe and harmonious', 'Impulse will lead to political chaos and destroy Hong Kong's image, 'Useless even after protest', 'No real democracy in every part of the world'...
Tena tiako ny hiteny aminareo rehetra fa, ny fandresen'i Leung dia tsy misy tokony hatahorana ; ny tena mahatahotra dia ny tsy firaharahian'ny olona manoloana ny loza mitatao amin'ny hery politika tsy refesi-mandidy. ||| I really want to tell you all that, Leung's victory is not fearful; the fear is people's lack of concern on the threat of the future iron hand politics.
Na dia mitombo foana aza n y teritery atao amin'ny fahalalahana miteny sy ny fahafahana manao fivoriana, mbola matoky hatrany ny herim-bahoaka aho. ||| Even if the repression of freedom of demonstration and assembly increases, I still believe in the power of people.
Indrindra indrindra, hitohy handrisika ny mpianatra sy ireo namana aho mba hanatevin-daharana ny hetsika sosialy, indrindra fa mba hahay hanararaotra ny famoriam-bahoaka hatao ny 1 Jolay ho avy izao. ||| In particular, I would continue to encourage students and friends to join social action, in particular to grasp the opportunity of the upcoming July 1 rally.
Mba ho hitan'ny fitondràna Kaominista Shinoa ny dian-tongotsika milaza amin'izy ireo fa tsy ilaintsika ny hanana an'i Leung Chun-ying ho Lehiben'ny Mpanatanteraka, izay "voafidin'"ny vondron'olom-bitsy ary tsy nahazo afa-tsy 18%-n'ny fanohanan'ny vahoaka. ||| Let our footstep tell the Chinese Communist regime that we don't want to have Leung Chun-ying who is "elected" by a small circle and with less than 18% public endorsement, to be our Chief Executive.
Fihetsiketsehana iray hafa manohitra ny fitsabahan'i Beijing amin'ny politika anatiny no natao ny fa ||| Another demonstration against Beijing intervention into local politics will be held the coming weekend on April 1.
Sina: Iza No Nahalala Fa Nankahala An'i Gaddafi Ny Libiana? ||| China: Who Could Have Known The Libyans Hate Gaddafi?
Zhang Zhaozhong dia toy ny Thomas Friedman Sinoa: Profesora fanta-daza iray miaraka amin'ny PLA National Defense University, Contre-Amiral ao amin'ny tafika an-dranomasina PLA ary mpanao tatitra momban'ny raharaha ara-miaramila ho an'ny CCTV sy ny haino aman-jery hafa, manana mpankafy marobe ary malaza amin'ny fandaminana ny fifanolanana eo anivon'ny miaramila izay iadidiany mialoha ny tsy hitrangan'ny voka-dratsiny. ||| Zhang Zhaozhong is like a Chinese Thomas Friedman: he's a celebrity professor with the PLA National Defense University, rear admiral in the PLA navy and a frequent commentator on military affairs for CCTV and other media, with many admiring fans and a reputation for adjusting his military conflict outcome predictions after the opposite turns out to be the case.
Rehefa nanani-bohitra tany Iraka ny Amerikana tamin'ny fiandohan'ny taona 2003, dia nanao fanambarana miezinezina tamin'ny alalan'ny haino aman-jery i Zhang fa ho voatàna ao anaty ady mitarazoka ny tafik'ireo mpanani-bohitra ireo mandritry ny taona maro. ||| When the United States invaded Iraq in early 2003, Zhang took to the media circuit with the confident assertion that the invading forces would remain locked in a battle of attrition for years.
Tao anaty fanadihadiana iray tao amin'ny CCTV, dia niteny i Zhang fa nanana ny fianakavian'i Hussein ny vahoaka Irakiana hanohana azy tao an-damosiny, ary ny tafiky ny firenena dia tena ampy fitaovana tsara mba hanoherana ireo firenena efatra izay nandray anjara tamin'izany fidirana an-keriny izany; rava i Baghdad ny andro manaraka ary nirehitra teny an-dàlana daholo ireo sarin'i Saddam Hussein. ||| In one interview with CCTV, Zhang said that the people of Iraq had the Hussein family's back, and the country's army was well-equipped to fend off the four countries which took part in the initial invasion phase; Baghdad fell the following day and pictures of Saddam Hussein were burnt in the streets.
Miaraka amin'ny fikomiana misy tao Libya, dia nisy atao hoe "sakaizan'ny vahoaka Sinoa" iray, izay mbola tena mibahan-toerana ao amin'ny fampahalalàm-baovao Sinoa (rohin-dresaka iray ao amin'ny BBS manaraka akaiky ny toe-draharaham-pirenena dia nahangona tsikera miisa 5,000 pejy mahery hatramin'ny nitsanganany ny volana May lasa teo) i Zhang, ihany koa, dia lasa niverina hita indray tamin'ity volana ity taorian'ny fanadihadiana natao taminy ny fiantombohan'ny volana Aogositra, izay mbola tao amin'ny CCTV ihany. ||| With the uprising in Libya, a certified "old friend of the Chinese people", still a major focus in Chinese news (one BBS thread tracking the situation in the country has gathered well over 5,000 pages of comments since it was set up in late May) Zhang, too, was back in the spotlight this month after an interview in early August, again with CCTV.
Tamin'ity dia manontany tena ireo mpampiasa aterineto hoe nahoana ny olona ambony toerana toy itony no mety hanao hadisoana goavana. ||| This time, netizens are wondering how someone so high-ranking could be so wrong.
Ny valiny: manao ny asany fotsiny izy. ||| The answer: he's just doing his job.
Efa nifikitra teo i Gaddafi nandritry ny dimy volana, ka tsy mino aho hoe hiteraka olana ho azy ny hijanona eo hatramin'ny taona manaraka. ||| Gaddafi has already held on for five months, I don't think it'll be a problem for him to stay through to this time next year.
Na, toa an'i Xin Haiguang, mpamoaka lahatsoratra aminà haino aman-jery samihafa, nandefa azy ity tao amin'ny Weibo: ||| Or as Xin Haiguang, a columnist for different media, put it on Weibo:
Ilay miaramila mpanao kajikajy fanta-daza ary contre-amiral, Zhang Zhaozhong, dia mbola miresaka ao amin'ny fahitalavitra, kanefa i Gaddafi efa niongana - toa niverena indray ny nandritran'ny ady tany Iraka...tsy dia tena zavatra manahirana loatra raha misy olona diso tombatombana, kanefa kosa i Zhang dia miavaka. ||| Well-known military theorist and rear admiral, Zhang Zhaozhong, is still talking on TV, but Gaddafi has already fallen—exactly how it went back during the war in Iraq...it's not a big deal when someone makes a faulty prediction, but Zhang is different.
Marina fa tsy maro ny miaramila Sinoa manam-pahaizana fakàn-kevitra mitovy fahaiza-manao aminy, kanefa raha amin'ny haavo lentan'ny fahaiza-manaon'i Zhang, raha toa izy ka tokony hanana toerana goavana ara-politika, dia tsy ho azo atao tsinontsinona ny fiantraikay ratsy ho an'ny firenena. ||| Surely there aren't many military think tanks in China at the same level as his, but with Zhang's level of competency, if he were to have influence over high-level policy, the damage to the country wouldn't just be negligible.
Natao hampisavorovoro ny fahavalo fotsiny ny fisiany, ary hita fa nahomby tokoa izy tamin'izany. ||| He only exists to confuse the enemy, and apparently he's quite successful at it.
Hah, tadidiko tamin'ny 2003 rehefa niteny izy fa tsy olana raha nahazo an'i Baghdad ny Amerikana, fa afaka ny hanohitra tsara ny ady eny an-dàlam-be ny miaramila Irakiana, mandritra ny fotoana maharitraritra. ||| Hah, I remember in 2003 when he said it wasn't a problem that the Americans had captured Baghdad, that the Iraqi soldiers would be able to persist in street warfare for quite some time.
Iza no nahalala fa hirodana ny ampitso ihany ny governemanta ary hataon'ny vahoaka ho toy ny tsinontsinona ny fananan'ny governemanta. ||| Who knew that the government would collapse the following day and that the people would make off with all that government property.
Afaka mihaino izay lazain'ity bandy ity ianao, kanefa tsy afaka ny hiteny aho raha toa ka tsy mahavita azy lery na raha toa ihany koa izy ka manara-drenirano fotsiny. ||| You can listen to what this guy has to say, but I can't tell if he just doesn't get it or if he's toeing the harmonious line.
Ny mpanolo-tsaina politikan'ny Antoko dia tsy manana alàlana hiseho amin'ny fahitalavitra. ||| Party policy advisors aren't allowed to go on TV.
Izay henonao sy izay famakafakana omeny an'ireo mpiandraikitra politika, dia zavatra tsy mitovy mihitsy. ||| What you hear and the analysis he gives to policy-makers, aren't the same thing.
Toy ny endrika miaramilan'i Wang Yongping izy: tsy vendrana izy akory, fa mody vendrana fotsiny mba hivelomana. ||| He's like the military version of Wang Yongping: he's not stupid, he just acts stupid for a living.
Okay, noho izany ity amiraly zokiny ity dia niseho an-taonany maro tamin'ny fahitalavitra mandrak'ankehitriny, misy te-hamantatra ve hoe mandra-pahoviana no hahavitàny mifikitra eo? ||| Okay, so the old admiral has been appearing on TV for years now, anyone want to guess how much longer he'll be able to hold on?
Tsy mino aho hoe ho olana ho an'ny contre-amiral Zhang ny fijanonany eo hatramin'ny taona manaraka. ||| I don't think it'll be a problem for rear admiral Zhang to stay through to this time next year.
Kely dia kely ny fiheverana fa ho tafatsofoka ny renivohitra mialohan' ny fahataperan'ny Ramadany ireo Libyana mpihoko, ary tsy fantatrao mihitsy, fa i Gaddafi dia mety hahavita handavo an'i Sarkozy sy Obama. ||| There's an extremely low chance that Libyan rebels will enter the capital before the end of Ramadan, and you never know, Gaddafi might just end up outliving both Sarkozy and Obama.
Namerina niantso an'i Zhang indray ny CCTV taty aoriana mba hahazoana ny valinteniny momba ny tsikera miely be momba ilay fahadisoam-pijeriny mahakasika ny toe-draharaha ao Libya, ka izao no ampahany avy amin'izay nolazainy: ||| CCTV later called Zhang back to get his response to the widespread criticism of his misdiagnosis of the situation in Libya, to which in part he said:
Ny zavatra fantatro rehetra dia manambara amiko fa ny antony nahatonga ny tombana nataoko ho tsy nandeha tamin'ny laoniny dia: nofitahin'ny vahoaka Libyana aho. ||| Everything I know tells me that the reason my prediction went awry is: I was lied to by the Libyan people.
Ankehitriny raha itodihana ny lasa, dia hita fa resin'ny vahoaka Libyana aho - raha atao amin'ny fiteny hafa dia hita fa artista mpilalao an-tsehatra mihitsy ny vahoaka Libyana. ||| Looking back now, I was defeated by the Libyan people—simply put, the Libyan people are all just performance artists.
Ny ao am-pon'izy ireo, dia mankahala tanteraka an'i Gaddafi ary maniry mafy ny hahafaty azy, kanefa ihany koa dia nandroso teo anoloan'ny camera izy ireo, tampoka teo anefa, dia izy ireo indray no lasa mpanohana azy mahafatra-po. ||| In their hearts, they hate Gaddafi and hope to see him die, but the second they step in front of a camera, suddenly they're his diehard supporters.
Tsy afaka ny hifaninana aminà hetsika toy izany aho, ka tonga lesona ho ahy izany. ||| I can't compete with acting like that, this has been a lesson for me.
Tsy nahita mpihaino tsara fandray ny tao amin'ny Weibo i Zhang, saika tsikera naneso azy avokoa no hita tao: ||| Zhang has not found a receptive audience on Weibo, where comments are nearly unanimous in mocking him:
Tsy mahazo ny fo sy ny sain'ny vahoaka ny mpanao didy jadona, fa seho an-tsehatra fotsiny izany rehetra izany. ||| Dictators don't win the hearts and minds of people, all there is is just acting.
Raha nandeha tany Korea Avaratra izy, dia ho norabirabian'ny vahoaka Koreana Tavaratra ihany koa ve? ||| If he were to go to North Korea, would he be fooled by the North Korean people, too?
Indray mandeha aho nahita lahatsary tanaty aterineto ahitàna ny vahoaka Koreana Tavaratra niresaka momba ny Jeneraly Lehibe Kim, ary dia latsa-dranomaso mihitsy izy ireo! ||| I once saw a video online of North Korean people talking about the Great General Kim, and they were truly moved to tears!
Ankehitriny aho dia manontany tena hoe mety hanao ahoana ny ho filalaon'ny vahoaka Sinoa. ||| Well now I just wonder how well the Chinese people are at acting.
Soso-kevitra ny ahy ny mba hanolorana ny namana Zhang Zhaozhong ny anaran'ny Actor of the People na "ny Mpilalao an-tsehatra lanim-Bahoaka!" ||| I recommend that comrade Zhang Zhaozhong be awarded the title of Actor of the People!
Hah, mba tiany ho hita ve hoe manao ahoana tsara ny fahafahan'ny vahoaka Sinoa milalao an-tsehatra? ||| Hah, does he want to see how well the Chinese people can act?
Omeo Oscar io bandy io! ||| Give this guy an Oscar!
Raha ny momban'ny fahaiza-milalaon'ny vahoaka Libyana no jerena, dia hita fa tsy mionona fotsiny amin'ny fampisehoana izy ireo rehefa eo imasonao. ||| Regarding the acting ability of the Libyan people, they don't just perform when they're in front of you.
Hitanay ihany koa izany. ||| We see it too.
Nahoana izay hitan'ny tsirairay mazava tsara no toa sarotra ho an'ireo jeneraly ao amin'ny tafika kosa ny manakatra azy? ||| Why is it that what everyone can see so clearly is only difficult to grasp for generals in the military?
Satria ve noho izy ireo mijolotra fanamiana? ||| Just because they're wearing a uniform?
Itodian'ny nataony koa indraindray ireo jeneraly ao amin'ny tafika! ||| Army generals sometimes fall flat on their faces, too!
Kanefa mety tsy hiresaka momba ny tsy fahombiazany ny Contre-Amiral Zhang, satria izy ihany koa no endrika isehoan'ny toerana ofisialy raisin'ireo manampahefana sy ny tafika Sinoa. ||| Although, Rear Admiral Zhang might not want to talk about his failures, because he does after represent the official stance of Chinese officials and the military.
Ka na ahoana na ahoana dia tsy ho avelan'izy ireo hiteny izay tiany ho lazaina amin'ny fahitalavitra izy, sa tsy izany? ||| There's no way they'd let him go say whatever he likes on TV, is there?
Toy izany ny toetran'ireo antsoina hoe manam-pahaizana amin'izao fotoana ao Sina, tsy misy na dia teny iray milaza fahamarinana mivoaka ny vavany. ||| Such is the state of China's so-called experts nowadays, not a word of truth comes out of their mouths.

Vendrana Ity manam-pahaizana ity. ||| This expert is an idiot.
Mety ho i Sina angamba no tiany ho lazaina raha ny marina? ||| Maybe he was actually alluding to China?

Fotoana izao tokony hanatsaharana ny fisaintsainana foana ny zavatra amin'ny zoro mifanohitra, na inona na inona ny fieritreretan'ny Tandrefana. ||| It's time to stop thinking about things from the view opposite whatever it is people in the West think.
Mendrika ireo mpanao didy jadona izay mahazo azy. ||| Dictators deserve what they get.
Izay mety ho fitserana asehonay amin'ny mpanao didy jadona dia fanaovana tsindry hazolena ny fiainam-bahoaka efa potika. ||| Any sympathy we show a dictator is just harm done on the people being oppressed.

Toy izany ny vahoaka rehefa eo ambany ny fahefan'ny mpanao didy jadona. ||| This is just how people are under any dictator.

Toy ny fony teo ambanin'i Stalin sy teo ambanin'i Mao nandritry ny Revolisiona Ara-Kolotsaina. ||| It was like that under Stalin and under Mao during the Cultural Revolution.
Tahaka izany ny tao Korea Avaratra-paty, toy ireny hoe mbola teo ambanin'i Saddam ireny, eny fa na dia ankehitriny aza eo ambanin'i Hu.... ||| It's like that in fucking North Korea, just as it was under Saddam, even now under Hu.......

Efa nametra-pialana ve izy? ||| Has he resigned yet?
Eny anivon'ny resadresaka amin'izao fotoana ao amin'ny aterineto momba izay mety hanjo an'i Gaddafi ilay naman'i Sina sy ny ho avin'ny fifandraisan'ny firenena amin'i Libya, dia hita fa maro ireo nifantoka kokoa amin'ny mety ho vokatry ny ataon'ny mpitarika ny mpanohitra ao Libya, izay niteny tamin'ny herinandro fa ireo firenena izay mankatoa - izay tsy mbola anisan'izany aloha i Sina - ny fanjakana ao aminy dia hahazo fifanaraham-pitrandrahana solika ho valisoa ary tetikasa hafa mahakasika ny fanarenana ny firenena, na dia hanilihana an'i Sina aza izany. ||| Amid all the discussion now underway online of the plight of China's dear old friend Gaddafi and the country's future relationship with Libya, a lot has focused on the fact that opposition leaders in Libya were quite vocal this past week in saying that nations which recognize - yet in China's case, oppose - their authority will be rewarded with contracts for oil production and other projects involved in rebuilding the country, even singling China out.
I Sina angamba no lasa mpandresy lehibe tao Irak taorian'i Saddam, kanefa hatreto aloha ny hany nataony dia toa nanome fanampiana iray noho ny maha-olombelona fotsiny ho an'ireo firenena mandray mpitsoa-ponenana Libyana. ||| China may have been a big winner in post-Saddam Iraq, but so far all it seems to have done is send one humanitarian aid package to countries now taking in Libyan refugees.
Ao amin'ny bilaogin'ny Phoenix News, Kai Shengli, mpampianatra ny fifandraisana iraisam-pirenena sy lalàna, dia nanoratra tamin'ny herinandro lasa fa i Sina ankehitriny dia efa mahatsapa ny tenany fa mihitsoka eo anelanelanà vato misakana lehibe sy ny fanohanany ireo ankolafy tsy nahomby: ||| At the Phoenix News blog portal, international relations and legal scholar and college instructor Kai Shengli wrote last week that China now finds itself stuck between a rock and its support for the losing side:
Ny lesona farany (azo notsoahina tamin'ny ady tao Libya) dia misy ifandraisany amin'i Sina. ||| The final lesson (from the war in Libya) relates to China.
Raha jerena ny fepetran'ny fifaninanana teo amin'ireo tena matanjaka, dia hita fa i Sina no maty antoka indrindra tamin'izy rehetra ireo. ||| Looking this from the perspective of competition between the major powers, China is the only loser among them.
Ny OTAN, izay notarihan'ny Frantsa, Amerika ary ny Britanika, dia nitondra ny fanafihana ny fitondran'i Gaddafi tamin'izany, ary vao haingana i Rosia no namadika palitao, ka nangataka ny fametraham-pialan'i Gaddafi sy nanaiky ny fampiharana sazy amin'io firenena io. ||| NATO, led by France, the United States and Britain, has been carrying out attacks on Gaddafi's regime all throughout this, and Russia changed its stance quite early on, calling for Gaddafi to step down and for sanctions against the country.
I Sina irery no hany firenena matanjaka izay tsy mbola tena niteny fa hoe mijoro eo anilan'ireo mpandresy tao Libya. ||| China is the only major power which hasn't yet said definitively that it stands on the side of the winners in Libya.
Raha ny antony mahatonga izany, ny fanazavana tokana dia ny hadisoana teo amin'ny tetikady stratejikany. ||| As for why that is, one possible explanation is a lapse in strategic judgment.
Ny zavatra iray mampatahotra azy dia ny mety hisian'ny vokany ratsy ao anatiny raha voaporofo tokoa fa nandray anjara tamin'ny fanohanana ny dingana ara-demokratika izy. ||| Another is that it worries what the domestic consequences might be if it were seen to be in support of a democratic process.
Tsy hojerenetsika loatra izay antony any, kanefa na izany aza, dia nandresy tamin'ny adiny ny antoko mpanohitra tao Libya, dia hitan'izy ireo izao fa misy sandany tokony haloa amin'izany. ||| Regardless of the reason, however, now that the opposition in Libya are winning the fight, they see that a there's a price that needs to be paid.
Tsy tonga dia haka fepetra avy hatrany ny amin'i Sina ny fitondrana vaovao ao Libya, noho ny fahafantarany fa mbola mila ny fanampian'i Sina izy amin'ny fanarenana ara-toekarena ny firenena. ||| The new regime in Libya won't take any direct action against far-off China as a result, particularly when it considers that it might still need China's help in economic rebuilding of the country.
Raha amin'ny sehatra ara-politika kosa anefa, dia azo heverina fa amin'ny fomba tsy mitovy mihitsy no hitondran'ity fitondrana vaovao ity ny firenena matanjaka isan'isany, ary hijaly i Sina noho ny nandraisany fepetra sy fanapahan-kevitra diso. ||| Politically, however, the new regime will unquestionably treat each major power differently, and China will have to suffer as a result of its strategic moves and erroneous decisions.
Izany no fampianarana fototra izay tokony horaisin'ireoe diplaomaty Sinoa avy amin'io. ||| This is the key lesson which Chinese diplomats ought to learn from this.
Tsy dia ohatra maningana loatra akory i Libya; nisy an'i Sodana ihany koa teo alohany ary mety mbola hisy firenen-kafa ihany koa amin'ny ho avy. ||| Libya also is not an isolated example; there was Sudan before this and there could well be other countries in the future.
Ny fanamby goavana atrehan'ny diplaomasia Sinoa fia ny fomba hialàny amin'ny foto-kevitra ara-politika anatiny izay efa lalim-pàka sy hametrahany paik'ady mitsinjo lavitra kokoa sy mitombina tsara, ary eo ihany koa ny fahaizana mamantatra mialoha ny tranga mety hiseho. ||| How it can free itself from the bindings of domestic political ideology and demonstrate a broader and more forward-looking strategy as well as preemptive capability is the major challenge for the future of Chinese diplomacy.
Fomba sy fanao isaky ny taombaovao manerantany an-dahatsary ||| Video: Year End Traditions and Rituals
Samy manana ny fomba(n-drazana) ankalazany ny fahatongavan'ny taona vaovao ny mponina manerantany. ||| Around the world, people celebrate the arrival of the New Year with certain traditions.
Amin'ity alina ity, amin'ny alalan'ny lahatsary no itondranay anareo hitsidika ny karazam-pombafomba arahin'ny olona hahatsara ny anjarany, hahazoan-karena na antsipirian-javatra hafa tiany ho azo amin'ny taona ho avy. ||| Tonight, through video we bring you some of the traditions and rituals people follow to improve their luck, fortune or other details in their life for the coming year.
Any Meksika, misy ny sasany izay mandrehitra labozia, emboka ary "mandro" miaraka amina raokandro hahatsara ny vintana sy harena amin'io taona mitsidika io. Amin'ity lahatsary manaraka ity no iresahan'ny mpivarotra ny kojakojam-panaka fanao isaky ny Taombaovao tahaka ny fangaron-dravina 7, ny fehezana Vintana tsara amin'ny Taombaovao miaraka amin'ny labozia, emboka manitra, vavaka sy rano voahasina ary nomarihin'izy ireo fa nidina ny varotra tamin'ity taona ity. ||| In Mexico, some people light candles, incense and take herbal "baths" to bring good luck and good fortune for the coming year.In the following video, merchants tell about the best selling New Year's items such as the 7 herb mix, the New Year Good Luck pack with candle, incense, prayer and holy water and then mention how sales have been slow this year.
Angamba handrehitra labozia ry zareo hahatongavan'ny vintana tsara rahalina. ||| Maybe they'll be lighting some candles for good luck tonight.
Matetika no ara-pomban-drazana ny sakafo natokana ho amin'itony fotoana itony: Niainga tany Sandusky Ohio, misy ireo olona no manao ny fomba pretzel fanaon'ny Alemana ho enti-miatrika ny taombaovao. ||| Special meals are often traditional: originating in Sandusky Ohio, some people will be partaking in the German New Year's Eve pretzel tradition.
Ity manaraka ity ny fikarakarana azy aseho an-dahatsary: ||| Following, the video recipe:

Ao amin'ity lahatsary ity no ahafahanao mijery ny fianakaviana vory manodidina ny latabatra, miaraka amin'ny voaloboka 12 efa voalahatry ny farango sy ny fitadiavan'izy ireo ny teknika tsara indrindra entina mitelina voaloboka isan-tsegondra: ||| In this video you'll be able to see a family gathered around the table, with the 12 grapes set on skewers as they try to discover the best technique for accomplishing the task of eating one grape per second:

Nitsena hetsika goavana avy amin'ny mponina iharany sy avy amin'ny fikambanana isan-karazany ny drafitry ny tranombarotra SM City Baguio ao avaratr'i Filipina hanongotra hazo an-jatony ka hanoloana azy ho tobim-piara sy toeram-pialamboly. ||| The plan of SM City Baguio shopping mall in north Philippines to remove more than 100 trees to make way for a new parking lot and entertainment site has been greeted by massive protests from concerned citizens and various cause-oriented groups.
Mpandraharaha manankarena indrindra any Filipina no tompon'ny SM. ||| SM is owned by the Philippines' richest businessman.
An'arivony no nanao diabe nanavatsava ny lalan'i Baguio tamin'ny 20 janoary lasa teo hiaro ny alaala ary miantso ny olona hanao fahirano ny SM City Baguio. ||| Thousands marched through the streets of Baguio City last January 20, to defend the trees and call on the public to boycott SM City Baguio.
Ny tenifototra "ProtectBaguiotrees" tompon'ny fironana Twitter tao amin'ny firenena tao amin'io andro io. ||| The hashtag "ProtectBaguiotrees" became the top Twitter trend in the country that day.
Nanomboka ny eritreritra sendra nandalo momba ity raharaha ity tamin'ny alalan'ny fiverenan-kiran'i Joni Mitchel nanao hoe "Natao rarivato ny paradisa hanorenana tobim-piara" ao amin'ny bolongana Take Me to the Riot: ||| Take Me to the Riot makes the Joni Mitchel song refrain "They paved paradise to put up a parking lot" the starting point of her musings on the issue:
Mampihomehy ihany fa ny tantara manontolon'ity tendrombohitra ity dia momba ny fanongotana sy famindran-toerana ranofotsiny. ||| Funnily, it feels like the entire history of that mountain is all about uprooting and displacement.
Nongotana avy tao afovoan-tanàna ary nafindra toerana any an-kafa ny foko – tahaka ny Kankanaey, Igorots, ary ny Ifugao -. ||| Tribes – like the Kankanaey, Igorots, and Ifugao - were uprooted from the heart of the city and were displaced to other places.
Ny sasany nafindra toerana tany. ||| Some had to move to other areas in Benguet.
Efa ela nitoerana noho i SM Baguio, 7-11 na ny McDonald eo amin'ny lalana ireo olona sy ireo hazo ireo. ||| These people, like those trees, have been around older than any SM Baguio, 7-11 or McDonald's in Session rd.
Saingy noho ny fanandratana ny varotra, fananganana tobim-piara izy eto, matanjaka kokoa matetika ka afa-manongotra sy mamindra izay nitonetra teo elaela kokoa sady mety mahafantatra hatramin'ny miafina ao aminy. ||| But commercialism, in this case parking lots, are always stronger–enough to uproot and displace those who have known the land longer and maybe even more intimately.
Hetsi-panoherana teo anoloan'ny SM Baguio. ||| Protest in front of SM Baguio.
Saripika ||| Photo from @KrissyAngela
A Mommy Who Tries Living Life to the Fullest! naka aingam-panahy avy amin'ny sarimiaina 3D (toratelo) mpiaro ny tontolo iainana Wall-E, nanasongadina ny tsy fisian'ny fahasamihafana eo amin'ny manongotra sy mamindra toerana ny hazo sy ny manapaka azy. ||| A Mommy Who Tries Living Life to the Fullest!, inspired by the pro-environment Wall-E 3D animation, points out the lack of significant difference between uprooting and transferring the trees and cutting them down.
Tsara ireny fampanantenana ireny rehefa tsy mahalala izay nanjò ireo hazo teo aloha nambolena indray. ||| These promises are good if you don't know what happened to the past trees that were being earth balled.
Ny Dr. Michael Bengwayan (tale mpanatanteraky ny Ivotoerana mpiaro ny tontolo iainana Cordillera -PINE TREE) no niteny fa, tamin'ny hazo kesika 497 nambolen'ny tobin'ny orinasa John Hay Development Corp. tamin'ny 1994, dia latsaky ny 20% sisa velona ary ireo sisa velona ireo dia tena efa mihasimba tanteraka. ||| Dr. Michael Bengwayan (executive director of Cordillera Ecological Center-PINE TREE) said that, for the 497 pine trees that were being earth-balled by Camp John Hay Development Corp. last 1994, only less than 20% survived and those not dead were showing signs of deteriorating.
Noho izany dia tokony hanantena isika fa amin'ny hazo kesika 187 nongotana dia eo ho eo amin'ny 30 ihany no ho velona. ||| So, we should expect that out of the 187 Pine Trees that will be uprooted, more or less only 30 trees will survive.
Mihiaka amin'ny tsy fisian'ny fanontaniana ny heviny ny mponina Baguio ary ny famoahana ny fahazoana alalana azon'ny tranombarotra hanongotra ny hazo. ||| Baguio City residents decry the lack of public consultations and are questioning the issuance of permit to the mall for the removal of the trees.
Nandona ny firaisana tsikombakomba eo amin'ny fitondrana sy ny fandraharahana vaventy ny Mpianatra (anjerimanontolo): ||| Student writers hit the government's connivance with big business:
Ny tena ratsy dia manaiky ity fanapahan-kevitra mandeha ila ity ny fitondrana ankehitriny ary tsy mety hiaro ny tombontsoan'ny besinimaro. ||| Worse, even the current administration sanctions this one-sided step and seems to refuse in protecting the interests of the larger population.
Tsy nampiseho fandavana ny drafitra ny filoha Aquino sy ny mpitondra ny tanàna ary namoaka ny taratasy fahazoana alalana ny departemantan'ny tontolo iainana sy ny harena voajanahary amin'ny fanorenana. ||| President Aquino along with city officials themselves shows no disapproval of this plan and the DENR issued the permit for the implementation.
Stretching the Symbolic mandritra izany fotoana izany fa ity tolona ity dia mifanandrina amin'ny"rafitra kapitalista manerantany": ||| Stretching the Symbolic meanwhile concludes that the cause is ultimately against the "world capitalist system":
Tsy hoe ady ho fiarovana ny hazo fotsiny ihany, na ho fanoherana ny orinasa SM sy ny rantsa-mangaikany; ady ho amin'ny vahoakantsika, ho an'i Baguio sy ny firenena, manohitra ilay rafitra midadasika izay iray amin'ny zava-dratsy tsy tambo isaina vitany ny fanapahana hazo. ||| This is not just a battle for the trees, or against SM corporations and their corporate greed; this is a battle for our people, of Baguio and the country, against the large system where tree-cutting projects like this are just one of the numerous evil manifestations.
Ady amin'ny rafitra manome vahana ny olombitsy sady mamely ny maro izy ity. ||| This is fight against a system where things are done for the benefit of a few and at the expense of the many.
Espana: Olona an-jatony Manao Fihetsiketsehana Manohitra Ny Fitondràna Siriana ||| Spain: Hundreds Protest Against the Syrian Regime
Ity lahatsoratra ity dia ampahany amin'ny tatitray manokana momba ny Hetsi-panoherana ao Syria 2011. ||| This post is part of our special coverage Syria Protests 2011.
Anjatony maro ireo olona nanao fihetsiketsehana tao Madrid ny Alahady teo ho fanehoana fanohanana ny vahoaka Siriana. ||| Hundreds of people in Madrid, Spain demonstrated in support of the Syrian people last Sunday.
Nanofà fiara vaventy fitateram-bahoaka mihitsy mba hitondràna ireo olona avy any amin'ny tanàna Espaniola hafa, toa an'i Valencia sy Granada. ||| Buses were hired to bring people from other Spanish cities such as Valencia and Granada.
Nangatahan-dry zareo ny hampodiana ny masoivoho Siriana ao Espana, ny ny hamaizan'ny governemanta Espaniola ny governemanta Siriana, tompon'antoky ny fanampenam-bava lehibe indrindra mahazo ireo mafàna fo Siriana nandritra ny taompolo maro. ||| They demanded the expulsion of the Syrian ambassador in Spain, and that the Spanish government sanction the Syrian government, amidst the biggest crackdown against Syrian activists in decades.
Nanomboka tao amin'ny kianja Puerta del Sol ao Madrid ny fihetsiketsehana, taoriana kely, nony maraina, dia nihisaka nankany amin'ny Ministera Espaniola momba ny Raharaham-bahiny, ary nifàrana tao amin'ny masoivoho Siriana. ||| The demonstration started at Madrid's main square Puerta del Sol, then moved later in the morning towards the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and ended at the Syrian embassy.
Hetsi-panoherana tao Madrid, Espana, ho fanohanana ny vahoaka Siriana. ||| Protest in Madrid, Spain, in support of the Syrian people.
Sary avy amin'i sy nampindramin'i Sara Díaz Gómez. ||| Photo by and courtesy of Sara Díaz Gómez.
Ireo mpanao fihetsiketsehana dia niventy ny teny faneva amin'ny teny Espaniola, miaraka aminà hafatra toy ny hoe "Mivoa-drà i Sirya ary mitazam-potsiny izao tontolo izao", "Aiza ianareo, Trinidad (Ministeran'ny Raharaham-bahivy) mandritra ny famonoana tsy misy indrafo ny Siriana?" ||| Demonstrators chanted in Spanish, with messages such as "Siria is bleeding and the world is watching", "Where are you, Trinidad (Minister of Foreign Affairs) when Syrians are killed without mercy"?
ary koa amin'ny teny Arabo, avy amin'ireo vondron'olona Siriana: "Tian'ny vahoaka hoesorina ny fitondrana" sy ny "Tokana ary tokana monja. ||| and also in Arabic, by members of the Syrian community: "The people want to overthrow the regime" and "One and only one.
Tokana ny vahoaka Siriana". ||| The Syrian people is one".
Nahasarika ny fifantohan-tsain'ireo mpampahalala vaovao maro ilay hetsika ary tena nifampizaràna be tokoa tao amin'ny aterineto. ||| The demonstration received much media attention and was widely shared online.
Democracia Real Ya, ilay vondrona izay nikarakara ilay hetsika goavana tamin'ny 15 May, izay niofo taty aoriana ho filasiana nanerana ny firenena, dia nizara vaovao tao amin'ny pejiny ao amin'ny Facebook. ||| Democracia Real Ya, the group that organized the big demonstration on May 15, which later transformed into camps out all over the country, shared information on its Facebook page.
Nahazo fanamarihana sy fanehoan-kevitra an'arivony ilay lahatsoratra. ||| The post has more than a thousand comments and reactions.
Hetsi-panoherana tao Madrid, Espana, ho fanohanana ny vahoaka Siriana. ||| Protest in Madrid, Spain, in support of the Syrian people.
Sary avy amin'i sy nampindramin'i Sara Díaz Gómez. ||| Photo by and courtesy of Sara Díaz Gómez.
Hetsi-panoherana tao Madrid, Espana, ho fanohanana ny vahoaka Siriana. ||| Protest in Madrid, Spain, in support of the Syrian people.
Sary avy amin'i sy nampindramin'i Sara Díaz Gómez. ||| Photo by and courtesy of Sara Díaz Gómez.
Hetsi-panoherana tao Madrid, Espana, ho fanohanana ny vahoaka Siriana. ||| Protest in Madrid, Spain, in support of the Syrian people.
Sary avy amin'i sy nampindramin'i Sara Díaz Gómez. ||| Photo by and courtesy of Sara Díaz Gómez.
Ny tabataba noforonina tao amin'ny Twitter dia tena nifandray betsaka tamin'ny tenifototra "spainwithsyria", izay lohahevitra noresahana betsaka tao Madrid, Barelona, ary Espana tamin'ny ankapobeny, tamin'ny fotoana samihafa teo anelanelan'ny 25 sy 26 Jona: ||| The buzz created on Twitter was mainly associated to the "spainwithsyria" tag, which was a trending topic in Madrid, in Barelona, and in Spain as a whole at different moments between June 25 and 26:
TrendsMadrid: 'champioooooonsssss', 'venezuela' sy "spainwithsyria" ankehitriny no lohahevitra ao Madrid ||| TrendsMadrid: 'champioooooonsssss', 'venezuela' and "spainwithsyria" are now a trend in Madrid
