Malezia:Mpanavao ny tsenam-barotra ve ny Praiministra? ||| Malaysia: Is The New PM a Market Reformer?
Tokony hiandràndra fiovàna ara-politika tampoka amin'ny fitondràna malezianina ve isika? ||| Are we expecting a gradual political revolution with new leadership in Malaysia?
Tsy hoe mandray fotsiny ireo haitaom-bahoaka amin'ny aterineto mba handrisihana ny fandraisan'anjaran'ny olom-pirenena i Najib Razak, mijery ny toerana izay mbola tsy nalehan'ireo nialoha làlana azy koa izy mba hametraka rafitra fanalalahàna araham-pantina, anatin'ny sehatra fitantanam-bola sy ny tolotr'asa tato ho ato. ||| Najib does not only embrace social media technology to improve citizen engagement, he ventures a step further where none of his predecessors had attempted before to introduce selective liberalization on financial and service sectors recently.
Tonga hatrany amin'ny fanafoanana ny fetra 30% ho an'ny Bumiputra (Foko Malais) ao anatin'ireo sehatra ireo izany mba hisian'ny fifaninanana bebe kokoa. ||| That includes removal of 30% Bumiputra (ethnic Malay) equity requirement in those sectors in order to promote greater competition.
Fotoana izao handalinanan'ny mpamakafaka rehetra ny amin'ity fiovana tsy nisy toa azy ity sady mangetaheta ny mponina te-hahalala hoe htraiza ny fidonan'ny fanovàna nandrasana teo amin'ny teokarena. ||| Now is the crucial time where critics will scrutinize this unprecedented move and people will be eager to know the level of impact and transformation expected on overall economy.
Tony Fernandes dia miaiky fa izy ity dia tokony ho fiandohàna mankany aminà fiovàna goavana: ||| Tony Fernandes acknowledges that it is a start that should lead to greater transformation:
Ny fanafoanana ireo fepetra takian'ny NEP¹ ao amin'ireo seha-pihariana madinika 27 dia fanombohana iray goavana. ||| The removal of NEP¹ requirements for 27 service sub-sectors represents a great start.
Saingy manantena indriindra indrindra aho mba ho ny fitambaramben'ny toekarem-pirenena manontolo no hasiam-panavaozana. ||| But I hope more importantly, that the entire domestic economy is reformed.
Faniriako raha i Datuk Seri Najib no ho lasa Margaret Thatcher vaovao. ||| My wish is that Datuk Seri Najib does a Margaret Thatcher.
Amin'izao fotoana, be loatra ireo zo azo, ireo fifandroritan'ny tombontsoa sy ny vesatra ara-taratasy mamono ny famoronana, mampivalaketraka ny fikarohana sy tsy dia mandrisika loatra ireo mpandraharaha hanorina sy hampivoatra orinasa. ||| At present, there is too much vested interest, conflict and red tape that kill creativity, discourage innovation and provide little incentive for entrepreneurs to start and grow businesses.
M. Bakri Musa dia manolotra tsoa-kevitra mitovitovy amin'izay, hoe fanombohana fotsiny iny fa tsy vahaolana feno, toy izao no fijeriny: ||| M. Bakri Musa offers similar conclusion that it is merely a beginning but not a total solution, he reasons that:
Mba hahazoan'i Najib vaha-olana tsara sy feno, mila mijery ny olana madinidinika sarotra noho izay nahatonga ny fametrahana fetra (fatra.) Avoatra ireo dia ho afaka hanalalaka, tsy ny seha-pihariana madinika monja ihany fa ny toekarena manontolo rehetra i Najib, raha tsy ny endri-piainana maleziana rehetra mihitsy aza. ||| For Najib to have an excellent and comprehensive solution would require him to address the more difficult underlying issue of what prompted the instituting of quotas in the first place Ameliorate it and Najib would be able to liberalize not only the whole service sector but also the entire economy, if not every facet of Malaysian life.
Amin'izay, tena tsy ho lavitra ny nofinofiny "1Malaysia" izy. ||| That would bring his "1Malaysia" aspiration that much closer.
Chua Soi Lek dia miaiky fa hetsika mampandroso izy ity ary ny Foko Malays dia tsy tokony hieritreritra fa hoe voatohintohina ny zon'izy ireo: ||| Chua Soi Lek also acknowledges this is a positive move and ethnic Malays should not think their rights have been compromised:
Mino aho fa hisintona fampiasam-bola bebe kokoa sy hisarika ireo matihanina sy ny haitao vaovao ho tonga eto amin'ny firenena ny fanavaozana, ary antenaina fa ho hery manosika ny sehatry ny tolotr'asa izy ity. ||| I am sure this will attract more investment and also attract more professionals and technology into the country and hopefully it will be a boost to the service sector.
Voarakitra ao anaty lalampanorenana ny zo fototry ny Bumiputra.Tsy misy na iza na iza afaka hanàla izany. ||| The Bumiputra special rights are entrenched in the constitution. Nobody can take that away.
Amin'izay, ny fanavaozana ny NEP dia tsy tokony horaisin'ireo Bumiputra ho toy ny fametraham-panontaniana momba ny zo manokana azy ireo, satria efa miraikitra ao anaty lalampanorenana izany. ||| So, a review of the NEP should not be construed by some Bumiputra as a challenge to their special rights as this is enshrined in the constitution.
Malaysia-Finance dia milaza ilay fanovana ho tena mendri-piderana tokoa ary hisarika mpampiasa vola vahiny mivantana ho ao anatin'ireo seha-piharian'ny tolotr'asa: ||| Malaysia-Finance says the move is highly commendable and will attract more foreign direct investment to the service sector:
Na dia tsy mbola hitan'ny firenena mivantana aza ireo tombontsoa, ny fitambatambaran'ireo laza tsara dia efa antoka sahady ho aminà tontolom-pihariana azon'ny fifaninanana ivelarana ao Malezia hisarihana ireo fampiasam-bola avy any ivelany. ||| While the country may not see an immediate benefit, the cumulative goodwill will ensure a more competitive landscape for Malaysia in attracting foreign investments.
Tena ilaina ny fiovàna raha ny fahitàna hoe ho tonga hatramin'ny 60% fara faha-keliny ny fiankinantsika amin'ireo seha-pihariana ireo, izay hampihena ny fiankinantsika amin'ny fanondranana ireo kojakoja elektronika sy ireo akora fototra. ||| The move is very crucial in moving our reliance on services to at least 60 percent, and which would then lessen our reliance on electronics exports and commodities.
Nefa, ny hevitra hoe ny fanavaozana dia hitondra fiovàna goavana amin'ireo politika efa misy dia tsy iraisan'ny maro. ||| However, not all are in the consensus that this move will lead to greater changes on the existing policies.
Mihevitra i Tony Pua fa tsy misy na inona na inona afa-tsy ny filazana ofisialy ny amin'ireo politika efa mipetraka ary miahiahy ny amin'izay lazaina fa hoe fiantraikany: ||| Tony Pua thinks it is nothing more than official announcement for policies that are already in place and questions its supposedly impact:
Ny (Depiote)-Minisitrin'ny Varotra Iraisam-pirenena sy ny Indostria, Datuk Mukhriz Mahathir, niteny ampahi-bemaso fa resaka fotsiny izany fanavaozana izany, tsy ampiana tsy analàna. ||| Deputy Minister for International Trade and Industry, Datuk Mukhriz Mahathir has officially confirmed that it's all just hot air, no more, no less.
Mukhriz dia tsy hoe nanambara fotsiny ny fikasany hiaro sy hanapariaka ny Pôlitika Ara-toekarena Vaovao (N.P.E), fa niteny koa izy fa ireo fepetra fanalalahana natao vao haingana, nambaran'i Najib, dia fepetra noraisina hifandrindran-daàlana amin'ny zavatra efa misy ao amin'ireo indostrian'ny tolotr'asa. ||| Mukhriz not only stated his intent to "defend and promote" the New Economic Policy, he said that the recent liberalization measures announced by Najib was a move to synchronize what was already happening in the service industry.
Ireny rehetra ireny izany dia fampandriana adrisa fotsiny. ||| So it was all pretty much a public relations sham.
Raha ny tena marina, ireo sehatra ireo efa afaka tamin'ireo gejan'ny fmaritana ny fari-panànana. ||| These sectors were in reality already unimpeded by ownership restriction constraints.
Araka izany, ireo nambaran'i Najib dia tsy hisy fiatraikany loatra amin'ny asa ataon'ny indostria, na tena tsy hisy mihitsy. ||| Hence what Najib announced will have very, very little real impact on the industry, if any at all.
Straight Talk dia nanamafy izay fomba fijery izay miaraka amin'ity filazany ity: ||| Straight Talk confirms this view with this assessment:
Efa niteny aho fa ny sasany amin'ireo fanehoan-kevitra tany am-piandohana no diso nentin'ny fo loatra sy nandeha ho azy. ||| I said that some of the initial reactions are too emotional and knee-jerk.
Maro tamin'ireo sehatra ireo no efa nisokatra, talohan'ny fanalalahana. ||| Some of these sectors are already quite open even before the liberalization.
Raiso ho ohatra ny informatika sy ireo tolotr'asa miaraka aminy, ity sampan'asa ity dia tena efa nalalaka tamin'ny ny nametrahana ny MSC². ||| Take computer and related services as an example, this sub-sector is already quite liberalized since the implementation of MSC² status.
Nefa toy ny mahazatra, antoko pôlitika vitsivitsy, manam-pahaizana sy tompona petra-bola vitsivitsy no midera sy manasohaso ny fanavaozana nataon'ny Praiminisitra. ||| But as usual, a number of parties, analysts and stakeholders are trumpeting compliments of the PM's move.
Raha ny haavon'ny fijery miiba sy ny fijery ankapobeny no zohiana dia be no mbola tokony hatao, mbola mila fotoana be i Najib mba hanaporofoany fa izy tokoa ny lehilahin'ny fanavaozana. ||| So given the level of skepticism and general acknowledgement that more need to be done, Najib will need more time to prove that he is indeed a market reformer.
Fanamarihana: NEP midika hoe New Economic Policy - Pôlitika Ara-Toekarena Vaovao natao mba hamongorana ny fahantrana tsy hijabahan'ny resaka ara-poko intsony ; MSC mifandraika amin'ny Multimédia Super Corridor - Lalantsara Migodanan'ny Multimedia natao mba hanapariahana ireo TIC ho toy ireo fitaovana fampandroasoana any amin'ireo firenena mandroso ||| Notes: NEP¹ refers to New Economic Policy introduced to eradicate poverty irrespective of race and to abolish identification of economic function by race; MSC² refers to Multimedia Super Corridor initiative to promote ICT as the engine of growth toward developed country status
Sary mihetsika: Antso vonjy ho an'i Perou Atsimo tratran'ny tondra-drano ||| Video: Call for Aid in the Peruvian South due to Flooding
fahatezeran'i rio urubamba avy amin'i Carlos Jose Rey ao amin'ny Living in Peru, nahazoana alàlana ||| rio urubamba rage by Carlos Jose Rey of Living in Peru, used with permission
Nahatonga ny mponina any Cusco sy ny manodidina azy any Perou hihetsika handefa sarimihetsika tamin'ny web ny trangam-pahamehana misy any aminy, miezaka izy ireo hanaitra ny fampahalalam-baovao rehetra hijery ny loza iainan'ireo mponina any an-toerana izay tsy manana trano fonenana, mitoka-monina sady tsy misy sakafo, tsy misy rano ary tsy misy herinaratra. ||| The state of emergency the city of Cusco in Peru and surrounding areas has moved many locals to make videos and upload them to the web, trying to get mass media to pay attention to the drama lived by villagers throughout the area who are now homeless, isolated and without food, water or electricity.
Oscarpucha nandefa sarimihetsika nalaina teny ambony fiarandalamby niverina avy any Machu Picchi: ity fiarandalamby nandehanana ity no farany niainga avy any Inca, talohan'ny orana, niakatra be ny rano ka tsy afaka nitondra nitondra olona maro niala ny tanànan'i Aguas Calientes, tao Machu Picchi sy tany Cusco. ||| Oscarpucha uploaded a video he took of the train ride returning from Machu Picchu: the train he was in was the last one to depart from the sacred Inca city, before the rain, the rising river levels and mudslides made it impossible to get more people out of the Aguas Calientes village at the base of Machu Picchu and into Cusco.
Ao amin'ny sary mihetsika no hahitanao ny fanonjan'ny reniranoka na dia ny olona mahay rano aza sahirana. ||| In the video, you can see the foaming river that even splashes passengers as they ride by.
Multimediantonio, namoaka sarimihetsika lava nalefa tao amin'ny fahitalavitra an'ny faritra ao Cusco, mampiseho amintsika ny fahavoazana mihatra amin'ny trano vitsivitsy, izay tsy vitan'ny feno fotaka fotsiny, fa hatramin'ny menaka maloto no mandrakotra ny tany. ||| Multimediantonio, who has also uploaded plenty of footage used in a regional Cusco television channel, shows us some of the damage caused to the inside of a few houses, where not only mud, but also raw sewage has covered the floors.
Avy any Urubamba, tanàna akaikin'i Cusco, Mamaderodriguin nandefa sary mihetsika mampiseho ny fohoaran'ny rano ary manazava fa simba noho izany ilay tora-pasika fitsangatsanganana vao notokanana vao haingana. ||| From Urubamba, a village near Cusco, Mamaderodriguin posts a video showing the overflowing river and explains how it wiped out a recently inaugurated beach promenade.
Tafahitsoka ao amin'ny toerana fijerena baolina ny mponina nandritra izay fotoana izay, ary amin'izao fotoana izao dia misy sary mihetsika vao hatao, tsy misy trano lay atoriana, ary miaraka amin'ny oram-be nandritra ny andro maromaro sy ny orana amin'ny volana febroary mbola ho avy dia mila trana fialofana izy ireo. ||| The population is staying at a stadium for the meantime, but at the moment the video was made, they had no tents to sleep in, and with the constant rains these days and the rains that usually come during the month of February, they will need shelter.
Azonao jerena ity sary mihetsika manaraka ity sy ireo hafa koa hahitanao ny fahavoazana tany Urubamba ao amin'ny YouTube. ||| You can see this next video and others regarding the damages in Urubamba in his YouTube channel.
Ao amin'ity sary mihetsika manaraka ity, Zenobia Valencia miresaka amin'i Mayten Sanchez any Cusco, miresaka ny halehiben'ny fahavoazana vokatry ny renirano manakaiky ny tanànan'i Huacarpay any Lucre. ||| In this next video, Zenobio Valencia talks to Mayten Sanchez in Cusco discussing the amount of damage caused by the river in his neighboring village of Huacarpay in Lucre.
Ao amin'ny tanànany, trano nentin-drazana daholo ny ankamaroan'ny trano fa tsy misy trano biriky ary tombanany ho ny 98% ny trano no ho rava sy hirodana ato anatin'ny andro vitsivitsy. ||| In the case of his village, most of the houses are built traditionally out of adobe bricks and he esteems that about 98% of the houses are either lost or will crumble down in the next few days.
Ao amin'ny antsony mitady vonjy dia mangataka bodofotsy izy, sakafo mbola tsy lany daty, rano, fitaovana fidiovana sy trano lay. ||| In his plea for help he asks for blankets, non-perishable food items, water, items for personal hygiene as well as tents.
Ms Sanchez no manamarika fa izy mihitsy no handeha hanangona fanampiana ary hanatitra izany ao amin'ireo vondrona miahy ny mahaolona izay ahitana mpitsabo iray, mpitsabo mpanampy roa, jeoljista iray ary injeniera iray. ||| Ms. Sanchez mentions that she personally is arranging for donation pickup as well as putting together a human team made up of a doctor, two nurses, a geologist and a civil engineer.
nandefa sary koa izy, izay nasehon'i Mayten ao amin'ny bilaoginy, milaza ny fahavoazana goavana nateraky ny renirano. ||| He also provided images and pictures, which Mayten uploaded on her blog, telling the story of the vast damage caused by the river.
Raha ho an'i Mayten, efa matihanina amin'ny fanaovana zavatra tahaka izao izy, ary ity sary mihetsika manaraka ity mampiseho ny fanampiana nataony tany Chincha, Pero, tamin'ny horohoron-tany tamin'ny taona 2007, nanampy nanarina ny fahavoazana izay tahaka ny hoe mpilatsaka an-tsitrapo, mpitsabo, mpitsabo mpanampy ary mpampianatra izay nanagana lakozia fandrahoana lasopy maromaro, sekoly vonjy maika, trano, namatsy entana ireo mpivarotra mila izany, fanampiana ara-pitsaboana sy ny mitovy aminy rehetra. ||| In Mayten's case, she is something of a pro at doing exactly this, and the following video shows how she helped in the 2007 earthquake in Chincha, Peru, arranging relief efforts during the aftermath such as teams of volunteers, doctors, nurses and teachers who helped build and run soup kitchens, temporary schools, houses, delivery of groceries to those who needed them, medical services and other such services, some of which are still running and which helped found the volunteer organization Mayten's House where they continue providing services to the Chincha community, long after the media has ceased to report on their situation after the earthquake.
ny sasany amin'ireny aza mbola am-perinasa ankehitriny ary mbola ampian'ireo fikambanan'ny mpilatsaka an-tsitrapo Mayten's House, mbola manolo-tanana an'i Chincha izy ireo, na dia efa tsy nilaza vaovao mikasika ny momba azy ireo intsony aza ny fampahalalam-baovao taorian'ny horohoron-tany. ||| Following is the video telling the story of Mayten's House: Mayten contacted us and asked us to please add the bank account information if you are interested in making donations to help the people in Cusco.
Araho ity sary mihetsika ity fa mampiseho ny tantaran'i Mayten's House: Juliana Rincón Parra ||| Global Voices Online is in no way related to the Casa de Mayten efforts except in the hope that they can provide aid to the people in the Peruvian South.
Malezia: Generation 709 miantso fihavaozana politika ||| Malaysia: Generation 709 Calls for Political Reforms
Taorian'ny fihetsiketsehana Bersih tamin'ny 9 Jolay, vondrona tanora Maleziana ankehitriny no tonga hanohy ny fitakiana fifidinana malalaka sy marina, izay antsoin'izy ireo manokana hoe 'Generation 709' na 'Taranaka 709'. ||| Following the Bersih rally on the 9 July, 2011, a group of young Malaysians have now come forward to continue calling for free and fair elections, calling themselves 'Generation 709'.
Ny Mpikarakara ny Taranaka 709, Lee Khai Loon, no nanoratra tao amin'ny Malaysia Today fa: ||| The Convener of Generation 709, Lee Khai Loon, wrote in Malaysia Today that:
709 dia tsiaro iraisan'ny mponina avy amin'ny foko rehetra tafaray amin'ny fampiakarana ny tantaran'i Malezia. ||| 709 is the collective memory of people of all races united in making history in Malaysia.
Ny Taranaka 709 dia sehatry ny tanora loana amin'ny resaka politika, zo politika (sivily) ary ny fahaiza-mitantana. ||| Generation 709 is a platform of youth concerned with politics, civil rights and good governance.
Nirona ho amina tanjona iray izahay taorian'ny diabe manantantaran'ny 9 jolay: managana ny demokrasianay. ||| We have converged after the historic walk of Jul 9, for a common goal: building our democracy.
Mahaleo tena izahay, manana fomba fihevitra sy sehatra famakafakana. ||| We are an independent, principled, critical platform.
Tsy misy anatina fikambanana politika izahay, tsy manana loharanom-bola, saingy mirehidrehitry ny idealisma. ||| We do not belong to any political organisation, do not have any financial resources, but have only a heart for the idealism.
Mihevitra izahay fa tsy milatsaka avy any an-danitra ny demokrasia, fa lalana manana dingana maromaro mila atao mivaingana. ||| We believe that democracy does not fall from the sky, that it takes a journey of many steps to materialise.
Amin'ny maha-andiam-piovana soslialy anay dia manana andrakitra sy adidy izahay ho lohalaharana. ||| As the generation of social change, we have the responsibility and duty to be at the forefront.
Mino ny tanjaky ny tanora avy amin'ny foko rehetra tafaray izahay, izay hampahery kokoa ny tanora handray anjara amin'ny asa sosialy sy hiaro ny zony. ||| We believe in the power from the united youth of all races, which will empower even more youth to participate in social works and defend their rights.
Hitondra fomba fijery vaovao amin'ny rakyat (vahoaka) izany hitolona hiaraka ho amin'i Malezia demokratika. ||| It will bring a new perspective to the rakyat, to struggle together for a democratic Malaysia.
Nosoratany ihany koa fa manana tanjona telo ry zareo: ||| He also wrote that they have three objectives:
(1) Fiarahana sy fanohanana ireo voafonja ara-politika rehetra noho ny fihaonana Bersih 2.0 sy amin'ny niharan'ny herisetran'ny polisy, ary tafiditra amin'izany ny famoahana avy hatrany ny mpitarika enina voatazona noho ny didy hitsivolana fahamaizana; ||| (1) Solidarity and support for all political detainees from Bersih 2.0 Rally and victims of police brutality, including calling for immediate release of six social leaders detained under Emergency Ordinance;
(2) Fandrisihana tanora bebe kokoa hiditra ao amin'ny fihavaozana demokratika, fahafahana politika (sivily) ary fahaiza-mitantana amin'ny alalan'ny fihaonambe milamina, valandresaka amin'ny mpanao gazety, forum ary asa ahitana zavabaovao; ||| (2) Encourage more young people to join the democratic reform, civil liberties and good governance through holding peaceful assembly, press conference, forum and innovative activities;
(3) Manatratra tanora maromaro kokoa amin'ny fampahafantarana amin'ny alalan'ny fampiasana mavitrika ny valantserasera. ||| (3) Reach out to more young people with information through active use of social media.
Geronimo, manoratra avy any Amerika mahatsapa fa misy ny fiovana. ||| Geronimo, writing from America, feels the change that is happening:
Tsy hita nivondrona mihitsy ity Taranaka ity mandra-pisian'ny 709. ||| This generation has never seen unity until 709.
Rahatrizay any aoriana any dia hijery todika ity Taranaka ity ary hiteny amin'ny zanany izay nanaovany azy.Izany no manome fanantenana, fahavononana sy tanjaka ho antsika. ||| In the years to come, this generation will look back and tell its children that this is how it went down. This is what gave us hope, determination and strength.
Tsy mbola nahita an'i Malezia tahaka izao mihitsy izahay nandritra ny androm-piainanay. ||| Never in our lives have we ever seen a Malaysia like this before.
Ahoana ny natao mba handry mandrakizay ny avelon'ny 13 Mey 13 (1969?) ||| What does it take to finally put the ghost of May 13 (1969) to rest forever?
Mipetraka tao amin'ny hetsika Bersih 2.0 ny valiny. ||| The answer lies in the events of the July 9 Bersih 2.0 rally.
Tsy matahotra intsony ity Taranaka ity. ||| This generation is not afraid anymore.
Mitady ny ampitson'ny firaisana sy ny fahatanjahana ity Taranaka ity. ||| This generation looks forward to a future of unity and strength.
Bryan Khoo, izay nandray anjara tamin'ny hetsika dia mahatsapa izany ihany koa: ||| Bryan Khoo, who participated in the rally, feels the same way:
Tsy nanenenako mihitsy ny nandehanana tamin'ilay hetsika noho ny fandresen-dahatra tao amiko tao fa mbola toerana tsara ho ahy sy ny taranako i Malezia. ||| I never regret for joining this rally as I am convinced that Malaysia is still a very good place for me and my future generation.
Mino tanteraka aho fa firenena maha-te-ho-tia hatrany i Malezia ary manantena fa maro ny namana mbola afaka miaramijoro hanangana ampitso tsaratsara kokoa ho an'ny taranatsika manaraka. ||| I strongly believe Malaysia is still a lovely country and hope that more friends can stand up together to create a better future for our next generation.
Navitrika ny vondrona tao amin'ny valan-tserasera, miaraka amin'ny ezaka farany nataony izay lasa 'Kempen Balik Bersih Kampung' (Miverina an-tanàna niaviana hanadio ny tontolony), fandaharan'asa ambanivohitra handrisihana ny Maleziana any ambanivohiny hanely ny antso hisian'ny demokrasia sy ny rariny bebe kokoa ao amin'ny firenena. ||| The group has been very active on social media, with their latest effort being 'Kempen Balik Bersih Kampung' (Back to Hometown Cleaning Up Campaign), an outreach program to rural areas urging Malaysians to go back to their hometowns to spread the word of the call to have more democracy and justice in the country.
Ao anatin'izany ny fitakiana fa mila rafitra antoko-roa i Malezia, mila avaozina ny rafi-pitsarana ary tokony hisoratra anarana haingana ny tanora Maleziana afa-mifidy mba hanana ny ambarany amin'ny politika. ||| Among their claims are that Malaysia needs a two-party system, the judiciary needs to be reformed and that young Malaysians who are eligible to vote should register themselves quickly in order to have a say in politics.
Ao amin'ny Facebook, efa nahazo mpankasitraka mihoatra ny 3000 ry zareo na dia mbola vao 300 ihany aza izany ao amin'ny Twitter. ||| On Facebook, they have already garnered more than 3000 Likes, although on Twitter that number is only almost 300.
Manaraka aoriana ihany koa amin'ny fananganana ny Taranaka 709 ny Maleziana monina any Amerika, ary miantso ny tenany ho 'Generation 709 any Etazonia'. ||| Following that, a group of Malaysians living in America have also created a Generation 709 there, calling themselves 'Generation 709 in the United States'.
Xandeloras ihany koa dia namoaka ny sary sy lahatsarin'ny hetsika Bersih. ||| Xandeloras also posted photos and videos of the Bersih rally.
Ejipta: Fahatakonan'ny aterineto ||| Egypt: An Internet Black Hole
Ampahany amin'ny fandrakofana manokan'ireo Fanoherana Ejypta 2011 ity lahatsoratra ity. ||| This post is part of our special coverage of Egypt Protests 2011.
Nandritra ireo andro vitsy lasa, satria nampiasa ireo fitaovan'ny media sosialy ireo Ejyptiana mba hikarakaran'izy ireo sy hanapariahany vaovao, nisy ihany koa ireo sakantsakana maro nianjady taminy: Ny 25 Janoary, voatatitra fa voasakana ny Twitter, narahin'ny Facebook ny andro manaraka. ||| Over the past few days, as protesting Egyptians have utilized social media tools for organizing and disseminating information, they've also come across numerous obstacles to access: On January 25, Twitter was reportedly blocked, with Facebook following the next day.
Ny 27, dia nitsitaitaika ny fahafahana miditra amin'ireo vohikala rehetra. ||| By the 27th, access to both sites was sporadic.
Teo amin'ny manodidina tamin'ny 1 ora maraina tany Kairo ny Zoma, 28 Janoary–andron'ireo fihetsiketsehana efa voaomana hatao–nanomboka niditra ireo tatitra fa hoe nanjary tsy afaka nidiran'ireo Ejyptiana tany Kairo sy Alexandria ny aterineto. ||| At around 1:00 am in Cairo on Friday, January 28–a day of planned protests–reports began to trickle in that the Internet had become inaccessible to Egyptians in Cairo and Alexandria.
Minitra vitsy taorian'izay, nitoraka tweet i ||| A few minutes later, tweeted:
Eny, manamarina ny CNN fa tapaka ny aterineto manerana an'i Ejypta. ||| yes, CNN confirms internet is down in ALL of Egypt.
Takona tanteraka i Ejypta amin'izao ||| Egypt now is total black hole
Fotoana fohy avy eo, nampitandrina i Alaa Abd El Fattah (alaa), Ejyptiana mipetraka any Afrika Atsimo: ||| Shortly thereafter, Alaa Abd El Fattah (alaa), an Egyptian based in South Africa, warned:
Tokony hivonona amin'ny fahatapahan'ny finday eraky ny tanàna ihany koa isika rahampitso (na fara-faharatsiny eo amin'ny faritry ny fihetsiketsehana) "Jan25" ||| we should be prepared for total mobile phone blackout tomorrow also (or at least in protest hotspots) "Jan25"
Jacob Appelbaum (ioerror), Amerikanina nitatitra fanivanana aterineto tany Ejypta, nanamafy ny fisakanana saiky manontolo, ka miteny: ||| Jacob Appelbaum (ioerror), an American who has been reporting instances of Internet filtering in Egypt, confirmed the almost-complete block, saying:
Toa azo lazaina fa i Ejipta manontolo mihitsy no tsy misy fifandraisana - toy ny tambajotra SS7 azy ireo ihany no mandeha. ||| It sure looks like nearly all of Egypt is offline - only their SS7 network seems to be working.
"Jan25" Egypt ||| "Jan25" Egypt
Ireo izay nikezaka niantso namana sy fianakaviana tany Ejypta dia naneho ny fisavoritahan-tsainy sy ny ahiahiny tao amin'ny Twitter. ||| Those working to contact friends and family in Egypt expressed frustration and concern over Twitter.
dia manazava: ||| explained:
mbola mandeha ny finday aty ejypta, izany no mbola mahatafajanona ahy eto, saingy tsy tomombana ireo serasera any amin'ny faritra sasany ||| cell phones still working in egypt that's how I'm staying in touch, but service spotty in areas
Ny fijery avy any Etazonia kosa dia toa mamporisika; fihetsika mahaliana, Alec Ross (alecjross), Mpanolotsaina Voalohany amin'ny Fanavaozana ny Mpitantsoratry ny Fanjakana Hillary Clinton, dia nitoraka tweet tamin'ny teny Arabo: ||| The view from the U.S. is somewhat encouraging; in an interesting twist, Alec Ross (alecjross), Senior Adviser for Innovation to Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, tweeted in Arabic:
Miantso ireo manam-pahefana Ejiptiana izahay mba hamela ny fihetsiketsehana am-pilaminana, ary miantso azy ireo mba hifehy tena ka tsy hitsabatsabaka hanelingelina ny fitaovan-tserasera sosialy. ||| We call upon the Egyptian authorities to allow peaceful protests, and call on them to refrain from interfering with means of social communication.
Na dia eo aza ny sakana, dia hita fa misy ireo Ejyptiana sasany afaka mitoraka tweet ao anatin'ny fanantenana hanome vaovao ny any ivelan'ny firenena. ||| Despite the block, it appears that a few remaining Egyptians are still tweeting in hopes of getting news out to the world.
Ivelan'ity fahatapahana ity, hiezaka hitatitra avy amin'ny antso an-telefaona sy fifaneraserana hafa ny Global Voices mandritra ireo andro vitsy ho avy. ||| In light of the blackout, Global Voices will attempt to report from phone calls and other communications over the course of the next few days.
Syria: Miditra An'i Hama Ny Fiara Mifono Vy Ny Hariva Mialoha Ny Ramadany ||| Syria: Tanks Enter Hama on Eve of Ramadan
Ny hariva mialoha ny Ramadany, niditra ny tanànan'i Hama ny andian-tafika Syriana, ary voalazan'ny tatitra fa namono olona betsaka efa ho 45 teo amin'ny tamin'ny 11:00 antoandro teo ny Alahady 31 Jolay. ||| On the eve of Ramadan, Syrian troops have entered the city of Hama, reportedly killing as many as 45 people by 11:00 am on Sunday, July 31.
Manana ny akony manokana ilay fanafihana ho an-dry zareo Siriana, satria ny tanànan'i Hama no toerana nisian'ny vono moka lehibe indrindra teo amin'ny tantara tamin'izao vaninandro maoderina izao. ||| The assault has particular resonance for Syrians, as the city of Hama was the site of one of the most horrific massacres in modern history.
Ny ankamaroan'ireo bitsika tamin'ny ora voalohany dia samy nitondra ho any amin'ilay vaovao avokoa, na dia ireo maro avy any Syria aza, ary ireo avy any ivelany dia samy nanameloka avokoa ilay famonoana, ka misy amin'ireny ny maneho hatezerana noho ny tsy fisian'ny fanamelohana iraisam-pirenena. ||| Most tweets at this early hour are links to news, though many from within Syria, and abroad have condemned the killings, with some expressing anger at a perceived lack of international outrage.
Ny sasany koa, tahaka an'i deekelgen963, dia naneho ahiahy momba ny tatitra avy ao Hama. ||| Still others, such as deekelgen963, expressed doubt about the reporting from Hama.
Amin'ireo tatitry ny fijery avy eny ifotony tonga amin'ny Twitter, iray no misongadina. ||| Of the view original reports coming across the Twitter lines, one stands out.
Mitattra i Debkafile hoe: "Tapaka ny rano, herinaratra, fifandraisana an-telefaonina ho an'ireo mponina 400.000 ao Hama". ||| Debkafile reports: "Water, power, phone lines cut for Hama's 400,000 inhabitants".
Mandritra izany, avy ao anatin'i Hama, lahatsary vitsivitsy no mipoitra. ||| Meanwhile, from inside Hama, a few videos have emerged.
Lahatsary mangovitra iray avy amin'ny Shams News Network no mampiseho fiara mifono vy miditra ny tanàna: ||| One shaky video from the Shams News Network shows tanks entering the city:
Lahatsary iray hafa mampiseho setroka mainty miakatra avy ao an-tanàna: ||| Another video shows black smoke rising up from within the city:
Shaimaa Khalil, mpanao gazety ao amin'ny BBC no nanipika lahatsary iray mivantana avy ao Hama, izay azo jerena ato ny tahirin'izy io. ||| BBC journalist Shaimaa Khalil pointed to live streaming video coming from Hama, the archive of which is available here.
Noho ny tsy fisian'ireo mpanao gazety matihanina ao Hama, ny fitaterana ny vaovao dia miankina betsaka amin'ireo mafàna fo sy ny fanaovan-gazetin'olon-tsotra, izay tena fivarotana aina ho azy ireo tokoa ny fakàna saripika sy lahatsary. ||| Without the presence of professional journalists in Hama, reporting is reliant on activists and citizen journalists, for whom capturing images and videos comes with considerable risk.
Vokany, taraiky be matetika ny vaovao vao mitete, saingy ny sasantsasany amin'ireo Siriana mafàna fo, toa an'i wissamtarif sy malathaumran dia manohy hatrany mibitsika ny vaovao. ||| As a result, news is often slow to trickle out, but some Syrian activists, such as wissamtarif and malathaumran are continuously tweeting news.
Peru: Tonga ao Lima ny Cow parade ||| Peru: Cow Parade arrives to Lima
Andro vitsy lasa izao, rakotry ny sarin'ombivavy mivongana mitovy habe amin'ny tena izy i Lima. ||| For the past days, Lima has been invaded by life-size cow sculptures.
Ny Cow Parade dia maneho asa 80 samihafa ao anaty zaridaina sy toerana natao ho an'ny daholobe manerana ny tanàna izy natao indrindra hamidy hanangonana vola ho an'ireo fikambanana maro. ||| The Cow Parade shows 80 different works in parks and public spaces of the city that will be auctioned to collect funds for several organizations.
Tany Soisa no niandohan'ny hetsika toy ity mba handrisihana ny seha-pamokarana ronono. ||| The event was originally created in Switzerland to promote milk-production activity.
Hita eny amin'ny manodidina ny tanàna ireo sarivongana, araka izay itanisàn'ny Tranonkala Viajando por Perú azy: ||| The sculptures can be around the city, as listed by Viajando por Perú website:
Ny asa tsirairay, voavolavola sy voaloko tao anaty fahaiza-mamorona sy fahaiza-manao tokoa, dia aranty ao Lima Main Square (ombivavy 10), Scribes Passage (ombivavy 5), sy ao Downtown Lima. ||| Each piece, creatively and cleverly designed and painted, is being exhibited in Lima Main Square (10 cows), Scribes Passage (5 cows), in Downtown Lima.
Ao (amin'ny distrikan'i) Miraflores, azo atao ny mijery ny fampirantiana ao amin'ny Salazar Park (ombivavy 15), Zaridainan'i Love (ombivavy 5), Raimondi Park (ombivavy 12), Kennedy Park (ombivavy 10). ||| In (the district of) Miraflores, the exhibit can be seen in Salazar Park (15 cows), Love Park (5 cows), Raimondi Park (12 cows), Kennedy Park (10 cows).
Mandritra izany, (ny distrikan'i) Pueblo Libre dia afaka mankafy azy ireo ao amin'ny Central Park (ombivavy 4). ||| Meanwhile, (the district of) Pueblo Libre can appreciate them in Central Park (4 cows).
Ao amin'ny (distrikan'i) Surco, ombivavy 9 no haseho ao amin'ny Jockey Plaza Mall. ||| In (the district of) Surco, 9 cows will be exhibited in Jockey Plaza Mall.
(Ny distrikan'i) Barranco koa dia manana vitsivitsy amin'ireto asa ireto ao amin'ny Saenz Peña Park (ombivavy 7) ary ao amin'ny Chabuca Granda Passage (ombivavy 3). ||| (The district of) Barranco has also some of these pieces in Saenz Peña Park (7 cows) and in Chabuca Granda Passage (3 cows).
Nefa, fomba ahoana no niaingan'izao rehetra izao? ||| Cow with the colors of a bus line, Kennedy Park But, how did it all started?
Ny blaogy ***Tota Iluxtra*** no manome ny valinteny: ||| ***Tota Iluxtra*** blog has the answer:
Taona maro lasa izay, ilay Soisa lahy Walter Snapp no nanan-kevitrahanosika ny seha-pamokarana ronono tao Zurich tamin'ny alalan'ny fandokoana ombivavy niaraka tamin'ny borosin'ireo mpanao taokanto tao an-toerana, namboarina tamin'ny fibre de verre. ||| Some years ago, Swiss Walter Snapp had the idea of promoting the milk-producing activity in Zurich with colorful cows painted with local artists paintbrushes, designed on fiberglass.
Tamin'ny 1999, Meter Hanig, mpandraharaha avy any Chicago, no nahazo ny alàlana ary dia nitondra ny haitao tany Amerika, nanomboka teo ity hetsika fanangonam-bola ity dia nahavoriana 25 tapitrisa dolara ho an'ny asa fanasoavana. ||| In 1999, businessman Meter Hanig from Chicago, acquired the rights and took the concept to the US, since then this peculiar event has collected 25 million dollars for charity causes. Cow dressed with a vest, Kennedy Park
Ny blaogy Corresponsales escolares, ampiantranoin'ny gazety Peroviana El Comercio, milaza amintsika hoe iza no handray ny tombontsoa avy amin'ny Cow Parade tao Lima: ||| The blog Corresponsales escolares, hosted by Peruvian newspaper El Comercio, tells us who will get the benefits from Lima Cow Parade:
Aorian'ny fampirantiana, hisy ny fivarotana amina'izay sahy ambony indrindra ny 64 amin'ireo sarivongana mba hanangonam-bola ho an'ny Foibe Ann Sullivan ao Peru, Socios en Salud NGO (mpiara-miombon'antoka ara-pahasalamana) ary ny Lima Foundation. ||| After the exhibit, there will be an auction for 64 sculptures in order to collect funds for Ann Sullivan Center of Peru, Socios en Salud NGO (Partners in Health) and the Lima Foundation.
Haharitra hatramin'ny Febroary, 2010 ny fampirantiana. ||| The exhibit will be held until February, 2010.
Ny sary rehetra mandravaka ity lahatsoratra ity dia ny tompony daholo no naka saripika azy, na tao LarcoMar na tao Parque Kennedy (Miraflores). ||| All the images in this post were taken by the author, both in LarcoMar and Parque Kennedy (Miraflores).
Koety: Mampanidina "Balônin'ny Fahafahana" ny Bidun ||| Kuwait: Bidun fly "Freedom Balloons"
Iray volana lasa izay, nanatontosa telo andro fanentanana "amadihana ny sarintava (avatara) ao amin'ny Twitter" hanairana ny famoaham-baovao sy hampisongadina ny momba azy ireo eo anatrehan'izao tontolo izao ny vondron'olona tsy manana zom-pirenena na inona na inona. ||| A month ago, the stateless community of Kuwait started a 3 day-long campaign of "flipping your Twitter avatar" to catch the media's attention and highlight their cause for the world.
Tamin'ity zoma ity dia hetsika hafa indray no nataony nampanidina balônina ho eny amin'ny rivotra, ary miantso azy ireo ho ny "balônin'ny fahafahana ||| This Friday, they've made another campaign to set balloons in the air, calling them "freedom balloons
Ny sarintava nobikain i miely ao amin ny Twitter ho fanohanana ny Bidun ao Koety ||| The avatar designed by spread on Twitter to show support for the Bidun of Kuwait
Taoriana kely monja nifaneraserana sy nifankazaran'ny olona tamin'ny hetsika "avadiho ny sarintavanao", maro ny mpisera Twitter no nanova ny sarintavany ho ilay namboarin'i Talal Obeid izay milaza voambolana iray amin'ny teny arabo: "Bidun" izay midika hoe "tsy manana zom-pirenena zakaina". ||| Just as people have interacted and sympathized with the "flip your avatar" campaign, many Twitter users have changed their avatars to one designed by Talal Obeid that says one word in Arabic: "Bidun", which means "stateless".
Nampiseho ny fanohanany sy ny fironam-pony amin'ireo mitaky ny zony am-pilaminana ny olona amin'ny alalan'ny fandefasana balônina manidina. ||| People are showing support and sympathy to those who want to speak up for their rights in a peaceful way, by flying balloons.
Mpisera Twitter vehivavy iray antsoina hoe Manayer no nankasitraka ny Bidun noho ny fanehoana (fitakiana) am-pilaminana tao amin'ny siokantserany: ||| A female Twitter user called Manayer complimented the Bidun for using peaceful expression in her tweet:
Na dia eo aza ny fiainana tsizarizariny dia mbola miezaka ny hientana am-pilaminana hatrany izy ireo hitakiana ny zony. ||| Despite the miserable ways of living, they manage to create a peaceful campaign to stand up for their rights.
Omar AlOraiman, mpianatra Koesiana, dia nanasongadina ihany koa ny filaminan'ny Bidun nitaky ny zony: ||| Omar AlOraiman, a Kuwaiti student, has also pointed out how peaceful the Bidun are when demanding their rights:
Balônin'ny fahafahana ary jereo anie fa mahafinaritra ry zareo amin'ny faharetany sy fitiavany an'i Koety amin'ny alalan'ny hetsika am-pilaminana ataon'izy ireo ||| Freedom balloons and they keep on showing us how great they r by their patience & love to Kuwait with their neat peaceful campaigns
Mpahay lalàna Koesiana Nasser Najaf nanoratra ho an'ny governemanta tao amin'ny tweet nataony miresaka momba ny satan'ny Bidun Koesiana tamin'ny filazana hoe: ||| Kuwaiti Lawyer Nasser Najaf addressed the government in his tweet about the status of Kuwaiti Bidun, saying:
Manantena aho fa tsy hanary dia ny fitondrana ary hiantoka ny zo sivily sy zon'olombelon'io vondron'olona voatsindry io ||| I wish that the government would stop playing around and guarantee the human and civil rights of this oppressed community
Tovovavy iray avy any Koety manana anaram-bositra Qaboul no nisiokantsera momba ny hetsika "FreedomBalloons" ary tao amin'ny iray amin'ny siokantsera nataony no nilazany ny fahadisoam-panantenany noho ny fisamborana izay nandefa ireny balônina ireny, na dia mbola tsy voamarina aza raha nisy tokoa izany fisamborana izany na tsia: ||| A girl from Kuwait whose nickname is Qaboul has been tweeting over the past few days for the "FreedomBalloons" campaign and in one of her tweets, she shows how disappointed she is over the arrest of those who were flying the balloons, although there is no confirmed news on these arrests yet:
Tsy misy zavatra tsara vita tsy misy fientanentanana izany. ||| Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
Saingy ankehitriny novonoiny ny nofinofinay novonoiny ny fientanentanana ||| But today they Kill the Dreams they kill our enthusiasm
Mpamaham-bolongana Amerikana mipetraka any Koety antsoina hoe "American Girl" no nanatsonga ny fanambarana momba ny hetsika tamina lahatsoratra iray vao haingana hanehoany fanohanana: ||| An American blogger based in Kuwait called "American Girl" has quoted the statement of the campaign in a recent post, to show support:
Hanao hetsika handrehitra sy handefa ny fanilon'ny fahafahana ho mariky ny fiaingan'ny fiainan-dry zareo hiala amin'ny fonjan'ny fanavakavahana ho any amin'ny lanitry ny fahafahana ny Bidun sy ny mpanohana azy, ny fotoana fandefasana dia amin'ny datin'ny 29/7/2011 amin'ny valo sy sasany alina ora eto Koety. Tohano azafady ny hetsiky ny Bidun mitaky ny mahaolona sy ny fahafahany. ||| The bidun and all their supporters launch A campaign to ignite the freedom glow flying lantern in Expression of the Departure of Their Lives out of the prison of racism to the sky of freedom,Timing of the launch will be in the date of 29/7/20118:30 PM Kuwait local time,plz support the bidun human campaign to claim their humanity and freedom.
Mandraisa anjara amin'ny alalan'ny fandefasana fanilon'ny fahafahana amin'ny ora voalaza. ||| Participate Through the launch of the glow lantern of freedom At the time mentioned.
Naneho ny fanohanany ny hetsika ka nandrakitra lahatsary tamin'ny ny Koesiana mpisera Twitter Abdulaziz Al-Assaf ||| Kuwaiti Twitter user Abdulaziz Al-Assaf was there to show support for the campaign and he recorded a video then uploaded it on Youtube.
Araka ny nolazain'ny zanaky ny mpianadahy aminy Fouz Abdullah dia nosamborin'ny polisy i Al-Assaf saingy nalefany indray rehefa hitany fa Koesiana ranamana fa tsy hoe tsy manana zom-pirenena zakaina: ||| According to his niece Fouz Abdullah, Al-Assaf was going to be taken by the police but was let go of when they discovered he is Kuwaiti and not stateless:
Mahaliana, ilay dadatoako Koesiana feno dia niangaviana hiaraka amin'nypolisy saingy navela rehefa fantatr'izy ireo fa Koesiana izy! ||| Interestingly, My fully kuwaiti uncle was also asked to go with the police but they left him when they knew he is Kuwaiti!
Mpamaham-bolongana iray antsoina hoe Khaled dia nanangona ny sarin'ny hetsika hita tao amin'ny Twitter ary nampiaraka azy tamina. ||| One of the bloggers called Khaled has gathered pictures of the campaign from Twitter and put them together in a post.
Ity ny iray amin'izany: ||| Here is one of them:
Olona iray mampanidina ny iray amin ny balônin ny Fahafahana Bidun ||| A man flies one of the Bidun's Freedom Balloons
Honduras: Hanomboka hifarana ny krizy? ||| Honduras: The Beginning of the End of the Crisis?
Manokatra ny varavaran'ny famahana ny krizy, nanomboka tamin'ny 28 jona 2009 tamin'ny nanonganana ny Filoha Manuel Zelaya ny nanasoniavana ny "Fifanarahana fifampidinihan'i Guaymuras ao San José/Tegucigalpa". ||| The signing of the "Guaymuras Dialogue Agreement of San José/Tegucigalpa" has opened the door to solving the crisis, which started on June 28, 2009 with the ousting of President Manuel Zelaya.
Nanao ny sonia tamin'ny 29 oktobra teo ny ekipa nisolo tena an'i Zelaya sy ny an'ny filoha vonjimaika Roberto Micheletti, miaraka amin'ny faneken'i Etazonia, na raha tononina mazava dia ny sekreteram-panjakana lefitra misahana ny raharahan'ny hemisfera, Atoa Thomas Shannon. ||| The teams representing Zelaya and interim President Roberto Micheletti signed the agreement on October 29, with the final backing of the United States, specifically the Sub-Secretary of Hemispheric Affairs, Thomas Shannon.
Ny tena niompanan'ny fifanarahana izay niadian-kevitra indrindra sy nampandamoka ny fifanarahana hatramin'izay dia ny momba ny hierenan'i Zelaya na tsia eo amin'ny fitondrana indray. ||| The agreement point that was debated the most and which had provoked the failure of previous dialogue attempts was whether or not to return Zelaya to power.
Mametraka fifampizaram- pahefana ity fifanarahana ity sy ny hanekan'ny andaniny sy ny ankilany ny valim-pifidianana izay hotanterahina amin'ny 29 Novembra ho avy izao. ||| This agreement would call for a power-sharing government and for both sides to recognize the results of the Presidential elections to be held on November 29.
Eo ampelatanan'ny Kongresy Nasionaly moa amin'izao fotoana izao ity fifanarahana ity, izay tsy maintsy hanaiky nefa izy ireo ihany no nandrotsa-bato ny hanalana an'i Zelaya 120 andro mahery izay. ||| The signed deal is now in the hands of the National Congress, which must approve it and which is the same body that voted for Zelaya's removal more than 120 days ago.
Saripikan'i NewsHour ary ambany fahazoan-dalan'ny Creative Commons license ||| Photo by NewsHour and used under a Creative Commons license
Midera izao fifanarahana vita sonia izao ny Fiarahamonina Iraisampirenena. ||| The international community has praised the signed agreement.
Manohana ny fifidianana hotontosaina amin'ny volana novambra ny Vondrom-pirenena Amerikana (kaontinanta), tahaka iany ihany koa ny Vondrona Eoropeana sy i Etazonia, izay efa mamoaka visa ho an'ny firenena indray, izay nandraisana fepetra nanerena ny fitondran'i Micheletti. ||| The Organization of American States supports the November general elections, as are the European Union and the United States, which also recently resumed the issuing of visas to the country, which had been a measure to pressure the Micheletti government.
Mifangaroharo ny fanantenana sy ny fisalasalana any Honduras. ||| In Honduras, there is a mix of hope and uncertainty.
Fanantenana fa hivaha araka izay haingana indrindra, farafaharatsiny ny toe- java- misy ankehitriny, ny krizy politika, ekonomika, ary sosialy izay niainan'ny firenena hatramin'ny volana jona. ||| There is hope that the political, economic, and social crisis that the country has been living since June will finish as soon as possible, at least in this current state.
Fisalasalana satria mbola eo ampelatanan'ny Kongresy ny momba ny fiverenan'i Zelaya. ||| There is uncertainty in that the return of Zelaya is still in the hands of the National Congress.
Misy noho izany ny hevitra mivoaka avy amin'ny bolongana: ||| There are reactions from Honduran blogs:
Ao amin'ny bolongana Nacer en Honduras, no anoratan'i Ardegas "Hiverina hitondra ve i Zelaya? ||| In the blog Nacer en Honduras, Ardegas writes "Will Zelaya be reinstated?

Fanontaniana mampihazohazo," ary dia nojereny ny sakantsakana mety hatrehiny mialoha ny hiverenany eo amin'ny fitondrana. ||| That is the floating question," and looks at some of the possible obstacles before he is returned to power.
Ohatra, nosoratan'i Ardegas fa tsy hanakery ny famerenana hitondra indray raha tsy ahanton'ny Fitsarana Tampony ny didy fampisamborana an'i Zelaya. ||| For example, Ardegas writes that the reinstatement will be ineffective if the Supreme Court does not suspend its pending orders for Zelaya's capture.
Mino i Juan Carlos Rivera ao amin'ny Mirada de Halcón: ||| Juan Carlos Rivera of Mirada de Halcón believes:
Mbola tsy tapitra ny krizy, varavarana misokasoka ialana amin'ny fifanandrinana ny fifanarahana. ||| The crisis is not yet over, the agreement is, barely, the door towards conflict resolution.
Mbola hitohy ny fikorontanana raha tsy miverina mitondra i Manuel Zelaya Rosales. ||| The instability, social upheaval, will continue if Manuel Zelaya Rosales does not return to power.
Tsy izaho no miteny izany. ||| It is not I who is saying this.
Fa izany no tabataba eny an-dalambe. ||| It is being yelled in the street.
Mitaky ny hamerenana amin'ny toerany ny filoha nofinidiny tamin'ny novambra 2005 ny ankamaroan'ny Hôndiorianina. ||| The majority of Hondurans demand the reinstatement of the president that they elected in November 2005.
Ao amin'ny bolongana Hibueras, no ilazan'i Gustavo Zelaya ny fifanarahana voasonia ho "Lalana mankamin'ny Fankalazana?" ||| In the blog Hibueras, Gustavo Zelaya calls the signing of the agreement a "Halfway Celebration"?
ka nanambarany ny heviny mikasika ny fitsabahan'i Etazonia amin'ny raharaham-pirenena: ||| and provides opinion about the interference of the United States in national affairs:
Fototra ity ho an'ny vahoaka maro, indrindra ho an'ny Amerikana tarihin'i Shannon sy izay rehetra mpirotsaka hofidiana ho filoha hafa. ||| This was fundamental for many people, especially for the Americans led by Shannon and for the rest of the presidential candidates.
Mazava tsara eto hoe iza no manday ny andraikitra, iza no manome baiko, iza no mametraka sy manapa-kevitra amin'ny raharaham-pirenena. ||| It is here where it is clearly noted who in charge, who gives the orders, who enforces and decides in national matters.
Noho izany tsy ny fahatafidiran'i Etazonia handray anjara amin'ny fiadiana ny ho tompondaka erantany ihany no adidintsika. ||| Now we don't only owe them (the United States) for the World Cup qualification.
Farany, milaza ny bolongana Honduras en el Mundo fa "mampiandry antsika ny Kongresy:" ||| Finally, the blog Honduras en el Mundo writes that "Congress has us waiting:"
Tsy maintsy mailo ny rehetra sy hijery tsara, manakaiky ny fiverenana, saingy tsy tokony hatoky tena be loatra ny tsirairay, antenaina (hijery ny tombotsoan'ny firenena) ny solombavambahoaka, ary hanonitra tamin'ny heloka nataony, ka hamaha ity olana ity, mba hitsimbadika indray mandeha tsy miverina ny fanonganam-panjakana. ||| One must be vigilant and watchful, reinstatement is near, but one must not get too overconfident, let's hope that the Congressional deputies are consequential with the country, that they repair the crime that they committed, and solve this problem, so that once and for all the coup is reversed.
Leonidas Mejia ||| Translation by Eduardo Ávila
Rosia: Veloma mandrakizay ho an'ilay mpilalao sarimihetsika Oleg Yankovsky ||| Russia: Farewell to Actor Oleg Yankovsky
Maty tany Mosko tamin'ny 20 Mey teo amin'ny faha-65 taonany ilay mpilalao sarimihetsika Rosiana Oleg Yankovsky ary nalevina tao amin'ny Fasan'i Novodevichy roa andro taty aoriana. ||| Renowned Russian actor Oleg Yankovsky died in Moscow at the age of 65 on May 20 and was buried at Novodevichy Cemetery two days later.
Mpankafy an'arivony no tonga nanao veloma farany azy tao amin'ny Fanaovana tantara an-tsehatra Lenkom. ||| Thousands of fans came to the Lenkom Theater to bid farewell to him.
I drugoi, mpampiasa LJ, dia namerina namoaka sary avy amin'ny AP mikasika ny fandevenana, ary i leosat, mpampiasa LJ dia nanoratra ity momba izany: ||| LJ user drugoi re-posted AP photos from the memorial event, and LJ user leosat wrote this about it:
Antsasak'adiny mialoha, nitondra ny vatapaty nivoaka ry zareo ary namoaka ny faty ho amin'ny lamesa fanaovam-belona. ||| Half an hour ago, they carried the coffin out and took the body away for a requiem service.
Tsy tafiditra tao anatin'ilay trano aho mba hanao ny faravelomako. ||| I didn't make it inside the building to say good-bye.
Na ireo tonga tamin'ny 11 ora aza tsy tafiditra. ||| Even those who were there by 11 AM did not make it.
Vahoaka marobe no teo, ary kely loatra izany adiny roa izany. ||| There were lots of people, and two hours is too little.
Tamin'ny 1:15 tolakandro, tsy afaka nanao veloma farany an'ilay (mpilalao sarimihetsika) malalany intsony ny olona. ||| At 1:15 PM, it was no longer possible for the people to bid farewell to their beloved (actor).
Tsy nihena ny vahoaka mandra-pamoaka ny faty. ||| The crowd didn't grow smaller until the body was carried out.
Toy ireo hafa, nampita ireo voninkazo tamin'ireo tany anatin'ilay faritra voafefy tady aho. ||| Along with others, I passed the flowers with those who were inside the cordoned-off area.
Nisy fitsanganana (fiondrehana) nitalakotroka be tao, toy ny nandritra ireo tantara efa nilalaovany. ||| There was a lively ovation, as during all the plays he had been in.
Androany, nitefotefoka in-droa ny tehaka. ||| Today, the applause sounded twice.
Ny voalohany, tamin'i (Nikolay Karachentsov, mpilalao hafa, izay naratra mafy noho ny lozam-pifamoivoizana tamin'ny 2005) tonga hanao veloma mandra-pihaona. ||| The first time, when (Nikolay Karachentsov, another famous actor, who was severely injured in a 2005 car accident) came to say good-bye.
Sahaza tokoa io amiko. ||| I guess this was appropriate.
Latsaka ny ranomasoko tamin'ny nitondràna ny vatapaty: mitoetra mafy miaraka amintsika izy ary tsy mety ampiarahana amin'ny sariny ny fahafatesana. ||| I shed a tear when the coffin was carried out: he remains deep within us all and it's impossible to associate his image with death.
Fahatsiarovana mamibe ho azy! ||| Loving memory to him!

Tany ho anao koa aho. ||| I was there for you, too.
Amin'ny ankapobeny, tsy dia mandeha matetika amina hetsika toy ireny aho. ||| In general, I don't go to such events often.
Nanatrika ny (fanaovam-beloma farany an'i Boris Yeltsyn) - ary androany... ||| Was at (Boris Yeltsyn 's farewell ceremony) - and today...
Shina: Fiampangana voalohany 'Jasmin' ||| China: First 'Jasmine' Sentence Handed Down
Nivoaka androany ny didim-pitsarana voalohany ilay mpikatroka miaro ny zon'ny sarambambe ao Chengdu, Li Shuangde, 47 taona, taorian'ny fisamborana sy fitazonana azy matetika nandritra ity lohataona ity. Li Shuangde ||| The first sentence has been handed down today following the many arrests and detentions this spring, to 47-year-old Chengdu legal rights activist Li Shuangde.
Taorian'ny fitazomana azy nanomboka tamin'ny 23 martsa, nohelohina ho nanao hosoka"carte de crédit" i M. Li tamin'ny Alarobia teo ary voasazy higadra mandritra ny efa-bolana sy handoa lamandy 20.000 RMB. ||| Following his detention on March 23, Li was convicted Wednesday on charges of credit card fraud and sentenced to four months in prison and fined RMB 20,000.
Araka ny hevitry ny "fikambanana mpiaro ny zon'olombelona Shinoa", dia azo iverenana amin'ny lasa ny didim-pitsarana an'i M. Li ka tokony ho tapitra amin'ny faran'ny volana jolay izao ny saziny. ||| According to legal rights organization Chinese Human Rights Defenders, Li's prison sentence applies retroactively and his term will be up in late July.
Noeritreretina tontosaina talata maraina ny fotoam-pitsarana an'i M. Li tamin'ny voalohany, saingy araka ny nambaran'ireo mpanohana azy sy ny mpisolo vava azy taloha Ran Tong, nahemotra indray izany raha nahare ny fikasan'ny mpisolovava ny "maitre" Ran hiantso fa tsy meloka Atoa. Li ny filohan'ny Fitsarana. ||| Li's day in court was originally scheduled for Tuesday morning, but according to Li's supporters and former lawyer, Ran Tong, the trial was postponed after the presiding judge learned that Ran intended to plead not guilty on Li's behalf.
Tonga tao amin'ny fitsarana ny mpanohana an'i Xing Qingxian tamin'ny talata, ary nanoratra ity tantara fohy ity: ||| Supporter Xing Qingxian was at the courthouse Tuesday, and wrote this account:
Ny 31 mey, tamin'ny 8:50 aho dia efa tonga teo am-bavahadin'ny tribonaly ao amin'ny Districta Jinjiang, izay efa nohavaozina. ||| On May 31, I arrived early at 8:50 at the entrance to the Jinjiang District courthouse, which was being renovated.
Ara-dalàna tsara avokoa ny tao anatin'ny fitsarana, fa tsy mora tezitezitra tahaka ny fotoam-pitsarana nandehananay taloha. ||| Things inside the courthouse were normal, not nervous like when we'd arrived for court before.
Reko tamin'ny mpahay lalàna iray fotoana fohy taty aoriana fa amin'ny 11 ora vao hanomboka ny fotoam-pitsarana, araka izany dia namonjy toeram-pisotroana dité teo akaiky teo aloha izaho sy ireo namana niaraka tamiko tany mba hiandry ny fotoana. ||| Later I heard from the lawyer that court would go into session at 11, so the friends I'd come with and I went to a nearby teahouse to have some tea and wait.
Tamin'ny 10:45, niditra teo amin'ny fidirana toeram-pisavana izahay ary niakatra tao an-dalantsara ao amin'ny rihana faharoa, izay nahitanay ny renin'i Li Shuangde, niresaka kely izahay mialoha ny idirana ao amin'ny efitra fitsarana laharana faha-5. ||| At 10:45 we went in through the court security check and up to the hall on the second floor of the court. There we saw Li Shuangde's mother and chatted for a bit before going into courtroom number 5.
Kelikely ny efitra ka tsy nisy toerana ho an'ny olona olona taminay. ||| Jijiang Court summons to court for the date May 31, 2011
Teo ampidirana dia nahita tovovavy nifantina taratasy izahay, angamba ny mpiandraikitra ny tahirin-taratasim-pitsarana izy i. Mbola tsy tonga tao ny mpitsara, ka niandry hatramin'ny 11ora sy fahefany izahay avy eo niditra ihany ilay mpitsara vavy antsoina hoe Lǚ ka namonjy ny toerany. ||| As we went in we saw a young woman sorting some papers, possibly the court secretary. The judge hadn't yet arrived, so we waited until about 11:15 and then judge Lǚ came in and sat down.
Nijery ireo antonta-taratasy izy dia nivoaka avy eo. ||| She looked through some files, then went out.
Minitra vitsy taty aoriana, nisy mpitsara lahy niditra indray ary niteny hoe ny raharaha izay sahaniny aloha no hodinihina voalohany, ka niangavy anay izy mba hiala tao amin'ny efitra. ||| A bit later, a male judge came in and said his cases would go to session first, and asked us to leave.
Teo ampialana ny efitra dia nahita jiolahy tanora maromaro nentina hotsaraina tao izahay. ||| As we left we saw several young criminals being brought in.
Niandry ela tao an-dalantsara izahay, avy eo nisy mpitsara vavy nanatona anay nilaza fa tsy anio no hotontosaina ny raharaha momba an'i Li, ka tokony hody daholo izahay ary miandry ny fampilazana manaraka. ||| We waited out in the hall, and some time later a female judge came to notify us that Li's trial would not be held today and that we should go and wait for further notice.
Nanontany ny anton' izany ny mpisolovava Ran Tong, ka hoy ilay mpitsara nanatona anay hoe efa nivonona ny hiarotena izy fa tsy meloka, ka tokony hiantso ny fianakaviany izy mba hanatrika ny fitsarana ary hanohana ny fandehan-draharaha. ||| Lawyer Ran Tong asked why, and the judge said that seeing as we he was prepared to make a plea of not guilty, that they needed to contact (Li's) family to appear in court to support the proceedings.
Na i Ran Tong na ny namana iray ao amin'ny fianakaviana no nilaza tamin'ny mpitsara fa tsy nisy olona nilaza fa niantso ny tsy mahameloka azy izy, ary te-hanamarina izy ireo fa nilaza izany tokoa i Li Shuangde, te-hahita raha izany tokoa no faniriany. ||| Both Ran Tong and a friend of the family told the judge that nobody had said they were going plead not guilty, and also that they wanted confirmation that Li Shuangde had confessed, to see if that was his true wish.
Nanadihady ireo porofo momba ny toe-draharaha i Ran Tong ka tsapany fa tsy meloka mihitsy i Li Shuangde. ||| Ran Tong had studied the evidence submitted for the case and felt that Li Shuangde wasn't guilty.
Amin'ny maha mpahay lalàna azy tsy misy fomba tsy ahafantaran'i Li Shuangde mihitsy fa tsy heloka velively ny zavatra nataony. ||| As a legal professional, there was no way that Li Shuangde wouldn't have known that his actions hadn't constituted any crime.
Voamarina koa izany ao amin'ny porofo nentin'ny fampanoavana, tsy misy dikany mazava ny fiaiken-keloka nataon'i Li Shuangde, na izahay koa no tsy nahazo ny tiany ambara. ||| Judging also from the evidence submitted by the prosecution, Li Shuangde's confession made no sense, and nor did we understand it.
Satria tara vao voarain'i Ran Tong ny taratasy fampiantsoana avy amin'ny tribonaly, dia tsy nanam-potoana nihaonana mialoha tamin'i Li Shuangde intsony izy, fa nanantena fa mbola afaka hanadihady azy amin'ny fotoam-pitsarana. ||| As Ran Tong had received notice from the court rather late, there hadn't been any time for him to meet with Li Shuangde beforehand, and he hoped to be able to question him in court.
Nilaza tamin'ny mpitsara ny mpisolovava Ran Tong fa raha niaiky ny helony Li Shuangde, ka tena izay tokoa no fikasany ao anatiny, dia tsy hisolo vava an'i Li manoloana ny fitsarana izy. ||| Lawyer Ran Tong told the judge that if Li Shuangde had confessed, and that was his true intent, then he would not represent Li in court.
Tsy nanaiky izany ilay mpitsara. ||| The judge wouldn't agree.
Nisakafo maikamaika izahay, avy eo nihazakazaka teny amin'ny fonja ny mpisolovava Ran Tong, nanantena hahita ani' Li Shuangde ary hanontany azy izay tena tadiaviny tokoa, ary koa ny ampahafantatra azy ny porofo rehetra momba ny toe-draharaha. ||| We quickly ate some lunch, and then lawyer Ran Tong rushed over the the detention center, hoping both to meet with Li Shuangde and ask him what his true wishes were, as well as to update him regarding the evidence in the case.
Kanefa nilaza ny tao amin'ny fonja fa tsy ao intsony i Li Shuangde fa efa nafindra toeran-kafa, ary tsy mahazo vangiana na tsidihina izy. ||| But the detention center said that Li Shuangde had already been transfered to another facility, and wasn't being allowed to meet with anyone.
Ary ny tena nahavariana dia niantso an'i Ran Tong tamin'ny antso an-tariby ny renin'i Li Shuangde avy eo ary nangataka azy mba tsy hiverina hijery an'i Li Shuangde intsony. ||| Even stranger, Li Shuangde's mother called Ran Tong shortly thereafter and told him not to go back to see Li Shuangde again.
Niverina nankany amin'ny fonja izay nitazonana an'i M.Li i Ran ny alarobia maraina, ary nilaza azy ny tompon'andraikitra tao fa efa nentina any amin'ny fitsarana any amin'ny Distrikan'i Jijiang izy ary efa nomena mpisolovava vaovao. Taratasy fampiantsona an'i Jijiang ho avy any amin'ny tribonaly amin'ny 31 mey2011 ||| Ran returned Wednesday morning to the detention center where Li had been held, and was told by staff there that Li had already been taken to the Jijiang District court and assigned a new lawyer.
Enimbolana voalohan'ny Rising Voices ||| The First Six Months of Rising Voices
Tahaka antsika efa vonona ny hiditra ao amin'ny taona 2008, dia hankalaza ny fahaenimbolana voalohany nisiany ny Rising Voices. ||| As we all get ready to enter 2008, Rising Voices celebrates its first six months of existence.
Isaorana indrindra ny fahalalaha-tanan'ny Fanorenana John S. sy James L. Knight nahafahan'ny Rising Voices nanolotra fanampiana madinika ireo tetikasa fampiroboroboana ny fantsom-panomezam-baovaon'olom-pirenena dimy miorina any Bangladesh, India, Sierra Leone, Bolivia, ary Colombia. ||| Thanks to the generous support of the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation, Rising Voices has been able to distribute microgrants to five citizen media outreach projects based in Bangladesh, India, Sierra Leone, Bolivia, and Colombia.
Nahasarika mpanao gazetin'olom-pirenena nihoatra ny 100 avy amina fiaraha-monina tsy nahalala izay fisian'ny resaka ankapobeny manerantany mihitsy ireo tetikasa ireo raha atambatra. ||| Collectively those five projects have trained over 100 new citizen journalists from communities that previously never entered the online global conversation.
Tsara ihany koa ny mametraka ireo mpamaham-bolongana vaovao ireo tsy ho loharanom-baovao madinidinika avy aty ivelany ihany, fa mba hiheverana azy ireo ho namana sy mpifanolo-bodi-rindrina amin'ity izao tontolo izao mihakely ity. ||| It is worth getting to know each new blogger not just as a source of under-reported foreign news, but also as a neighbor and friend in our rapidly shrinking world.
Fantaro ry Carmen, mpitia tononkalo sy literatiora, avy any amin'ny vohitry ny sarangan'ny mpiasa manodidina an'i La Loma any Medellín, Kolombia. ||| Get to know Carmen, a lover of poetry and literature, from the hillside working class neighborhood of La Loma in Medellín, Colombia.
Vakio ny tantaran'i Suso – mpanangon-javatra azo ahodina any La Loma (ihany). ||| Discover the story of Suso - La Loma's local recyclables collector.
Andeha mihaona amin'i Cristina Quisbert izay mamaham-bolongana mila ho isan'andro any amin'ny tanàna voaorina amin'ny toerana avo indrindra manerantany ao El Alto, Bolivia. ||| Meet Cristina Quisbert who now blogs almost every day from the world's highest major city, El Alto, Bolivia.
Ny any Dhaka any Bengladesh indray no misy ny Nari Jibon center izay mitari-dalana ireo tanora vavy toa an'i Sifat Binte Qaiyum sy i Ayesha Parveen hanangona ny tantaran'ny faritra (fiaraha-monina) sy ny tsirairay avy amin'ny alalan'ny aterineto. ||| Or head to Dhaka, Bangladesh where the Nari Jibon center is training young women like Sifat Binte Qaiyum and Ayesha Parveen how to document their personal and community stories with online media.
Eo atsimo andrefan'i Bengladesh eo no ahitantsika ny Neighbourhood Diaries (Isan'andron'ny manodidina) tetikasa maka toerana ao Kolkata, India. ||| Just southwest of Bangladesh we find the Neighbourhood Diaries project taking place in Kolkata, India.
Na dia samy efa manana ny bolongana fahanany avy aza ny mpandray anjara folo ao amin'ny neighbourhood of Bow Bazaar, dia mbola mampahafantatra azy ireo tsirairay avy ihany ny lehiben'ny tetikasa Sahar Romani. ||| Though the ten participants in the neighbourhood of Bow Bazaar have yet to start writing on their own blogs, project leader Sahar Romani has introduced us to each one.
Ohatra horaisintsika i Surojit Mitra 16 taona: ||| Take 16-year-old Surojit Mitra, for example:
Mpianatra ao amin'ny Sekoly ambonin'ny Bow Bazaar i Surojit. ||| Surojit is a student at Bow Bazaar Highschool.
Tiany ny dihinkarana(?) sy mihaino mozika rehefa manana fotoa-malalaka izy. ||| During his free time he loves to coreograph dances and listen to music.
Fantatra amin'ny fihomehiny sy ny fanarahiny ny dihinkarana ao Sanlaap. ||| He is known for his laughter and his coreography in Sanlaap programmes.
Ny zavatra iray tsy fantatry ny be sy ny maromomba azy dia indray ihany izy tsy afa-panadinana. ||| One thing that no one knows about him is that, once he failed an exam.
Tamin'ny lahatsoratra farany navoakany ny ahitantsika fa ny tian'i Surojit ho famantarana an'i Bow Bazaar dia ny Punjabi Hotel. ||| In a later post we learn that Surojit's favorite landmark of Bow Bazaar is the Punjabi Hotel.
Izao no nosoratany: ||| Here's his description:
Arakaraky ny hanatonanao ny Panjabi Hotel no handrenesanao ny tabataban'ny olona mizotra mankany. ||| As soon as you reach the Punjabi Hotel, what you hear first is the sound of conversations and the din of people who are going in.
Misy tsio-drivotra malefaka ihany koa mitondra ny hanitry ny sakafo isankarazany avy ao. ||| A light wind brings the smell of various food items to my nose.
Hitanao ireo mpivarotra kiraro sy ireo legioma isankarazany voavidy sy voavarotra. ||| You can see shoe shops, the vegetables in the market being bought and sold.
Ny nahandro ahafantarana ny trano fandraisam-bahiny sy ny fuchka. ||| The touch of food items from the hotel and the fuchka.
Efa niorina hatry ny ela io trano fandraisam-bahiny io. ||| It is a very old hotel.
Vao nohavaozina vao haingana izy, na iza na iza mahalala izany avokoa. ||| Earlier it was renowned, everyone knew of it.
Ankoatra izay moa dia naman'ny reniko ihany koa ny tompon'io toerana io. ||| Besides, the proprietor of the place was a friend of my mother's.
Ary farany dia hitodika any amin'ny Think Build Change Salone (mieritreritra hanangana, Hanova ny Salone?) ||| Finally, make sure to head to the Think Build Change Salone in Freetown, Sierra Leone.
ao Freetown, Sierra Leone isika. Hamarino anie ny saripikan'i Noah Dauda amin'ny famatsiana madinika sy ny haizatran'i Emmanuel Joseph mamokatra loharanombaovao fanadihadiana any amin'ny faritra atsinanan'ny faritanin'i Kenema, Kailahun ary Kono. ||| Make sure to check out Noah Dauda's photographs of microfinance traders and Emmanuel Joseph's experience producing a documentary in the eastern provinces of Kenema, Kailahun and Kono.

(Efa nampahafantarina vao teo moa ny nahazo fankaherezana dimy hafa indray). ||| A sense of purpose and community has developed within each group.

Rosia: Ny zava-niainan'ny mpitoraka bilaogy Isiraeliana tany amin'ny Hopitaly Rosiana ||| Russia: Adventures of Israeli Blogger in Russian Hospital
Ny lalantsaran'ny hopitaly "malaza"-n'i Voronezh. ||| The hallway of the "famous" hospital in Voronezh.
Sary nalain'i dorinem. ||| Photo by dorinem.
Betsaka ireo olona miaina ny fiainany ka tsy manam-potoana akory ny hijery ireo zavatra fahita amin'ny andavanandro amin'ny fomba fijery vahiny. ||| Many people live their lives without an opportunity to look at everyday things from unusual perspective.
Indraindray mila mankany ivelany ianao vao mahalala kokoa ny zavatra nataonao na tsia tany an-tranonao. ||| Sometimes it takes traveling abroad to better understand what you have or don't have at home.
Fa indraindray kosa, vahiny mitoraka bilaogy mikasika ireo zavatra niainany tany amin'ny hopitaly no mamaritra "ny marina manindrona" mikasika ny firenenao. ||| But sometimes it takes a foreigner blogging about her experiences in a hospital to pinpoint the "shocking truth" about your country.
Na dia tsy hoe "vahiny" loatra aza no tena teny famaritana mety ho an'ny mpitoraka bilaogy, i dorinem izay teraka tany Ukraine ary nandany 16 taona tany talohan'ny nifindrany tao Isiraely izay nahitany trano vaovao indray tamin'ny taona 1993. ||| Although "a foreigner" may not be the most accurate description of a blogger dorinem who was born in Ukraine and spent there 16 years before moving to Israel where she found a new home in 1993.
Miteny Rosiana misosasosa ny tovovavy ary fantany ny lalana manodidina ny Firaisana Sovietika. ||| The young women speaks perfect Russian and knows her way around the former Soviet Union.
Nandeha tany Rosia izy vao haingana nitsidika ireo havany. ||| She recently traveled to Russia to visit her relatives.
Fa faharatrana tampoka no nanova ireo drafitry ny diany ary nentina tany amin'ny hopitaly tany Voronezh izy, tanàna any Rosia Atsimo andrefana. ||| But sudden bleeding changed her travel plans and she found herself in a hospital in Voronezh, a city in southwestern Russia.
Mamaritra ny tantaram-piainany tao amin'ny hopitaly Rosiana i Dorinem ao amin'ny LiveJournal.com, toeram-piseraseran'ny bilaogy malaza indrindra eo amin'ny firenena. ||| Dorinem described her adventures in the Russian hospital on LiveJournal.com, the most popular blogging platform in the country.
Lasa nalaza tao anatin'ny andro vitsivitsy ireo lahatsoratra tao amin'ny bilaoginy. ||| The blog posts became popular within days.
Niafara tany amin'ireo pejin'ny gazety sy gazety boky ireo fahatsiarovany sy ireo oha-pitenenany. ||| Her recollections and quotes ended up on the pages of newspapers and magazines.
Niitatra nanjary adihevitra nivelatra teo amin'ny firenena ireo resadresaka nanomboka tao amin'ny bilaoginy mikasika ny kalitaon'ny fikarakarana ara-pahasalamana any Rosia. ||| Discussions that started on her blog grew into nation-wide debates on the quality of health care in Russia.
Ary na dia tsy zava-baovao loatra ho an'ireo mponina maro any Rosia aza ny zavatra rehetra nofaritan'i dorinem tao, nanjary nanohana mafy ny olona mihitsy ny nahita fa tsy araka ny tokony ho izy ny ny zavatra ratsy nahazatra azy ireo. ||| And although everything that dorinem described is nothing new for many citizens of Russia, it took an outraged outsider to make people realize that getting used to something horrible doesn't make it normal.
Ny Sabotsy no nanomboka narary ny vehivavy ka nanomboka ho tena faran'izay sarotra ny mahita fanampian'ny matihanina. ||| The woman got sick in Voronezh on Saturday when it turned out to be extremely difficult to find any professional help.
Ity ny fomba nanehoany ny zavatra niainany voalohany tany amin'ny hopitaly: ||| The hospital in question is being investigated and evaluated by different government commissions.
Côte d'Ivoire: Miteraka Romoromo Ny Fanoloana Ny Mpanazatra Zahoui ||| Côte d'Ivoire: Controversy as Manager of National Football Team Replaced (All links forward to French texts unless otherwise stated)
Nanambara ny fanovana ny mitantana ny ekipam-pirenena tamin'ny alatsinainy 28 mey lasa teo ny Fédération Ivoirienne de Football (FIF na Federasiona Ivoariana Baolina Kitra=Fandaka): ||| On Monday May 28, 2012, the Ivorian Football Federation announced a change at the top of the national football team:
Milaza etoana ny Federasiona Ivoarianan'ny Baolina Fandaka, fa manomboka mason'andro anio dia voatondro ho mpanazatra sy mpifantina ny ekipam-pirenena A hisolo an'Atoa François ZAHOUI i Sabri LAMOUCHI. ||| The FIF informed us that from today, Sabri Lamouchi is named Coach and Manager of the National A Team, replacing François Zahoui.
